author: {'steamid': '76561197971214958', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 349, 'last_played': 1711224518}
review: No tutorial, you start out plummeting to the ground without knowing how to get out of it.  Some sort of how to or something to make it somewhat understandable.
developer_response: Hi ddugery58! As you are falling to the ground, a prompt will appear on the right-hand side of the screen telling you to press F to open the parachute. Once you manage to land, you can press Tab and go into the 'Manual' section to read more about the systems and mechanics present in SCUM. However, we acknowledge that there are better ways to convey the game and how it works to the player, which is why the team is working to add some kind of tutorial which will help new players ease into the game. That is why, knowing this, we hope you'll consider giving the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050221229', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 52388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 213, 'playtime_at_review': 52175, 'last_played': 1712419927}
review:
So much potential...waisted.
I have a few thousand hours in since .70, but it has gone down hill. Now the puppets just spawn wherever you are...clear an area and they'll spawn all around you, realism is gone. No more clearing an area and looting, they just drop on you, literally on top of you. I loved this game, but they have taken it a different direction, and as much as I want to play it, it just isn't worth the frustration.
developer_response: Hi ShiVeR! We're sorry to see that the puppet spawning system ruined your time with the game. We acknowledge that this system does not work as intended and you'll be pleased to know that the team is hard at work on tweaking and fixing this system to make it work properly. Also, the team is hard at work on delivering the last content updates, bugfixes and QoL improvements before we hit the 1.0 version of the game, which is why we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance when we manage to get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561199641408093', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 11597, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2647, 'playtime_at_review': 8353, 'last_played': 1712482889}
review: Best game ive ever played

author: {'steamid': '76561198432242310', 'num_games_owned': 5, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2539, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1396, 'playtime_at_review': 1039, 'last_played': 1712497475}
review:
Puppet spawns system is broken. You clear a place and then zombies spawn on you in a few seconds. This is not realistic at all. 
Also impossible to use a gun.. You clear a place, make one shot and zombies spawn a horde... Sniping  was killed since zombies are seen only when you get near them.  Do not order this till these things are fixed.   Devs made an update and ruined all they have created before.  UNPLAYABLE ATM.
developer_response: We're well aware of the issues that the horde update has brought with itself and we'd like to emphasize that the team is hard at work to tweak the puppet spawning as soon as possible.

author: {'steamid': '76561199246966304', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 42862, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42862, 'last_played': 1710773803}

author: {'steamid': '76561198247891420', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 5543, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 533, 'playtime_at_review': 5010, 'last_played': 1711765237}
review: Still some work to be done, melee combat is quite buggy and doesn't register hits even when you're quite literally next to the zombie, speaking of which, during your scuffle they do have the tendency to suddenly turn into prime Mike Tyson and pivot right behind you, create an angle and left hook you out of nowhere. Besides that, there's the annoying ,,someone killed you in a driveby while being passenger and your loot disappears even though your friend evaded your assailants and normally it should still be there" part, not a lot of vehicles to choose from, the hordes respawn like three real time minutes after you get rid of them, and some guns (especially shotguns) are quite shaky. Still, on the bright side, overall it's still an enjoyable experience, even though there's still room for improvement, and I have hope that by the time the full release date comes around it will be the best version possible. Good Day-Z alternative.

While we do not know what exactly made you strongly dislike the game, we'd like to emphasize that the game is still in Early access and that we still have a lot of work to do before we manage to hit the 1.0 version of SCUM. Before we manage to get there, the team will be focusing on delivering the last promised content addition and features. Also, we'll make sure to fix the underlying bugs that are present in the game, and that it is as optimized and polished as possible. author: {'steamid': '76561198131335208', 'num_games_owned': 55, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 87131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 226, 'playtime_at_review': 86887, 'last_played': 1712093907}
review:
Spend a LOT of hours on this game, saw good stuff taken away, bad stuff put back.
And with that even more bad things happen. NPC's CHEAT (and yes they are programmed to do so)
when the player is clever and finds a way without damage to defeat the zombie, it miraculously TELEPORTS behind the player and hits him in the back..... Nice eh? Snipers in the SP were void. Sniping was no longer possible due to changes made and NOT rolled back even after tenthousands of complaints about it from the community. These people dont care about creating a good, fair and playable game. They are only interested in taking your money. DO NOT BUY IT!! its NOT worth it. Seriously.
And its a waste of your time...... and your money!
developer_response: Hi G4BBER4LIFE! We're sorry to see that you've experienced some issues with the puppets. The issue you've mentioned sounds like the server had a hiccup which made the puppet look like it teleported behind you. This is definitely not intended. As for the sniping, this was implemented in order to optimize the overall experience. We understand and acknowledge that these are not popular decisions, but they were made with the intention to secure the proper functioning of the game. As we'll be nearing the 1.0 version and optimizing it prior to the final release, we'll have much more leeway to return some of these functionalities back in the game. That is why we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance - at least when we'll manage to get to the full 1.0 version of SCUM.

developer_response: Hi The Lone Wanderer! We're sorry to see that you feel the game is progressively becoming worse. While we can understand where some of this sentiment comes from, we'd like to reassure you that we fully intend to create a satisfying and rewarding hardcore survival experience. We also intend to fix the underlying issues and bugs that are ruining the game for some players and to introduce a host of QoL improvements and optimizations that will make the game more polished and run even better. That being said, we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198176598726', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2212, 'last_played': 1711143045}
review: Simulator Runner! this game not fun at all! run, Loot, Die, Run! its all about this!
developer_response: Hi THAMANICH! We're sorry to see that you did not find enjoyment with SCUM. If you want to find challenge in it, try finding a police station or a bunker in order to loot its content to find some firepower and then, try to brave one of the abandoned bunkers in the game to see what horrors lie within. We're still yet to add some of the content that we've promised to implement prior or with the 1.0 release of the game and we are on course to deliver just that. With that in mind, we hope that you'll give SCUM another chance and that you'll find something to enjoy in it.

review: the game is so inconsistent i rather play dayz just cause it works better in this game when servers kick u out and you try and load back in your character is reset all the way to the beginning and  when zombies scream they dont call other ssh you and the only way to get weapons and ammo is thru lock picking and you can never find the stuff for it this game looks and feels better than dayz but i rather play dayz than this due to the frustration of inconsistencies
developer_response: HI 6Bluddy6Wulf6! We're sorry to see that you've found the game to be disappointing. While the game has its underlying issues, the team is working to iron them out as we'll be nearing the full release of SCUM. As for the specific issue with being kicked out and having to start with a player, we'd like to kindly ask you to write a ticket via https://scum.help.jagex.com/hc/en-gb and explain in detail what happened in order to ensure that there was a bug. That being said, we hope that you'll consider giving SCUM another chance and that you'll contact us with this potential issue.

review: игра норм, НО! багов хватает с головой! часто промахи сквозь врагов (зомби) ДЛС дико дорогие для такого шлака. игра и так не 50р стоит, а еще и платные фишки ввели типа красить тачки ПЛАТНО! совсем а..х.ли ? я думал майл групп жадные выродки, а тут еще и скам натягивает еврейскую нотку..была бы игра бесплатная или рублей 500, то понимаю о платном ДЛС, но тут такая дичь конечно..разрабы пытаются что то исправить, а в итоге ломают то что работало ДО, а ты жди мечтай в купленной игре, к слову которая в разработке уже не первый год весит! есть функция скрина с игры прям на стим страничку, однако если скрин неугоден, то его удалят и выдадут бан за свою же игровую механнку, в сообществе игры) ишаки тупые) було куча техники крутой, все убрали зачем то...ну хоть пикапы вернули. крч там под пивком сидят ребятки и допиливают всякие ДЛС и обновы...

author: {'steamid': '76561198025824045', 'num_games_owned': 1307, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 11006, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10995, 'last_played': 1711094140}
review: Coming from someone looking for a game like H1Z1 Just Survive, i am very satisfied, this is a very good survival game, as of the time of this review i have played almost 200 hours and probably will play hundreds more, BUT it has a very serious problem with disappearing items, both by design and bugs, cars and other very useful items disappear after a few days, around 2 weeks, this should not be a thing, at most they should deteriorate over time, you should not be held hostage by a game, corpses, either yours or of players that you kill also disappear, in this case, after a few minutes, horrible and unacceptable, and i hope they change that.
developer_response: Hi Gr8Gr3yM! Thank you for your review and for enjoying the game. We're aware of the issue with the disappearing items and we'll make sure to iron this out by the time we manage to get to the 1.0 version of SCUM. As for the cars and bodies, this is currently set in this manner for optimization purposes. However, as we'll be further optimizing the game, we'll look potential opportunities for making increasing some of these times. That being said, we hope that this will not discourage you from the game entirely and that you'll continue enjoying SCUM.

author: {'steamid': '76561198130296738', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 23880, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2129, 'playtime_at_review': 20268, 'last_played': 1711747536}
review:
Damals 16€ für ein Early Access Game was in meinen Augen schon einiges zu bieten hatte.
Ein Metabolismus System hinzuzufügen ist krass aber auch jetzt das customizen von Fahrzeugen, Das Kochsystem was dazu kam aber auch das Farming System haben mich sehr überrascht

Ich würde mir noch wünschen das man einen Update herausbringt was den Titel "Iron Pump" trägt.
Es erhöht den Stärke cap auf 10 und bringt Protein Shakes, Steoride, Gewichte zum trainieren und verschiedene locations in Städten mit wo es dann Gyms geben soll wo man diese Sachen finden kann.

Es wäre auch cool vielleicht mehr mit dem Faust Kampf machen zu können vielleicht neue Kampfstyles wie Karate, Wrestling oder Kung Fu die man an verschiedene Locations von einem Meister erlernen kann der dich nur als Schüler annimmt wenn du Vorraussetzungen wie "Töte 100 Infizierte mit Brawling und habe 3 Stärke etc"  womit du dann die Grundhaltung bekommst und deine Schläge/Tritte anders aussehen aber auch Moves hinzukommen wie beim Wrestling zum Beispiel den "Suplex"

Meinung dazu würde ich gerne wissen.

author: {'steamid': '76561199630096787', 'num_games_owned': 4, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2528, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 910, 'playtime_at_review': 227, 'last_played': 1712277487}
review: 报完

author: {'steamid': '76561198166867968', 'num_games_owned': 193, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 3221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1939, 'playtime_at_review': 1259, 'last_played': 1712499191}
review:
Игру губят лаги, баги и китайские читеры. Прошло уже 3 года, а транспорт всё также уходит под землю, оружие теряется, лута мало, бегать с одного конца карты до другого - утомляет. Я вижу, что здесь действительно поле экспериментов, да, возможностей много, но помимо игровых механик существует ещё и сам геймплей. А геймплей наполнен статтерами, нехваткой ресурсов, причём, частенько искусственной нехваткой ресурсов, могли бы в ящиках побольше рандомно накидывать. Проблема с отображением карты, что она становится белой.
Это весь SCUM. Я игры беру не чтобы страдать, я развлекаюсь в симуляции, но здесь развлечений нет. Одни мучения. Мне хватило 20 часов, чтобы понять, что такая игра вообще не заслуживает быть популярной и такой дорогой по цене. Киберпанк на старте лучше был. Да, сравнивать игры нельзя, но я сравниваю их в ценовой категории. Если разработчики SCUM пытаются из себя строить "больших игроделов", то стоило бы поучиться у других. Сейчас я вижу их, как маленькую инди-студию, которая выпускает игры за невообразимо высокую цену, делая вид, что у них всё чётко работает.

review: 一款超强硬核生存游戏，在游戏中，不仅需要对付烦人的丧尸，如果在pvp中还要提防老六，可以说非常的有难度。不过生存类游戏中，这款算顶流之一吧，游戏可玩性极高，可以在pve中悠闲生存，也可以在pvp中进行紧张刺激的攻防。建议最好是跟几个朋友一起玩，不然被杀，一切重新来！dlc推荐刀男，建议练体。需要各位帅哥美女的点赞，祝你们身体健康，阖家欢乐，感谢！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198289748959', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 10187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 7873, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1712471506}
review:
Initially I said I did not recommend this game in its current state. Well after playing it a little longer, I have changed my mind. This game has a way of sucking you in the longer you play. The game is challenging, and rewards patience. 

Here's what I'd like to see after the full release:

1. Living NPCs walking around the world. Friendly and unfriendly. Maybe NPCs doing random things like hunting an animal, fighting puppets, attempting to rob the player, or repairing a vehicle. Things that give the illusion of a living world. 

2. Perhaps some tweaks to the hunting system. Although I like a good challenge, currently it feels broken. Though this game does challenge you to get better overtime, and I do like that about it, I have serious issues just tracking an animal. Maybe a higher encounter rate would suffice? I'm not sure. 

Anyway, great game overall. I am looking forward to the full release. I'd like to see this become a $60 game eventually. I want this game to be the best open world survival game on steam, and it does have things going for it. 

Good luck devs.
developer_response: Hi divsection! Thank you for leaving your feedback and we're sorry to see that the game currently feels boring for you. You'll be pleased to know that the human NPC's are actually one of the last promised features that will find their way into the game. These will help to further enrich the core gameplay and bring more variety into it. Also, we'll make sure to further support the game after we get out of Early access, which is why we hope that you'll be there with us and that you will be enjoying your time in SCUM.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084623033', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1786, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 260, 'playtime_at_review': 1368, 'last_played': 1711638361}
review:
"Are you really shitting on the floor of our base??" 
If you played early Dayz SA and liked it then you'll like this game. Only negative is servers are either dead (0-5 people) or max pop amazing ping rates compared to most games. Takes a few hours to learn the zombie mechanics/types but if you've played a few different zombie games in your time you'll catch on quick.

review:
Nachdem ich fünfmal, gestorben bin, bekam ich psychische, Probleme.

Rage quit im petto definitiv 

wenn man vor eine horde, weg rennt. 
und man den 10m von einer Klippe.
 runter springt denkt man man wäre tot. 
aber man überlebt es im Gedanken. 
haste dein Charakter. schon im Grab gesehen. 
zwar halb tot aber erstmal geschafft.
 und dann stirbt man wieder wegen, einem dummen, Fehler.
so läuft es  holt es euch wird. euch, echte Freude bereiten. 
besonders. wenn BOOM, BOOM kommt. und euch in. die Luft, sprengt. :D

review:

그리고 무엇보다도 한글화가 되어있다고해서 샀는데, 쓸때없는 옵션, 게임시작, 이런것만 되어있고 정작 중요한 스킬트리나 스킬설명은

author: {'steamid': '76561198304964983', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 77236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77236, 'last_played': 1706713500}
review: There is loads of potential but the game is fundamentally broken and lacks any long term substance. New things are added constantly and things that work are removed and replaced by buggy gameplay which results in hotfix after hotfix to try correct the issues. DLC,s are the order of the day and they seem to be the priority for the dev team.
developer_response: Hi Dr_KATZ! We're sorry to see that you're disappointed with the game and we acknowledge the criticism put forth. Some of the things that were added do not function as intended, but the team will be doing their best to fix these, as well as other underlying issues that are still present as we'll be nearing the full 1.0 version. Also, we'd like to provide some clarification regarding the DLCs and confirm that they are completely optional, cosmetic-only in nature and that they do not give any unfair advantage to those that have them. Also, we'd like to point out that they do not detract the team from the overall development of the game and that everything's progressing as it should. That being said, we hope that we've dispelled some uncertainties and that you'll consider giving the game another chance once we manage to get to the full 1.0 release of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960429884', 'num_games_owned': 484, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 71156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71156, 'last_played': 1710716173}
review:
I can no longer recommend this game until the developers get their act together and fix all the major problems they are creating.

They broke the spawn system completely and made  puppet spawns completely insane and all kinds of buggy,  meanwhile several patches go by with no fix and they release a new DLC.

They ruined the hunting system and replaced it with some mini-game that nobody likes.

Also as of late they have started clamping down on issuing any kind of negative criticism on their Steam forums and will lock thread / delete posts  for  giving strongly worded opinions.  Arguing that you are being offensive or some stupid reason like that.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992601258', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2307, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2307, 'last_played': 1710964236}
review:
The community is a huge part of an MMO. Sadly, it's a lot about PvP and a very toxic place to be in...
Prepare to get betrayed, justified with nationalistic, religious, rasistic or political reasons that have nothing todo with the game.
Can not recommend unless you want that, and then, why wouldn't you go with e.g. EFT or other games that at least pay more attention to PvP aspects and factors. Plus PvP in this game feels like a 10 or 20 year old game... not really anything a sane person would want to play for PvP.
developer_response: Hi geekazoid! We're sorry to hear that you had an bad encounter with this kind of people and that this ruined your time with the game. We'd like to emphasize that the team promptly reacts to these kinds of occurrences and that we dish out swift sanctions against them. If you encounter more of these, please report them via https://support.scumgame.com/ and our team will do everything they can in order to prevent players from expressing themselves in that manner. With all that being said, we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance and we hope that you'll contact us if you'll encounter something like this again.

author: {'steamid': '76561199162840936', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 23939, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21668, 'last_played': 1711230185}

author: {'steamid': '76561198956246405', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6873, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 729, 'playtime_at_review': 4029, 'last_played': 1712260940}
review:
This is a great game!! if you enjoy open world id highly suggest this for your next purchase-
there is near endless amount of stuff to do, awesome weapons to collect, numerous amount of vehicles to drive, and with a very life like health system, can be quite a challenge to keep up with at times, but it truly adds a awesome new mechanic which is quite original to most open world games ive played.

awesome story in my opinion, i love the enemies and wild life that that keep you on your toes.
 and i greatly enjoy the supportive community.

I do hope the developers fix the problem with the puppet spawning, but that's my only major complaint so far.

author: {'steamid': '76561199241629632', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1891, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 334, 'playtime_at_review': 878, 'last_played': 1711584818}
review:
Después de muchas hora en Dayz, acabe jugando Scum...

review: 整体体验太磨叽，很多地方的交互纯属恶心人，强行拉长游戏时间，真的烦！！！比如1.载具交互，慢，太偏向形式主义，2.枪械、换弹速度，太拖拉，很多时候真没心情“欣赏”换单过程，3.建筑，对齐BUG太严重，乱吸附，建筑模块和可放置物品花样也不够多，对于可放置的要求要求太严格，一层如果太外观不协调，建筑过程堪比上刑，不断重复的空旷，二层基本就放不了什么建筑模块了！！！多步骤选取建筑模块，生存游戏，时间就是生命，干脆利索直达目标才是生存，又TM不是跟僵尸度假！！！交互这块不知道什么是利索可以借鉴一下隔壁RUST！

review: Игра очень интересная, словно твой пахан ушёл за хлебом и не вернулся, ведь чтобы дойти до магазина нужно обойти китайскую стену. Это не игра, а симулятор нажми су2цид 15 раз, чтобы тебя закинуло в нужный тебе сектор. Тебя от5издили 4 зомби, соизволь пробежать полторы тысячи км до нужного сектора. Умер пока бежал, соизволь нажать су2цид ещё 6 раз и если тебе повезет, ты всё таки появишься в нужном тебе секторе, пока ты летел тебя чмэкнули, не беда, ведь ты закаленный мужчина с завода, выпивший 3 бутылки пива и ты снова нажмешь эту проклятую кнопку рестарта.

developer_response: Hi moinLuis! We're sorry to see that the game was not to your liking. We'll take the liberty to conclude that you had a hard time with grasping how the game works and how to approach it. This is understandable as we unfortunately do not have a tutorial that would ease the player into the game's mechanics. We'd also like to reassure you that we will indeed be adding something that will help new players and make the learning curve less steep sometime down the line. In the meantime, you can press the 'Tab' button on your keyboard and go into the 'Manual' section to read about the game's functionalities. Also, if you are new, we'd like to recommend that you try the game in singleplayer first before moving onto PvE and PvP multiplayer so you can get yourself acquainted with the game before you encounter other players. That being said, we hope that these tips were helpful and that you will consider giving the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561199062212066', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 10, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1709268653}
review: Was excited to try it out, had a few hard red flags out of the gate. First character visual customization is extremely limited, cosmetics that would only partially correct this are for sale while the game is incomplete. I will give that the skill and body weight section is interesting. I probably would have given it more of a chance if it at least had partial controller support. It strikes a nerve to see an aspect that lacks in an early access game being remedied through a sale of a lack luster pack instead of expanding on it as it shows the lack of respect for the community that supported you to get you as far as you have. The term early access has been abused to an extreme point, and we're losing faith as consumers in the term because of actions like these.
developer_response: Hi Proud Defender! We're sorry that you found the game lacking to the point of you refunding it. We completely understand and respect your decision. However, we'd like to reassure you that the team does not wish disrespect our community with this longer development cycle. We're very committed to get the game out the door, which is proven by the release of three big updates last year, which means that we are inching ever closer to the full 1.0 version. As for the controller support that is lacking, we'd like to confirm that this feature is a work-in progress and that we'll have it in the game sometime down the line. That being said, we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance sometime in the future when we'll make SCUM even better with all the bugfixes, optimizations and QoL improvements that will find their way into the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561199404465597', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1728, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 31, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1711346076}

author: {'steamid': '76561198160374398', 'num_games_owned': 92, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 5441, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5441, 'last_played': 1710683100}
review:
I think this game has amazing potential but there are so many things that need improving, i play for a bit then delete the game in a vicious cycle. i only have just got to the big guy who just kills me with in seconds of seeing him,  base building needs so much work. being able to customize settings needs work. the fact that the npc have a limit of 10k is insane. by the time i go to visit them i sell and use up the balance in a single hiker backpacks worth. having puppets spawns pretty much on top of me is frustrating ,  i play only single player, the map is great and filled with items, apart from buildings with rooms blocked off and not able to search through them is annoying. whole building and not a single thing to search or explore. 
when exploring bunkers i have noise of razors above me going absolutely mental and all i can hear are them when in the bunkers is driving me insane.
ive had issues with the killbox not spawning any puppets and doing nothing for the whole timer.
this game can be great but has so much work for it to be a great game. i will play it and hope for the best but as far as mid  to end game this is not a fun experience. bunkers are just the worst, and doing any POI are just insufferable.
hope this games 1.0 happens and brings so much great need improvements to the game

author: {'steamid': '76561197965618679', 'num_games_owned': 154, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 29621, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29621, 'last_played': 1708104028}
review:
Als begeisterter Fan von Survival-Spielen war ich angenehm überrascht von meiner Erfahrung mit SCUM. Dieses Early Access-Spiel bietet nicht nur ein intensives Überlebensgameplay, sondern beeindruckt auch mit seiner Grafik.

Das Überlebensaspekt von SCUM ist wirklich herausragend. Von der Notwendigkeit, Nahrung und Wasser zu beschaffen, bis hin zur ständigen Bedrohung durch feindliche Spieler und die Umwelt, bietet das Spiel eine wirklich immersive Erfahrung. Die Welt fühlt sich lebendig an, mit dynamischen Wetterbedingungen und einer Vielzahl von Ressourcen, die es zu entdecken und zu nutzen gilt. Das Balancing zwischen den verschiedenen Bedürfnissen des Charakters sowie die ständige Spannung, die von anderen Spielern ausgeht, halten den Adrenalinspiegel hoch und sorgen für eine konstante Herausforderung.

Was mich jedoch am meisten beeindruckt hat, ist die Grafik von SCUM. Für ein Spiel im Early Access Stadium ist die visuelle Qualität wirklich bemerkenswert. Die Landschaften sind atemberaubend gestaltet, von dichten Wäldern bis hin zu verlassenen Städten, die mit faszinierenden Details gefüllt sind. Die Charaktermodelle und Animationen sind ebenfalls sehr gut gemacht und tragen dazu bei, eine immersive und realistische Spielwelt zu schaffen.

Darüber hinaus ist das Entwicklerteam von SCUM aktiv und engagiert, was sich in regelmäßigen Updates und der Integration von Community-Feedback zeigt. Es ist erfrischend zu sehen, wie sie kontinuierlich an der Verbesserung des Spiels arbeiten und neue Inhalte hinzufügen, um das Spielerlebnis zu erweitern.

Insgesamt kann ich SCUM jedem empfehlen, der ein packendes Survival-Erlebnis sucht. Mit seinem anspruchsvollen Gameplay und seiner beeindruckenden Grafik hat es definitiv das Potenzial, zu einem der besten Spiele seines Genres zu werden.

author: {'steamid': '76561198210903137', 'num_games_owned': 63, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 13936, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 9232, 'playtime_at_review': 1721, 'last_played': 1712396829}
review: É um jogo impressionante que oferece uma experiência de sobrevivência em mundo aberto excepcionalmente detalhada e desafiadora. Com gráficos realistas e mecânicas de jogo complexas, SCUM mergulha os jogadores em um ambiente hostil onde cada decisão importa. A profundidade do sistema de progressão, que inclui aspectos como controle de peso corporal e metabolismo, adiciona uma camada de realismo e imersão que é incomparável. Além disso, a interação entre jogadores, juntamente com a ameaça constante de zumbis, cria um ambiente dinâmico e imprevisível que mantém os jogadores sempre alertas. Com uma comunidade ativa e desenvolvedores dedicados que continuam aprimorando e expandindo o jogo, SCUM é uma experiência que promete horas de diversão e desafio para os fãs de jogos de sobrevivência.

author: {'steamid': '76561199073992512', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 5183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 625, 'playtime_at_review': 1222, 'last_played': 1712077354}

author: {'steamid': '76561197960457050', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 48462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 3765, 'playtime_at_review': 42331, 'last_played': 1712227079}
review: Tries to be a jack of all trades, master of none. Game is fun with friends, but can get boring after a while. As of 0.95 and the "the horde" update, AI is all over the place, walking through walls, spawning 2 metres from players. It's certainly better than the initial 0.95 version, but has a LONG way to go. The "would not recommend" doesn't mean I won't play the game, but it's not a game I could recommend to others in good conscience. It purports itself to have an extensive metabolism system yet lacks sickness from drinking dirty water, or broken limbs, or limb based symptoms (get hit in the arm and it causes you to limp). It feels like every feature is held together with duct tape and glue, that no one feature is ever brought up to at least 90% before a new feature is added. Feels like every feature is 40% complete, and bugs are fixed in the most janky ways possible. (their anti duplication "fix" isn't to just tell one player no you can't have that item, it's to kick one of those players from the server).
developer_response:
Hi Zeus party! We're sorry to see that the game disappointed you. We'd like to point out that the team is aware of that the horde spawning mechanic does not work as intended and that the team is actively working to fix this system so that the puppets will spawn much more organically.

Also, we're sorry that the game feels unfinished to you. SCUM is still in Early access and we have a lot of work to be done until we get to the full 1.0 version of the game. All that being said, we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094025400', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 19279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1, 'playtime_at_review': 18823, 'last_played': 1711335305}
review:
I have over 300 hours in SCUM having played it on and off over a few years. We recently came back for the Horde major update and the game in UNPLAYABLE. Hordes seemingly cant be disabled even after zeroing out every horde option in server settings.

The Hordes themselves are not "hordes" the are just a random number of Puppets that spawn in if you are spotted or make a noise *gunshot* and that will keep spawning in until you hide or die. You can even watch them pop into existence right in front of you.

Cleared a building? Made sure everything was clear? One wrong move and that building is flooding puppets down its previously clear stairs. Want to loot a Mil Base but there's a beeper? If you blow it up, its over.

I have loved this game among the survival crafter genre for years, but this Horde update has rendered the game unplayable.
developer_response: Hi Krãtõs! We're sorry to see that the latest big patch has soured your time with the game. You'll be pleased to know that the team is well aware of the issues with the horde spawning system and that we are actively working on a fix for this. When we'll have that sorted out, the hordes will spawn much more organically and you'll have a much better fighting chance against them. That being said, we truly hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance and that you'll find enjoyment with it again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055336272', 'num_games_owned': 205, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 550, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 550, 'last_played': 1710659067}
review:
[h1]Operators, I have a briefing![/h1]

[b]Overview:[/b]
This is an attempt at a hardcore zombie survival with elements of science fiction. The lore isn't the most interesting for a zombie survival, with pretty basic Sci-Fi (ish) take on things really.

[b][u]Positives:[/u][/b]

[b]Survival Mechanics:[/b] The game has a highly detailed survival experience, with mechanics that go further than hunger and thirst, including bodily functions like metabolism, mineral and vitamins, excretion. [spoiler](You can pee on your enemies)[/spoiler] This realism adds depth to the game play and challenges players to manage their diet. So don't only eat trash food like me.

[b]Character Customization:[/b] The game allows for decent customization of your character, from physical appearance to skills and abilities. This depth of customization adds a personal touch to the gameplay, allowing players to tailor their experience to their preferences a bit. It feels similar to choosing something in fallout for a characters beginning stats. Kinda sorta.

[b]Crafting:[/b] The game has some pretty decent crafting, with different tables and stations allowing you to craft more things than you can with your bare hands. Its a pretty solid formula for crafting, and is much like any other successful survival game with crafting.

[b]Variety of Weapons and Equipment:[/b] The game offers a not so large array of weapons, gear, and equipment for players to scavenge and utilize in their survival efforts. Basic firearms, melee weapons, and ranged weapons.

Positive Note: The game COULD BE.............[spoiler]so much more.[/spoiler] 
It feels like a great foundation for a survival PvEvP game.

But for why you're here. Why you've read this far, and want to know the big secret, [spoiler]you will read further.[/spoiler]


[b][u]Negatives:[/u][/b]

[b]Performance Issues:[/b] I and many others experience performance issues and bugs, including lag, crashes, and optimization struggles. These technical issues detract from the overall gameplay experience and can make the game difficult to enjoy. My cherry on top for these issues; in SINGLE PLAYER, I've even had tons of items I've collected in crates, in a garage, and my own inventory, [spoiler]DISAPPEAR,[/spoiler] after logging off and back on from a break.

[b]Lack of Content Updates:[/b] Despite early promise, Scum has struggled to deliver consistent content updates and improvements. This has led to a stagnant gameplay experience, with little to incentivize long-term engagement. BUT, they haven't had a problem shoving out a sponsored DLC with a very famous actor. [i]Cause that's what we [spoiler]($$$they needed$$$)[/spoiler] needed[/i].


[b]Conclusion:[/b]
While Scum offers a unique survival experience with its realistic mechanics and extensive customization options, it ultimately falls short due to its performance issues, and lack of content updates. Unless you're a die-hard fan of hardcore survival games and willing to overlook these flaws, it's advisable to steer clear of Scum and explore other titles in the genre. 

I really cant put it simpler, its just a buggy boring game.
developer_response: Hi Matchwood! We're sorry to see that you were disappointed with the game. We acknowledge that the has has certain underlying issues that have been present in the game for quite some time now, but we'd like to provide some reassurance and state that we'll invest significant effort into ironing these issues out before we hit the 1.0 version of the game. As for the content updates, we've release three big content updates last year and we're yet to add new content with the 1.0 release of the game. We'll also make sure to regularly add new content to the game and to support it even after the 1.0 version, which is why we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance and that you'll return and continue enjoying SCUM.

author: {'steamid': '76561198258622040', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 189828, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189828, 'last_played': 1710186778}
review: Done with the game until they fix the issues with puppets. Putting the game on sale isn't going to help dwindling player numbers either, fixing the issues will, and bring long term players back along with it. It's pretty simple really. Pull your finger out boys or the game is gonna fail.
developer_response: Hey I'm Appy :)! Sorry to see that the puppets and their spawning that came with the latest update ruined your time with the game. We're aware that it's not working as intended and we're actively working to fix this as soon as possible. That's why we'd like to kindly ask you for your patience and express our hope that you'll return to the game once we'll have that sorted out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036610170', 'num_games_owned': 492, 'num_reviews': 227, 'playtime_forever': 622, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2, 'playtime_at_review': 619, 'last_played': 1711555787}
review:
Nach ein 8 Stunden Strem mit Freunde kann ich nur sagen:

Scum ist eine schlechte Kopie von H1Z1 und Bugy ohne ende, langweilig wie sau, kaum Zombies unterwegs und nichts los, man muss sich auch ein eigenen Server mieten um was ansatzweise einstellen zu könne aber allgemein ist das Spiel schlechter als H1Z1
normal Preis wollen die für diesen Early Access Mist 40€, der Schott ist nicht mal 5 € Wert
Wenn man bei Scum im Auto als Beifahrer sitzt, dann kann man schissen, aber nicht nachladen, essen, trinken, oder sich selbst heilen.

Wenn man aussteigt muss man die Waffen wider in die Hand nehmen, Feuermodus ändert sich wider zu vollautomatisch, wenn man die Waffe wechselt.

Das Spiel ist die reinste abzocke!

Arma 3 mit Zombie Mods ist da um Welten besser!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198010437803', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 10370, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 48, 'playtime_at_review': 10195, 'last_played': 1712478670}
review:
This game has been in 'early access' for like 6-7 years now and it still is massively unfinished, broken and full of bugs - yet it costs like a full price game with extra DLCs to purchase on top of that. Yet the game fails to function even at a basic level.
Essentially this is a running / bandage simulator made in UE so at least the trees look realistic I guess? Which makes it look and feel as generic as any other garage projects made in UE after 2 weeks of experimenting with its asset store.

The mechanics that are 'implemented' in the game are utterly broken for the most part:

Unarmed combat doesn't do anything - even at max level and top strength you get killed.
Melee combat is even worse because half the time the weapon just swings through the puppets.
Then, through a combat armor, helmet, backpack filled with stuff, a hoodie, shirt, undershirt etc... a puppet even just glances at you causing your arteries to burst and you have to bandage yourself for 2 hours to stop the bleeding. I guess being punched through several layers of armor is somehow causing one to bleed from 5x open wounds?

My character is 150kg according to the BCU, just because he / she has muscles. That's really an accurate simulation.

Character stats are tied to character looks. You can't be strong AND durable without being fat? Also being intelligent to any degree means you somehow can't be also strong, because.... reasons.

Stats are also randomly assigned to skills. I guess it takes tremendous dexterity to drive a car, and parachute all the same, and both of these activities really really require you to be skinny. I guess fat people can't drive?   And what does intelligence have to do with stealth? Having high stamina means you can run forever or stay in a fight longer, but... having high stamina (and running everywhere) somehow doesn't count, you are still fat because you aren't 'dexterous' enough to lockpick or improvise gunpowder - yeah makes sense -.-

Nature respawns into areas where it has no business being anymore. You chop down a tree, build a house of it and the next day the very same tree is grown back into and through the house you've built from that tree.

You may disable puppets vaulting through windows and opening doors, but fret not because they can still go through walls at their leasure or hit you through the wall, again causing you to bleed for 3 hours.

Everything causes the player to bleed. A puppet hit you through 50kg backpack from behind - you bleed 3x C1 and a C2.
You land a bit harder than should from a height that DOES NOT break your leg but your sole bleeds??  You get bleeding abrasions for walking barefoot, but your completely fine and dedicated combat boot falls apart after having walked in it for an hour. That's some military quality boots right there. I wonder if my character will start to bleed from being hungry or thirsty? Which is just obnoxious too. Can't go half an hour without moaning for being hungry or thirsty, then you drink two gulps of water immediately causing bladder issues.

Puppets struggle to find their waypoints. They relentlessly keep playing the running animation against a railing or wall instead of just going around it. Puppets colliding into one another does the same thing, the keep running in place forever or until one of them is killed.

Parachute spawning is bugged. At least one out of ten times it lands me in places that force me to suicide. Such as landing on top of large trees. Landing on utility poles. Landing on windmills (if it has a slight angle then you can land on its side so you have to press any button first to fall to your death). Once my character was parachuted out of bounds into the open sea because of the wind.

Things that you would use disappear. Such as building / crafting materials, vehicles, weapons, food, puppets and their clothes. Things reappear that should not - such as cleared trees and bushes (in single player mode). I mean can I at least control the vegetation within my base area?

All in all this has the potential to be a good game, but until the devs put more effort into adding willy warmers and 'celebrities' (whoever they are, never heard of any of those names) in the game instead of finishing the game actually, it remains to be EA for another 10 years while shamelessly asking for your money now for even stuff that should just be part of the game by default.

DEVS: fix the game as is before adding a new pink fluffy unicorn skin to the AK47, I don't think anyone cares how creative you can be with willy warmers and xmas ornaments as long as pretty much everything in the game is broken. It's been 7 years in EA ffs. Entire franchises rise and fall during this time so give me value for my money please.
developer_response: Hi salem! First off, we'd like to thank you for taking the time the write this lengthy and constructive review. The fact of the matter regarding the long development time is true and no one can dispute this. However, the complexities of game development, alongside turbulent real-world events have taken their toll and have influenced the speed at which development was progressing. What we want to emphasize is that the team is now very much committed towards delivering the full 1.0 version of the game, which will include the rest of the promised content and feature additions, fixes for the underlying issues that have been plaguing the game for quite some time, optimizations which will make the overall experience much more better and polished, and quality of life improvements and balancing some of the systems and mechanics. The team is more than motivated to bring SCUM to the end of its Early access run and to deliver on its core promise - to be one of the best hardcore survival experiences out there. That being said, we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance and that you'll find value in it.

author: {'steamid': '76561199135460092', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 10900, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 3871, 'playtime_at_review': 3611, 'last_played': 1712288511}
review: 游戏上手不是太容易，需要观摩网上视频。由于地图大，早期人物基本靠走，相当部分时间是从一个地方到另个地方的路途上。好不容易才清理一个地区的僵尸，想做点装备小车什么的，僵尸刷新了，还一起围过来攻击。前期辛苦积累寻找的物资背包就废了。复活捡尸就别想了，人被扔到天涯海角，别说捡装备，就一路活着过来，那些装备也能恢复了，还去捡什么尸，而且复活还扣分数，不如重新开始算了。开锁还要技术要求，想换点好的装备，还要再去练，边看边听的开锁，有这闲心我不能干点别的去。我是来玩是来娱乐的，不是给自己找麻烦的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198031098338', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1710627253}
review:
Early Access ist auch hier wieder eine Ausrede für absolute Unzulänglichkeit. Aber hauptsache man kann mit ner großen Karte protzen. Größe auf Kosten fehlenden, sinnvollen Inhalts. Mieses Kampfsystem, Steuerung und Menüführung wenig intuitiv. Fanboys sprechen von einer "Lernkurve" und "realitätsnah"  - wenn das bedeutet das...
Schwieriger Einstieg - definitiv. Wenn schwierig heisst, dass Lootcontainer nur so voller Leere strotzen. Man mit Dingen, wenn man mal welche findet, so garnichts anfangen kann, weil einem ein Haufen anderer Dinge fehlen, die man nur bekommt, wenn man sich durch Horden voller Zombies stirbt.  Schwierigkeit durch sinnlose Verknappung oder besser "nicht vorhanden sein". Habe die Entwicklung über viele Videoreihen verfolgt. Es wird verschlimmbessert, sonst nichts, 
Ich mag Herausforderungen und bin absoluter Fan von Crafting/Survival. Aber in einer absolut leeren Welt in der man nichts anfangen kann weil man kaum etwas sinvolles oder überhaupt etwas findet schiebt nur Frust statt Spaß.
Eine absolute Frechheit ist der Preis für ein Spiel, das so rudimentär wie jedes andere EA-Crafting/Survival Spiel ist, Dann auch noch einen Haufen Geld für sinnlose Kosmetics zu verlangen statt endlich mal sinnvollen Inhalt zu bringen schlägt dem Fass den Boden aus.

author: {'steamid': '76561198443260691', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1710620833}
review: 4 hours i cant do anymore.beyond boring its painfull.my experience?pressing f with a timer searching empty containers till no end.well about 4 hours of it.running long distances to the most uninteresting poi with a stamina bar.not a sign of wild life nothing in between just empty.its just crafting mechanics no game play in a sea of unpopulated servers.someone tell me what im missing.try again in the future.idk.to the guys crying about pvp seriously thats the only thing interesting in this game.so much data wasted at the expense of game play to what craft? lol cmon guys grow up
developer_response: Hi fiddlewig! We're sorry to see that your time with the game was less than enjoyable. The game is designed to be a hardcore survival experience and consequentially will not shower you with loot. However, we recognize that there are players that prefer to have a lot of things to find, which is why we've enabled the option to open and play on private servers whose settings (such as loot, puppets, sentries, etc.) can be modified in order to cater to the preference of certain players, which is why we would kindly advise that you find a server via https://www.battlemetrics.com/servers/scum and see if it will be more fun that way. As for the emptiness of the map, we'll be adding content that will fill it up and enrich the moment to moment gameplay. That being said, we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance - either on private servers or after we manage to get to the 1.0 version.

author: {'steamid': '76561198354873888', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 37832, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 8038, 'playtime_at_review': 26051, 'last_played': 1712456736}
review:
[h1] SCUM diye yazılır, SCAM diye okunur [/h1] 

Steamde inceleme yazan biri değilim fakat bir survival aşığı olarak içimi dökmek istiyorum. Bugüne kadar SCUM'ı bir gün gelişeceğini ve düzeleceğini umarak hep destekledim, hatta Danny Trejo DLCsi ve iki adet supporter pack satın aldım destek amaçlı. Ama oyuna y4rr4k ve m3m3 boyutu ayarlamak gibi gereksiz birçok özellik ekleyen developer ekibi, dolu sunucular için sıraya girme özelliği bile eklememiş, amele gibi sürekli girmeyi denemeniz gerek. Ayrıca oyuna normal bir şekilde eklenmesi gereken yenilikler bile (örn. araç renkleri) DLC içeriği olarak ekleniyor. Bug konusuna değinmek dahi istemiyorum. Ödediğimiz paranın yarısını dahi hak etmeyen rezalet bir oyun, zamanınızı boşa harcamaya değmez. [b] Uzun lafın kısası bu oyun SCUM değil SCAM'dir arkadaşlar. [/b]


[h1] It's SCAM, not SCUM. [/h1] 

I've always supported the game hoping it would improve one day, until now. Got two supporter packs and danny trejo pack to support. But wonder when you gonna bring the queue feature to the game instead of pen!$ and br3ast size. Even features that normally need to be added to the game are published as DLC content when they added (e.g. vehicle colors). You don't deserve even half of the amount we paid. This game is a shame, it's not worth wasting your time. Briefly, [b] it's not SCUM, it's SCAM. [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198046685290', 'num_games_owned': 109, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 24344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24344, 'last_played': 1705100860}
review:
First, I know I've spent several hundred hours, but I bought this game several years ago and have tested almost every update.

And it's the same thing every time, the fun ends up being ruined by bugs that are never fixed and that have been there for years, by developers who prefer to add useless and buggy features rather than focusing on the essential.
One example among many others, we still have the same melee combat that has been completely bugged and uninteresting for years, but now we have a flame thrower... (which is useless and which is also bugged)

The latest update "Hordes" is a complete failure, many players have been complaining for months but nothing will change. The world is even emptier than before, they had already removed all the animals, but now they have also removed all the zombies, you just walk around until a zombie magically appears in front of you. And if this zombie calls a horde, several zombies appear as if by magic and attack you.
Here is the summary of the latest “Hordes” patch.

Which brings me to my final point is that the developers have taken on something too big for them. Over the years, they have not stopped enlarging the map, but also removing features to improve performance.
This is apparently their excuse about the last update, they are preparing for the arrival of NPCs, so they removed all the zombies to make room on the servers.

If you are not able to handle such a large map, stop enlarging it.

At this point I don't even want to wait and test 1.0, I think I've been patient enough with this game.
The game has been uninstalled for a while and will remain so.

author: {'steamid': '76561198275273762', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 11168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 286, 'playtime_at_review': 10139, 'last_played': 1712244058}
review:
Разрабы этой игры те еще гандоны. Игра не стоит своих денег вообще.
из +
Ахухеть какая реалистичная механика метаболизма и здоровья в целом.
В игре есть такая херня как симулятор кулинара.
из -
физика тарспорта говнище. 
Многие механики были спизжены из других игр.
строительство баз дерьмище
Оптимизации ужас - причем самый прикол в том что разрабы специально портят оптимизацию. К примеру у меня раньше грузился инвентарь без всяких проблем, но после обновы фул ящики больше не грузятся. Игра у меня стоит на hdd. Тимейт у которого игра на ssd даже не топовом все прекрасно грузит. Общие хр компов не особо отличаются.
Так же с графикой.
В общем разрабы те еще мрази. максимум купил бы игру за 200р. Больше она не стоит. 
Я впервые вижу таких мразотных разработчиков.

author: {'steamid': '76561199579521551', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 64376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 9783, 'playtime_at_review': 52324, 'last_played': 1712498618}
review: I apologize for the lack of hacker data in the scum team's database.I am truly sorry that I was unable to break into the hacker's home and steal his data to send to you.I should go kill every hacker, take their data, fill the empty database of the scum team with hacker data, so that you can accurately identify the hacker.Or maybe I shouldn't have given any feedback at all. I should continue to be chased by hackers and not disturb your rest. I'm really sorry.I have deeply reflected and realized my mistake. Please lift the ban on my account and thank the scum team.
developer_response: Hi 秋枫! The support team processed your queries and did their due diligence with regards to your reports. Since, as you've said it yourself, did not provide complete evidence, we could not ban a player based on something that could be characterized as 'hearsay'. The team is committed towards removing cheaters from official servers and the game in general as quickly and efficiently as possible and we make sure to review and analyze all the reports that we receive and make sure to react accordingly. However, baseless accusations that are repeatedly spammed after sending multiple replies is something that we cannot react upon and has, in your case, resulted in a restricted access to our support channels.

author: {'steamid': '76561198843206508', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 93291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1099, 'playtime_at_review': 92075, 'last_played': 1712437148}
review: В целом игра конечно отличная по графике, по крафту, по строительству. Реальная выживалка где нужно есть, ходить по нужде итд. Реально все очень классно, но как всегда есть одно НО. И это НО это читеры, которые без проблем рушат твою базу строительными тачками, воруют машины  внутри базы не вскрывая и не взрывая ее. то есть можно долго развиваться и по итогу все отдать нечестным игрокам. Читы продаются в интернете, и их без проблем можно купить. Судя по количеству "невозможных" рейдов, когда например с полностью закрытой 5и этажной базы, на официальном сервере,  у вас крадут именно ящики с оружием и каким-то образом оставляют не самодельную тачку на 5м этаже (которую туда затянуть в принципе не возможно) администрация не боится с этим. На обращение в поддержку вас попросту игнорят. По этой причине, играть в эту игру становится не интересно и люди уходят.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082228607', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 16272, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 11, 'playtime_at_review': 16221, 'last_played': 1711673257}
review:
Too many bugs, the game development keeps reversing decisions being made.
Ninja changes that aren't publicised nor admitted, instead denied when clear changes have been made.
The sense of direction where the game is going is really confusing and incoherent with its original vision. 

The game isn't a "Supermax Survival" or "Hardcore" in any sense of the term, its TEDIOUS and INCREDIBLY ANNOYING.
70 - 75% of the game's functionality has been changed, reversed, modified, tampered or removed completely.
The game was a clear copy and paste of RUST but had visions and aims to be less PvP-oriented and more about surviving.
0.95 (as of this review) has been the utter worst for anyone to bother playing due to the ridiculously low rates of items to keep gameplay incentive up and interest, to high spawn rates of zombies with a broken spawn + broken respawn timer.

There is no point to using guns despite the variety and custom options you may choose from because one shot will attract 40 puppets from a horde (the 0.95abcde patch) is COMPLETELY BROKEN. And you WILL NOT SURVIVE. 
Even if you use a bow or silenced option, you'll still attract tons of puppets that'll continuously set off hordes.

Animals are non-existent. Night time and cover does not break puppet Line-Of-Sight and will chase you through walls. 
Fishing is too damn tedious to set up. 90% of the cooking function is broken. Vehicles are a rarity on public servers.
Chinese Hackers are rampaging through Western Official Servers and destroying the reputation of the game through exploits and general, stereotypical behaviour.

For an early access game that uses publicly available assets, its taking a considerable amount of time to fix really basic things and 1.0 is being advertised already to save whatever copium is left. The company also had changed to join Jagex Ltd for whatever it is worth mentioning. 

There is a massive identity crisis affecting SCUM. Whilst devs have been quite communicative on forums, they too are facing the struggle with maintaining good public image and courtesy towards the now increasingly angry fanbase with troll commentary. 

If you want PvP - Go play Rust
If you want PvE - Play ARK, Conan Exiles or Palworld (the game made as a school project by mere students).

P.S. I'd rather play Fallout 76 than this.
developer_response:
Hi Shibubs! We're sorry to see that the game has thoroughly disappointed you. We understand and acknowledge the criticism that you have for the game and would like to thank you for the lengthy review that you've left us. However, we'd like to point out that the main gripe that you have with the game (with regards to the horde spawning mechanic) is known and that it is being attended to by the team, which is actively working on a fix for this and which we'll have sooner rather than later. 

To address some of the other things that you've mentioned, we'd like to emphasize that we'll be looking into other systems (such as fishing, hunting) and see how we can further enhance and modify them to be more entertaining. Also, we're actively upgrading and improving our anti-cheat capabilities, which will help us detect and remove these bad actors from our game much more quickly and efficiently. 

Although we recognize the criticism that you gave us, we have to provide clarification regarding the allegation that we use publicly available assets and state that we do not use those and that all of our assets are made in-game.

All that being said, we hope that you will consider giving the game another chance and that you will find that we will deliver on the core promise of the game, especially once we manage to exit Early access and get to the 1.0 version of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561199058992767', 'num_games_owned': 102, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 2473, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1109, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1712358756}
review:
-Buy the game on sale
-Meet up with some friends who already play.
-We decide to do a bunker
-Hear crying babies and horrific sounds of something giant on the other side of the door.
-Atmosphere has me wishing I wore brown pants.
-Search the bunker and take out some puppets.
-Before we leave I decide to try to crack the bunker's security door code.
-BIGGEST MISTAKE OF MY LIFE
-Shrieking and fleshy sounds surround us and puppets start coming from the ceiling.
-My more experience friends start panicking, and I figure if they're freaking out.. I should too.. after all I only have a hammer.
-I run for the door, second out of the trio I'm in.
-I look behind me at my friend, and a giant sword armed puppet is walking behind him so close that he most likely could hear it breathing.
-We start screaming.
-I run out the bunker door first yelling as my other friend comes out and starts the process of the closing the door.
-My friend is still in there.. running for the door with the horrific puppet at his back.
-By the grace of the gods, he slips out of the door before it shuts on the puppet...
-We leave and we don't look back.
-We all agreed that we were glad we weren't doing the bunker alone.

Recommend because the atmosphere and time with friends is immaculate.

As for the server files, we'll look into releasing those after the release of the game. That being said, we hope that you'll give the game another chance once we get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561199528723002', 'num_games_owned': 17, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 527, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 527, 'last_played': 1707639189}
review:
新手建议先玩单人模式熟悉一下制作菜单和地图资源。然后直接玩人少一点的高倍服刷b4附近开局，或者落采石场搜螺丝刀贼多。落地做两把长矛一个背包，然后直接去海边城市搜螺丝刀开锁工具，然后直接去撬警察局武器柜，然后把警察局搜完，出大背包的几率还挺高的，自己留一把枪，其它的直接去旁边交易区卖了，等警察局资源刷新了，然后就这样反复搞几趟，路上搜橄榄刷声望，那附近全是橄榄，声望多了加上搜枪卖的钱，足够买一身装备和一把枪加子弹，然后就全图搜车，然后就建家，下地堡。这游戏难就难在没有新手教程，其实上手了之后很简单
——来自小黑盒用户Vae慕微凉的评价

author: {'steamid': '76561198080965267', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 9882, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 9, 'playtime_at_review': 9467, 'last_played': 1712369842}
review:
Only started playing after the patch 0.95 dropped, 1 month in playing can already felt that the game is lacking in so many different ways, in comparison to many other younger early access game, and I'm very surprised that it's already 5 years in the development cycle.

1. New player's experience: it did not felt good. Definitely experienced everyone's first or second death, which is not knowing how to deploy your parachute and landed on your face. You get thrown into the map without any new player guide or starting zone, everything was too hard to figure out just by exploring. It only started to make sense only after I had someone who played the game before taught it to me.

2. Difficulty: it's the same across the world. Of course it's more difficult inside the bunker, but what I mean is, no matter the Biome, they're the same zombie, therefore new player who hasn't figure out how to get a weapon yet, will not be able to kill any zombie with bare hand, but once you know what you're doing, you will do so well in killing the same zombie when you first encounter, the only difference is the spawn rate in certain poi.

3. Feature: this game is very feature lacking. Yes it's early access, but a lot of other younger games has already done more for a fair comparison than this 5 years old EA.
- You want survival? There's none. It's incredibly hard to encounter an animal, even if you got lucky and hear one nearby, it's either glitched to the ground (which you can't see, or you can see but will disappeared upon death), or it'll lead you to 3 more zombie spawned before you're able to get closer to the animal. Even if you've successfully killed something and cooked it, it won't fill you up, you get hungry so fast anyway and constantly has to eat and drink so much. Fruit and vegetable won't fill up much either. After I understood the game, the way to survive is just to grind for gold and go to the shop to buy the overpriced food from the store. You know, it cost as much as selling a gun.
- Cooking: I looked up a beginner's guide about cooking, well.... none of them work, apparently they scraped the cooking system in 0.95 and only skewer works, killed a fat chicken but can't even cook and eat the drumsticks, only 2 made skewers that has 2 charges each, which is not enough to fill 2 adults from a single chicken? Not to mention that I also have to stare at the timer during the whole cooking process, in which I could already be starving and ate 2 bowls of cereal before eating the skewer. 
- Building: too many things that will de-spawn once you placed it out WITHIN THE FLAG area. Found a lantern? Nah, good luck remembering to put it back into the storage every single time or it'll be gone next time you log back in. Not enough building pieces allowed within the claimed area, even if you're building for a squad of few people, you'll have to buy more land expansion but it doesn't give you much more pieces to work with. It's not a game for you if you're into survival building where you want to build a separate room for everything (for example, kitchen, armoury, weaponry, crafting + player's room). It's a building only for just enough to get by. Maintaining the base is also a pain, the durability lost so fast that you'll have to constantly repairing it.
- Crafting: overly convoluted and complicated. Not many things can be crafted too. The only thing that I crafted a lot is.... improvised repair kit to repair the base.
- Vehicle: well... it's incredibly hard to get one in P v E. It's limited by the fixed number of a certain type allowed in the server, so in most days, you just walk, and they have a short despawn rate of 5 days. Good luck going on a holiday that is more than 5 days.

4. Balance: horrible. For example:
- Player stat drains too fast (I'm looking at you, constitution). In reality, after your workout, you need to rest your body, the recover day will also burn energy after you worked your muscle; but in this game, as soon as you stopped moving, you started to drain your constitution. Although slowly, but it isn't fair, because sometimes I could be standing still to chop wood and that IT IS hard work too, it burns a lot of energy to do it!
- Horde spawn/normal spawn rate is abysmal. Re-spawn rate is super fast. You killed one 3 seconds ago, another one spawned, good luck in clearing an area because that will never happen. It'll spawn on a spot that you just cleared or walked on behind you. Sometimes after you finally managed to clear a room, another wild zombie spawned out of line of sight somewhere in a different room and immediately called a horde, from where?????? It's like they spawned and immediately saw us regardless of the wall in between us. The horde came quick and BIG!!!! I've experienced upon approaching a police station, we stopped 1 blocked away and walked in, we'd kite the zombie that we can see with a baseball bat and a bow that has 2 silencers in it, but it somehow spawned a horde of 50. Even if we killed the first wave, we opened the door and most zombies inside the building would notice us and charges on us, so we back out to the safer ground, yeah another horde of 50 would be called. We killed the 2nd horde, finally started to loot. half way looting, some zombie spawned somewhere outside of the building and called on a 3rd horde of 50 on us. All of this is on official server. I just can't be bothered to login now because what's the point if the reward vs risk is not balanced. 
- Using gun is a curse. First shot will immediately draw you a horde of 50. Is not like I don't want to use the gun, I just can't use it unless I want to commit suicide or having too many bullets on me to burn.
- The character eats like a cow, it's an eating simulator. Realistically, you don't require that much food to survive unless you're someone who has an eating disorder? Like I've mentioned above, how much you require to eat just to get by the day isn't realistic at all.
- The durability of the majority of items wear out too fast. This game is also a repair simulator. Base require constant repair. Clothes need to be repaired after every single trip. Weapon I can understand. But how does the canteen got beat up so much after few trips? Are you sure they're military grade not made of cheap plastic? Why is bank card decaying too? They're inside a pocket, which usually they'd last for years!
- Why clothes get 100% of dirtiness so quickly, but a full bar of soap of 20 charges, can't even clean a single piece of it to 100%?
- There's no point looting in town anymore. Like what I've mentioned above that, the re-spawn rate of zombie is too fast and the horde is crazy. Even if it's just a normal building not the police station, the risk is so much higher now that it's not worth looting the normal building anymore (I've even tried the small village). It's not same as what they claimed that the normal building is for new players who has nothing with them. You have to be an experienced player in order to loot the town now.
- Imo death penalty should be reduced by half to encourage new player not afraid to take more risk.

5. Glitch: zombie will glitch through the wall or any object while they spawned. I've seen them only has the head like a Diglet rushing toward me, and a beeper who I can hear it getting closer but cannot see where it was coming from until it was too close. They can also have part of their legs glitching (jumping) in and out of the boulder rapidly making it hard for me to aim, Oh yeah, sometimes they float in the air with a stiff motion until they reached your destination, but don't assume that you're safe if they are landing far, because they've already seen you. As soon as you hear anything or see any Diglet, run because they've already seen you while they were floating. It's also the main reason that I won't be bothered entering any bunker (this and the crazy zombie re-spawn rate plus the horde of 50 entering the bunker).

So no, I do not recommend this game,
developer_response:
Hi Blueberry! First off, we'd like to thank you for taking the time to write this extensive and constructive review and for being so meticulous with your analysis of the game. We'd like to address several key points that you pointed out in order to alleviate some concerns:

We acknowledge that the new player experience can be vastly improved and that we have to improve the communication of our mechanics to the player. We'll be adding something akin to a tutorial eventually that will help guide new players and make the learning curve less steep. However, there is a manual that can be accessed by pressing the TAB button where all in-game mechanics are explained.

However, the main point of contention that you have with the game stems from the inadequate functioning of the puppet/horde spawning mechanic. The team is well aware of the issues this mechanic is creating for other players and we're actively working to tweak it so that the puppets spawn much more organically and, of course, that they do not walk through the ground. After this gets sorted out, the issues that trickle down as a consequence of the hordes will also no longer present an issue.

As for the rest of the things that you've mentioned, we'll be looking into all the systems present in the game before we get to the 1.0 version of SCUM and invest a lot of dedicated effort to fix bugs and bring about necessary balancing changes in order to improve the overall experience. That is why we hope that you'll consider giving SCUM another chance eventually and that you find enjoyment in it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971913403', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 3251, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 120, 'playtime_at_review': 2345, 'last_played': 1711388635}
review:
It's just a grind game, with a horrible inventory system. You will spend the majority of your time trying to find a way to carry more. When you loot any puppet you cant use anything from them because its durability is like 5%. you can loot an entire town and not find any food, equipment or usable items, and when you do find a good item, you don't have inventory space because the horrible inventory system, and lack of backpacks. The QOL is near zero. crafting is too finicky.. enemy spawns are crazy random. I have not seen an animal yet. So no food! Maybe a few updates with QOL improvements it will be better. MAKE IT EASIER FOR THE PLAYER NOT HARDER!
This game has potential, where the devs take it from here will make or break it. 
I did enjoy some of the aspects of the game but low QOL turned me off.
developer_response:
Hi halfdead77! We're sorry to see that the game left you disappointed. The inventory space that your clothes provide you is not enough for surviving on the island. That is why it is imperative that you find, buy or craft some sort of backpack that will allow you to carry more things with you. Backpacks spawn in a wide variety of places, but the things that we want to emphasize here is that the game is designed to be a hardcore survival experience - meaning that it will not shower you with items. However, we are aware that certain players prefer an experience that is more generous with item spawning, which is why we've enabled our player to create and access private servers where certain elements (such as loot) can be modified and increased. That is why we'd like to kindly suggest that you find a private SCUM server (https://www.battlemetrics.com/servers/scum) that best suits your preferences and that you try playing there.

When it comes to QoL, we'll make sure to introduce changes that will improve the overall experience of the game - both before and after the 1.0 release of the game. The same goes for the enemy spawns that you've mentioned as those are actually tended to as we speak and will go live sooner rather than later.

Thank you for recognizing the potential SCUM has. We'll do our best to deliver on the promise the game sets out for itself and we hope that you'll give SCUM another try eventually.

author: {'steamid': '76561198371067116', 'num_games_owned': 196, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 7160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7160, 'last_played': 1710514306}
review: 为啥差评？作为一个回归新手，辛辛苦苦在机场捡一背包东西，突如其来的喊叫，凭空刷丧尸是吧？看着半空掉下来一群丧尸，他奶奶的知道一个萌新捡一背包东西有多不容易嘛？全被这些魔法大哥给半路截胡了，想做硬核游戏就好好做，整你妈的魔法刷怪呢？还有稀碎的枪械战斗，用警喷硬是被俩魔法大哥偷袭拍的还手的机会都没有，举枪开枪打中一只，被另一只拍的没打出来第二发，好不容易跑开愣是光举枪不上弹，泵动喷子上个弹往后往前一推有那么难吗！我崭新的枪和子弹啊！最后用枪托砸死的另一只。只能说游戏是好游戏，就是开发嫌萌新太多了，非常劝退。

author: {'steamid': '76561198118987200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 141, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1710511650}
review: Simply awful.
developer_response: Hi Cortana! We're sorry to see that you are thoroughly disappointed with the game. While we do not know what made you this discouraged with SCUM, we'd like to point out that the game is still in Early access and that we still have a lot of work to do as we're nearing the full release of it. That is why we'd like to express our hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance once we manage to get to that 1.0 version and that you'll see for yourself how we've manage to elevate it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198945713579', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 70764, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 3284, 'playtime_at_review': 65755, 'last_played': 1712450720}
review: All the devs care about is making money! Another DLC and more stuff is broken. STOP releasing dumb DLCs and just FIX THE GAME.
developer_response: Hi ToxicLandmine™! We're sorry to see that the latest DLC addition soured your opinion of SCUM. However, we'd like to point out that these do not detract us from the overall development of the game and that we are fully committed toward delivering the best possible version of it as we're nearing our full 1.0 release. You can expect the eradication of the underlying issues that are plaguing the game, as we'll as more optimizations and content additions that will make SCUM a more complete and polished experience. That is why we hope that you'll give the game another chance eventually and that you'll see that the SCUM has lots to offer regardless of these cosmetic and optional DLC's.

review: 这个游戏打一个中评把，我这个评论是在仅玩单机的情况下写的，这点必须说明，首先游戏难度很高，我玩了10个小时加修改器编码啥的，目前游戏都还没玩明白，另外就是更新，一更新，一验证一个小时了还没弄完，不明白为什么要这样，我觉得我重新安装都比更新快。第三，本来说想再玩玩再给大家点启示，结果今天又更新了9.6M的东西，结果又给我验证了N久，听着硬盘在狂转，我果断给它卸载了，大家等不来第三条了。。。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561199295147873', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 16979, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13167, 'last_played': 1711098230}
review:
这个游戏吧，得看你喜不喜欢末日生存+沙盒+pvp+交易市场，，就玩了几百个小时，觉得这游戏适合长时间玩，虽然这个游戏的优化差BUG多，但是不妨碍它是一款好游戏
也许市面上的类似游戏有很多，但我会依旧选择它，scum这游戏不是很火，但是我挺希望它有很多人玩的，如果你有想法进入这游戏，可以去dy上看看，我相信你会喜欢他
如果你心态不好，我建议你好好考虑，因为这游戏万一你被抄家了，那你辛辛苦苦几个月甚至更久的东西都没了，也不知道你会不会因此退游，哈哈哈

author: {'steamid': '76561199383650980', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 26804, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26804, 'last_played': 1704430596}
review: The game was great, then crap, then great again. The problem is the player base tries too hard to be the game title. Scum. I would like to specify that it's the players ruining the game. Not the developers.
developer_response: Hi Rogue! We're sorry that you fell this way about the game. We understand that some of the decisions that went into the game, as well as the execution of some of its elements, left a sour taste for some people in our community. However, we're still finding our footing as the game is still in Early access and there still things that we want to do before we manage to get to the 1.0 version of the game. As we'll be nearing that point, we'll make sure to improve and enhance SCUM and to add the features that have been previously promised. We'll also make significant effort to iron out the underlying bugs that are present in the game and to make the overall experience more polished and optimized. That is why we hope that you'll give the game another chance eventually and that you will no longer find the game to be like its name.
