author: {'steamid': '76561198114672385', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 29581, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29497, 'last_played': 1710633159}
review:
WILL YOU QUIT ADDING DLC CHARACTER SKINS TO THIS UNFINISHED GAME IT DOESN'T NEED THEM RIGHT NOW!!!

I like this game it has great potential and when 1.0 releases and mod support comes out it will be played by all but until then wait on buying and playing.

A few things i would like to see added/fixed,
-Remove the limping when you hurt your arms, seriously this makes no sense I understand low health slowness but this needs reworked.
-Ability to open/shut the car doors when in and not driving.
-Puppets need more work, don't like swinging through them when they're a little to close.
-Would have been cool to see a new puppet for the horde screamer.
-Quit adding character skins they're not bringing players back to the game especially at $15.
-add a drink/eat button without having to open the inventory
-last one and most important add weights and the ability to do push-ups its a prison game come on, like do you see people using the wheel barrel for leveling strength and go yeah that's all we need.

author: {'steamid': '76561198399789679', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 160935, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 9005, 'playtime_at_review': 144956, 'last_played': 1712464770}
review:
SCUM is by far one of the most immersive and action packed games ive played. Whether its out foraging for gear or in an intense battle fighting off a band of raiders, it never fails to provide an incredible gameplay experience. 
Due to the games system of if you die, you risk losing your belongings, it can be a turn off to those who relish the time it takes to do things. However those who stick it out and learn the game and get good at it, well.. 
WE ARE SCUM!

author: {'steamid': '76561198173451319', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 6, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1711296139}
review: What a shit game. Wonder around for hours and only find a god damn Christmas ornament. Save your money and don't waste a minute on this abomination of a game.
developer_response: Hi Gamerev! We're sorry to see that you did not enjoy your time with the game. While we do not know the specifics of your experience and why you were unable to find any loot, we must address the fact that SCUM is designed to be a hardcore survival experience that leans heavily into realism, which means that you will not be showered with items as you'll be surviving on the island. Also, if you were playing on an official server with a lot of players, it is entirely possible that someone managed to loot the areas that you were searching right before you came there. However, we understand that some players prefer an experience where loot is more abundant, which is why we've enabled the option to create and join private servers where certain elements (such as frequency of loot, number of puppets, presence of sentries, etc.) can be modified. That is why we'd like kindly propose that you find a server via https://www.battlemetrics.com/servers/scum and that you join it and see if those settings fit your preferences.

author: {'steamid': '76561199330373306', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 925, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 920, 'last_played': 1710409381}
review:
Actually i Like scum very very much! But the way the Game goes shrinks my will to Play it… 
It needs way more variety in Items and Weapon customization to come Close to todays Elite Games. The Game has soooo much Potential… but it seems it will ever be unused. 

And sorry… the puppets Are so stupid. Rollback the Horde thing as soon as you can or the Game will die forever!
No one likes that! The puppets Are also way to strong… if You Are a Bambi and you trigger one of them You Are dead. Also they Should Not have the ability to Jump through Windows and Open Doors. It makes the Game totally broke. Also the respawn Mechanic should Not be there. 

Boys… Please listen to your Community the Game will die… 

For the moment the Game isnt a good choice until the devs make Major changes, sorry.
developer_response: Hi J_FlickZ! Thank you for finding enjoyment with the game despite the obvious gripes that you have with it. You'll be pleased to know that we acknowledge that the horde mechanic does not work as intended and that we are working to make further tweaks to this system, which will result in hordes and puppets spawning more organically. With that sorted out, the fact that puppets can go through windows and doors will no longer be an issue. That being said, we hope that you'll continue enjoying SCUM, especially once we manage to get to the full 1.0 release of the game and when we manage to further polish and optimize the game, which will be very soon.

author: {'steamid': '76561198259253697', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3795, 'last_played': 1710630166}
review: Zamanında oyunu ilk çıktığı dakika almıştım o kadar hevesle oynama isteği ile diyebilirim fakat çok fazla sorun mevcuttu pek keyif alamadım ama oyunun gelişeceğine emindim. Uzun zaman sonra tekrar başladım ve aşırı fazla gelişme ve düzelme gördüm hatalar, optimizasyon, buglar vs. hepsi düzeltilmiş ve şu an aşırı keyifli bir hale gelmiş. Bu tür oyunları seviyorsanız sizin için en iyi seçeneklerden biri arasındadır emin olabilirsiniz.

author: {'steamid': '76561198195339425', 'num_games_owned': 10, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 10001, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8953, 'last_played': 1710576708}
review:
Cant recommend this game anymore. They took away all the vehicles and gave us back 3 cars, 1 boat, 1 motorcycle 2 bicycles and 1 plane. 
The horde system is completely broken now. zombies will spawn behind you, jump through walls, have no collision, know where you are in any location even when you are standing still and not making noise, will start hording as soon as you enter a poi. They will even walk through your base walls.. no need to even use doors. 

Think you killed all the zombies in a large hanger and closed the doors? nope they respawn right behind you and murder you in a menu!

have a silenced weapon and want to kill a zombie without calling a horde, Nope calls horde and they all know exactly where you're at.

Trying to hide from a puppet in a bush? nope they will walk right over to you and start beating your a** while crouched in a bush.

Smiler puppet dead? think again game respawns the puppet right next to you 2 mins later and kills you while youre trying to heal yourself.

all puppets dead in your vicinity and you think youre safe? think again a loud roar comes from right next to you even though all the zombies are clearly dead and youre now surrounded by them.

The game  is just packed with bugs and issues that should "just work"  and a horde system that is clearly moving backwards. 

While the devs are working on NPCs and Quests etc adding content, they are clearly not focusing on fixing the things that they took away from us like vehicles and a functioning horde system taht was working before. 

Maybe focus your efforts on the MAJOR gameplay mechanics that you took away and broke BEFORE adding new content huh?
developer_response: Hi Pr0fesseur! We're sorry to see that  you've become disappointed with the game. However, you'll be pleased to know that the team is working to tweak and fix the main gripe which you have with the game, which are the puppet spawns. We acknowledge that this system does not work as intended and we'll make sure to get it sorted out sooner rather than later. That is why we'd like to kindly ask you for your patience until we get that in line and that you'll give the game another chance - at least when we manage to get to the 1.0 version of the game.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198107262287', 'num_games_owned': 103, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1824, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1824, 'last_played': 1710271682}
review:
2024了
近戰手感稀爛
一隻狼就能無限僵直弄死你
被殭屍敲一敲還會破圖掉到地圖外 導致武器丟失
多人模式殭屍跟動物會隨機刷新  遇到兩次狼直接刷在屁股後  直接咬死
一次被熊刷在身後兩米  又是一次咬死
不知道幾次了  殭屍直接刷在屁股後面 然後上來就是一套連招外帶叫好友一起圍毆你
廢棄建築摸個箱子  殭屍直接在100米外直接刷7-8隻  從三個方向朝你衝過來
死亡物品全噴我能接受  但死亡後沒有標記死亡位置是在哈囉?
2024了
能玩到這種稀飯屬實是不容易  搶先體驗了5年多的稀飯
我再玩這稀飯我就是傻子 
最後提一下  我玩了30小時在做啥?
前兩小時瘋狂死  不斷空投下來 然後繼續死
最後終於到了安全區  好耶  有人給我裝備賣錢  買了釣竿
開始釣魚 賣魚 賺錢
全身穿好裝備 拿上武士刀  出門
然後趴地上回體力  我剛走過的路上直接刷兩隻殭屍在屁股後 就在我剛剛經過的位置
然後就被敲死了  從安全區出發到我死甚至沒超過10分鐘
謝囉浪費我745NTD跟30小時
我看這遊戲不該叫scum  該叫做釣魚模擬器  釣魚都比摸垃圾好玩  還不會被屁股刷出來的怪東西打死

author: {'steamid': '76561198030768133', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 11641, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2476, 'playtime_at_review': 5748, 'last_played': 1712500290}
review:
One of my favorite survival games of all time.  

The level of detail is mind-blowing.  The UI is abit clunky but I find its OK, I've looked up tons of tutorials and helpful tips to learn the game.

The healing function IS abit confusing.  I initially put that here as a caveat and turns out they DID fix it awhile back.  When you're trying to heal, click and highlight your rags or bandages, and go to Health tab and select treat after highlighting the injury.  Easy as that.

I'm also a fish enthusiast in real life so seeing such a detailed fishing mini-game is awesome.  I was excited to see Orange Ruffe here, and I caught a Bass and a Pike.

The combat is difficult and thats OK.  The assets for the houses add abit of charm, but there could be more variety... in sims like this its neat to see what civilization looked like BEFORE things went bad.  Considering its a small team of developers, I'm impressed that they've created a whole world.

I love this game and I've loved it for a few years now.  I look forward to seeing what they come up with next.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044336309', 'num_games_owned': 78, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 2263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 149, 'playtime_at_review': 946, 'last_played': 1711324347}
review: Hunting, fishing, infection, dirt, cooking, building base... everything is a big grind and extremely boring to do. But the worst of all is the dirt system, as well as being extremely annoying, it is difficult to deal with, as the resource to clean clothes is extremely difficult to find, as is almost everything in the game!
developer_response: Hi UrsoGentil! We're sorry to see that the game disappointed you. SCUM is designed to be a hardcore survival game that relies heavily on realism. Also, it will not shower you with items. However, you should not have an issue with finding things, you just need to look in specific places as the items spawn contextually. That is where our awesome community came in and helped other members by creating the https://scum-map.com/en/interactive_map where you can filter out specific places where things you need spawn, as well as locations of POI's, police stations, pharmacies, etc. Also, you can also try out the private servers where loot is greatly increased as it may better cater to your playstyle. That being said, we hope that these tips will provide some help and that you'll consider giving the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025815913', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 1611, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1611, 'last_played': 1710112233}
review:
the game has great concepts going, but the game has poor development concepts that causes the game to severely suffer. The fact that Zombies smack a player and and has a 100% chance of bleed damage is outrageous, a player should not have to consume 90% of their inventory in bandages to accomodate. The loot economy in a base game without the server owner, editing loot spawns is non existent. There shouldn't be any reason a player should visit, 4-5 villages and towns and can't find anything to survive off of, starvation and dehydration is as much of a threat as the zombies are. It's almost like there is a push to force immediate crafting to survive the crafting system should compliment the survival aspect of the game. not reliant.
if body heat plays a heavy factor on body heat, there desperately needs to be an increase on inventory space. The need to carrying food stuff, sewing kit, rags, and ammo, requires multiple layers of clothes, especially since backpacks are as rare as military equipment.
I read that this game is about to push a full release, and the mechanics seriously feel like its in alpha. there is a lack of balance and polish
developer_response: Hi Altitude_Seven! We're sorry to see that the game is not to your liking. We'd like to point out that SCUM is still in Early access and that we still have a lot of work to do with the game. As we'll be nearing the full 1.0 version of the game, we'll look into the various game systems and make balancing adjustments where necessary. That being said, we hope that you'll consider giving SCUM another try and that you'll find enjoyment with it eventually.

The scope of the game is big and ambitious, but we acknowledge that some things could definitely work better. As we're in Early access, we still have a lot of work to be done to make the game as awesome as possible. That means having as few bugs as possible, making the game run as smooth as possible, to make it as safe as possible from cheaters and to make it feature-complete. That being said, we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance and that you'll return to it.

developer_response: Hi Just Vibin! We're sorry to see that you are thoroughly disappointed with the game. You'll be pleased to know that the team is aware that this feature does not work properly and that we are actively working on tweaking this system so that puppets spawn more organically. That being said, we hope that you'll consider giving SCUM another chance and that you'll rejoin the game, especially after we manage to get to the 1.0 version.

review:
现实上线莫名其妙的刷尸潮，在警局外下线，在上线瞬间一群僵尸➕自爆，更新后好了；然后就是疯狂丢车，每次都会有概率把车刷到地图上随机位置，只能开代码找；然后莫名其妙就好了，接着就是玩着玩着就弹出，要么地堡里弹出，上线后满头大汉，被嘎嘎乱杀，要么躲高达弹出，上线被嘎嘎一顿突突 Ծ‸Ծ 
5倍的搜刮概率都弥补不上丢枪多速度，按理说3070+i512490,32G内存虽然不是高配，但是完这个游戏应该没问题，但每次一个BUG好了之后，就会有一个更逆天的bug，服了，游戏机制很好，但BUG给我治的一点脾气没有。

——来自小黑盒用户misaka10092的评价

review:
While the game does have bugs, but what game dosent? and Cosmetic DLC (not gamepires fault. blame Jagx for that) i would absoley recommend this. blows DAYZ out of the water. i have bought every dlc to support gamepires to continue to make this great game

I started with DAYZ and i will never go back because of how good scum is. the devs seem to be really trying and caring what they are making here. the sounds. graphics and gameplay are so much better than dayz. the medical is in depth. and theres a variety of biomes. 

with the 1.0 full release coming out soon, i look forward to this even more. quests and NPC characters.

author: {'steamid': '76561198144423124', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 17986, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17986, 'last_played': 1710036389}
review:
After deciding to come back after a year or so, I was pleased with the graphics and idea of the playing a survival game again. Long time rust player so I was use to the toxic community. The reason I actually decided to write this review is because whenever you get that rush of winning a fight or getting some loot the game will inevitably screw you over. 
After 50 hours this week:
Multiple unknowns as to why a vehicle in the middle of nowhere that I would lock, would be gone or locked for me once id arrive back within the hour.
Finally hours of effort strictly for a vehicle and i get a dirtbike, nope.. touched a quarter of its tire into water and decided to destroy itself.
2 straights days later of pushing a vehicle into the forest, hiding it, walking piece by piece 30m roundtrip from the city to the truck. finally up and running. Oh wait cant fill up gas with cash... run all the way across the map to get to a bank, get killed, go into debt trying to spawn anywhere near where i died or a trader. Finally get back to vehicle with gas, make sure its locked and go into a town and sell some extra goods, some expoiter jumps into my locked vehicle and then takes off with it. Wont be returning. Not to mention, how is there even less content in the game than prior, just more running simulator..
developer_response: Hi Crazedly! We're sorry to see that the game left you disappointed. As we'll be nearing the full 1.0 release of the game, we'll look into the various systems that are present in the game and see if there are necessary tweaks that need to be introduced (such as your car getting wrecked because it was tire-deep in the water). That is why we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance as we'll get near that point and that you'll find enjoyment with the game again.

review:
came back to this game for its highly realistic survival gameplay, however doesn't seem like i'll stay long since the hordes that appear from nowhere triggered by a solo puppet, puppets spawning right in front of you or a cleared building.. and bodies disappearing quicker then i can take a piss - break immersion and eventually the game. hope the devs see this as a massive oversight and correct their mistakes, otherwise - rip SCUM 
p.s. bring back cabins please
developer_response: Hi SmiteEYE! We'd like to emphasize that the team is well aware of the issues that you've mentioned and you'll be pleased to know that we are working hard to have them fixed by the full 1.0 release of the game. That is why we'd like to kindly ask you for your patience and understanding as the team is really working hard to optimize and polish SCUM, but we need a bit more time, which is why we hope you'll give the game another chance once we manage to get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198108603221', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 11247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2017, 'playtime_at_review': 9230, 'last_played': 1712385181}
review: I just deleted the game from my computer again. I know about early access and the possible problems with it. But... after so many years of development, zombies crawl out of walls, spawn a few meters from the player, sometimes teleport without animations, mechs can see through walls, terrible synchronization on official and private servers that are just over half full, lags, etc. What about animations? Come on guys, the character doesn’t even have a door opening animation, it looks like the door opens by magic.
developer_response: Hi Pushistik! We're sorry to see that you find the game to be disappointing. We acknowledge that the game has some underlying issues, but we'd like to emphasize that the team is hard at work with optimizing the overall experience of the game and fixing the issues that are present, which will make SCUM a truly polished game by the time we get to the 1.0 version. We'll also be supporting the game after its 1.0 release with additional content, animations, QoL improvements, etc., which is why we hope that you'll give SCUM another chance sometime down the line.

review: don't waste your time or money on this game as the devs keep adding new stuff and not bothering to fix game breaking glitches like the map not rendering fast enough and you fall through the map and lose your vehicle which has been a problem for a couple of years now!!!! also cooking is near impossible as every time it says its well cooked but cold and my player just throws up ,zombies spawning at random and in large hordes and farming doesn't appear to work either.
developer_response: Hi pardii191! We're sorry to see that you feel disappointed with the game. We're aware that there are some underlying issues in the game that have persisted for quite some time, but we'd like to provide some reassurance and state that we will be investing significant effort into fixing the bugs that are present and polishing the overall SCUM experience as we'll be nearing its full 1.0 release. The same applies for the hordes which we'll have tweaked sooner rather than later. As for the cooking and gardening, we'd like to kindly ask you to report the issues you've experienced via https://support.scumgame.com/ so we can have a look at it and fix it. All of that being said, we truly hope you'll give the game another chance and that you'll return to it and find enjoyment with it once more.

author: {'steamid': '76561198207590316', 'num_games_owned': 60, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 922, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 922, 'last_played': 1698071469}
review:
Игра со сложными механиками, болью, багами, и всеми прелестями страданий новичков, но в целом если посидеть поразбираться достаточно интересная! Об оптимизации разраб видимо не слышал от слова совсем. Разбираться придется во всем начиная с управления заканчивая крафтом, Сложность 20 непоняток из 10
Наверное одна из самых сложных игр к пониманию, но достаточно интересная.
Советую испытать на себе данный опыт!
Бонус рецепт пиццы!
Продукты
Для теста:
Яйцо - 1 шт.
Мука - 2-2,5 стакана
Масло растительное - 2 ст. л.
Вода - 200 мл
Соль - 1 ч. л.
Сахар - 1 ст. л.
*
Для начинки:
Сыр моцарелла - 300 г
Сыр твердый - 200 г
Помидоры - 2-3 шт.
Колбаса вареная - 200-250 г
Колбаса копченая
Грибы шампиньоны
Соус томатный
Яйцо, соль, сахар и растительное масло взбиваем венчиком до получения однородной массы.
Добавляем 200 мл воды и хорошо перемешиваем.
В полученную массу просеиваем 2 стакана муки и замешиваем упругое тесто. Оно не должно быть липким.
Желательно оставить тесто примерно на час (или на большее время в холодильнике), завернув его в пищевую пленку.
Раскатываем тесто для пиццы в круг толщиной 0,5 см.
Смазываем любимым томатным соусом и раскладываем начинку. Начинка может быть любой, на ваш вкус.
Пиццу выпекаем в разогретой духовке в течение примерно 20 минут при температуре 180 градусов.
Всем приятного аппетита!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198065726003', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 47547, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47272, 'last_played': 1710180395}
review: Òtimo precisa de suporte para hacker em servidores oficiais pois eles dominam e saem ilesos, porém a mecânica do jogo é perfeita a física bonita o suficiente para ter imersão no mundo idealizado do game, inimigos bem programados tirando o fato deles cliparem muitas vezes sem você saber se é do servidor, da sua internet ou do jogo, mas acredito ser do jogo pois jogo a 6 anos, ótima customização e evolução progressiva, como muscularidade do personagem, habilidades com armas e sobrevivência, que mudam no decorrer da sua  rotina dentro do game,  avatar quase um rpg de habilidades e perks,  muitas possibilidades quando se trata de diversão em pvp, porem no pve muitas vezes você se cansa de explorar a ilha pois o jogo depende 100%  da historia  onde a ilha é hostil e você só tem que ficar vivo, adoro o game mais sendo transparente com os futuros jogadores os desenvolvedores deste jogo precisam sofrer mais pressão do publico, apesar deles entregarem um jogo de qualidade gráfica maravilhosa com uma otimização ok depois de 4 anos de atualizações,  é um jogo que tem um tema casual porém não se trata de tal devido ao tempo que você se dedica para usufruir das experiencias mais legais e desafiadoras que o jogo fornece como invasão a bankers,  raidar bases inimigas, tudo isso é possível, mais com a questão da dificuldade de progressão e conteúdo, isso com o decorrer do tempo satura a ponto da empresa estar farmando dinheiro com conteúdos que no alpha já foram feitos e retirados e hoje eles acrescentam de forma periódica em patchs pagos para os consumidores não notarem,  pontos importantes a serem melhorados no jogo como simplesmente a dos hackers isso já ajudaria de forma extrondoza o jogo, deixa no chinelo muitos jogos lançados recentemente ou até mesmo da época do alpha dele, como Day z entre outros indies ai no mercado, merece nosso dinheiro porém com sabedoria e tentar jogar de forma mas desprendida de evolução   dentro do game possível, morrer injustamente para npc players e atualizações estranhas mal informadas estressão e afastam publico, por mais que seja filho unico do mercado em proposta e imersão survival com elementos de RPG.

author: {'steamid': '76561198094464270', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 503, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 151, 'playtime_at_review': 240, 'last_played': 1711550156}
review:
Поправлю обзор, если что-то изменится в оценке игры. Пока что: огромный список крафта, который нужен постольку-поскольку. За первые 4 часа так и не нашел нормальных способов добыть еду и воду. Для сравнения: в 7 days to die пропитание тоже нужно искать, но проблемы с этим нет, можно есть даже мясо мертвых. Здесь же в луте практически нет ни еды, ни воды, а сорвав спелое яблоко с ветки, ты узнаешь, что и его ты съесть не можешь. Зато можешь съесть кузнечика из трухлявого дерева, но он тебе ничего не добавит. Животных нет, до рыбалки не дошел (может и рыбы нет, как животных).

Чтобы скрафтить веревку, нужно 5 веток. Я не понимаю эту логику.
Чтобы скрафтить копье, нужно 5 веревок. Где-то нужно 10 веревок. В общем, руби ветки до посинения. Носить можешь очень мало, тех же веток возьмешь штуки 3-4, при наличии слутанного рюкзака, без него еще меньше. Это все складывать себе под ноги, на пол, очень удобно и круто. Потом оно еще и пропадает по неизвестной причине.
Крафт усложнен и не факт, что вообще нужен (оружие проще лутать, чем крафтить).

Никакого вводного обучения в игре нет. Это всё прям "здорово". При том, что игра выглядит классно и крафтить хочется, и освоиться хочется тоже. Но пока что продуманности в игре я не вижу.

author: {'steamid': '76561198433302302', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 16159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16159, 'last_played': 1707766513}
review: Would be a great game, if the zombie spawning system was better. Now, when you go to a POI, it'll be empty till you have been there for a moment or two and then suddenly a group of zombies spawn behind you Cyberpunk style.
developer_response: Hi KurkkuKuwart! We're sorry to see that you are thoroughly disappointed with the game. You'll be pleased to know that the team is aware that this feature does not work properly and that we are actively working on tweaking this system so that puppets spawn more organically. That being said, we hope that you'll consider giving SCUM another chance and that you'll rejoin the game, especially after we manage to get to the 1.0 version.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976351594', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 65598, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 27, 'playtime_at_review': 65571, 'last_played': 1711632331}
review: I have just over a thousand hours on record, and I've stopped playing, as have so many others. The horde and puppet system has effectively broken the game, and taken all the joy out of it. Hopefully this will be remedied and the Dev's won't ignore the community. This is no time to start experimenting with things so close to 1.0. Just remember, when you've been in Early Access this long, and you have a mature and established community on social media, the content creators can bury your rear end before you've even had a chance to launch. So you better listen to the player base or kiss this game goodbye.
developer_response: Hi Pancake! We're really sorry that you find the game to be disappointing because of the new patch that changed the puppet spawns. You'll be pleased to know that the team is well aware of the issues that were introduced with the latest big patch and that we acknowledge the frustration that comes from the community on this matter. We're actively working on a fix for this issue and we'll have this system tweaked as soon as possible. That is why we'd like to kindly ask for your patience until we manage to get this sorted out and express our hope that you will give the game another chance eventually.

developer_response: Hi Master Chief! We're sorry to see that you did not find SCUM to be to your liking. It's important to note that the game is still in Early access and that we still have a lot of work to be done with it. As we'll be nearing the full release of SCUM, we'll be introducing a lot of improvements and optimizations that will make the game experience much more polished. We'll also be introducing new content additions and features that will further enrich the experience of the game. That is why we hope you'll give the game another chance eventually.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043867469', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3030, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3026, 'last_played': 1709995908}
review: Game is filled with cheaters that play out of their regions server in order to further gain advantage. They openly talk in game chat about the use and sale of hacks as well as berate you in their language. If you respond unfavorably against the cheaters you will be outright game BANNED for `Disrupting` the game for others with bad language. Not worth anyone's time.
developer_response: Hi Vic Vinegar! We're sorry to see that your time in the game was ruined by cheaters. We'd like to provide some reassurance by confirming that we are investing significant effort into improving out anti-cheat capabilities, which will enable us to identify and target cheaters almost instantaneously. While we are committed towards dealing with cheaters, we also must ensure that inappropriate and offensive language is not used in the in-game chat, regardless of the fact that it was caused by valid frustration with the cheaters. When you encounter them, please contact us via https://support.scumgame.com/ and report these bad actors and we-ll do everything we can to remove them as swiftly as possible.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027853718', 'num_games_owned': 278, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 10470, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9114, 'last_played': 1710149794}
review:
SCUM is a really fun and extremely challenging game. This is DayZ on steroids and way more polished. The only thing I think was a bad idea, was removing the prefab cabin blueprints. This game is already very challenging and grindy, and having the ability to throw down a small cabin blueprint and fill it with the required mats was great for early game, allowing new players to start something pretty quickly and have a place to respawn/store loot instead of having to backpack all over the map constantly dropping loot for "better" loot because you've run out of backpack space.

The new Horde system is a bit janky but I believe the devs will address/fix it in the upcoming patches. This game isn't really mean't for solo play IMO, it can be done, but you will have a pretty rough beginning. This game will definitely test your resolve and if you have any weakness in you, you will fail...lol It has made my friend rage quit and uninstall the game multiple times...lol

The last thing that I think is terrible, is playing with your friends. It is pretty difficult and time consuming trying to stay alive long enough to meet up with your friend. I don't care about spawning in with my friends, I know its not that type of game where we can join a lobby and then jump into the game, BUT what they should implement is a steam friends list system where, the game checks steam IDs and then checks if any of those steam IDs are friends. So if my friend and I are on the same server, we can automatically see where each other is on the map. That would make it so much easier. If that is too hard, maybe make it to where clans can send invites to whomever they want and once the other player accepts clan invite, they appear on the map.

Anyway, great game. Buy it if you're brave enough and don't if you're not and just going to refund it after 10 minutes of playtime.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012271478', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 124550, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2667, 'playtime_at_review': 117551, 'last_played': 1712448265}
review: Riddled with cheaters. They openly talk in game chat about the use and sale of hacks and when a normal player dares to raise a voice and use bad language out of frustration against the cheaters recieves a ban himself for `Disrupting` the game for others with bad language.
developer_response: Hi PeteCortez! We're sorry to see that you had a bad experience with cheaters and that they ruined your time with the game and we completely understand the frustration that comes with this. However, repeated use of inappropriate and offensive language on the servers instead of reporting suspicious cheating activity via official channels is not something that we can allow, despite it being a reaction to the unfair conduct of cheaters. As we're nearing the full 1.0 release of the game and are making the last finishing touches, we'll also significantly improve our anti-cheat measures and capabilities which will bring the negative effects of cheaters to a minimum. That is why, once you return to the game, we'd like to kindly ask you to refrain from using such language on official servers and to report cheaters once you encounter them via https://support.scumgame.com/

author: {'steamid': '76561198192416231', 'num_games_owned': 50, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 88776, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88776, 'last_played': 1703568281}
review:
Having, shit or footprints making the noise of animals instead the actual animals is NOT ok, totally absurd and unreal, yet devs stand by this idiotic design and choice, having puppets falling from the sky is another "wtf are you guys smoking" moment and not to mention that you did change the behaviour of puppets, allowing them to open doors and jump windows (which is ok) but totally disregarded how bad the animations and general behaviour is and did absolutely no CRUCIAL change prior to the new features, this is totally laziness and dereliction. 

Used to be a good game, big pass now.
developer_response: Hi XENOS! We're sorry to see that you have become disappointed with the game. You'll be pleased to know that the team is well aware of the issues with puppet/horde spawning and that we're actively working on a tweak for this system, which will make the puppet spawns much more organic. As for the other changes to features like the hunting, we'd like to emphasize that we're still in Early access and that we are working to polish and optimize the SCUM experience as much as possible by the time we enter Early access. After that, we'll look into what features can be modified or improved. That being said, we hope that you'll give the game another chance eventually and that you did not become entirely discouraged from playing SCUM.

author: {'steamid': '76561199012634674', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 18949, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1594, 'playtime_at_review': 17684, 'last_played': 1711794714}
review:
这游戏是真的垃圾，所有人都是俄头重甲大包AK  你根本认不出来谁是谁，在多人服务器里要是有2队关系比较好的pvp队伍，就会经常出现错把敌人当成友军，同类型游戏以及同时期游戏例如 DAYZ 腐蚀 都不会出现类似的问题，然后游戏的bug更是多到离谱 车子卡虚空  把箱子从车上搬下来结果卡地底下没办法打开 跑尸时经常性的看不见自己的尸体 别和我说什么电脑配置原因 队伍里4080的显卡都会出现这种情况。
游戏性更是离谱  个个都会穿墙无限刷的怪  在天上踏空而行的僵尸以及飞天自爆  卡地底下一边傻笑一边奔你而来的自爆   无敌的boss  我玩别的生存游戏都能把怪清完然后舒舒服服的摸东西，就算无限刷怪 也会留一些时间让玩家进行缓冲  并且怪物本身也会掉落稀有物品，这个游戏呢 掉毛 全部TM垃圾东西， 想搞点好东西？ 你必须去练TM的开锁 4秒内必须开完  如果没打开 锁就会换锁眼 就算打开了这游戏能开出来最好的东西是什么呢？ 各种黄金武器  炸药 RPG  大哥我在这b岛上 你给我黄金武器有什么用吗  除了值点钱还能干什么啊。
算了懒得讲那么多废话了，就直接总结吧

我能手搓炸药 但不能给车上加装一个炮台 我有超级药物一针下去满血复活  但我被怪物打的无限控  根本扎不出来针  这个岛上有高达  有变种人  但是我就是不能给自己的武装强化一下 只能穿着防弹衣在装一个没什么卵用的智慧芯片      这里有超智能门锁  4秒换一次锁眼   这里有永远不会坏的动物尸体和坏的超快的饭菜  这里有一大堆没有用的烹饪配方  这里有十分糟糕的音效  这里有多到我说不完的bug  这里有小到看不清的字  这是一款运用了6年的游戏 售价200+ 每次更新都会出现新的bug  如果你想来这里受苦  我十分推荐你购买这款游戏。

 前情提要，因为被挂狗在官服打的玩不下去了，来到了私服。

朋友：晚了，前几任垃圾佬把服务器重要物资点都占领了，咱们来错地方了。
ME：我到时觉得这地方不错。
朋友：路人都成穷鬼了，没油水可榨了。
ME：老子从来就没想刮穷鬼的物资。
朋友：不刮穷鬼的物资你收谁的呀？
ME：谁有物资搞谁的。
朋友：玩过人渣私服嘛？
ME：没有。
朋友：我告诉告诉你！玩人渣，得巧立名目，拉拢豪杰，巴结大佬，大佬拉你们进了队伍，开始讨要物资，要到物资之后，大佬的物资如数奉还，你们搜刮来的三七分成！
ME：怎么才七成啊？
朋友：七成是人家的！能得三成还得看服主的脸色。
ME：谁的脸色？
朋友：他（指了指服主的无人机）
ME：他？我花钱买了游戏就是为了看他的脸色？
朋友：对。
ME：我花了200块钱，买了这个游戏。（朋友说了一声：对。） 我还得在私服里花钱，（朋友又附和了一声：对。） 还要巴结大佬，（对。）害得看TM的脸色？（对。）我不成花钱给别人玩的陪玩了吗？
朋友：那你要怎么说，花钱买人渣进私服玩的 还真的就是当陪玩的，就这多少人还没这门槛呢！（指找到一个好点的服务器，不在官服受苦受累）
ME：我问问你，我为什么买人渣进私服？
朋友（摇摇头）
ME：我就是想远离挂狗，想怎么玩怎么玩！
朋友：原来你是想当独狼啊！那还是回去玩官服吧。
ME：哎？这我就不明白了，我已经花钱进服务器了，怎么还不如原来官服啊？
朋友：官服那边你是玩家，可是私服里你就是个韭菜。玩游戏嘛，娱乐，不寒颤！

接着陪朋友玩了100个小时 还是一坨 我辛辛苦苦炸进别人家 把别人车都炸成废铁了想去看看车上还有什么东西可以拿  结果呢 系统告诉你 需要撬锁，我撬你妈，这B车就剩下个框架了我还要撬锁啊，这游戏的锁就TM是外星科技。
你说车炸了里面东西随机坏掉一部分也行啊 我把别人车炸了不就是因为撬不开锁嘛？ 好了
接下来呢我们炸进了别人家的物资点 你想拿里面的东西？ 还是一样你得撬锁！撬了才能获得里面的物资 撬不开怎么办？ 不好意思你只能给别人砸了。最后得个两败俱伤。玩这个游戏又浪费时间又浪费精力，我真不如搞个挂来玩得了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198329438846', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 9686, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5798, 'last_played': 1710635611}
review: Das Game ist einfach in so vieler Hinsicht noch nicht ausbalanciert, dass der Spaß oft auf der Strecke bleibt. Beim Looten wird es schnell langweilig, weil man meist immer und immer wieder das gleiche findet und wenig passiert, die "Hotspots" sind dagegen unverhältnismäßig hart, vor allem wenn man allein unterwegs ist. Man schlägt teils durch die Puppets hindurch, die Waffen laden nicht nach oder der Waffenwechsel funktioniert nicht richtig (verzögert). Und das permanente "ich friere/ich schwitze/ich muss pissen/ich hab Hunger/ich hab Durst/mir ist übel/ich blute/ich bin infiziert" nervt irgendwann. Auch ist man meist trotz Ausrüstung so stark verletzt von nur 1 oder 2 Schlägen, die man einsteckt, dass man mehr Zeit mit Verbinden verbringt als mit Kämpfen. Im schlimmsten Fall verblutet man sogar während des Verbindens. Ich spiele viele Survival- oder Shooter-Games und Frustmomente hat man immer mal,  aber das hier ist schon sehr speziell (im negativen Sinne) und für meinen Geschmack oft too much. Ein Dauerbrenner wird das eher nicht. Man kann natürlich viel ein/runterstellen, das macht es angenehmer im Spiel, aber ist halt auch nicht Sinn der Sache und wenn man bestimmte Spots (Bunker) einfach meidet, weil der Hauptboss unsterblich ist und die Chance, dort leben rauszukommen gering (und der Loot ist den Aufwand leider auch nicht wert), find ich das irgendwie schade.

review: Has the potential to be one to the best survival games around but horrible experience for new players. The zed/puppet spawns are just annoyingly difficult. Other than that, the game will probably be one of the most in-dept survival experiences out there. Looking forward to the puppets spawn system being fixed and the eventual release of this game.
developer_response: Hi OfflineGhost! We're sorry to see that the latest update was not to your liking and that it soured your time with the game. We'd like to reassure you that the team is aware that the puppets spawning system does not work as intended and that the team is actively working on a tweak for this, which is why we'd like to kindly ask you to keep an eye on our Steam announcements to see when we'll manage to get this sorted out and we'd also like to express our hope that you'll give the game another chance eventually.

author: {'steamid': '76561198161404200', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 68050, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2164, 'playtime_at_review': 63726, 'last_played': 1712492594}
review:
Aggiornamento dopo aggiornamento il gioco diventa sempre più ingiocabile, lag generico, frame-lag che aumenta e diventa sempre più notevole ad ogni aggiornamento: ora non si riesce più a sparare perché quando miri lagga talmente tanto che ti ritrovi morto, l'omino smette di correre se premi tasto destro su un oggetto nell'inventario, durante i deathmatch le armi impiegano sempre più tempo ad essere equipaggiate dopo aver usato le granate, se siete sfortunati rimarrete con la granata buggata in mano e senza possibilità di prendere in mano l'arma. 
Sembra poi che gli sviluppatori stiano favorendo uno stile di gioco da "ratto", mi spiego subito in modo conciso e diretto: l'obiettivo del gioco sta diventando sempre più simile a quello di thesims, ovvero ti fai la base e non puoi lasciarla altrimenti laggi talmente tanto da dover abbassare grafica e render scale, ma a questo punto direi che giocare a minecraft sia un'esperienza decisamente migliore e da considerare prima di comprare questo gioco

author: {'steamid': '76561198441117970', 'num_games_owned': 83, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 381, 'last_played': 1709576422}
review:
Нашел биту,никого ей не убил,просрал когда садился в лодку,каким образом не понятно.Нашел тесак,так же просрал на лодке.Понял,что на лодке просираешь всякие ништяки.Нашел весло.Размахивал им будь здоров.На лестнице самый вариант.Один зомби слег,второй,третий...еще и еще.Понял,что они мгновенно респавнятся.Устал махать,пора деру давать.
Хитро вы е ба нный я,залег на дно,стал тише воды,ниже травы.Словно хищник,поджидающий свою жертву.Я тебя слышу,да да...слышу,но не вижу.А где ты?Где то ведь рядом,да?Ну что ж,этот зомби оказался гораздо хи тро вые баннее меня,когда с рычащим воплем вылез из под...бетонной,мать ее, лестницы!Умер,уже и не помню в который раз,жопа полыхнула,удалил SCUM,чтобы глаза мне не мазолил и подсел на ромашковый чай.
Зря купил ключ,нужно было в стиме приобретать этот кусок говна,хоть бабки бы вернул.

We'd appreciate that greatly and we'd also like to express our hope that this did not discourage you from the game entirely and that you'll give it another chance eventually - at least when we manage to hit the 1.0 version and exit Early access.

developer_response: Hi DUKES! We're sorry to see that you find the game to be unrewarding. We acknowledge that there are still some things that are waiting to find their way into the game which should make the overall experience more rewarding, but we'd like to emphasize that we are still in Early access and that we aim to get to the full, 1.0 release, and that we'll be supporting the game with additional content after its release. That is why we hope you'll give the game another chance eventually and that you'll find the sense of reward with the game that you've lost over time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198448820600', 'num_games_owned': 1337, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 55445, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 6, 'playtime_at_review': 47836, 'last_played': 1711322380}
review:
SCUM, hayatta kalma türündeki oyunlar arasında dikkat çeken ve benzersiz bir deneyim sunan bir yapım. Oyunu inceledikten sonra, SCUM'un sunduğu zorluklar, detaylar ve oynanabilirlik üzerine birkaç düşünce paylaşmak isterim.

Grafikler ve Görsel Tasarım:
SCUM, grafiksel olarak başarılı ve detaylı bir dünya sunuyor. Karakter modelleri, çevresel detaylar ve hava koşulları gibi faktörler, oyunun gerçekçiliğini artırıyor. Ancak, bazı optimizasyon sorunları ve nadir de olsa karşılaşılan grafik hataları gözlemlenebilir.

Hayatta Kalma ve Strateji:
Oyun, hayatta kalma unsurlarını ustalıkla bir araya getiriyor. Açık dünya haritasında beslenme, sağlık, su ve sıcaklık gibi temel ihtiyaçlarınızı dengelemek için stratejik kararlar almanız gerekiyor. Bu, oyunu gerçek bir hayatta kalma simülasyonu haline getiriyor.

Oynanabilirlik ve Kontroller:
SCUM, karmaşık bir kontrol sistemine sahip, ancak bir kez alıştıktan sonra oynanabilirlik oldukça tatmin edici. Farklı becerilere sahip karakterler yaratma, silah kullanma ve zorlu durumlarla başa çıkma konusundaki çeşitlilik, oyunun sürekli ilgi çekici kalmasını sağlıyor.

Topluluk ve Çok Oyunculu Deneyim:
Oyun, çok oyunculu bir ortamda rekabet ve işbirliği üzerine odaklanıyor. Topluluk etkinlikleri ve düzenli güncellemeler, oyuncuların bir araya gelmesini ve birlikte mücadele etmelerini teşvik ediyor. Ancak, bazen sunucu sorunları veya bağlantı problemleri yaşanabiliyor.

Geliştirici Desteği ve Güncellemeler:
Geliştirici ekip, SCUM'u sürekli olarak geliştirmeye ve güncellemeye devam ediyor. Bu, oyunun gelecekte daha da zenginleşeceği ve oyunculara yeni içerikler sunacağı anlamına geliyor.

Sonuç:
SCUM, hayatta kalma oyunlarına yeni bir soluk getiren ve detaylı bir oyun deneyimi sunan başarılı bir yapım. Grafiksel detaylar, zorlu hayatta kalma unsurları ve çeşitli oynanabilirlik seçenekleri, oyununun çekiciliğini artırıyor. Geliştirici ekibe, oyunculara bu deneyimi sunmaları için teşekkür ederim. Oyunu beğendiyseniz, gelecekteki güncellemelerle birlikte daha da heyecan verici bir deneyim sizi bekliyor olacak.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026474034', 'num_games_owned': 231, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 20011, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 59, 'playtime_at_review': 19693, 'last_played': 1711298278}
review:
За 6, ШЕСТЬ лет так называемой разработки эти криворукие так называемые рАзРаБоТчИкИ не могут пофиксить баги, которые древнее динозавров. Кусок сырого отвратительно оптимизированного игрового творения. Если дороги ваши нервы, то даже не запускайте и уж тем более не покупайте эту дичь, до тех пор пока не выйдет релиз и разрабы не поклянутся, что исправили все баги. Тогда заходите, убеждайтесь в том, что за 10+ лет ничего не изменится и благополучно закрывайте игру.

Если всё поправить, а не заниматься дополнительным контентом в видуе бункеров и прочих дополнений, то выходит лучший выживач на арене. Но увы и ах, рАзРаБоТчИкИ

author: {'steamid': '76561197970384320', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 5364, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 349, 'playtime_at_review': 1802, 'last_played': 1711619138}
review: In diesem Spiel ist man auf "realistische" Weise dabei zu überleben. Man muss gut auf seine Nahrungsaufnahme achten um nicht zuviel und auch nicht zu wenig zu Essen und zu Trinken. Die Kämpfe laufen recht fair ab ohne zu überfordern. Man darf sie aber nicht auf die leichte Schulter nehmen. Man sollte die Gegner nicht zu viele auf einmal werden lassen gegen die man aktiv kämpft, ansonsten ist man schneller tot als man glaubt. Im Singleplayer kann sich die Servereinstellungen nach dem eigenen Belieben anpassen, im Multiplayer ist man auf die Einstellungen des Serveradmins angewiesen. Dadurch lässt sich das eigene Vorankommen ganz individuell anpassen. Das Crafting ist relativ gut umgesetzt. Man braucht für die unterschiedlichen Ausbaustufen die verschiedensten Materialien die alle unterschiedlich schwer zu beschaffen sind. Manche kann man selbst herstellen, andere muss man abbauen und bei manchen muss einem das Lootglück helfen. Wenn man aber weiß wo man die Sachen finden kann, dann ist es nur eine Frage der Zeit bis man die benötigten Ressourcen findet. Das Schlösserknacken ist recht simpel wenn man einmal die Mechanik dahinter verstanden hat.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048004536', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 6897, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6897, 'last_played': 1709329238}
review: Has potential, a lot of it, but too slow and it's just awfully boring. Roughly 115 hours in the game and i honestly can say this was the most time, that i felt, I have wasted on games... ever. Basically running for hours (and i literally mean hours of IRL time running in-game to somewhere) to try and NOT find one item you need. Or when you finally get a car together after 10 hours of playing for it to be stolen by a cheater with esp. Who then admitted to cheating; then awkwardly explained/bragged about the cheats on the game (while robbing us blind from inside our base after splitting everyone's wig) which include, auto lock picking, auto bomb defuse, aimbot, radar, esp, fov enhancers, magic bullets (yes a cheat to trick the game to allow someone to shoot the same bullet a million times), and some others bullshit i cant remember. I really liked this game at first, really tried to give it a shot. But after the constant dick punching from the game, I have to give this game a thumbs down. Maybe in the future when the game is completely set in stone (and has improved), then ill change the review. 'Til then: THUMBS DOWN
developer_response: Hi Bush Wookie! We're sorry to see that you've had such a negative experience with a cheater, which ultimately ruined your time with SCUM. We'd like to point out that we are continuously improving our anti-cheat capabilities, which will enable us to remove these bad actors from the game almost instantaneously. That is why we'd like to kindly ask you to contact us with the information on your situation with the cheater via https://support.scumgame.com/ . There's a good chance the cheater was already removed, but we just want to make sure to be certain. As for the part with running to not find what you need, that is simply an issue of not looking in the right spot or that someone looted the places that you wanted to loot just before you got there. If you want to always find a lot of things, we recommend that you try out playing on private servers with modified loot settings. That being said, we hope that you'll give the game another chance and that you'll find enjoyment with it again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198421241439', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 71374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71374, 'last_played': 1703109319}
review:
Even though the game has lots of bugs, desync, unfinished stuff, and other problems...its the best game I ever played.
The amount of memories and moments that I had in this game are priceless, I always played it with a couple buddies of mine, don't recommend playing it solo, you really need a squad of at least 3 players to have a really good SCUM experience.
But I would recommend this game 100%, great memories were made
The gameplay itself isn't that bad, I think when the 1.0 version comes out with a couple more tweaks and hotfixes it's gonna reach its prime.

review: Best PvP survival game there is with awesome graphics and gameplay, but......it has a very guarded and niche community that are extremely soft when it comes to PvP and dont like being killed or raided at all, be prepared to watch the world chat or discord servers explode into days long episodes of everyone accusing EVERYONE of being a hacker or sit back and watch the developers spawning in raid equipment for streamers or reviving them live on stream....its a very special place for very special people and mama always told me i was the specialist as she was putting my helmet on every morning.

author: {'steamid': '76561198305502351', 'num_games_owned': 170, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 2079, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 321, 'playtime_at_review': 956, 'last_played': 1712422981}
review:
J'ai pas tout découvert mais sur un serveur privé avec des potes, le jeu est vraiment bon. Le choix de customisé les options c'est game changer. Mais attention on peut faire une partie solo local avec également la possibilité de changer les options et profiter d'apprendre à notre rythme. 

Le jeu est bon en tout point selon moi, graphismes, gameplay, survie et tout le reste.

Je recommande avec les amis ou seul. 

En revanche n'allez pas sur n'importe quel serveur, vous risquez d'être rapidement frustré.

Des bisous

author: {'steamid': '76561198836785209', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6891, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6627, 'last_played': 1710027760}
review: bunker is too scary. why so many dead bodies and jumping zombies and crying zombies, not fun to go in. zombies can open doors and jump in from the windows, creepiest ever. can we have some excitement and relaxing moments as well.
developer_response: Hi Evanie! We're sorry to see that you cannot find a lot of chill moments in the game. However, if you are playing in singleplayer, you can opt to remove the puppets from your game altogether from the server settings in the main menu. If you are playing in multiplayer, there are private servers that can accommodate your playstyle, you just need to find them. As for the bunkers, they are designed to bring a bit of variety to the experience as we wanted to have this scary space with those special types of enemies, but they are completely optional and you do not have to go in there. Hope that these suggestions will be enough to get you back in the game and that you will find moments of relaxation in it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198847690837', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1709234411}
review: My mouse cursor doesn't even line up with what I'm trying to select and I have no idea what to do to keep from starving. This game sucks in it's current state but does show promise. We'll see!
developer_response: Hi BillofRights257! There's an easy fix for the issue with the cursor. Just try switching between fullscreen and windowed modes ( and back again ) in the options panel. That alone should fix it. If that doesn't work, try switching the resolution and then reverting it back again. As for starving, you need to look for locations where it would be sensible to find food, such as supermarkets, shops, olive groves, vineyards, etc. There are even POI's like the dairy farm that have a lot of edible food there. If you are a newcomer, we suggest that you help yourself with the community-created SCUM map - https://scum-map.com/en/interactive_map which can help you find food. You can also try playing on private servers where the amount of loot is greatly increased which can also help you find food easier. Hope these help with the game and that you'll consider giving it another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198804550893', 'num_games_owned': 111, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 14378, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 8567, 'playtime_at_review': 5284, 'last_played': 1712499270}
review:
Polski:
SCUM to brutalna i realistyczna gra survivalowa, której celem jest przetrwanie w niebezpiecznym świecie, będącym areną dla brutalnych walk o dominację. Gra oferuje głębokie mechaniki przetrwania, w tym zarządzanie głodem, pragnieniem i innymi parametrami fizjologicznymi, co sprawia, że doświadczenie jest niezwykle immersyjne. Dodatkowo, SCUM oferuje także elementy rywalizacji, w tym możliwość prowadzenia walki z innymi graczami i zdobywania prestiżu na arenie. Pomimo pewnych niedociągnięć technicznych, gra przyciąga fanów survivali, którzy szukają brutalnego wyzwania.

English:
SCUM is a brutal and realistic survival game where the goal is to survive in a dangerous world, serving as an arena for brutal fights for dominance. The game offers deep survival mechanics, including managing hunger, thirst, and other physiological parameters, making the experience incredibly immersive. Additionally, SCUM also offers competitive elements, including the ability to engage in combat with other players and gain prestige in the arena. Despite some technical shortcomings, the game attracts survival fans looking for a brutal challenge.

author: {'steamid': '76561198397405855', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 21972, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 5060, 'playtime_at_review': 2077, 'last_played': 1712499791}

author: {'steamid': '76561198841474018', 'num_games_owned': 176, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 36111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35465, 'last_played': 1709492815}
review:
SCUM delivers a visceral and intense survival experience that pushes the genre to new heights. Set in a massive open world, players are dropped into a brutal environment where every decision matters. From managing hunger and hydration to navigating hostile encounters with other players and AI threats, SCUM demands both strategy and adaptability. 
The game's comprehensive character customization and progression systems allow for deep personalization, while its realistic physics and mechanics add an immersive layer of authenticity. Whether you're scavenging for resources, crafting tools, or engaging in intense firefights, SCUM keeps you on the edge of your seat with its relentless challenges and dynamic gameplay. With frequent updates and a passionate community, SCUM continues to evolve, making it a must-play for fans of the survival genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157239734', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 14217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 611, 'playtime_at_review': 13019, 'last_played': 1711400529}
review: This Horde update has ruined the game for me. Some people might like it but I don't enjoy landing on top of a puppet and having it scream its whole fucking family to gang bang me in the woods. Please leave me alone puppets. I just want to make my shitty stone knife and run from Z0 to B3 to my teammate, who's also dying to your shitty cousins screaming.
developer_response: Hi Bearded Dragon! We're sorry to see that you are thoroughly disappointed with the game. You'll be pleased to know that the team is aware that this feature does not work properly and that we are actively working on tweaking this system so that puppets spawn more organically. As for you and your friend spawning on different sides of the map, the official servers do not support this feature at the moment, but if you want to start playing together from the get-go, you can try finding a private server where admins are willing to teleport you together. That being said, we hope that you'll consider giving SCUM another chance and that you'll rejoin the game, especially after we manage to get to the 1.0 version.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198104598239', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 25043, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2253, 'playtime_at_review': 25043, 'last_played': 1712082368}
review:
Es un buen juego de supervivencia, gráficos chulos, con mucho contenido, armas (fabuloso), vehículos, caza y pesca, construcción de bases muy bueno, muchísimos edificios con interiores, mapa variadísimo con zonas espectaculares y con los sistemas de metabolismo, medicina, atributos y cocina más completos ke he visto hasta hoy, con amigos diversión al 1000%.

Si te gustan estos juegos lo vas a disfrutar seguro, yo lo juego y lo seguiré jugando pero no le puedo dar reseña positiva. Después de 6 años en desarrollo sigue plagado de errores ke te pueden arruinar horas de juego en un momento. Tiene 8 DLCs ke son pura estética y apoyo al desarrollo, espero ke cuando lo terminen no metan armas o contenido paytowin. Dicen ke le falta poco para salir de acceso anticipado y también dicen ke lo van a cambiar al motor Unreal 5, ya veremos si esto último no rompe aún más el juego.

Problemas en el PvE:
Cuando has jugado un tiempo y ya tienes de todo, dejas de jugar porke no hay ningún reto y se vuelve repetitivo hasta la saciedad. En cuanto aprendes como lidiar con el entorno, animales depredadores, zombis y robots no son ninguna amenaza. Los lobos los oyes de lejos y se matan fácilmente, los osos son de chiste para lo ke debería de ser un oso, los zombis es raro que te maten (palante patras y listo), los robots los degradaron tanto ke ya tampoco son un desafío. NPCs ke atraviesan puertas y suelos, zonas donde atraviesas el suelo cuando vas en tu vehículo y lo pierdes todo. El mundo submarino, naufragios, cuevas, entorno, es inexplorable ya ke hay un tiburón inmortal ke aparece y adiós.

Problemas serios en el PvP: 
El sonido es malísimo, no puedes ubicar disparos, en ocasiones no se oyen puertas ni pasos. 
El sistema de respawn es muy injusto para el ganador de un combate, haciendo ke el jugador derrotado pueda aparecer en cuestión de 2-5 minutos en el área del combate, mientras ke el ganador necesita recuperarse de sus heridas, estando con movilidad muy reducida o nula más de 5 minutos, dado el complejo sistema de salud.

En conclusión, si arreglan los problemas serios, lo abren de una vez a los modders y se ponen las pilas, será el mejor juego de supervivencia del mercado.

author: {'steamid': '76561198832179457', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3358, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2359, 'last_played': 1709361780}
review: If you like rust, day-z, any type of survival base building game. This is the game for you. 10/10 would recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198953105004', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 6136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6010, 'last_played': 1709753558}
review:
Es la cuarta vez que el vehiculo en el que ando se cae del mapa infiniamente, haciendo que pierda todo, podrian ponerse a jugar un poco al juego que hacen ustedes, y darse cuenta de los 100000000000 bugs que tiene, que aunque este en beta se deberian resolver, porque son tipicos bugs predecibles, como quedarse trabado en un lugar random porque al juego le da la gana, o que simplemente vas por la ruta y te caes del mapa porque si. Por ahora todas las horas que le eh metido y son muchas, las eh disfrutado muy poco. Siempre termino yendome del juego porque se bugea o porque pasa algo que te arruina todo el fameo que venis haciendo.
Ponganse las pilas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198846620984', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1708953836}
review: Ich muss auf Grund der Marktstrategie jetzt schon davon abraten das Spiel zu kaufen. Mal abgesehen davon dass die deutsche Version immer noch 3/4 fremdsprachig ist und es daher zu weilen recht anstrengend ist das Spiel zu spielen, zeichnet sich mit zunehmender Wartezeit auf eine deutsche Version eine richtige Abzocke ab. Noch bevor überhaupt eine Spielversion 1.0 draußen ist, werden Standardfunktionalitäten beschränkt, welche man dann mit kosmetischen DLCs etc. nachkaufen soll. Diese sind schon bereits zu Massen vor der V1.0 auf dem Markt. Man kauft also für 40 Euro das Spiel und dann soll man im Moment etwa 50 Euro nachschieben um alle Funktionen einen zukünftigen V1.0 nutzen zu können . Pfffuiiii schämt euch.

author: {'steamid': '76561199246394271', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1113, 'last_played': 1710038115}
review: If you're looking for an extremely difficult zombie apocalypse survival game, this game might be for you. The world of SCUM is an immersive open world (a humongous open world!) filled with towns infested by vicious zombies that will make your experience miserable, secrets, and vast terrains of grass, forests, etc, for you to try and survive in peace! This game is guaranteed to make you feel emotions such as determination, entertainment, fear, frustration, frustration, and frustration (did I mention frustration?). Considering this game is still in early access, I would still rate it an easy 7.5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064016260', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 8792, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1069, 'playtime_at_review': 6350, 'last_played': 1712464550}
review: Ruined with the hordes an new puppet spawn system.
developer_response: Hi Abdul! We're sorry to see that the horde update left you disappointed with the game! You'll be pleased to know that we acknowledge that the horde spawns do not function to the best of their ability and that the team is working on a fix for this which will make the spawns much more organic. That is why we'd like to invite you to keep an eye on our Steam announcements to see when the fix for this system will drop. We'd also like to express our hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance once we'll manage to get that sorted out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198806918864', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 21062, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21062, 'last_played': 1708859183}
review: 我犯了死罪，被流放到一座孤岛，全程直播供富人观赏娱乐。我被束缚住手脚从高空的飞机上坠落，好不容易挣脱拉开伞包，孤岛上等待着我的却是地狱。这里有和我一样穷凶极恶的其他死刑犯、有饥肠辘辘的野兽、有倾泻子弹炮火的高达、还有无处不在的被脑后芯片控制的死而复生的尸体。我摸了摸自己脑后的芯片，整个身体如坠冰窟，即将到来的威胁不仅于此，更有疾病与饥寒。

author: {'steamid': '76561198885794099', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 284126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 118, 'playtime_at_review': 283751, 'last_played': 1712486367}
review: Cheating(flying cars,bodies teleported to wherever the cheater wants and people clipping from walls) is out of control,no one cares to fix it and the saddest thing is that the admins want all the details from you and they just ban the cheatersafter you made aaaallll the work from you!!!Funny things ,stay away till they update their anticheat!If they will ever do it!
developer_response: Hi ToDekaToKako! We're sorry to see that your time with the game was soured because of cheaters. We'd like to express our regret because of this, but also provide some reassurance by stating that we are continuously improving our anti-cheat capabilities and that we will be further enhancing them by making the detection of cheats much more efficient and that we'll invest considerable effort towards that. Having said this, we hope that we've provided some reassurance as we are committed towards providing the best possible experience for our players and that you will return to the game once we'll have that sorted out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198986399199', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1763, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1760, 'last_played': 1708816595}
review: It's a fun game, playable in its current stage of development but does have various factors that make the fun of playing short-lived. Starting the game is especially difficult due to you being dropped in a random part of the map every single time you drop in, the completely unnecessary radiation, robots, "puppets" that randomly spawn next to you, or in buildings within your base after you place a banner, not being able to go to the trader to buy stuff until you hit a certain fame level (but you can sell to them). The tutorial also explains very basic concepts of the game with no real direction being given. Items rarely spawn to the point where you're looking for hours to find stuff of value. The game is fun to an extent but overly difficult to the point where its not enjoyable for long without playing with others.

author: {'steamid': '76561198186410610', 'num_games_owned': 1851, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 763, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 763, 'last_played': 1708797775}
review: Complete garbage, its incredible how it became worse to be honest.
developer_response: Hi Marliun! We're sorry to see that the game left you thoroughly disappointed. We'd like to emphasize that we're still in Early access and that we are aware that the game still has some underlying issues that undermine the experience our players have with the game. That being said, we'd also like to provide some reassurance and state that the team is committed towards solving these issues and to making the best possible version of SCUM when we hit the 1.0 mark. We truly hope that you'll consider giving it another chance once we manage to get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198206948575', 'num_games_owned': 161, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 8093, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8093, 'last_played': 1708716687}
review: This game has been out for 6 fucking years yet there is so many frustrating and literally game breaking bugs. within only a few days me and my buddies managed to somehow get our car stuck inside a telephone pole, lost the ability to use our mouse to select "respawn". I fell through the map 5+ times in one day one resulted in me being catapulted across the map into the ocean which cost me hours and hours worth of gear. This game is the definition of trash. The devs are clearly milking this shit out and have done nothing at all to fix these bugs that have existed since day 1. there is absolutely zero excuse for bugs this fucking big in a game thats almost at the global release stage. This game needs a lot of work and polishing. Could be fun if you enjoy wasting countless hours of your life just to get a 15 second straight lag that sends you rubber banding across the map. Or if you enjoy driving a car and textures just dont render so you end up slamming into a hay bale or rock that you literally couldnt see, resulting in you totaling your vehicle that took you ages to put together. I cannot stress enough how fucking retarded this game is. This game is a direct reflection of the lazy fucks that made it. Don't give these retards any more money.
developer_response: Hi bullgawd2679! We're sorry to see that you have experienced issues such as the ones you've mentioned. You are right to feel frustrated over this. We acknowledge that the game can be affected by such occurrences, especially on more populated servers. However, we'd like to provide at least some reassurance and state that the team is committed towards fixing these issues before we hit the 1.0 version of SCUM and that we'll have a dedicated optimization and bugfixing phase in order to make the game as polished as possible. We also understand and acknowledge the criticism regarding the long development time, but the end is on the horizon and we'll be hitting the 1.0 version in the foreseeable future. While the situations is far from ideal, we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance - at least when we manage to get these things sorted out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198118164756', 'num_games_owned': 24, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 147770, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145682, 'last_played': 1710111322}
review: SCUM é um jogo incrível que combina elementos de sobrevivência, ação e estratégia de forma envolvente. Sua vasta e detalhada ambientação, juntamente com mecânicas complexas de crafting e progressão de personagens, proporcionam uma experiência imersiva única. Além disso, o realismo nos aspectos de sobrevivência, como fome, sede e temperatura, adiciona um nível adicional de desafio e profundidade ao jogo. Com uma comunidade ativa e atualizações frequentes, SCUM continua a evoluir e oferecer novas experiências aos jogadores. Definitivamente recomendo para quem busca uma jornada desafiadora e gratificante no mundo dos jogos de sobrevivência

author: {'steamid': '76561198372876228', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 42, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1707083206}
review: Walking Simulator with no clear instructions on how to progress
developer_response: Hi The Tism! We're sorry to see that the game did not live up to your expectations! We acknowledge that the game has a steep learning curve and that some of the game's mechanics can be better communicated. However, there is an in-game manual that describes the mechanics of the game that is located when you press the 'Tab' button. As we'll be nearing the exit of our Early access run, we'll make sure to improve the new player experience to minimize situations such as the one you had. We respect your refund decision and we'd like to express our hope that you'll consider giving the game another try eventually once we manage to get to the 1.0 release.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038795944', 'num_games_owned': 621, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 34266, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34266, 'last_played': 1708770723}
review: พัฒนาใด้ไร้จุดหมายมาก พัฒนาไป3ขันแล้วก็ย้อนกลับมาทำใหม่ ใอ้ของเดิมที่มันดีอยู่แล้วก็ไปปรับให้มันชับช้อนยุ่งยากขึ้น  แทนที่จะทำอันใหม่แยกไปเลย อย่างบังเกอร์เนี่ย  ในบังเกอร์มันก็มีคิลบ็อคอยู่แล้ว  ใครจะเข้าคิลบ็อคก็หาคีย์กับชวนเพื่อนเข้าไปสิ  กูหรือบางคนแค่อยากจะไปหาปืนหากระสุนเฉยๆไม่เข้าคิลบ็อคก็ใด้ แต่แม่งอัพใหม่เป็นบังเกอร์เหี้ยไรก็ไม่รู้  ทำให้คิลบ็อคไม่มีสิ่งที่น่าจูงใจให้เข้าไป  แถมคนเล่นสายฟาร์มคนเดียวอย่างกูเข้าไปลำบากอีกตัวเหี้ยไรไม่รู้ยั้วเยี้ยไปหมดมืดก็มืด แทนที่จะทำหลุมบังเกอร์แบบใหม่แยกต่างหากไป   รถยนต์หรือยานพาหนะ อัพชะจนเริ่มกลายเป็นภาระชิ้นส่วนกับรายระเอียดแม่งเยอะยุบยิบไปหมด  แทนที่จะอัพเป็นชุดเกราะให้มาติดเอาเฉยๆ ไปรีอัพให้มันเสียเวลาเปล่าประโยชน์   อัพใหม่อัพเป็นคอนเทนเพิ่มไปเป็นจุดๆในแผนที่ก็ใด้ไม่ใช่แม่งรีโนเวสใหม่  เกมส์ยังอยู่ในช่วงกำลังพัฒนาแต่แม่งเล่นขาย DLC แล้ว

author: {'steamid': '76561198767696167', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 373, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 373, 'last_played': 1708749839}
review: Honestly the devs seem to have over-prioritized realism with this game, exhaustion is just a constant overbearing force that requires you to rest sometimes for multiple irl hours at a time, reloading is a pain requiring you to drag ammo to a magazine then to drag the magazine to the gun making firearms rarely useful, and I'm not personally a fan of inventory tetris. There are definitely positives to the game notably the nutrition system works quite well and real life medical problems with the exception of exhaustion flow very well within the game. It is also quite funny to have to remove your pants so as to prevent your character simply squatting and taking a deuce directly in your underwear, a misstep requiring many a rare bars of soap to clean.
developer_response:
Hi CopLegacy! We're sorry to see that the game left you disappointed in certain aspects. The exhaustion mechanic kicks in if you are bringing your character always to the brink of his/hers physical abilities, meaning that things such as prolonged sprinting sessions with weights on your back can bring your character down quickly. That is why sometimes it is a good idea to rest on chairs, beds, or simply lying on the ground so that your character doesn't get exhausted.

As for the reloading, you do not have to manually place a magazine into your weapon each time you want to reload. The only manual thing that you have to do is place bullets into the magazine. However, if you have a magazine in your inventory that has bullets in it, you can simply press 'R' to reload your weapon.

Also, we checked the situation with defecation and we have found that the character does not soil themselves if you pick the 'Poop' option through the Tab menu. You only do so if you do not manage to do that intentionally, which then results in your character relieving themselves with their clothes on.

Hope this clears it up for you and we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance eventually.

author: {'steamid': '76561198852201728', 'num_games_owned': 432, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 6564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 159, 'playtime_at_review': 2322, 'last_played': 1712486161}
review: 游戏还可以 差评是因为制作组强制服务器搭建必须租他们的关系户服务商 导致你和朋友联机要么进各种乱七八糟的服务器要么花高价去租他们的服务器。这种强制高价服务器另外会导致开服服主成本提高 羊毛出在羊身上 服务器环境直接变差一个档次

author: {'steamid': '76561198313501580', 'num_games_owned': 27, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1278, 'last_played': 1673815970}
review:
Sehr schönes und vor allem ein sehr detailliertes Spiel mit einem mittelmäßigen Bausystem. Lobenswert ist der direkte Kontakt von Developer zu der Community und deren Interessen gut umzusetzen. 

Bin davon sehr überzeugt, dass "SCUM" ein sehr gutes Survival Spiel ist, welches an viele Kleinigkeiten gedacht haben und dessen Realismus dadurch nach oben gezogen wird. (Ich meine, man muss KOTZEN und PISSEN und wenn man eine Maske trägt, dann kann man nichts essen, clever?!) 

Die Zombies sind herausfordernd und in einem guten Team macht PVE sehr viel Spaß. Wer gerne mal etwas anderes ausprobieren will, als wie 0815 Survival Games, der ist hier gut bedient. 

~ Aber letzendlich .. Müsst ihr wissen!

review: I've tried everything to get the game to load. It comes up with a black screen and I never even see the the start screen for the game after it has initialized. I've even tried to put the game into windowed mode as a work-around and it refuses to go into windowed mode. I guess it's time to cut my losses and uninstall this game. For those interested, I run Steam on an ASUS ROG and yes, I've updated the drivers and put in extra code for HDL display as well.
developer_response: Hi shirotoko! We're sorry to see that you are experiencing these issues and that they are souring your experience with SCUM. We'd like to kindly direct you to our support team at https://support.scumgame.com/ who will do everything they can to assist you with this. We'd hate to see you discouraged from the game entirely because of something that can be fixed, which is why we truly hope that you'll contact us so we can get to the bottom of it and so that you can continue playing SCUM.

developer_response: Hi Ticklez! We're sorry to see that you did not have a satisfying experience with SCUM. While the official PvP servers cater much more to squads, you can find official solo/duo server that focuses on sole survival of individual players in a PvP setting. You also have the option to enjoy the game in singleplayer. Also, there are private servers with all kinds of specific settings that are modified for various playstyles that you can partake in. That being said, we hope that you'll give the game another chance and that you'll find a mode of playing SCUM that caters to you the most.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065798761', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 5151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5064, 'last_played': 1709967433}
review:
It's not bad game, but it's missing something to get recommend.

I went in blind. In terms of single player it was over for me after fully looting bunker. Endgame then would be multiplayer and pvp. The problem with that is, that there is no way to store your items without being looted. If you ever had base in such game you know you get raided sooner than later and all your stuff you worked for and base you worked to build will be gone and destroyed because "game mechanic". It's not fun so I pass on that. Devs seem to have wrong idea about bases, they should add some small storage that cannot be looted, otherwise multiplayer is really really demoralising and unfun.

Otherwise it's cool survival game with a complex mechanics that will be appealing to very few specific people. And that's a lot of work.
developer_response: Hi sunny boy! We're sorry to see that you've lost interest in the game. We're currently focused on delivering a fully optimised, polished and bug-free experience as we'll be nearing the full 1.0 release of the game. We acknowledge the gripes that you've mentioned with the game and we'd like to reassure you that more content will be coming into SCUM before we exit Early access and that we'll be supporting the game after its release. We hope that you will give the game another chance eventually and that you will be able enjoy it enough to recommend it one day.
