author: {'steamid': '76561197996191797', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 10332, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10332, 'last_played': 1704403452}
review: SCUM is an unpolished mess of a game that fails to deliver on its promises. Using early access as a crutch for its numerous issues is a cop-out, and the constant push for DLC shows how the developers have become more focused on making money than fixing the core gameplay. The lack of optimization, bugs, and lackluster content make this a frustrating experience that ultimately feels like a cash grab. Save your money and wait for a more complete and competent game
developer_response: Hi Heretic! We're sorry to see that you were disappointed with the game. We'd like to point out that being in Early access and the support we received from our fans with the DLC's has greatly helped with the development of the game - especially during the turmoil of the pandemic. However, we do acknowledge that the game still has some underlying issues even after such a long time in the oven, but we'd like to provide some reassurance that we will make sure to fix them and to further polish and optimize it in order to make the 1.0 experience as smooth as possible. That is why we'd like to express our hope that you will consider giving the game another chance once we manage to get these issues sorted out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088726895', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1800, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1723, 'last_played': 1708721598}
review:
Also nach 50 Spielstunden von mir eine klare Kaufempfehlung vorne weg .
Selbst auf einen  Intel System mit 4 Kernen  ,32 GB  Arbeitspeicher und ner NVidia  1080 TI absolut flüssig mit bis zu 120 FPS .
Kommen wir zum Spiel und da gehe ich vom Grundspiel aus  , man kann am Anfang zwischen  Mann und Frau auswählen ,deren Aussehen  kann man  verändern  und wer mehr will , den bieten  manche DLC´s mehr Auswahl .
Dazu kommt noch die 5 Attribute  ,die man individuell einstellen kann .
Ist man damit fertig ,wird man  aus dem Flugzeug geworfen als verurteilter Häftling .
Man landet per Fallschirm und einen implantierten Chip im Hinterkopf  auf einer Insel mit Zombies .
Sollte man die Insel verlassen wollen , wird der Chip  im Hinterkopf explodieren .
Deine Strafe verbüßt du auf der Insel  ,soviel zur Story .
Fast alles ist einstellbar in den Optionen ,wenn man keine Horden will ,kann man es abstellen ,wenn man mehr Loot will , geht dies auch .
Man fängt also an mit Steinen  und Holz sammeln wie in jeden  Survival  Spiel , aber dann nimmt es auch ganz schnell eigene Züge an .
Man baut daraus Pfeil und Bogen ,Speer und Messer , Rucksack und Köcher .
Dazu kommen irgendwann die Zombies dazu . 
Man trifft sie in Städten  ,vereinzelt in Wälder  , Militär Bunker ,Schrottplätze , Militärcamps und es gibt verschiedene Arten von denen .
Von explodierenden Zombies bis zu fast untötbaren Zombies und Zombie Horden ist alles dabei ,dazu kommen noch die Mech´s , die einen den Gar aus machen , ruck zuck .
Ich bin ja nicht so der Freund vom looten  , aber Scum geht noch einen Schritt weiter .
Es gibt Händler ,wo man seinen Loot verkaufen kann ,man kann sich bei Händlern eindecken mit allen ,was man praktisch looten kann , abhängig von seinen Ruhm .
Je länger man lebt ,desto mehr Ruhmpunkte erhält man . 
Man muss auf seine Gesundheit achten , kann seine 5 Attribute verbessern durch  Crafting ,schiessen usw.
Bei kämpfen mit Zombies kann man schwer verletzt werden , es gibt Antibiotika , Vitamin Pillen usw. um eine Infektion entsprechend zu behandeln .
Was kann man alles looten fragt ihr euch , es fängt an von Nahrung ,Schraubendrehern , Waffen , Munition , Büroklammern , und sogar Autos , Fahrräder .
Bei den Autos können Reifen ,Sitze ,Türen , Lichtmaschiene und auch die Batterie fehlen .
Die findet man dann meistens an anderer Stelle oder baut sie von anderen herumstehenden Autos ab .
Scum bietet auch Base Building an mit vielen Möglichkeiten ,dieses Spiel hat einen Multiplayer ,da ist für jeden was dabei  von PVE bis PVP .
Selbst RolePlay ist bei diesen Spiel möglich , das erinnert mich stark an meine Arma 3 / Altis Life  Zeit .
Scum geht aber eher in die Schiene PubG  mit Zombies .
Kommen wir zurück zum Spiel .
Spätestens wenn man sein erstes Auto gefunden hat ,will man die restlichen Teile looten , 
wenn es nicht schon komplett ist  .
Alles ist möglich ,Verschleiß ist auch ein Thema , Autos ,Kettensägen ,Flammenwerfer ,alles muss betankt und auch irgendwann repariert werden ,selbst die Waffe kann kaputtgehen .
 Man kann  kochen ,man findet Gasflaschen  , in den Häusern gibt es Gaskocher und Gasherde ,die Gaskocher kann man ebenfalls looten .
Man arbeitet praktisch auf einer eigenen Base hin , immer im Hinterkopf ,jeden Moment könnte man auf eine Horde , Zombies treffen ..
Die Fahrzeuge im Spiel ähneln an bekannten Fahrzeugen der Realität  , da haben wir den bekannten VW Golf 2 ,der im Spiel  ähnlich heißt  , den Lada  , im Spiel  Laika genannt und den neu in Patch 0.95 hinzugekommenen Ranger Pickup .
Es gab mal eine Zeit lang den Traktor ,der soll wohl irgendwann vielleicht wieder kommen .
Ihr seht schon , ich könnte immer weiter schreiben ,so tiefgründig ist das Spiel .
Für Scum gibt es verschiedene DLC´s , die brauch man nicht , ich für meinen Teil kaufe die DLC´s  um die Entwickler zu unterstützen .
Die Entwickler hören sehr auf die Comunity und setzen auch vieles um .
Die DLC´s geben neben 2  vorgefertigten Charakteren auch mehr Frisuren  für Mann und Frau ,mehr Waffen ,  Waffenaussehen  usw.
Ich hab dieses Game gekauft  für um die 26 Euro , jeden Cent gut investiert , klare Kaufempfehlung .

author: {'steamid': '76561198079963569', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 966, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 454, 'last_played': 1710276931}
review:
Titel: Ein Meisterwerk des Survival-Genres: Eine umfassende Rezension von "SCUM"

Als passionierter Spieler von Survival-Spielen war ich auf der Suche nach einem Titel, der nicht nur die üblichen Elemente bietet, sondern auch eine immersive und tiefgehende Erfahrung liefert. SCUM hat meine Erwartungen nicht nur erfüllt, sondern übertroffen. Dieses Spiel, entwickelt von Gamepires und Croteam, ist zweifellos ein Meisterwerk des Genres und bietet eine beeindruckende Vielfalt an Gameplay-Optionen, realistische Mechaniken und eine atemberaubende grafische Präsentation.

Ein herausragendes Merkmal von SCUM ist seine authentische Darstellung des Überlebenskampfes. Vom ersten Moment an wird der Spieler in eine gnadenlose Umgebung geworfen, in der Nahrung, Wasser und Schutz lebenswichtig sind. Doch SCUM geht über die üblichen Mechaniken hinaus, indem es den Spielern eine Vielzahl von Bedürfnissen präsentiert, die sie erfüllen müssen, darunter auch die Verwaltung von Kalorien, Proteinen und Vitaminen. Dies zwingt die Spieler, ihre Entscheidungen sorgfältig zu überdenken und ihre Ressourcen effektiv zu nutzen, um am Leben zu bleiben.

Ein weiterer Höhepunkt von SCUM ist seine unerreichte Vielseitigkeit. Das Spiel bietet eine riesige offene Welt, die erkundet werden will, von dichten Wäldern bis hin zu verlassenen Städten. Darüber hinaus gibt es eine Fülle von Crafting-Möglichkeiten, die es den Spielern ermöglichen, ihre Umgebung zu nutzen, um Waffen, Werkzeuge und Unterkünfte zu bauen. Diese Freiheit fördert die Kreativität und erlaubt es jedem Spieler, seinen eigenen Weg zu finden.

Die Grafik von SCUM ist ein weiterer Grund, warum es sich von anderen Spielen des Genres abhebt. Die detailreiche Welt ist atemberaubend gestaltet und bietet eine beeindruckende Vielfalt an Landschaften und Umgebungen. Die Charaktermodelle sind ebenfalls äußerst realistisch und tragen dazu bei, eine immersive Spielerfahrung zu schaffen.

Abgesehen von der Einzelspielererfahrung bietet SCUM auch ein umfangreiches Mehrspieler-Feature. Spieler können sich zusammenschließen, um zu überleben oder gegeneinander anzutreten, was zu dynamischen und spannenden Interaktionen führt. Die Integration von PvP- und PvE-Elementen sorgt für eine ständig wechselnde Spielumgebung, die selbst nach Stunden des Spielens nicht langweilig wird.

Insgesamt ist SCUM ein herausragendes Beispiel für das Survival-Genre. Mit seiner realistischen Darstellung des Überlebenskampfes, seiner beeindruckenden Vielseitigkeit und seiner atemberaubenden Grafik setzt es neue Maßstäbe für das Genre. Egal, ob Sie alleine spielen oder sich mit Freunden zusammenschließen, SCUM bietet eine unvergleichliche Spielerfahrung, die Sie stundenlang in ihren Bann ziehen wird.

review:
Был у меня мотоцикл, 10 дней я его не заводил... пропал он
Была у меня Нива, накрыло её эйрдропом... сгорела она
Был голодный, съел 25 псилоцибиновых грибов,  голод не прошёл, но глючило почти сутки, проблевался, съел платформу угля, попил воды... глюки прошли, но теперь со мной летает ворона, назвал Трип.
Копил всю игру деньги, успел купить пикап по скидке, осталось на банку тушёнки... Нива была топчик (((
В общем, если хочется получить весь кайф выживания, то однозначно рекомендую Scum!

author: {'steamid': '76561198333152080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 10166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 355, 'playtime_at_review': 1461, 'last_played': 1712017540}
review:
有些地方能说是硬核，有些地方就纯有些膈应人了
（我只是一个新手，相信老手有很多经验可以避开这些问题，但只想说以下的这些设定太不合理了）
近战武器和枪械前摇后摇长，可以理解
本身很多建造搜集就很麻烦，流程也很长，尤其是载具，背包又小还容易损坏，真的就是一趟一趟搬来搬去，也可以理解
但是这个僵尸刷新是真的恶心，完完全全就是现刷的，基本要近到五十米以内僵尸才会开始刷
你一路跑到一个路口看到空无一人，只要你转过头去再转回来，立马一堆的僵尸
有时甚至都不需要转过去，都会看到僵尸落地生成的过程
如果你不巧被一个僵尸发现，从而惊动了尸群
于是五秒前还空无一人的路口，因为刷出了一个僵尸并且发现了你，瞬间就变出二十个僵尸，而且其中可能七八个都是狂暴僵尸，跑的比玩家快的多
最恶心的来了，你拿着辛辛苦苦搜的喷子，和肝了一白天搜到的几盒霰弹，你如果跑，因为狂暴僵尸比你跑得快，他最终会击中你，一旦击中，就是很长很恶心的硬直，减速且打断一切动作，差不多要持续半秒到一秒，而不少枪械的开火前摇也都是半秒到一秒，而僵尸攻击速率又快，于是你就不断的在开火前摇-被僵尸攻击打断中循环，根本打不出一发，近战武器也基本同理
基本可以得到一个结论，你如果不慎吸引了一个尸群，跑路基本是没什么用的
那如果一开始就回头站桩输出呢
那你最好期待你的子弹够多，并且持续开枪不会吸引出更多的僵尸。就算这样也可能操作失误，放过来那么几个僵尸，那么就会再次出现上面的情况
或者搜房区，刚刚清完点，准备开箱子了，然后当着你面就给你空降僵尸
说实话，我大多fps游戏都是稳扎稳打，眼观六路的打法，先收集信息清点，再决定打法。
这游戏刚搜完确认空无一物安全的房间，立马给你刷出僵尸反手就把你围住，是真的把我打得有些破防。你要是真的硬核游戏，为什么不保证NPC刷新机制和现实尽量贴近？我宁愿房区野地僵尸数量多点，也不愿意是这样高频率凭空刷新的，非常反直觉，至少数量多我可以提前观测好位置逐个潜行击破

近战武器打击感极差，日常看上去打中了实际没打中
操作比较反人类，主要是键位和一些操作逻辑

别的硬核方面感觉还是可以接受，比如繁多详细的子弹种类，复杂的建造材料，生存健康要素等

author: {'steamid': '76561198284496981', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 938, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1708805624}
review:
SCUM est un bon jeu, il n'est pas parfait mais pas nul.
Je n'ai pas joué à ce jeu des tonnes d'heures mais suffisamment pour souligner certains défauts et certaines qualités.

SCUM est complet comparé à son rival DayZ qui m'a laissé un goût amer par son vide.
On ne peut le modder, du moins pas depuis le workshop Steam et pas que je sache. Cependant, le jeu est complet donc nul besoin de le modder.
Ce jeu se veut complexe et compliqué, ce qu'il réussit à faire même s'il n'excelle pas dans ce domaine.
C'est un bon jeu de survie, comme il y en a des centaines qui ont copié la recette de DayZ ou 7 Days to Die pour la remanier à leur sauce, ça n'est pas une mauvaise sauce. Il se démarque sur certains points comme j'ai cité en haut : la complexité. D'autres points également comme l'ajout de robots qui protègent les zones à gros loot.
Bon, maintenant quels sont les points forts et moins forts :

Points forts :
Le gameplay que je trouve intéressant sur certaines facettes.
L'ambiance qui est plutôt réussie et sympathique.
Le solo, car oui, tout le monde n'est pas sociable donc tout le monde ne veut pas jouer en RP.
La complexité, c'est ce que je souligne depuis le début, mais c'est LE point fort.
La satisfaction de tuer un joueur, oui, comme beaucoup de jeux de survie dans ce genre.

Points faibles :
Les serveurs, dites-vous que j'ai passé une soirée entière à chercher à accéder aux serveurs qui ne faisaient que de crasher.
La mauvaise optimisation, j'ai une config plutôt sympathique pourtant lorsque je joue en multi, le jeu varie entre 120 et 20 fps, ce qui fait une grande différence. Cependant, en solo le jeu est stable.


Alors concluons cet avis, pourquoi acheter SCUM ? Je ne sais pas. C'est un jeu comme un autre, comme il en existe des tonnes. Mais, malgré qu'il en existe des tonnes, il reste meilleur (selon moi) que certains jeux comme DayZ (oui, je n'aime pas ce jeu qui vaut trop cher pour ce qu'il propose.) Malgré tout, en lisant les avis, le jeu regresse avec le temps, donc vaut-il le coût ? je ne sais pas.
Il est sympa et on peut y passer des heures sans se soucier du temps.
Il existe de meilleurs jeux dans ce genre, mais il s'en sort bien.
Seul vous pourrez fonder votre avis.

author: {'steamid': '76561198144300918', 'num_games_owned': 79, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 5594, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2022, 'last_played': 1710964453}
review: the idea of the game is not so bad but the system is trash , Fame points system is so stupid once you die you lose sooo much huge amount which will reset you for older levels in game , and there are more than million reason to die , so much details are killing the game seriously , they want you to play the game 45 hours a day lol no recommended at all , here RUST take the win 100%
developer_response: Hi Cleveland Brown (RACISM)! We're sorry to see that the fame points system ruined your time with the game. SCUM is designed to be a hardcore survival game and the death of your character is something that cannot go without certain repercussions. However, we understand that this system is not to everyone's liking, which is why we've enabled adjustments for it for private servers, which is why we'd like to advise that you try and find a private server where the loss of fame points is modified so that you don't lose as much when you die. That being said, we hope that you'll give the game another chance and find a server that caters to your preferences.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054256395', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 63719, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 5120, 'playtime_at_review': 51481, 'last_played': 1712481544}
review: Honestly the best survival game I have ever played. This game (at least for me) is everything I wanted DayZ to be. With that being said, it in its vanilla form is by no means easy. Also, it is still full of bugs. Non of these bugs are game breaking or even ruin the experience (at least for me). This game is 10/10 in environmental beauty, 10/10 in replay ability, and 10/10 when it comes to development being open and honest about issues and addressing them. This games is overwhelmingly ambitious for any developer, and the fact it has made it to where it is now is a feat in itself. If you are new to the game and wanting to take baby steps towards learning it or are looking for a more casual experience, then come join us at 40 HOUR WEEKS! That’s right, I enjoy this game so much, and want to share my enjoyment of it, that I pay for a public server to share with you. Whether it’s on my server or anyone else’s, do yourself a favor and give this game a try. It offers things you will never find in other open world survival titles.

review:
unable to get started.   1 step forward & 2 steps back.   Food is not available.  the puppets seem to spawn before you can get even a basic stone spear crafted-- and they spawn in crowds of 3-6 at a time.   1 or 2 i can handle.  but 4-6?  nope.
rinse & repeat until your out of money and have to recreate your character.
developer_response: Hi kittle! We're sorry to see that the current state of the game made you disappointed with it. While food can easily be found in a fair share of POI's, kitchens, supermarkets, etc., we acknowledge that there are issues with the puppets spawns. That is why we'd like to reassure you and confirm that the team is working on a fix for that system, which will make puppet spawns much more organic. That is why we'd like to invite you to keep an eye on our Steam announcements to see when the fix for this system will drop and express our hope that you will give SCUM another try.

review: I can honestly say now with over 1000 hrs playing this game, that it is totally worth it. There are still bugs and glitches but in the grand scheme of things, these are minor nuisances given what the game has become. The Devs seem to be on top of it and really get the job done. There is literally something here for everyone. You can excel in pretty much any game-play style, be it loner, team player, PvE, PvP, crafter, base builder, chef, gearhead, you name it... I'm looking forward to another 1000+ hours to see what's next!

review: 太糟糕了，更新之后变得玩不了。启动游戏直接闪退了。 论坛贴吧找不到任何解决的方案，显卡驱动更新了，游戏重装了，文件完整性也验证过了 启动游戏就直接闪退。

author: {'steamid': '76561197999403507', 'num_games_owned': 1175, 'num_reviews': 1276, 'playtime_forever': 20286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20286, 'last_played': 1708134103}
review:
Gra w obecnym stanie po grudniowym HORDE update to dramatyczny crap. Wprowadzono zepsuty i odklejony system pojawiania się zombiakow. Zrujnowalo to rozgrywkę do tego stopnia, że ponad połowa graczy opuściła ten tytuł.
Mimo masy sprzeciwu i sygnałów, devsi uparcie brną by utrzymać nowy system, z bezczelnymi uśmieszkami i odpowiedziami , ze to super zmiana i może to nie jest gra dla tych co narzekaja. I fakt widać jak powoli ubywa i ubywa graczy. Powychodziły kolejne hotfixy mające trochę usprawniać rozgrywkę. Ale daremnie, bo graczy nadal ubywa, a rozgrywka dalej zieje dramatem i zombiaki spawnują się od czapy i to tylko w zasiegu kilku kilkunastu metrów od gracza, co odebrało tej grze sens ji logikę działania. 
Przed tym nieszczęsnym updatem było już tak pięknie, widziało się z oddali błąkające się zombiaki, inne leżały nieaktywne i zbliżenie się sprawiało, że wstawały. można było zaplanować jakąś rozgrywke. System hordy zmienił ta grę w bezmyslny zombie slasher. Wpadasz , robisz halas tak by aktywowała się horda, z nikąd, dookoła ciebie pojawia się tłum nieumarłych i możesz sobie ich kosić do woli karabinem maszynowym, w trakcie tego aktywuje się kolejna horda, później kolejna, aż kończą się zasoby spawnu na dany moment i kolejna horda to już tylko jeden puppet się pojawia, a ty masz na koncie z 20- 30 killi i górę zwłok dookoła. Obecnie hotfixem zminimalizowano aktywność hordy, i wypluwa dwa trzy puppety,  do tego, nieudolne próby naprawy systemu pojawiania się zombiaków sprawił , ze faktycznie nie spawnuja sie na graczu, tylko kilkadziesiąt metrów dalej i komicznym pląsem baletowym z rękami wystawionymi do przodu płyną  (czsami bokiem, czasami kręcąc się) w stronę gracza( bo maja nadal przesadzony system ESP namierzania gracza, mimo, że będziesz schowany). 
Nowy update sprawił , ze najczęstsza przyczyną zgonu jest jakiś bug. Mozna się zgliczować w jakimś obiekcie i wtedy dopada nas stado a my możemy tylko patrzeć i nie da się już ruszyć. System walki wręcz to ciągła niewiadoma czy zarejestruje trafienie czy może jednak nie nas zabije,  Takich niuansów jest dużo, ale wszystkie były do przełknięcia, jeśli odnalazło się sposób na siebie w tej grze.  Obecnie jednak system gdzie wszystko jest puste jak lokacja widmo i dopiero zbliżenie się triggeruje jakieś pojawianie się puppetów na dłuższą metę zniechęca jeszcze bardziej.

Ta gra to też fenomen pod innym względem. O ile w takim DayZ potrafi być toksyczne community, co widać w dyskusjach , ze jakiekolwiek krytyczne uwagi są od razu gnojone przez wyznawców tytułu z pierdyliardem godzin na koncie.. To w SCUMie toksyczni są sami devsi moderujacy dyskusje. Tutaj za uwagi i opisywanie problemów dostaje się bana na udział w dyskusjach (wystarczy zobaczyć jak często w jakiejś dyskusji widoczna jest przy nicku na czerwono informacja o zbanowaniu) Fenomen po prostu. 
Dodano nowy samochód który jest jak powietrze, próbujesz rozjechać zombiaka, a tu niestety, nie da się, bo przenika on przez tekstury auta. 
Ta gra to jak ledwie trzymający szwy połatany worek z łajnem, gdzie co chwila coś z jakiejś stron się wylewa. A co robi deweloper zamiast  posłuchać graczy i coś naprawić? Wydaje kolejne kosmetyczne płatne DLC.
  

Otwarty świat, survival, malownicze tereny, świetna grafika otoczenia, klimat. To wszystko mnie pochłonęło i zapadłem się w rozgrywkę. Możliwości craftowania z rzeczy przypadkowo znalezionych o wiele większa niż w DayZ. Zaczynając grę nie musisz robić wyścigu z czasem by coś znaleźć do przetrwania, wszystko leci intuicyjnie i wciąga. Ale niestety.
Tak jak i znajomi z którymi grałem godzinami , zrazili się odeszli od tej gry na dobre,tak myślałem, ze wytrzymam trochę dłużej, ale niestety nie da się i obecna rozgrywka to tylko strata czasu. Szczerze odradzam zakup w tym stanie, można się strasznie rozczarować.

review: Raw shit. Still. A lot of bugs, poor on performance. You can spent a lot of hours of playing and then just cant connect to the server because of regular stupid errors. Enjoy new character. Network performance is awful. Don't recommend this game. Piece of crap.
developer_response: Hi stolker! There were some unexpected and unforeseen disturbances with the servers over the weekend, which created some issues for our players. We apologize for the inconvenience and we'd like to emphasize that the issues are present no more and that you can continue playing SCUM. We hope that this temporary occurrence did not detract you from playing the game altogether and that you'll consider giving it another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198987256613', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 569, 'last_played': 1708772155}
review:
Я скачал эту игру в ожидании хардкорного выживания. Всего за первые пару часов у меня сгорела жопа раз 5.
Игра определенно для мазахистов. Я почти каждый раз умираю либо от жажды либо от голода. Я случайно зашел в зону с радиацией и облучился, после такого раны просто не заживали, сняв с себя последние трусы для перевязки, отчаявшись я пошел на военный объект и нашел там Desert Eagle без патронов и обоймы. Поняв что заражение и кровотечение уже не остановить я взял сковороду в руки и начал из последних сил биться за жизнь после чего умер и все потерял. Мой вам совет, не ходите куда попало в SCUM.

review: I'll keep it short. This is a fun game. It's my favorite survival game. The graphics and gameplay outmatch other games in the genre. I embarrassingly admit that I held off purchasing this game for years due to the "complexity" of the health and equipment management systems. Well, I was wrong. It's fun and intuitive once you figure it out. The devs do a great job with updates. I'm still a noob with just over 30 hours in, but I don't have much negative to say. I'm looking forward to future updates!

author: {'steamid': '76561198018211540', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 41167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41056, 'last_played': 1708118377}
review:
Time for a review.
1. A lot of cinematics and some pictures you can see here have nothing to do with the game.
2. The grind for stats, for resources, the amount needed to upgrade or even build your base. The fact that everything loses durability and quite fast. Some stuff should not lose durability at all..
3. Weird updates, no good stuff for the game. Slow progress. Bugs not being fixed. Wheelbarrow is broken for years and is annoying as you know what.
4. Lack of construction options and information.
5. Huge lack of QOL, like auto sorting options. If you like sorting thousands of items, endlessly.. Lack of basic information of stats, which you can only check in the game itself, but not when creating a character.
6. Lack of search filters for servers. Basically have to go into a dozen of servers, check everything yourself and research, ask, instead of having all the QOL option from the beginning.
7. Would never recommend anyone playing on vanilla servers (official), the drop rate and skill progression is so bad. And you don't get to keep stats switching servers.
8. Big lack of content, there are caves, diving areas, etc. Which have nothing. And nothing changed for years.
9. When you get to "late game" when you have a good base and most materials, there is nothing to do except pvp. There's only abandoned bunker with broken Brenor and nuclear power plant, which isn't even worth doing.
10. To put it all together, huge grind, so later you can pvp. Bugs, some that don't get fixed. Lack of QOL, features, building options. It's just boring grind with nothing to do in the endgame. Not polished. If you can, give it a try, but expect to spend many hours of grind. There's so many things i can list but, not going to post a wall of text.
developer_response: Hi blackborg! We'd like to thank you for this extensive review and we'd like to express our regret that the game did not live up to your expectations and that the lack of quality of life features is something that hinders your time with it. Some of these things are valid and would definitely elevate the experience of SCUM. We'd like to emphasize that the game is still in Early access and there are still changes and improvements that will find their way into the game prior to its full 1.0 release. Apart from adding new content and improvements, we'll also be polishing, optimizing and bugfixing, in other words making the SCUM the best possible version of itself. After its initial release, we'll also make sure to further support the game with additional improvements, especially those concerning quality of life. That being said, we hope that you'll give the game another chance and that you'll consider returning to it, at lest when we manage to hit the 1.0 mark.

developer_response: Hi ItsMeSnipe! We're sorry to see that the perceived lack of loot has ruined your time with the game. We've tweaked the loot system multiple times in order to modify the amount of loot on the server. It is important to note that SCUM was never designed to be a game that showers you with loot and that in order to find the best items in the game, you will need to brave the most challenging places in the game, which are abandoned bunkers, police stations, regular bunkers, and other points of interest. However, we recognize that some players prefer to play with greater loot spawns, which is why we've enabled private servers where server owners can modify a host of settings - loot included. That is why we'd like to advise that you try and find a server that caters to your preferences and express our hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561199283816737', 'num_games_owned': 20, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 32460, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28472, 'last_played': 1708811674}
review: Its gonna be a great game at some point but right now its not... devs keeps doing randoms changes that are just not good or against the actual concept of the game which is suppose to be extra realistic... For example: can you give me one single good reason why you changed the bayonets damages! every bayonets use to kill puppets and razor one shot now its only the N9 for the M16  its completely unrealistic and unbalanced if the N9 one shots puppet then all bayonets should be able to (like it use to) ! All peoples I talked to in game are not in favour of this change its just dumb honestly... And right now the game feels more empty than ever because the puppet spawn are broken they either spawn right in front of you in bunkers or they never actually spawn in poi other then bunkers, if theres multiple players at the same place they wont spawn when you enter a city alone no puppets are gonna be there but after a 15min they are gonna start to spawn randomly in the city. the hordes system is broken too most of the time when a horde will spawn its gonna be literally one or two zombies... To be fair tho they are trying to repair the spawns and they are aware of the problem. The more you play the more you think that there's not enough clothing, guns, accessories for guns, melee weapons and vehicles. I played 475h and its a love and hate it at the same time type of game. The final project is really interesting, I would love to see it and play it as its meant to but am starting to think that's its not gonna happen after 5 years in early access... I hope so tho !
developer_response: Hi PunkTriggered! We're sorry to see that the game left you disappointed and we'd like to thank you for seeing past through some of the issues and that you've managed to find enjoyment with it. As you've said yourself, we're working on a fix for the puppet spawns, which should be completed sooner rather than later. As we'll be nearing the full, 1.0 release of the game, we'll make sure to look over all the items and their effects and will make sure to make necessary adjustments if a need for them will arise. We really hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance and that you'll find enjoyment with the game again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043431847', 'num_games_owned': 111, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 25717, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1061, 'playtime_at_review': 8952, 'last_played': 1712454433}
review:
SCUM: A Masterpiece of Survival Gaming

If you're searching for a gaming experience that pushes the boundaries of immersion, strategy, and raw survival instincts, look no further than SCUM. This game isn't just another run-of-the-mill survival title; it's a masterpiece that sets a new standard for the genre.

From the moment you step foot into its vast and unforgiving world, SCUM captivates you with its attention to detail and realism. The sheer scale of the environment is staggering, offering an expansive landscape teeming with dangers and opportunities. Whether you're scavenging for resources, engaging in intense firefights, or simply trying to stay alive against the elements, every moment in SCUM feels like a true test of your skills and adaptability.

One of the most impressive aspects of SCUM is its deep character customization and progression system. Gone are the days of generic avatars; in SCUM, you have unparalleled control over every aspect of your character's appearance, abilities, and even bodily functions. Yes, you read that right – SCUM takes realism to a whole new level by incorporating detailed metabolism and physiology mechanics, forcing players to monitor everything from their nutrition and hydration to their heart rate and metabolism. It's an incredibly immersive feature that adds a new layer of challenge and complexity to the game.

But SCUM isn't just about surviving – it's also about thriving. The game offers a plethora of activities and objectives to pursue, from building fortifications and crafting weapons to participating in intense PvP battles and forming alliances with other players. The freedom to play however you choose is one of SCUM's greatest strengths, allowing you to carve out your own path in this harsh and unforgiving world.

Visually, SCUM is stunning, with breathtaking landscapes, realistic weather effects, and meticulously detailed character models. The attention to detail is evident in every aspect of the game, from the way sunlight filters through the trees to the way your character's clothes become gradually dirtier and more worn over time. It's clear that the developers poured their hearts and souls into creating a world that feels alive and immersive in every way.

Furthermore, what truly sets SCUM apart is the unwavering dedication of its developers to delivering a top-tier gaming experience. The team behind SCUM is committed to perfection, evident in their constant stream of hotfixes and regular updates. They're not content with resting on their laurels; instead, they actively listen to the community, swiftly addressing issues, and implementing player feedback to continuously improve the game. This level of responsiveness and commitment ensures that SCUM remains fresh, exciting, and bug-free, providing players with an ever-evolving world to explore and conquer. In an industry where post-launch support can often be lacking, SCUM stands out as a shining example of how to do it right, cementing its status as a true gem in the gaming landscape.

In conclusion, SCUM is nothing short of a triumph. With each update, SCUM only gets better, promising an enduring and dynamic gaming experience for years to come. Whether you're a hardcore survival enthusiast or just looking for a unique and unforgettable gaming experience, SCUM delivers in spades. Don't miss out on what is undoubtedly one of the greatest survival games of all time.

review:
Scum in a nutshell:
Run and loot for 5 hours and u don't find much untill you get closer to military base and then u get shot. 
If u play this solo, this game SUCKS HARDCORE !
developer_response: Hi SamBal! We're sorry to see that your time with the game was less than satisfying. SCUM was always intended as a hardcore survival experience that relies heavily on realism, and staying alive on the island is designed to be challenging. If you are playing on PvP servers and are alone, you will have a much harder time against established and populous squads that are geared up and armed to the teeth. If you are playing solo and are new to the game, we'd advise that you try out the PvE servers or singleplayer in order to get yourself acquainted with the game and its mechanics, and then try out either our official or private solo/duo servers. That being said, we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance and try out a slightly different approach where you will find a setting where you can enjoy the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198381755148', 'num_games_owned': 743, 'num_reviews': 157, 'playtime_forever': 11747, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11616, 'last_played': 1708097956}
review:
Summary:
SCUM, yes this is an abbreviation for "Survival Combat United Masses", thrusts players into a challenging and gritty open world survival experience. Developed by Gamepires and Croteam, this game takes the survival genre to a higher level with a highly detailed metabolic system, realistic environments, and intense combat mechanics.

Gameplay:
SCUM excels at offering a deep and immersive survival experience. From regulating a character's metabolism to scavenging for resources and crafting essential items, every action feels essential to survival. The metabolic system adds an extra layer of realism, requiring players to monitor their character's calorie intake, hydration levels, and even vitamin balance. The game's expansive open world map provides plenty of opportunities for exploration and discovery, with a variety of landmarks, cities, and military installations to plunder and conquer.

Graphics and Sound:
Visually, SCUM impresses with its detailed environments and realistic lighting effects. From dense forests to abandoned urban areas, each location feels different and immersive. The sound design further enhances the atmosphere, with ambient noise and environmental effects adding to the sense of immersion. However, occasional bugs and glitches can detract from the overall experience.

Combat and Interaction:
Combat in SCUM is intense and unforgiving. Whether engaged in close-quarters combat or long-range firefights, players must utilize cover, tactics, and skill to outmaneuver their opponents. The game's realistic ballistics system adds depth to gunplay, requiring players to consider factors such as bullet drop and weapon recoil. Additionally, SCUM has a strong interaction system, allowing players to communicate, trade, and form alliances with other survivors.

Community and Updates:
One of SCUM's greatest strengths is its active and dedicated community. With regular updates and fixes from the developer, the game continues to develop and improve over time. Player feedback is valued and implemented frequently, ensuring that SCUM remains a dynamic and engaging experience for both new and veteran players.

Conclusion:
In conclusion, SCUM sets a new standard for the survival genre with its complex gameplay mechanics, immersive world, and intense combat. While not without its flaws, the game offers a challenging and rewarding experience for those willing to take on the harsh post-apocalyptic landscape. With a dedicated community and continued support from the developers, SCUM remains a must-play title for survival game fans.

Request: 
Polish this game so that it becomes smoother and the gameplay is still a bit stiff
Add and upgrade several NPCs, both zombies and NPC figures (quest reward items) because the game feels lonely and empty
Add features and items to build a base, hold a massive zombie attack  when you have a base
Add some characters or bots that help in the grinding process (single player)
Increase vehicle spawn when we have difficulty looking for vehicles
Add various animals to hunt for food according to the climate and place

Recommended to play 5/5
developer_response: Hi 𝓚𝖆𝖓𝖙𝖚𝖑𝕱𝕮! We're sorry to see that the game left you with mixed feelings. We're aware that SCUM's been in Early access for quite some time and and that it still has some underlying issues, but we're confident that we'll iron those out and further improve the overall experience as we'll be nearing the full 1.0 release, which is almost upon us. We can see that you have found enjoyment with the game as it is, and we hope that you'll give it another chance and that you'll return to the game soon.

author: {'steamid': '76561199237319108', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3960, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 53, 'playtime_at_review': 2225, 'last_played': 1711791401}

author: {'steamid': '76561198339267253', 'num_games_owned': 12, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 26782, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 7495, 'playtime_at_review': 703, 'last_played': 1712497722}
review: OK I will admit that my early review was out of frustration of not knowing the games steep learning curve, but now, even with a game that has some issues, I am addicted. The harsh reality of every single thing wanting you dead makes me keep coming back for the challenge. There is no safety blanket like I had become accustom to over the years from other games that are trying to appeal to the broader market. this is a survival game, survive if you can or die like the rest. Cant wait for the next update.
developer_response:
Hi AphX! We're sorry to see that the game left you disappointed. The issue you are referring to and that is causing frustration is tied to the horde spawning system that is not currently working as intended. You'll be pleased to know that the team is well aware of the issue and that we are working on fix for it, which will make the hordes spawn much more organically.

Also, keep in mind that there are multiple factors that influence your efficiency at killing puppets. It can depend on the type of weapon you are carrying, how much points did you allocate into your STRENGHT attribute, the level of your MELEE WEAPONS skill proficiency and also on the type of puppet you are battling as the bulkier ones and better armored ones take more hits to get killed. 

We hope that, knowing this, you will consider giving the game another chance and that you will return to it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077539676', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1094, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1094, 'last_played': 1707865098}
review:
Extreme tedium.  With nice graphics.   And bugs in video settings.   And read-only Discord.   And 8+ tabs of key binds. 

If you're a fan of going house to house, room to room, searching cabinets and desks and boxes and trash... this is your game.
developer_response: Hi Graawk! We're sorry to see that the game did not live up to your expectations. SCUM was designed to be a hardcore survival game that leans heavily on realism, and thus it was designed to not shower the player with loot. We've made several modifications to loots spawning based on player feedback on our official servers, but we understand that some players enjoy having a lot of items at their disposal, which is why we enabled private servers that can modify a lot of settings (loot included), which is why we'd like to propose that you give these servers with increased loot a chance as they may cater better to your preferred playstyle. That being said, we hope that, knowing this, you'll give the game another chance and hopefully find enjoyment with it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198818506378', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 51110, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 406, 'playtime_at_review': 48986, 'last_played': 1712221576}
review: На самом деле игра мне нравилась до тех пор пока не вышло обновление с ордой и тем что зомби теперь и в окна прыгают и двери ломают, мало того что вещи багаются, падают под шкафы, куда то исчезают, так еще и это. С любого огнестрела теперь безнаказанно не пострелять иначе ты просто будешь загашен толпой гопников, слетевшихся на звук выстрелов, лук со стрелами и катана стали моими лучшими друзьями. ползаю чаще всего на жопе (потому что я нежный цветочек и всего боюсь) потому как если какая то гн... зомби увидит тебя и заорёт -жди гоп-команду которая со скоростью флеша догонит тебя и не даст уйти, а ты и сделать ничего не сможешь если ты один (в последнее время я играла соло). В стройке часто багаются элементы так что их нельзя улучшить на какой то из стадий улучшения...Решила сделать перерыв и понаблюдать за тем, как выходят какие либо фиксы, потому что чем больше нового выпускают - тем больше появляется багов которые портят впечатления об игре, которая на самом деле очень даже хорошая, плюсы в ней есть, но минусы неумолимо перевешивают их... надеюсь в будущем починят недочёты, а пока что рекомендовать не стала бы...(сугубо моё мнение, не навязываю свою точку зрения)

author: {'steamid': '76561198065816742', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1522, 'last_played': 1707762317}
review: I love survival games and especially DayZ, but this game is just a lot of work with little payoff. The hoard system is stupid, and all the mechanics are wonky and difficult to use. Just not worth putting in the hours for.
developer_response: Hi fire.fox.0511! We're sorry to see that you did not enjoy your time with the game. We'd like to emphasize that the team is well aware of the issues with the hordes and their spawning and that we're actively working on a fix for this system. That is why we'd like to invite you to keep an eye on our Steam announcements to see when the update that will get this sorted out goes live. Also, we'll be working on further balancing and  quality of life improvements as we'll be nearing the full 1.0 release, and will be further improving SCUM after we exit Early access. That being said, we hope that you'll give the game another chance eventually.

review: Великолепно! Очень живые эмоции от игры. Немного смущает баланс: слишком много усилий чтобы построить в свете того, как легко можно разрушить построенное. Если на сервере играет пара сильных сквадов, то одиночкам строить что-либо становится бессмысленным. В остальном топ. Рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561199387193873', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1692131701}
review:
Bought this game for play with friends. And after purchase we found that the game doesn't support dedicated server (at least for now).
So we are waiting for dedicated server and cannot play like we want. It's sad and annoying
developer_response:
Hi simbolya! We're sorry to see that you could not start playing with your friend. While currently there's no way to start immediately next to one another, you can find private servers where admins are willing to teleport you to next to each other once you log in. 

We'd like to point out that the team is currently focused on delivering the final features for 1.0, as well as polishing and bugfixing. Once we manage to exit Early access, we'll be able to talk more about adding such features into the game. That being said, we hope that you'll give SCUM another chance once we manage to get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198262185180', 'num_games_owned': 23, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 163567, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163205, 'last_played': 1711102905}
review:
Когда будет патч 1.0 разрабы обещают релиз игры,  на данный момент патч 9.5. Релиз уже скоро, НО:
Старые баги которым уже по несколько лет так и не исправили
Лагают сервера при высоком онлайне
Плохая оптимизация
Все еще нет функций быстрой распаковки предметов, сидишь как идиот вынимаешь болтики по 1 шт.
Баланс оружия вышел из чата и все еще не вернулся
Строительство базы очень времязатратное занятие, а зарейдить ее можно за пол часа
Плохой баланс рейдов, мало функций для защиты базы
Очень маленький выбор прицелов. (по факту их 2 это х1 и х4. не считая снайперских)
На больших расстояниях исчезают некоторые элементы построек, например шкафы, и вас можно видеть через них
Очень кривая боевка в ближнем бою, можно спокойно махать ножом сквозь зомбаря, а он тебе будет навешивать люлей
Сложно найти адекватный сервер с адекватной администрацией
Разработчики очень много всего обещают но нифига не делают, есть новости которым уже больше года а в игре их так и нет
Наличие P2W DLC

review: If you like survival/crafting like DayZ and And Rust's building and driving. This is for you. This team made some heavy overhauls since launch. They even have a solo mode where you can just play round with admin commands if you wanna rent a server. PvP is the same as DayZ. All in all a good PvPvE survival game really. 2 thumbs up.

author: {'steamid': '76561198850647606', 'num_games_owned': 37, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 13730, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7983, 'last_played': 1711252896}
review: Game has been in development for years, yet still requires people to pay top dime for DLC and game. multiple times I've had my vehicles cause me to lose everything. They design is quality in the areas that you don't care about yet has design flaws in major mechanics of the game. I've been deeply disappointed in the overall performance of the game. The creators put on the log in screen that the game is still in development and you are prone to multiple deconstructions in the game like glitches,crashes, etc. Yet they still charge top dollar and will give some B.S reason it helps the development of the game. I believe they use this as an excuse to never actually take any responsibility for the crap design mechanics of specific portions of the game that cause people to be completely reset and lose all the grind they have achieved.
developer_response: Hi Preston! We're sorry to see that you are disappointed with the state of the game. We're aware that SCUM's been in development for quite some time now and that the game still has some underlying issues. We'd like to emphasize that we're very much aware of the situation and we're committed towards bringing the game to its full 1.0 release and to deliver a truly polished and optimized experience. We understand your frustration and we hope to alleviate it once we manage to get the issues that are plaguing the game sorted out and that you consider giving it another chance once we get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073606145', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 7964, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7964, 'last_played': 1707547420}
review:
Awesome game. Its open world, sandbox. With PvE and PvP options. The world is giant. With too much discoveries to count. Lots of transportation modes. Lots of combat modes. Lots to build, farm, cook, hunt and fish. You have major stats and subskills you can improve to get an edge. 
Very good game to casually and competitively explore. I highly recommend playing with more people.

author: {'steamid': '76561198252521790', 'num_games_owned': 5, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 3977, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2764, 'last_played': 1710897318}
review: Foi o extremo realismo das mecânicas do jogo que me fez querer comprar e jogar. De longe nunca soube de um jogo com mecânicas realistas e complexas como esse. Com certeza é muito desafiador, mas também é divertido! Pra quem ta começando recomendo entrar num servidor PVE e aprender sobre o jogo, vale muito a pena! Parabéns aos desenvolvedores por criarem esse jogo tao incrível, seria bom que houvessem outros games assim e com outras temáticas também!

author: {'steamid': '76561199260050817', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 365, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 365, 'last_played': 1707617776}
review: I really want to like this game... but I just can't ... you literally have to watch a 40 minute tutorial just to figure out how to wipe your own ass and after that good luck finding toilet paper. It sucks though because the concept is amazing and I truly love zombie games but to even be able to battle zombies is difficult enough on top of being swarmed instantly not being able to outrun them or fight them well... maybe I need to mess around with the starting skill points more because I really want to like this game but its making it difficult to enjoy. Unless that is what the're going for ... an absolutely difficult zombie game then they sure have done that.

If you are inclined to play with other players, make sure that you explore other options when it comes to either official or private servers. We hope that you'll manage to find something that suits you and that you'll give the game another chance.

developer_response: Hi BlacksheepBF93! We're sorry to see that the game and its last update ruined the game for you. You'll be pleased to know that the team is well aware of the issue and that we're actively working on a fix for this system, which will make the puppet spawns much more organic. That being said, we'd like to invite you to keep an eye on our Steam announcements to see when we'll have this sorted out. We really hope that you'll give the game another chance once we'll manage to get there.

review: 游戏非常不稳定，本身道具拾取很难，好不容易捡到关键道具，用一次就莫名消失，导致游戏体验很差，而且游戏会闪退，闪退后道具又会莫名消失，总而言之，就是你玩着玩着道具就不在了，你会玩的很难受，在修复这些问题前，不建议购买。

review: Tengo algun tiempo jugando a este titulo puedo decir que he notado las actualizaciones a mejorado un monton y mas desde la ultima update donde mejoraron los tutoriales menu de crafteo y otros, era un cambio necesario que esperabamos todos, por otra parte sigue faltando optimizar los graficos ya que el juego consume muchos recursos y el juego a pasado de solicitar 10gb ram minimo a solicitar 16gb y seguimos teniendo problemas de rendimiento y algun bug, pero si buscas algo real del genero de supervivencia este es el mejor juego que podras conseguir y seguimos esperando que salga de manera oficial con la update 1.0

author: {'steamid': '76561199146840918', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 14452, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 778, 'playtime_at_review': 7088, 'last_played': 1712447203}
review:
This is an amazing game in a perpetually broken state.

If you close the game, it stills exists in the background for a very long time.
You can't kill it with task manager. You can't kill it with Alt+F4. You can't kill it by any means.
It just eats away at your resources until you just completely turn off your computer.

In it's current state, some players can't play for more then 20 minutes without mandatory restart required while running top of the line hardware.

The devs make things worse almost every update at this point...
They have been in development for 6 years and the game still crashes perpetually, and it's worse then it was last year with some of the same bugs from 3 years ago.
developer_response: Hi Taco! We're sorry to see that you find the current state of the game to be disappointing. We'd like to emphasize that the game is still in Early access and that we're still working to bring it to its full, 1.0 version of the game. As we'll be nearing towards that, we'll make sure to polish, optimize, and make it as smooth as possible. That being said, we hope that you'll reconsider and give the game another chance as we'll be nearing the full, 1.0 version of SCUM.

author: {'steamid': '76561198005405388', 'num_games_owned': 143, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 48402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 106, 'playtime_at_review': 42506, 'last_played': 1712383693}
review:
I have watched this game evolve over the years and it has become amazing. There is so so much to do and its highly immersive. One strong suggestion is to play on servers with Admins who either host it for free or accept donations because they really care about reducing hackers and correcting major issues. 

Only thing I dislike is how overly important lockpicking mini game is. Its for sure taken a dominate role in late game play and I am simply not very good at it.

review: The zombies movement in Scum are horrible ! and Zombies spawning right in front of you. the only things you do is looting empty houses.
developer_response: Hi Ajy.! We're sorry to see that the issues brought forth by the puppet spawning ruined your time with the game. We'd like to reassure you that the team is well aware that this system does not function as well as it could have and that we are actively working to tweak it so that the hordes will spawn much more organically. That being said, we'd like to invite you to keep an eye out for our Steam announcements to see when the update that will get this sorted out will go live and we'd like to express our hope that you'll give the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023334590', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2407, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2407, 'last_played': 1707415872}
review:
Borring running simulator with no loot and no help on how to play. 
i tried my best with this game but, i get the feeling that the Devs are working their hardest to sabotage their own game.

I think they like the zombies more than the players they hoped to play this miserable empty calorie heartrate simulator

I do not recommend this game, it´s way more fun to watch paint dry!
developer_response: Hi Finger! We're sorry to see that the game disappointed you. We're aware that the game needs to do much more with communicating the game's mechanics organically through gameplay, like a dedicated tutorial. As we'll be exiting Early access, we'll make sure to improve this segment of the game in order to accommodate new players and make the learning curve for the game a bit less steep. As for the loot - SCUM is designed as a hardcore survival game, meaning that it will not shower you with loot and that you'll need to get through the more challenging part of the game (bunkers, killboxes, police stations, etc.) if you want to find powerful weapons and explosives. However, we understand that some players enjoy a more casual experience, which is why we enabled the creation of private servers where loot can be modified and significantly increased. All that being said, we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance when we manage to get SCUM out of Early access and get it to the 1.0 version.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974675254', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 25558, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 5443, 'playtime_at_review': 3459, 'last_played': 1712499375}
review:
Salut, si vous cherchez un jeu beau , survie en monde ouvert , difficile, vous êtes au bon endroit !! se jeu n'est clairement pas fait pour les casuals, il est dur , vraiment dur, même sans parler du pvp , rien que les zombies, les zombies c4 et autre méca sont largement capable de vous crevez sans aide extérieur :P
Surtout attention avant de vous y mettre se jeu reste une drogue.. le début et dur à prendre en main, le mieux étant de s’entraîner un peu en solo ou de faire un serveur pve, afin de vous familiarisé avec la mécanique complexe que le jeu vous offre.
Parce que oui vous pouvez construire votre base et la défendre au mieux des assauts des autres joueurs si vous êtes en pvp (que je vous conseille vivement à choisir).
Oui le pvp rajoute une couche dans cette douleur , mais ce qui rend se jeu vraiment unique et procure un vrai plaisir de jeu.
Ensuite beaucoup de rageux diront qu'il est trop dur etc, qu'il est bugger et autre.. Oui il y a quelques petits bugs, oui le système de horde n'est pas super au point, le spawnnage des Z n'est pas super équilibré.
Mais je pense que le reste est vraiment super bien réalisé, les dev's font un boulot pas mal et j’espère qu'il continueront dans la bonne vois pour nous offrir toujours un jeu encore meilleurs.

Donc en conclusion je vous invite à consulté la page youtube de Mr P7 qui fait des lives régulièrement sur se jeu , c'est grâce à lui que j'ai commencé le jeu et je ne regrette pas, je vous invite à suite ces lives et peu être vous aussi vous rejoindrez la communauté de scum !

author: {'steamid': '76561197974597147', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 25853, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25852, 'last_played': 1707666879}
review: Wer Survival mag, kommt an SCUM nicht vorbei! Egal ob PVP oder PVE, das Spiel bietet eine enorme Spieltiefe auf einer der schönsten maps, die ich bisher erkunden durfte. Die tolle Grafik, die gelungenen Bewegungen der Avatare und die gute Vertonung lassen einen die teils etwas nervigen Bugs vergessen. So verschwindet schon mal das eine oder andere beim Umlagern vom Rucksack in die Kiste oder man hat endlich ein Fahrzeug gefunden und kann es nicht reparieren, weil der Wagenheber sich nicht anbringen lässt. Trotz der langen EA-Phase, sind die Defs fleißig am ausbessern und liefern ständig Updates und Patches - sehr lobenswert. Nicht alles immer zur Zufriedenheit der Community, aber über die Jahre gesehen wurde SCUM zu einer Referenz im Genré, die nicht mehr zu übersehen ist. Weiter so!

author: {'steamid': '76561198444333184', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 81938, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 73, 'playtime_at_review': 80487, 'last_played': 1712153662}
review:
SCUM is realistic take on survival mechanics, That has both impressed and frustrated me since its early access release. While the game's attention to detail and innovative features are admirable, it's essential to address two significant issues: poor frame rates and the impact of overly detailed "jiggle physics" on the female character models.

One of the main concerns for me revolves around SCUM's performance in terms of frame rates. The game's demanding graphics and physics simulations can strain even high-end gaming systems, resulting in sub-optimal frame rates. This issue can severely hinder the overall gaming experience, causing frustration and detracting from the immersive survival atmosphere that SCUM aims to create. This notable in the latest release which along with low frame rates suffers from late object drawing.

To address the frame rate concerns, the developers could consider additional game optimisation. This might involve refining resource-intensive graphical elements, tweaking the rendering pipeline, or providing additional graphics settings to allow players to tailor the game to their hardware capabilities. Frequent updates have been forthcoming from the developer so there is ample opportunity to roll out improvements.


While SCUM strives for realism in its character models, the implementation of overly detailed "jiggle physics" on female characters can contribute to distracting and unrealistic visuals, particularly during intense gameplay moments.

To address this concern, the developers might consider implementing an option in the settings menu that allows players to adjust or disable the jiggle physics effect to their own tastes and system capabilities. Providing players with the ability to customise their gaming experience in this manner would strike a balance between realism and player preference, ensuring a more inclusive and enjoyable environment for all players.

author: {'steamid': '76561197971324417', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1707112571}
review: I bought this game for a friend and I because I thought we could enjoy co-op together. Well the only way to play with friends is through a pricey third party server. I played it for a while alone and it wasn't very enjoyable. I felt like going back to playing 7 days to die instead because even though the graphics aren't as high, it definitely has more heart and you can enjoy it without a pay for server.  Maybe I will give the game a try again if they eliminated the having to rent a server.
developer_response:
Hi Lady Death! We're sorry to see that you were unable to find a viable way to play with a friend. Even though you have refunded the game, we'd like to express our hope that you will eventually consider returning to the game - especially when we'll manage to get to the full 1.0 version of the game and when we'll be able to talk more about additional game modes.

However, there is a way for you and your friend to play immediately together. You can find a private server where the admin is willing to teleport the two of you next to each other. It is a bit cumbersome, but it is possible. That is why we said that we'll look into it after we get the 1.0 sorted out.

review: Всім добра! Гра бобма, рекомендую! Слідкував за грою після першого анонсу, купив на початку 2023, награ майже 800 годин часу. Навіть маючи досить слабий ПК, в соло режимі грав в 20-24 FPS, мені подобалось вивчати можливості ігрового простору. Мене настільки захопило, що перші годинок так 100 мо й під 200 за перший вхід. На жаль після одного з останніх оновлень моє залізо відмовилось тягнути гру, але після оновлення заліза  відразу порину у вже новий, але досить знайомий ігровий світ. Адже розвиток ігрових можливостей та їх варіацій постійно доповнюються. Гра тільки починає свій шлях, звісно будуть і недоліки, які потім виправлять в переваги. Розробнику, щоб руці не боліли та натхнень.

author: {'steamid': '76561198811471844', 'num_games_owned': 25, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 47425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 17, 'playtime_at_review': 46868, 'last_played': 1712071346}
review: I loved the game. I enjoy the community I found in the game. This review is an "Intervention" because the game is just going in the wrong direction. Deep immersion can be found in the survival aspect of Scum but you will not find it when you are challenged by the NPCs/AI. The spawning system is ridiculous and it will not change anytime soon, as it is meant to make room for new NPCs with guns, lazers, or whatever... New games are coming and its sad to see the fallout of Scum, which will not be able to compete with all the new titles coming. Its just a poor design. Wish you all fun and good luck. I got my money back and had a blast on 0.8, 0.85, 0.9, but this is not for me anymore.

author: {'steamid': '76561199076067236', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 9263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3437, 'last_played': 1709073154}
review:
server settings is complete broke + players can't revert to the older versions of the game

P.S.
see those awesome rafts on screenshots? forget about them
developer_response:
Hi user688! We're sorry to see that you were disappointed with the game. While we are unsure what you are referring to by claiming that the server options are broken, we'd like to emphasize that we are aware that the game has certain underlying issues that are present, but we'd also like to reassure you that the team is hard at work on bringing about the best possible version of the game by the time we exit Early access and deliver the 1.0 version of the game. To address your final point, we'd like to express our commitment toward gradually bringing these vehicles (such as the raft  that you've mentioned) back into the game.

As for the broken server options, we'd like to kindly ask you to give us more details on the issue you've encountered via our official support  - https://support.scumgame.com/ so we can check what's happening and provide necessary fixes

author: {'steamid': '76561198448157497', 'num_games_owned': 33, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 32379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 2904, 'playtime_at_review': 7209, 'last_played': 1712358987}
review: Sceptical at first and only got into it because of friends who wanted to get a group together. End result, they hardly turn up and I'm clocking up hours in this game (all alone 😒). Love everything about this game. Exploring the huge map, the scenery, the crafting, the cooking, the survival! One thing though, avoid swimming! Do not go into the water! Scum devs, please fix the swimming!! It's a small detail but one which from one moment to another, it spoils what could be a great adventure! I was on a boat, exploring another outpost, high waters tip me of my boat and off to the bottom of the lake I go. Lost all the loot I had. Couldn't even get back into my boat once spawned back in. Apart from that, excellent game and very addictive!

author: {'steamid': '76561198004424719', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 84792, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 410, 'playtime_at_review': 79161, 'last_played': 1712327093}
review:
Popup Puppets in Bunkern. Gefühlt jeder Puppet ruft eine Horde. Horden sind noch immer auf Kokain, oder trainieren für den nächsten Marathon. Puppets sind zu Apnoetauchern geworden und glitchen auch gerne, meist an Hafenbecken, unter Wasser durch Texturen, um dann auf der Straße hinter dir zu stehen. 
Ich weiß nicht, so kurz vor der 1.0 sollten andere Prioritäten gesetzt werden. Hätte man mehr auf die Verbesserung der Netzwerk- bzw. Servertechnik gesetzt, anstatt nur eine Graphendatenbank einzupflegen. Die Spielwelt wird immer leerer und das Team "Popup Puppet" immer voller. 
Es wird wohl so kommen, dass die Moddercommunity das Spiel retten wird. 
Sehr sehr Schade, dabei gab es schon gute Versionen und das weit vor 0.95xxxx.
Da bleibt nur noch hoffen...

review: As a solo PVE enjoyer this game is no longer fun to play. The traders were one thing, but now puppets aren't organically in the world as they once were. With the animals also gone its very clear that all the fun and life of this world is supposed to come from others. Oh well
developer_response: Hi Rawhide Kobayashi! We're sorry to see that you no longer enjoy the game. Per your review, we can see that the main issue you have with the game was caused by the latest big update and the puppet spawns. We'd like to reassure you that we are aware that this does not work as intended and that we'll have this sorted out in some of the upcoming patches as the team is actively working to get this sorted out. That is why we'd like to invite you to keep an eye on our Steam announcements to see when a fix for this will drop. We really hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance once we'll have this taken care of.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087700588', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 12725, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8454, 'last_played': 1708914094}
review:
First of all it must be pointed out this is an early access game… still.  Its got a lot of potential, and a lot of bugs… A LOT OF BUGS.  And as soon as they get the game back to a somewhat reasonable state… they go and **** it all up again by adding features no-one asked for that break the game completely. 

If playing with friends it is fun, for a bit. Get it on sale. And just know, the hardest part of the game isnt surviving the enemies and players, its surviving the broken day 1 glitches that still remain an issue. 

But again, it is an early access game, still. And with no end to this state in sight, still.

But with the repetitive back peddling on progress that seems to be a NEVER ENDING TORRENT OF PAIN AND FRUSTRATION WITH THE STATE OF THE GAME, I wouldn’t recommend it until they fix their base issues and actually start optimizing.
developer_response: Hi ShitBird! We're really sorry that the underlying issues that are present in the game have ruined your time with it. We'd like to very much reassure you that we are aware of them and that SCUM will be undergoing a dedicated polishing phase where we'll make sure to do away with these bugs and make the game as smoothly as possible. That being said, we hope that the current state of the game does not make give up on it entirely and that you'll give it another chance once we manage to get to the 1.0 version of the game.

We really hope that the current state of the game will not discourage you entirely from the game and that you will consider giving it another chance, at least when we manage to get SCUM fully out the door.

review:

Nicht Fisch nicht Fleisch eigentlich als PvP gedacht aber nicht wirklich durchdacht....

author: {'steamid': '76561197990657148', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 7144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3689, 'last_played': 1709502514}
review:
Battle royale disguised as survival, can't invite friends to single player mode, lacks variety in many aspects including crafting mode, hit boxes are very odd and fishing mode is very buggy. I would only recommend this game if you play on a private server with friends. Full pvp gets very tired at times.

If you play on a private premium server this game could be alot of fun with certain rules and restrictions but on the original servers as the game was intended to be played is a nono.

 KEEP IN MIND THIS GAME IS STILL ON EARLY ACCESS.
developer_response:
Hi Evil Clown! We're sorry to see that you are thoroughly disappointed with the game. We're aware that we've been in development and Early access for quite a while now, but the task we set out for ourselves was ambitious and was not a small feat with the team that we have. We're also aware that there are underlying issues with the game that have been present for quite some time and we'd like to reassure you that we will tend to these when we'll be polishing it.

As for some of the additional features such as the private hosting where you can make your own servers is something that we will able to talk about more after we manage to get to the 1.0 release of the game.

That being said, we hope that you'll give the game another chance once we manage to get there.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198065113552', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 130695, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 8360, 'playtime_at_review': 112097, 'last_played': 1712481305}
review:
The heart of "Scum" beats to the rhythm of diversity: By water, air, and land unfolds a symphony of movement. The player, an artist in this landscape, weaves their existence through gardening, cooking, crafting, and repairing. Each action is a brushstroke on the canvas of the skill system, a dance between power and humility.

Yet, in this realm of boundless possibilities, monotony lurks like a shadow. Slaying zombies, gathering loot, bartering with traders - these are chapters of a story that lose their allure once the book is completed.

A narrative of depth or characters that touch the heart remain elusive. The zombies, appearing like phantoms from nowhere, are strangers in this world, disrupting the illusion of reality.

The game's controls are a reliable compass in this adventure, yet the technical shortcomings are like cliffs that captivate the player. For a smooth journey through this world, one needs a vessel as strong as the strongest servers.

"Scum" reflects life itself – a journey that enthralls but can also tire. Over 1,800 hours I have spent in this cosmos, a testament to its richness in exploration. Yet how often does one find oneself, again at the beginning, yearning for the spark that ignites the fire of enthusiasm?

For those who long for a world in which to lose themselves, "Scum" offers a sanctuary. It is a game of contrasts, immense possibilities, and unfulfilled promises. In its entirety, "Scum" is an odyssey, a challenge to both mind and soul, a call for an adventure that is yet to be completed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198320522528', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 13968, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12480, 'last_played': 1708287683}

review:
不推荐，操作极其硬核，但可玩性高，适合闲的没事的人玩，地图超级大，载具也难找，找到了还要电池燃油及配件，僵尸打两下就流血，连新手教程都没有，干啥都要查攻略，逼事贼多，还有各种色情血腥内容，居然还能用阳
具当武器，物资爆率感人，十个箱子九个空，萌新不作弊几乎玩不下去

author: {'steamid': '76561198159670067', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 190, 'last_played': 1707237708}
review: This game is FKN HARD! DayZ is a piece of cake compared to this. Want to be frustrated from constantly dying? Spend your money here!
developer_response: Hi CyberNinja! We're sorry to see that the game was not to your liking. SCUM is definitely a challenging experience as it was designed to be a hardcore survival game that leans heavily into realism. The game's experience also varies greatly based on the server where you are playing. If you are new to the game and the genre overall, we would recommend spending some time in singleplayer and then trying out maybe some PvE servers with regulated settings to ease in into the game. We hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance, especially as we'll be nearing the full 1.0 release of the game very soon.
