author: {'steamid': '76561198083434450', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 9403, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8727, 'last_played': 1707453776}
review: I would like to first say this game is awesome in that its hard to learn to play. Its hard to achieve things and even harder finding people you trust with out getting shot first and questioned later, but that is what makes it so much more rewarding and immersive experience. I have played games like ark and the whole mega tribes but nothing like this game. its attention to details is excellent. One task like getting a car running might take you days or just keeping enough food in your system is a challenge. Another great thing to point out is the skills. Just because you get advance in any of them does not mean you go through the game on easy since you still have to learn to do those skills yourself. Although i enjoyed playing it, its sad that my experience with 4 others got ruined because of a hacker in official server. 1v4 aim bot and lockpicked 1 reinforced lock and 3 silver ones in a minute like they werent even there with no gear. the worst part is we were hiding and he ran up behind us like he knew were each one of us were even though we were pretty spread out in a forest area. it heartbreaking that someone cheating can just come and take the grind of 4 people in under 10 minutes. Cheating ruins the game and makes all the development of this game pointless if your player base will not last more than a week.
developer_response:
Hi spritus! We're sorry to see that the cheaters negatively impacted your experience with the game and ruined your time with it. We're aware of this issue and we'd like to provide some reassurance and state that we'll make sure to improve the situation with cheaters as we'll be nearing our 1.0 full release of the game. This means that we'll be implementing better detection systems that will automatically ban such bad actors and that we'll make sure to better moderate the official servers. We really hope that this will not dissuade you from the game entirely and that you will consider giving it another chance eventually.

We'd also like to invite you to report the situation you've experienced via our support system here https://support.scumgame.com/scp/index.php and our team will make sure to find and remove the cheater that has done this to you.

author: {'steamid': '76561199132676711', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 106738, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106682, 'last_played': 1707276767}
review: I never thought i would be here doing this, but here i am after 1700 hrs and i have to let you all know something, this game is in a downward spiral. I used to be in love with this game and always looked forward to the bright future it had. But now, my squad an i all agree that this game was in a better state at version 0.4 than it is now. that was FOUR YEARS AGO. Ever since they decided to double the size of the map its been trash update after trash update and it marks the beginning of the decline.  Somehow they've managed to completely derail the the core elements that used to make the game fun. Each new update leaves the game broken for months with no word from the devs whatsoever. Finally when they run out of ideas for money grabbing dlc, they will adjust it just enough to be somewhat playable for a month or two before releasing another game breaking update and the cycle repeats. I believe that the core of the many issues with this game all come back to one thing, the game engine cannot handle all the assets. They are constantly trying to find ways to budget their resources and as a result, the whole game loop suffers. If your new to this game, or a returning player wondering if now is a good time to play, its not. The glory days are long gone. all you have to look forward to now are trash game breaking updates, content nobody wanted, removing content people once enjoyed, and greedy developers trying to monetise dance moves, hairstyles, weapon skins etc in a game that still hasn't been officially released. ive been clinging onto the memory of this game but its been years since this dev team has made a good decision. stay away from this game.
developer_response: Hi BTK-Griller! Firstly, we'd like to thank you for supporting the game for such a long time. Seeing the number of time you've invested in the game was humbling and made it even harder to read your review. SCUM has definitely changed over the years and various changes were introduced - some which were more popular, and some that were not popular at all. Ideas and priorities shift with time, but we've never wavered from our core vision, which is to make a truly hardcore survival experience that leans heavily into realism. Our focus was always to get to the 1.0 version of the game and fully release it, and the additional support we've garnered through the sales of DLC's has helped us immensely with the development of SCUM. We understand and respect the opinion that some of the updates did not pan out as expected (such as the recent horde spawning system) but we'd like to reassure you that we are committed toward creating the best possible version of the game and we hope that you'll at least give it another go once we manage to get that full release out the door and that you will manage to find enjoyment with SCUM again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115376335', 'num_games_owned': 96, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 124587, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124142, 'last_played': 1707545623}
review:
I've invested over 2000 hours into this game since 2018, and in 2024, I'm sharing this review as a cautionary message to the community.

This game used to be one of the best zombie survival experiences I've ever had. Scum drew me away from the Dayz universe with its straightforward crafting and base-building elements. I loved the simplicity and ease of looting various boxes, containers, puppets, and other players I encountered. The freedom to explore buildings and bunkers at my own pace was truly enjoyable. Over the past two years, I even went on to rent my own server, hosting up to 60 players.

Regrettably, the recent direction the developers have taken is bewildering. They introduced a convoluted cooking system and implemented an exhaustion mechanic that immobilizes you, forcing you to recuperate in bed. Crafting anything without gloves now results in numerous hand lacerations. They removed valuable content and replaced it with undesirable features. Server performance has declined, causing lag and rubber banding even with just one person present, worsened in full servers. Zombie spawns are erratic, with the new horde system leading to zombies appearing right in front of you or dropping from the sky. Clearing out a town or bunker becomes a futile effort as they respawn within ten minutes. The hordes are a formidable challenge, making the game unbearable for even seasoned players, let alone newcomers.

Regarding bunkers, instead of addressing lag and server stability, access has been restricted to mitigate stress on the servers. The last time the game felt enjoyable and stable was probably before they removed the old vehicles and introduced the new ones. I'm skeptical about the game improving; it seems to be heading towards increased confusion and bugs with each addition rather than addressing existing server issues. I didn't write this out of hatred for the game; it's actually my favorite, but it's currently in a dire state, and I don't foresee any improvement.
developer_response: Hello hxcwhiteford! Firstly, we want to express our gratitude for your enduring support of the game and it is with a mixture of humility and concern that we read your review. SCUM has significantly evolved over the years, with changes that were welcomed and changes that were unpopular, but necessary. However, our aim has always been to deliver an uncompromisingly hardcore survival experience steeped in realism. While priorities and ideas have shifted, our core vision has not wavered.  We acknowledge and respect the viewpoint that some updates, like the recent horde spawning system, may not have met expectations. However, we want to assure you that we will be fixing this mechanic, as well as other underlying issues that are present in the game. We sincerely hope that, once we reach that milestone and release the complete game, you'll consider giving it another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198233946552', 'num_games_owned': 89, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 12121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 117, 'playtime_at_review': 11290, 'last_played': 1711479435}
review: I bought this game shortly after it was released. I bought the first supporter pack as well. I love the concept and they had something really good going here, but sadly they are flushing it down the toilet. What was so appealing to me was the prison aspect; playing as a criminal/jailbird. Very unique. I also love what they did with the BCU and the metabolism aspect. But unfortunately they removed the tattoos and a lot of the cool features. Focus more on the prison side of things! Put the ACAB tattoos back in and the option to pick the crime you committed. The metabolism is very well done, but the graphics and animation need to be improved. It would also be cool to be able to bottle piss and shit and throw it. I really like this game a lot but I just feel like they are ruining a lot of the stuff that made it special.
developer_response: Hi ♥ Lena ♥! We're sorry to see that you've grown to become disappointed with the game. As we'll be nearing the full release of the game, we'll be adding additional content to it that will further enrich the experience of the game, and we'll be committed to additionally support the game after the 1.0 version with more content. That being said, we hope that you'll consider giving SCUM another chance and that you'll manage to find enjoyment with it again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122810831', 'num_games_owned': 165, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 135636, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 3700, 'playtime_at_review': 116109, 'last_played': 1712463904}
review:
Scum is my favorite game of all time. I've been playing since .7, and I'm sitting on almost 2,000 hours. There have been times that I get bored with the game, and try something else, but I always come back. 

It is not an easy game by any means, but extremely rewarding when you figure it out. You will die a lot in the beginning, but you will learn. There are servers out there that are high loot, no mechs, pve zones, nerfed mechanics like accumulated fatigue, metabolism, infections etc. but those will get boring much quicker.  

I buy most survival games, DayZ, The Forrest, Project Zomboid are among my favorites, but none of them are as complicated, fun, rewarding or beautiful as Scum. 

It is in early access, and you/we are the ones testing each build. You will encounter bugs at some point. In 3 years of playing, I haven't seen a game breaking bug. You might loose a backpack or gun at some point, and if that is enough for you to rage quit, you probably won't like the rest of the game either. This is the best dev team I've encountered, and they fix/nerf things and mechanics very quickly, usually within the day. They also listen to the community which is something I haven't seen before.

Buy it. It is absolutely worth every penny at full price, it is a steal when it's on sale.

Das Spielprinzip macht schon Laune. Als Anfänger tut man sich zunächst eher schwer, bis man die Basics halbwegs drauf hat. Servereinstellungen Droprate hochsetzen und Puppischaden verringern. Zum Start die Bunker meiden.

Alles in Allem macht mir das Game aber Spaß ... und das zählt ja beim Zocken :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198107152058', 'num_games_owned': 96, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 50695, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2802, 'last_played': 1710771550}
review:
(See update below)
I have played this game for 46 hours.

So, the graphics are pretty good, but there is a lot wrong with this game. 

1. Rendering is so slow.
    I sometimes land and am able to walk through houses and other objects as they have not yet rendered. This can also happen when I run.
2. Food is very hard to find.
    I have died numerous times as I have been travelling and unable to find food, or enough food to make a big difference to your hunger.
3. You can hardly carry anything with you.
    To start with you only have pockets, and you cannot stack items. If you are lucky you might find a bum bag. I know you can craft a backpack, but you need a lot of stuff to do so.
4. Items are sparse.
    You can travel far and wide, but you will not find many needed items. It's not too bad in the city, but it's one thing finding stuff you need, it's another being able to collect it and take it with you (see 3).
5. Zombies are too fast.
    You can't outrun most zombies (you can, if you are lucky, run out of their line of sight). 
6. Zombies are too strong.
    Even with simple weapons it is hard to kill a zombie.
7. Zombies are too numerous.
    Especially in towns and the city, you will likely get attacked by more than one zombie. Killing one zombie is hard enough but taking on 2, 3, 4 or more zombies is impossible without a gun.
8. Base building is a nightmare!
    a simple foundation requires several items which have to be added after you have placed the blueprint. 3 rope, 3 logs, 3 sticks (for example). so, you have to go and collect these items (as you can't stack items in your inventory) and drop them on the ground. Then go and find more.....and so on. SO a 4x4 hut would require so many items that it would take ages to build even if those items were available in close vacinity.
This is the worst base building I have come across in all the many games of this ilk that I have played.

660 hours later....

1. Well, the rendering is no longer slow.
2. If you run at the default pace (second click on the scroll wheel) your food now lasts quite a long time, long enough to find a few veggies to keep you going.
3. Still ca't carry much unless you are lucky enough to find a backpack or, even better, a large backpack. It can take you hours and several lives to get that lucky.
4. Items/loot is still sparse and it can take forever to just get some decent clothes.
5. Zombies are still too fast. It's not a problem if you get a head start, but if you come across one suddenly, you can't outrun it. Even running through bushes won't help.
6. Okay, so, get your timing right and you can deal with a single zombie without too many scratches. But...
7.  the horde mode is just crazy. I've been in a house making not the slightest noise when, suddenly, the horde starts yelling and gathering and they will normally find you even if you don't move. Fighting a horde without ranged weapons is (almost) impossible unless you can fight them in a doorway or other narrow place that will prevent them overwhelming you.
8. Still not liking the base building system, though I did manage to build a 3x2 base, which took HOURS.
So, I managed to exceed 300 fame points in single player mode, but multiplayer is another problem (even with no PvP) as you have to start from scratch.
developer_response:
Hi bruteforceoap! We're sorry to see that you we're disappointed with the game. However, based on the points you've mentioned, we believe it would be best to address each of them in order to provide much needed clarity:

1. We're aware of the issue with rendering. The game still needs to be vastly optimized and we'll make sure to attend to that as we are nearing the full 1.0 release, which should improve this situation.
2. The overall loot of the game depends on where you are looking and whether someone that got before you looted the place which rendered you unable to find anything. There are spots, buildings and POI's on the map where you can find food that would help you sustain yourself. However, if that is also not satisfactory, you can also try playing on private servers where loot is vastly increased, meaning that it would be far easier for you to find new stuff.
3. You can bundle certain items such as short sticks, which are crucial for crafting initial items that can help you in the early game (such as the courier backpack that you've mentioned). It is intended that the starter clothes you have do not let you carry a lot of items as that makes you more inclined to loot and attempt to find better clothing and backpacks that will help you carry more stuff.
4. We've already touched upon this in point 2. The game is designed to not shower you with loot. However, if you prefer playing with a lot of it, there are private servers you can join that have drastically increased loot spawns so if that is your preference, you are free to try them out. 
5. Puppets are designed to be a real threat in the game. It is very hard to outrun them in an open field, and you also have to keep in mind that all puppets do not run at the same speed and that your stats, as well as the weight of items you are carrying, also have an influence your speed.
6. Your stats and the weapon you are carrying influence how difficult it is to kill puppets. However, by crafting either an improvised bow or a small stone axe, you should be able to get rid of them with ease.
7. We are looking into this system. Their number is not so much of a problem as is their spawning, which is something that we'll be tweaking in some of the upcoming patches.
8. We'll also be looking into this system to see if something can be done to make things easier for solo players. 

We hope that some of these will provide necessary clarification and that you'll consider giving the game another chance eventually or at least when we manage to bring it to the full 1.0 version.

author: {'steamid': '76561199071841833', 'num_games_owned': 39, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1707108906}
review: I can,t believe i paid money for this game. I understand its early access but i have waited for the last 2 updates to come out and have tried to play it 3 times.  I wish I wasn't disappointed with it but unfortunately I am SMH.
developer_response: Hi (UGR)MasterWookie732! We're sorry to see that the game failed to live up to your expectations. While we do not know what exactly is not to your liking, you'll be pleased to know that we'll be making a myriad of content additions and improvements to existing features as we'll be nearing the full 1.0 release of the game. That being said, we hope that you'll give SCUM another chance once we manage to get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965729503', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 27752, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14920, 'last_played': 1708645283}
review:
This game is plagued with hackers. You'll spend so much time to gather, make a base, just to be offlined by some Chinese hacker and wake up with all your shit gone. It's sad because it could be a good game.

Edit: I played an additional 34 hours after this thumbs down review and steam kept bugging me to revise it, so I am. I was pretty mad about losing my stuff/progress after being hacked by China, but did some redditing and found that is how it is on the official servers. The unofficial servers actually have admins and tight communities, where there aren't hackers. I'd advise picking up the game, but staying away from any official server.
developer_response: Hi Slice0351! We're sorry to see that you were negatively affected by cheaters and their behavior. The team here is committed towards their removal from the servers and our community has helped us greatly with providing us with evidence that help us remove these bad actors from the game. We'd like you to know that we are working towards solutions that will minimize their effect and that we are making improvements to the systems and processes we use to handle cases like this. We'd like to extend our apologies once more and express our hope that this does not dissuade you entirely from the game and that you will consider giving it another chance eventually.

author: {'steamid': '76561198261946148', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 3616, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3076, 'last_played': 1710262368}
review:
Scum ist schon wirklich gut, das Überleben mit allen seinen Mechaniken ist sehr gut und gut durchdacht. Nur wenige Elemente stören mich extrem. Beispielsweise währe da die Erschöpfung die lächerlich langsam geheilt werden kann. Vor allem macht es in einen Laufsimulator wenig Sinn sowas einzubauen. Zum anderen sind Die Mecha am Airfield maßlos übertrieben. Trotz schleichen und 50m Abstand drehen die Dinger sich sofort um und ballern los sobald man aus der Deckung kommt. Waffen Drop Chance ist ebenfalls zu gering. Auf Offizielle Server kann man das Spiel vergessen. Auf Private Server sieht das alles aber wieder ganz anders aus. 

Am Ende des Tages werde ich aber weiter spielen da der Rest des Games wie gesagt sehr gut ist und Spaß macht.

author: {'steamid': '76561198360308873', 'num_games_owned': 375, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 11937, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 157, 'playtime_at_review': 3930, 'last_played': 1712065454}
review:
[h1]S.C.U.M[/h1]
 Şimdiye kadar gördüğünüz hayatta kalma oyunlarını düşünün ve bunları 'öldün mü? tekrar başla' mantığı ile birleştirip birçok detay ile harmanlayın. İşte size SCUM.

Oyunun kendine has kimliği daha karakter tasarlama ekranında aslında dikkatli kişiler tarafından anlaşılsa da ben size detaylı bir şekilde deneyimlerimden bahsetmek istiyorum.

 Hala geliştirilmekte olmasına rağmen içeriği ve doluluğu beni cezbetti. Sanılanın aksine tüm hayatta kalma oyunlarında olduğu gibi bu oyunda da ölünce oyun bitmiyor arkadaşlar...
deneyimleriniz, harita hakimiyetiniz, hayatta kalma güdüleriniz, hatta zevkleriniz bile bu oyunda size farklı bi kapı açıyor ve oyun tarzınızı şekillendiriyor.

 Oyunumuzun hikayesini kısaca özetlemek gerekirse (böylesi daha anlamlı olacak) suçluları bi adaya atarak onların hayatta kalmasını dronlar aracılığı ile çekip yüksek teknolojilerle onları tekrar tekrar canlandırıp 'baştan' başlamaları üzerine kurulmuş... BAYILDIM

Dediğim gibi 'baştan' başlamak ama sıfırdan değil. önceki yaptığınız davranışlarınız bi sonrakini etkileyecek şekilde. örnek vermem gerekirse;

Adaya indim. biraz gezinmem ve etrafımda hiçbişey bulamamamın sonucu zombilere yakalanıp öldüm. tekrar atıldığımda ise -250 para ile başladım bu nasıl iş derken bu sefer kendimi sağlama almak adına üzerimdeki eşyalar ile ekipman yaptım, önceki ölüşümdeki gibi hazırlıksız yakalanabileceğim yerlere girmektense şehir yağmalayıp korunaklı bölgeye girdim. Birçok satıcının yanı sıra bir de bankamız olduğunu gördüm. Buradaki satıcıların istedikleri şeyleri ayrı ayrı onlara satarak para kazanıp bankaya yatırdığımda ise o -250 nin ne demek olduğunu anladım.

Oyun her başlangıcında yatırımlarınız ile hızlı bir başlangıç yapma fırsatı sunuyor... Ama ilerleyebilirseniz.

author: {'steamid': '76561198933927717', 'num_games_owned': 51, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 7977, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 49, 'playtime_at_review': 6873, 'last_played': 1711879114}

author: {'steamid': '76561198132081864', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 684, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 684, 'last_played': 1707069561}
review:
A grafika szép és ezzel kifújt a játék.
4x futottam neki. De azon kívül hogy folyton felcseszett sok értelme nem volt.
Mik is voltak a problémák:
- folyton éhes a karakter, amivel még nem is lenne feltétlen baj, de olyat ótvar a loot a játékban, hogy ezt orvosolni rendes 
   kínszenvedés
- a járművek roncsok, nem találtam olyat ami működött volna, 1-3 kerék mindig hiányzott, de volt, hogy ülés nuku és motor 
  se mindben volt.
- Zombik.... A hitbox-uk nevetséges. Átszúrok rajta és nem találom el a lándzsával... Marha gyorsan ütnek, lefutni sem 
  igazán lehet őket, főleg ha már a seggedben vannak. De a kedvencem a spawn-olásuk. Simán leteszi őket köréd amikor 
  loot-olsz egy házat és behúzol egyet aztán a semmiből előkerül még 7 haverja...
- az íjászkodás meg borzalom.
- végül az építkezés, indokolatlanul sok alapanyagot igényel minden.... Vacak zászlóhoz ami az építései területet adja 7 vas 
  kell ami csak roncs kocsikból lootol-ható, és nem egy település van ahol, nincs roncs egy darab sem...
Szeretem az ilyen stílusú játékokat és 5 év után nem hittem, hogy egy ilyen vacakot fogok kipróbálni, érthető is miért üresek a szerverek.... Rég volt már olyan játék amire sajnáltam, hogy költöttem egy fillért is. Ez még akciósan sem ér meg egy forintot sem.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027416791', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 11289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11289, 'last_played': 1702647275}
review: Next will be a Wildlife DLC pack l0l.
developer_response: Hi Bless the Broke! We're sorry to see that the inclusion of DLC's have soured your opinion of the game. While we're aware of the bad rep they have. However, in our case, they were essential for making the game a reality and have helped sustain us over the course of the development. We'd like to emphasize that the DLC's are exclusively visual and do not give any unfair advantage to those that have them. They also did not detract us from the overall development of the game as we are with each day getting ever closer to our ultimate goal, which is to exit Early access and deliver on the core promise of the game, which is to be a truly hardcore survival experience our fans and community will enjoy. That being said, we hope that these will not dissuade you from the game entirely and that you'll consider giving it another chance once we'll manage to get that 1.0 version of the game out the door.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013742055', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2513, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2133, 'last_played': 1707864456}
review:
This game is a buggy mess and you should not buy this game in this state.
Its a shame the game could be really good but its too frustrating.
Most game mechanics clich or have some bug. Spent 5k credits to start fishing. Caught several fish, but they all disappear once you try to keep them and you just keep losing your tackle.
Character falls through the floor and gear disappearing are just some other bugs 
Overall, this game is not even fit for early access. Developers should be ashamed at this god awful mess and charging people.
developer_response: Hi [PBS] Scott! We're sorry to see that you are thoroughly disappointed with the game. We understand your frustration as we are aware that the game still has some underlying issues, but what we want to emphasize is that the team is hard at work on delivering a full-functional, optimized, bug-free and feature-complete version of the game by the time we release the 1.0 version of SCUM. That is why we hope that you will consider giving SCUM another chance - at least when we manage to get these issues sorted out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198361831932', 'num_games_owned': 100, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 7312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6976, 'last_played': 1710425502}
review:
这是一个从屎到神的游戏，从2018年刚出的bug无数，到现在官方收集玩家反馈修复了无数bug的游戏。
制作组官方对玩家的回应很高，在多数游戏里面这点已经很少见了，如果你是为了玩爽游来玩SCUM，我的推荐只能是让你换一款游戏，这款游戏更像一杯浓烈的威士忌，刚入门时，非常浓烈，但是慢慢的这股浓烈会让你上瘾，逐渐上头，加上官方对低配机的优化
更像是威士忌里面加了一块冰，让更多的玩家涌入了进来，但因为部落系统的原因，丧尸确实更加智能了，但是有个别服务器加大了丧尸数量，逼着玩家氪血衣就很脑残，这里就不点名这些服了，赞助是肯定正常的，逼氪那就是死妈妈。
PVE趣味程度很高，但PVE 终究是PVE，你在造了房子，虐杀了僵尸之后，你会慢慢的兴趣偏到PVP去。
这也是丧尸生存游戏的阶段性吧，如果你恰好还玩过DayZ 噢那就太好了，玩过DayZ后玩SCUM是非常容易上手的，因为死法都差不多，寒假荒不知道玩啥，SCUM肯定就是你和你朋友的首选了，好游戏不该不知道，希望制作组越做越好。

author: {'steamid': '76561198280049628', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 2775, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 252, 'playtime_at_review': 2522, 'last_played': 1712425897}
review:
[u] [h1] SCUM [/h1] [/u]
[table]
    [tr]
        [th]Gatunek[/th]
        [td]Survival[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [th]Kampania[/th]
        [td]Nie[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [th]Długość gry[/th]
        [td]Różna[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [th]Tryby trudności[/th]
        [td]Tak[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [th]Metacritic[/th]
        [td]78%[/td] 
    [/tr]
[table equalcells=1]
[/table]


[h2] [b] 💀BRUTALNA ANALIZA [/b]  [/h2] 

🔸[i] SCUM [/i]
Hardcore'owa jatka survivalowa, rzucająca cię w klatkę z bestialską walką o przetrwanie. W świecie, gdzie śmierć czai się za każdym rogiem, musisz być gotów na najbardziej bezwzględne wyzwania.

[h2] [b] 🔥ROZGRYWKA W PIEKLE [/b] [/h2]

🔸 SCUM serwuje ci skomplikowane doświadczenie survivalowe, 
gdzie musisz radzić sobie z głodem, pragnieniem i chorobami. Gra nie odpuszcza, oferując brutalną rzeczywistość, gdzie tylko najsilniejsi przetrwają. Broń się różnorodnym arsenałem i sztuką przetrwania.

[h2] [b] 🌐MULTIPLAYEROWY WÓDZ [/b] [/h2]

🔸Aspekt multiplayerowy SCUM 
to walka o dominację, gdzie sojusze rodzą się w ogniu walki, a starcia gracz kontra gracz są krwawymi widowiskami. Nieprzewidywalność drugiego człowieka dodaje smaczku do tej brutalnej ucztę przetrwania.

[h2]  [b] 🎮EKSTREMALNA WIZUALIZACJA I HARMONIA DŹWIĘKU [/b] [/h2]

🔸SCUM przynosi ci imponującą grafikę, 
ukazującą świat po apokalipsie w pełnej okazałości. Detale postaci, otoczenia i efekty pogodowe odciskają się w pamięci. Dźwięki? To nie jest symfonia, to symfonia chaosu, gdzie odgłosy śmierci przypominają, że każde wyjście na zewnątrz to ryzyko.

[h2] [b] 💀WYZWANIE ZA WYZWANIEM [/b] [/h2]

🔸SCUM to brutalny sprawdzian, 
w którym albo dostosowujesz się do surowych warunków, albo przegrywasz. Bez tradycyjnej kampanii, narracja to twoja własna walka o przeżycie, a każda decyzja wpływa na wynik tej mrocznej gry.

[h2] [b] 💰WARTOŚĆ I EKSTREMALNA TRWAŁOŚĆ [/b] [/h2]

🔸Wartość gry SCUM to niekończąca się orgia przetrwania, 
z otwartym światem, oferującym nieskończone możliwości. Dynamika, regularne aktualizacje i oddana społeczność to dawka adrenaliny utrzymująca cię przy życiu. Brak kampanii zastępuje powtarzalna historia, którą sam tworzysz.

[h2] 💻 [b] SPRZĘTOWE ZWYCIĘSTWO [/b] [/h2]

🔸SCUM wymaga sprzętu na miarę wyzwania, 
przyjmując przynajmniej Intel Core i5-6600K lub AMD Ryzen 5 1600, 16 GB RAM i kartę graficzną NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 lub AMD Radeon RX 580. Jeśli masz to, co potrzeba, wchodzisz do tego brutalnego świata na własnych warunkach.

[h2] ⌛ [b] PODSUMOWANIE Z PUNKTEM WIDZENIA KŁĘSKI [/b] [/h2]

🔸SCUM to przetrwanie na najbardziej bestialskim poziomie, 
pokazujące realistyczne wyobrażenie o świecie po końcu. Silny multiplayer i poszanowanie brutalnej rzeczywistości uczyniły ją wyborem dla tych, którzy szukają ekstremalnych doświadczeń.

[code] [url=store.steampowered.com/curator/43276783/] Śledź naszą stronę kuratora, [b]The Salad Mix[/b], jeśli masz odwagę encyklopedycznego eksperymentu.[/url] [/code]

review: They seem to be taking one step forward and two steps back at the moment, they completly broke zombie spawns where they literally spawn 2 ft behind you with no audio, almost like they didnt even test it first. And instead of immediatly fixing it or rolling back they instead fix a very minor base building issue by hunting towers. Now i wanna just uninstall cause aint no telling when they will fix the zombie spawns
developer_response: Hi Dirty Harry! We're sorry to see that the latest horde update ruined the game for you. You'll be pleased to know that the team is well aware of the issue and that we're actively working on a fix for this system, which will make the puppet spawns much more organic. That being said, we'd like to invite you to keep an eye on our Steam announcements to see when we'll have this sorted out. We really hope that you'll give the game another chance once we'll manage to get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198136594854', 'num_games_owned': 312, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 78283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69220, 'last_played': 1709397796}
review:
The horde update kind of ruined the game, went into the normal bunker and had 8 consecutive hordes spawn on me, wasn't even done getting the arrows back as they kept coming. 

I understand that it is meant to be a challenging and hard game, but at this point it's not challenging it is ridiculous. Before the new spawn system you could approach a place strategically and clean up the spawned puppets now they spawn right on top of you and often with a beeper and there's very little you can do unless you get a lucky shot out of the bow at him. 

The guns are pretty much pointless at this point because with bunkers and abandoned bunkers being a death trap they are with a bow, they become inescapable deathtrap as soon as you decide to use a gun inside. 

PLEASE MAKE THE NEW SPAWN SYSTEM MAKE SENSE. Either you want a realistic survival challenge or you want a game to decide to tell you "fuck you" and spawn 15 zombies in the same room with you, it's not challenging and it's not fun now.

author: {'steamid': '76561198197476828', 'num_games_owned': 116, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 22043, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22043, 'last_played': 1706927449}
review:
v.-0.95
Наиграл на официальном РУ сервере №5 почти 200 часов, встретил читера прыгающего выше 2го этажа и такого - кого пули не убивают, а он тебя с кулаков бьет запросто. последней каплей стало то что за ночь в разных частях большого города в квадрате D4-D3 пропали все спрятанные сундуки со всем хабаром, инженерка, броня комплекты с рюкзаками, оружие, патроны...
Сама игра еще пустовата, интерфейс совсем не дружелюбный, надо чтобы ктото помогал в освоении, зомби спавнятся там где 5 мин назад всех зачистил, в случае громкого шума спавнится в 20 шагах прям на глазах 5-7 штук прям из воздуха в бетонном подземелье или в поле и бегут на тебя.
В целом если есть друзья и частный сервер без читаков - играть можно, но если к релизц ни чего не добават то игра удержит вас на месяц , пока посетите пару локаций и попробуете механики, потом там особо держаться не зачто.
ЧИТЕРЫ БЕСЯТ!! УШЕЛ ИЗ ИГРЫ ИЗ ЗА НИХ!

author: {'steamid': '76561198007233788', 'num_games_owned': 135, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1706852080}
review: Just wasn't my cup of tea... The game has great detailed mechanics and crafting but really lacks avatar customization.  I'm so use to DayZ and 7 Days to Die were you jump right in and can figure most things about what to do.  It was a horrible experience, the game starts you in a free fall with hands and feet bonded, so unless you look thru the controls before hand your a spat on the ground.  I just couldn't get a feel for the game.  In all honesty, I only played for less than an hour, but that was enough to kill any enjoyment or interest for me.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985613152', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 14336, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14336, 'last_played': 1706819741}
review:
Scum before Horde mode was introduced
Best survival game out there. Introduced so much cool stuff DayZ has promised for years. Take on a puppet alone? With right gear. No issue. Search farm houses for small loot? Just be careful if its "mined" with sleepers. Head into town for that sweet loot? Sure but be sure to have a tactic. Sweep streets and clean the place. Go house by house and kill all puppets. Be aware of other players and good hunting. Game had it all. 

Scum after horde mode. 
Very few puppets around. No point scouting. You wont see much. Trigger a single puppet. Either by attacking or it gets the drop on you. Instantly there will be a horde teleported in. In front of you, behind you, behind closed doors, in cleared areas, in your pants. 
If you think you can beat them. They will teleport in more. Only viable tactic left is to run. Think you can board up? They break down doors nowdays to. Think you can scruff around small farmlets and cottages? Only takes one single puppet to turn that cottage into grand central station. You thinking of playing Scum today? Better play Left4Dead. They do this kind of game better. Im heading back to DayZ where atleast there is some kind of realism left. So dissapointed on this guys. I really enjoyed the game pre Horde BS.
developer_response: Hi Northstar! We're sorry to see that the latest patch that introduced puppet hordes was not to your liking. However, we believe that this is more due to the functioning of the horde, rather than the horde itself as we're aware that its spawning does not work as intended. That is why we'd like to provide some reassurance by saying that the team is actively working on a fix for the hordes, which will make their spawns much more organic. That is why we'd like to invite you to keep an eye on our hotfix/patch updates in order to see when will this fix go live. That being said, we really hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance once we manage to get that sorted out.

E um jogo dificil, então envolve muita paciência para conseguir as coisas e saber lidar com tudo.
Porém, é muito dinamico e realmente envolve questão de vida real. Jogos desse estilo, principalmente esse, tem que ter tempo e dedicação para aprender as manias dele.
Pra mim gosto desse estilo é nota 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198114194502', 'num_games_owned': 192, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 14114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 241, 'playtime_at_review': 11490, 'last_played': 1712431506}
review:
Играю в игру со времен 0.6 патча, игра казалась мне перспективной, классной, были куплены оба supporter pack'a, если 0.7 патч был нормальным, 0.8 патч был ну окей, то 0.9 и 0.95 патч похоронил игру на х8уЙ!

Проблем у игры много, на каждый пук будет приходить дохуилиард зомбаков, полутать что-то? Забудь об этом.
Лута на военках или в мире нету, я будто на харде дейза играю, разрабы сделали из игру помойку.
Зомби спавнятся прямо за спиной)0)

Кто-то скажет, мб ты играешь на не официальных серверах? А вот хуй там) Вся эта история происходит везде, в моем отзыве фигурируем опыт игры как раз на официальном сервере.

Не рекомендую к покупке за фулл прайс, пожалеете.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068862324', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 20415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 6022, 'playtime_at_review': 13513, 'last_played': 1712496717}
review:
This was one of my favorite survival games out there.

Sadly afther the latest decision of the developers to change the puppet spawn i no longer enjoy the game.
From my understanding the developers are aiming for 100-200 people [PVP] servers wich does not fit the rest of this game at all and would make it a worse DayZ clone honestly people that want such experience will be on DayZ anyway.

Because the developers made this decision to move to 100-200 people servers they had to sacrafice the puppet spawn system wich now turned into a infinite out of thin air spawner.
It breaks immersion and the survival feel this game use to have.

I truly hope the developers wake up and realise they should head for immersion and a 50slot tops PVE/PVP experience.
Basicly the route they went up to this point.

Many daily SCUM players and streamers said the same way better then i could do.

If u the developers want to compete with DayZ for the PVP crowd your setting yourself up to fail

That being said, we really hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance once we manage to get that sorted out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198287129031', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 9316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8305, 'last_played': 1707331913}
review:
TLDR: It'd be a great 0.5v, not 0.95v.

Currently, the devs seem to be adding more errors to the game then fixing. Just 2 patches ago I could play for 8 hours straight without a crash, now I might get a half an hour to an hour, others barely 10 minutes.

But hey, Vehicle skins got added with a 64 GB update. Woo... At this current state I cannot reccomend this game despite loving the survival elements present (nutrition specifically.)


Things that need work -
*Cooking
*Crafting Variety/Complexity
*Zombie/Puppet AI and animations
*Melee Combat
*Animals

Things that are 10/10
*Graphics
*Player Character Movement
*Nutrition and Body


I would suggest -

Melee, add a player shove when a puppet is too close to be hit with either a punch or melee weapon, like every good zombie game. Make kicking and combos require player input (Look at Kingdom Come's combat)

Puppets just need a massive overhaul, and NOT spawning-wise. That's already borked and should be reverted. Give them the same physics as the player character or something similar, they shouldn't go from prone to vertical mid-swing.

Crafting needs some higher level stuff and more crafting stations. Ever heard of blacksmithing? Take scrap metal, make stuff. Higher skill means better looking (and more durable/functional) stuff. Humans can make better things, we're not limited to trashcan armor and animal-skin pants IRL. Crafting could also have a mini-game for things like blacksmithing or maybe tailoring. Player draws a little stitch mark or something? Hits metal with hammer until it's to shape (with re-heating?) Vintage story does this very well in blacksmithing.

Cooking just needs an overhaul, the current system makes no sense. I guess skewers can be expanded to anything logically skewerable, soup/stew as well. Look at any other decent survival game for ideas, Vintage Story is a great example.

review:
Can somebody please ping me when/if this becomes playable again (the zombie spawning that got broken in 0.95 gets fixed) ?

---------------------------

Basically, I did recommend this game a lot in the past.

Now, sadly...

Not just 0.95, that broke zombie spawning... Even the previous updates were for me a chain of cutting features in order to add other "features".

I must admit that I did witness some bug repairs over the past 3 years, like for instance, last time I checked, I could get my arrows back...

I mean, this might return to be one of my favourite games, after they fix some of the major issues due to the backslash. It's just that I cannot recommend it yet. Sorry guys!

All the best!

author: {'steamid': '76561198033653887', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 28939, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28938, 'last_played': 1706930218}
review:
Nobody really reads these anyway so i'm going to make this relatively short.

Just play DayZ.

There was a time when SCUM was light-years ahead of DayZ, but not anymore. Everyone is talking about how terrible this "Horde" update is, and they're not wrong, it really is awful, but its just one update among many. virtually every update over the last 2 years removed content in the name of server load and performance, so much so that most of what is show on the store page is just not in the game anymore, or replaced with something far inferior. it just seems as though the developers are doing whatever is easiest, not necessarily what is right for the game. on top of all that there are NINE dlc's for a game that isn't even released yet. I guess that's to be expected though when an indie developer sells out to a big publisher.
developer_response:
Hi Mr. Stitches! We're sorry to see that you're thoroughly disappointed with the game. We acknowledge that the horde update does not function as intended and that it negatively affects the player experience and we'd like to reassure you that we're actively working to tweak that system so that it feels more organic and less frustrating for players.

We also recognize and acknowledge the criticism for removing some of the content that was present in the game - namely the removal of vehicles. We'd like to point out that that was not an easy decision to make and that we did not make it lightly, but however difficult it was, it was necessary at the time in order to ensure the stability of the game. As we'll be nearing the 1.0 release of the game and supporting it after its release, we'll make sure to add the removed content back into the game and to add new one as well.

Our main focus at the moment is delivering a polished and feature-complete 1.0 release and we're right on track to deliver just that. We completely understand if you feel checked out at this moment, but we'd like nothing more than for you to give the game another chance, at least when we'll get to that 1.0 version of the game and to enjoy it again as you already have.

author: {'steamid': '76561198268811503', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 13662, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10983, 'last_played': 1707812105}
review:
SCUM stands as a paragon in the realm of survival games, distinguished by its unparalleled realism and meticulous attention to detail. It offers an immersive experience that transports players into a world that, while fantastical, feels incredibly tangible and lifelike. Since its inception, the game has undergone a remarkable evolution, marked by substantial enhancements that have only amplified its appeal. As a strategic alternative to third-person tactical shooters, SCUM presents a compelling proposition.

As a dedicated player, I’m eagerly awaiting the upcoming updates, which promise the addition of AI/NPCs into the game world. This new feature is set to enrich the dynamics of both single-player and multiplayer modes, adding another layer to the already engaging gameplay. I highly recommend keeping an eye on SCUM’s future developments.

I strongly encourage you to consider supporting SCUM by purchasing the DLC. The value it offers far exceeds the initial investment, providing a substantial return in terms of the quality and quantity of content. The development team is highly responsive to player feedback, consistently implementing improvements and frequently releasing updates. Your support not only enhances your own gaming experience but also contributes to the ongoing development and refinement of this exceptional game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039882439', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 13215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 171, 'playtime_at_review': 3337, 'last_played': 1712391945}
review:
50時間超えたので、とりまレビュー（基本はシングルでプレイ

サバイバルという点だと、（デフォルト設定で）一番初心者にまったく優しくないゲーム
ただし、アイテムの湧き率自体はシングルプレイでも大きく変更できるので、それを知ってるかでゲーム難易度が大きく違いがあるように感じた。
チュートリアルがあったらしいが0.95で始めた自分にはそれらしきものが無かった
SCUMプレイ者がいない環境では死んで憶えるゲーとなるため、この点も敷居が高いように感じる。

マルチはそれぞれの管理者がプレイ方針にあわせた環境を準備してるので、それらを読んで参加することをお勧め。

ゲームの方向性に感じたこと等は、1.0に向けてどう差別化をしていきたいのかをまだ見極めきれてないので、言及しない。

ただ、サバイバルという点では十分遊べるゲームだと思えるし、マルチも自分にあった鯖を探せは楽しめるだろう。
難点は、日本語Wikiを探しても最新のことが書かれてるサイトが一つもないという点が一番の弱点だと思う(マルチだったら人に聞けるが)。

author: {'steamid': '76561198012926742', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 11678, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11581, 'last_played': 1710961476}
review: It was good until the recent update that made the zombies unrealistically spawning right next to you after you have just killed them. Also the horde mechanic gets annoying quickly. I would otherwise recommend the game but the zombie situation is pretty game- and immersion breaking for me.
developer_response: Hi Lag Fairy! We're very much aware that the hordes and their spawning do not work as intended and we're sorry that this has soured your time with the game. You'll be pleased to know that the team is actively working on a fix for this, which is why we'd like to remind you to keep an eye on out for our hotfix/dev updates to see when we'll implement a fix for this and express our hope that you'll give the game another chance once we get that sorted out.

review: As an experienced 18-year veteran of the industry, I would like to inquire if the authorities could potentially develop a versatile vehicle with dual functionality - allowing passengers to embark and disembark seamlessly while ensuring automatic door closure.  Additionally, it would be beneficial to optimize both the planting pattern and bullet loading rate for enhanced efficiency.  Currently, there is a limitation where only one plant can be sown at a time, resulting in slow progress.  May I ask if you have practical farming experience?  Furthermore, let's address the issue of hygiene when handling waste.  Is it necessary to inspect our hands after using the restroom?  Moreover, is mobility restricted during urination?  Lastly, have you ever encountered any encounters with hostile entities such as zombies?

author: {'steamid': '76561198837850642', 'num_games_owned': 73, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 13360, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8280, 'last_played': 1708446232}
review:
Советы:

1. Будучи в лесу, опробуйте все виды грибов ;)

2. Будучи в городе, обязательно пошумите. Таким образом вы устроите забег с самыми лучшими атлетами!!!

3. Если Вы очень любите себя и своих тиммейтов - креветок, то обязательно сходите в бункер, там будет приятный парень Рейзер, он очень любит обниматься.

4. Если вы слышите, как что-то пищит и приближается, то Вам стоит дождаться приближения, ведь это НЕВЕРОЯТНЫЙ КУРЬЕР, ОН ХОЧЕТ ОБОГРЕТЬ ВАС СВОИМ ПОДАРКОМ, ВАМ ЖЕ ОЧЕНЬ ХОЛОДНО!!! 

ps: одевайтесь теплее, но в воде вам это вряд ли поможет.

author: {'steamid': '76561198256526091', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 772, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 552, 'last_played': 1707159340}
review:
says Co-op game but you have to Buy a server in order to play with your friends. False advertisement to the finest here.
It's just a massively multiplayer game like how most games are. Just another game trying to steal your money, When the game actually comes out with CO-OP like it says it has I will delete my post but I'd never recommend this game to friends.

This is a example of a poor excuse for the devs to make a game, say it's still being worked on and the full game will be released soon. but it's been since 2018 and nothing hardly has been done to match what they had said the game is about. you'd think with how many people are complaining about having to rent/buy a server just to play with your friends. Sure, you can just join the servers listed, but then you run into the hassle of dealing with other players who are entire jerks and hunt you down no matter where you go, you get the hassle of having to find your friends in a Large as map which takes over a hour to just find your friend.

it's 2024 now, if this game has been in early access for this long it's VERY clear the Devs gave up on the game or using the game to exploit people for their money by having them pay more money just to play with their friends, even though the game does say online CO-OP.
developer_response: Hi _CloudDaze_! We're sorry to see that a lack of option when it comes to multiplayer has soured your opinion of the game. We're aware that private lobbies are a very requested feature, but we'd like provide some reassurance and state that the team does not with to exploit people in any way. We are currently focused on releasing the 1.0 version of the game and exiting Early access. After we manage to polish and fix all the issues that are present in the game by v1.0, we'll be able to talk more about additional modes. Until then, we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance at least when we'll manage to get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036565014', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 70159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1575, 'playtime_at_review': 53227, 'last_played': 1712480296}
review: Kurz um gesagt, ist SCUM mein Lieblingsspiel. Jedoch verschlimmbessern die DEVS mit jedem Hotfix und Update das Spiel (BUGS). Sie sind zwar bemüht, die Vielzahl an BUGS zu lösen, jedoch müssen Prioritäten im Projekt überdacht werden. Tanzmoves und Skins für Fahrzeuge sollten an letzter Stelle kommen. Lieber supporte ich über etwaige Supportpacks als über etwaige SKINS oder sonstigen Schlunz.

review:
[h1] 님들 저 쓰레기장에 왔는데
여기 너무 더럽고 냄새나는데 어떻게 해야되요? [/h1]

사이버 노가다 판와서 노잼이라 불평해도 어쩔 수 없음. 

졸라...현실보다 더 현실적인 게임이라 
불친절한데 할거리가 너무 많고, 
먼지보다 더 미세한 디테일함에 나가 떨어질 수 있음.

그런데...이런 냄새나고 밑바닥 인생 같은 게임이 취향이다!?
그럼 바로 인생 게임 그 잡채입니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198164195116', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 293023, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 6801, 'playtime_at_review': 280051, 'last_played': 1712449021}
review:
I think i bought this game 5 years ago for 14.95 euro and now in 2024 i am still playing and having lots of fun.
This survival game is by far the best in his genre, i know there are still some little issues but this game has a very commited dev crew and updates are always coming. The game has some awsome graphics and the gameplay is very good and very realistic. The biggest issue i have with this game is the lag on server you play on even if ping is very low but maybe that has to do with my mid range PC setup. You will need a very good PC to play this game well because on low settings you enjoy this game less. I hope that the dev crew will attend to this issues if it is possible if not this game is still worthy buying and you will have so much fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198969785655', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2804, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1447, 'last_played': 1707827501}
review:
事情是这样的，这个游戏衣服会脏，穿着满脏的衣服会生病。菜鸡的我只敢在没僵尸的一倍区搜物资，完事我好不容易搜到两肥皂，洗个裤子衣服就没了，心疼得紧。结果洗完人物想拉屎，拉完裤子鞋子满脏。
于是后来再想拉屎的时候我就给裤子鞋配枪丢了扔前面一点的地方...
然后我拉完屎，恰好新刷了（或者是我找不着了）。。（是的，裤子鞋子枪都没了）
于是在玩这个游戏的第一天，有个光腚的变态搁物资区疯狂找裤子鞋子，脚还因为不穿鞋损伤了。（此前因为缺布条我还给我看到的衣服裤子都剪了...）

author: {'steamid': '76561198086475042', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 1120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1120, 'last_played': 1688525333}
review: Nobody wants to micromanage the poop in their colon.
developer_response:
Hi 𝓛𝓸 𝓢𝓲𝓮𝓷𝓽𝓸! We're sorry to see that our metabolism system is not to your liking. The system itself is one the most complex simulations of real-time human health in gaming and is one the unique features that makes SCUM special. It adds an additional layer of challenge to those that wish to survive on the island and creates a feeling of emergent gameplay as it greatly influences the player's priorities and decisions as they navigate through the wilderness and pockets of civilization. 

However, we recognize that the way some of these features are set up do not cater to everyone, which is why we've enabled private servers where certain settings can be modified. That is why we would advise that you find a server with settings that cater to your playstyle and enjoy the game there. If you are playing singleplayer, you can also change that setting by clicking ESC, picking 'Server settings', and then under the 'World' category, pick the 'MISC' subcategory and there you will find the slider for modifying the speed at which this system is simulated.

Hope this provides some clarification and we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198045301435', 'num_games_owned': 2017, 'num_reviews': 697, 'playtime_forever': 7286, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7286, 'last_played': 1706673537}
review: So, this game has been a back and forth like no other that I've played. Since the game's inception, it has admittedly gotten so much better. The entirety of the reason that I give the game a thumbs down currently is because literally every single time there's an update, something becomes fundamentally broken that wasn't before. The new horde system has broken the overall system for the PVE servers, and I hate playing PVP on games like this. So, as of the moment, the game is pretty much unplayable without a decent team going with you everywhere. The game has so much potential that it honestly hurts giving it a thumbs down. Right now, 5/10, but will definitely be higher when they correct the current issues.
developer_response: Hey there 01110111 01100001 01110010! We're sorry to see that the latest update soured your experience with the game. You'll be pleased to know that the team is actively working on a fix for this feature and that we'll have have it quite soon. Make sure to keep an eye out for our hotfix/dev updates to see when we'll have that sorted out. We truly hope that you'll return to the game as we'd really hate to lose a passionate player because of something that will be tended to.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037425823', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 944, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 944, 'last_played': 1699057793}
review:
There's promise in the complexity of some systems, but the overall package just doesn't hit. It's not really a matter of rather it's worth $40 or not but rather the game just doesn't feel like it offers much past PVP. The PvE elements are far from enough.

Can't recommend sale or otherwise, if you don't mind having to drop money for a server, and don't mind PVP being the only reason to play, then watch some videos and decide if the gameplay is enough to deal with the UI. I will end this review on a good note by saying that the simulation aspect of the game systems are amazing and offers something no other survival game I've played does at this level.
developer_response: Hi InAbsentia! We're sorry to see that you find the PvE aspect of the game to be lacking. We'd like to emphasize that the game is still in Early access and that we'll be adding more PvE content as we'll be releasing the full 1.0 version of the game, and that we'll be supporting the game after its release. That being said, we truly hope you'll consider giving the game another chance once we manage to get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561199324872454', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6651, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2479, 'last_played': 1707391852}
review:
Eigentlich sehr empfehlenswert, wäre da nicht das absolut Spielspaß abtötende Problem mit dem UE Fatal Error. Bei mir tritt er nicht beim Start auf, sondern random, während dem Spiel. Meistens wenn ich eine Schubkarre belade?

Treiber aktualisieren und Save Game Ordner löschen hilft, aber ein Beigeschmack bleibt. Jedes mal von vorne anfangen, wenn ein Update rauskommt macht es irgendwie witzlos. In der Hoffnung, dass es ab der 1.0 nicht mit jedem Update so weiter geht, absolute Empfehlung für jeden der mehr Realismus in Survival Games und Erfolgserlebnisse in den kleinen Dingen feiert.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035788970', 'num_games_owned': 125, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 13471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2597, 'last_played': 1710946651}
review:
As soon as I got the game it was hard at first as it is a very in depth game with a lot of mechanics to it and a lot of thought put into how things work in the game. I would for sure tell anyone to look into how to play the game a bit before jumping right into it with little to no knowledge like I did. 

Now after about 40 hours in I can confidently say that this game is one of the best if not the best survival game i have ever player honestly. I cannot wait for the full release of the game or for more updates and patches. Sure it has some bugs and crashes here and there a few times but you can always get right back to what you were doing and carry on as they continue to finish the game :) 

Amazing game can not wait to see what they do next as the game is developed :)

author: {'steamid': '76561199065562796', 'num_games_owned': 36, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 852, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 838, 'last_played': 1710101541}
review: This game is so hard, can't find food or anything else it's not like a survival game
developer_response:
Hi IksDee! We're sorry to see that the game left you disappointed. However, it is important to mention that SCUM was never designed to be generous with loot as its core vision is to be a hardcore survival game that leans heavily on realism. The truth is that there is plenty of loot to be found, but it is crucial that you know where to look and to make sure that (in case of PvP) you are not attempting to loot an area that was already cleaned out by some other player. 

You can help yourself by using the community-made SCUM map - https://scum-map.com/en/interactive_map or you can try to find a private server where the setting for loot is increased so that you can easily find the things that you want.

Hope this helps and we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198347979033', 'num_games_owned': 55, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 102491, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96074, 'last_played': 1709901496}
review:
0.95 added a new zombie spawn system (Horde System) that basically spawns a bunch of zombies 10 feet in front of you, completely out of nowhere. 

It doesn't matter if you try to be stealthy, the game simply spawns puppets right behind you, even while looting a 2x2 meter room with the door closed. 

Also, they introduced this little feature called "Realism" ™ to projectiles, where the wind affects every single projectile in a worse way than Sniper Elite does, so even with the best sniper rifle with the highest muzzle velocity, you will never be able to land an accurate shot beyond 300 meters, so like one of the other negative reviews left recently by another player, yeah... Sniping is absolutely dead.

And don't even get me started on medium/low muzzle velocity guns, or bows, which are now absolutely unplayable.

If you are a solo player, just getting started on whatever server, you will not be able to survive at all against the horde system. The game was already hard enough and very unforgiving for solo players, which wasn't that much of a problem the moment you became experienced, but with 0.95 the artificial difficulty is beyond bs.
developer_response:
Hi ImJustSinful! We're sorry to see that the latest update has soured your experience with the game. You'll be pleased to know that the team is actively working on a fix for this issue and that we'll be releasing a fix for it really soon, which is why we'd like to remind you to keep and eye on our dev/hotfix updates to see when we'll get that sorted out. 

As for the ballistics, we'll also make sure to tweak and improve this system as we'll be nearing the 1.0 version.

All that being said, we hope that you'll give the game another chance once we manage to get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198015571153', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 12656, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8748, 'last_played': 1710801609}
review:
Ein umfangreiches, graphisch sehr ansprechendes und gelungenes Survival-Game. Die Karte ist riesig, mit verschiedenen Klimazonen und sehr unterschiedlichem Gelände. Militärcamps, Militäranlagen mit Bunkern, Industrieanlagen mit Horden von Zombies und riesigen Mech's (4-6 Meter hohe Kampf-Roboter), die diese Militär- und Bunkeranlagen, sowie teilweise die Industrieanlagen schützen. 
Zwar ist es noch im early exces Status und birgt auch hier und da noch mal ein paar bug's mit sich, diese werden jedoch fleißig mit den Updates gepatched.

author: {'steamid': '76561198955094676', 'num_games_owned': 84, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 8353, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4253, 'last_played': 1710284254}
review:
The game is pretty good and I like it more than Rust, DayZ or any similar game. However if you are new or coming from these games you will get bored and frustrated in the beginning because is annoying to spawn where you want to and bases should not be your first priority because you won't be able to spawn at it. The reason I prefer this game is due to the Gold system which gives you the feeling that in some way you are making progress and is worth investing time, Wipes are not that constant and even when you have one you keep the gold unless there is a major problem with the game or is necessary. This is why the base is not a priority at first, you should start by trying to make money until you have decent money and gold that way you will be able to spawn at your base (Yes you have to spend gold to spawn at your base and money if you wish to spawn in a sector of the map). 
Try to spend more skill points in running since you will be able to run for more time because that's what you will be doing when you start the game and probably the skill that unlocks more crafting recipes.

review:
武器を手に入れるためにバンカーに入りたかったんだが
そこはとんでもなくデカイ銃を搭載した殺人ロボが警備してた
俺は隙を見計らってロボの注意が他へ向いたときにバンカーの入り口へダッシュした
するとなぜか俺は立ち止まってズボンを下ろしイチモツとケツを丸出しにしてクソをひりだし始めた
このゲームのクソは長い
快便ならまだ早いかもしれないが俺は腹を下していた
ケツから勢いよく下痢便を地面に向けてぶちまけ始めたとき
ロボが俺に気づいた
俺は自分の下痢便にまみれながら50口径だか対空砲みてえな武器にぶち抜かれて死んだ

author: {'steamid': '76561198260698697', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 6465, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3224, 'last_played': 1710467603}
review:
I had purchased scum a couple years ago and at the time i was living somewhere with poor internet and that made this game difficult to play considering my connection speed, so I had left it in my inventory and maybe played solo a couple times.

Recently my brother and I were looking for a fun, somewhat grindy, PVE and some PVP games to play in the Open World Survival Craft genre, and I had remembered this game, and now I have much better internet. We have put several hours in so far and I will say we are enjoying this early access game.
Here are some thing we like and don't like about this game. 

Don't likes: 
At default settings, this game is WAY more grindy than most OWSC games I've played, but the solution is finding a server with an 8-10x loot modifier. 
The game can crash at times, and it's annoying, but luckily your character isn't idle in server time, so when you crash, your character disappears until you log back in. 
There can be some glitches at times: drinking or eating food straight from a box's inventory, can sometimes cause your characters ability to interact with anything disappear. Most of the time, a re-log will solve this issue. 
The most recent glitch me and my brother found is a random occurrence where our truck, while driving, no clipped through the map floor, we were spawned back on the ground, but our truck and all the loot from a bunker was lost to the abyss. 

Now the positives: 
This game is possibly the most accurate OWSC game in the gun department. IRL I am a gun nerd and seeing a game that implements correct loading animations for mags. drums, shotguns and also has accurate quantity counts (like 7rds. in a 1911 or certain shotguns have shorter feed tubes) is really cool and speaks to the research the devs have done. 
The complexity of crafting materials, or "grinding" to build bases, the inner-workings of vehicle mechanics, charging batteries, repairing guns with the parts of an identical gun and resource gathering restrictions (only carry 2 large logs at a time) are just a few ways this game immerses you into the survival mentality.

Don't let haters scare you off, but if you want the cleanliness of a AAA title then play a AAA title, but what I'll tell you is, I have not found a AAA title that itches all the spots of an immersive open world survival craft like this one. This isn't pay to win. Play with friends and enjoy a real walking dead world simulator where your day to day survival is based on how you maneuver through the challenges.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036716470', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 16409, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16226, 'last_played': 1706985737}
review:
Latest update just nuked the zombie spawn system. Rather than fix the spawning, the developers created paid DLC for car paints for $9.99. Keep in mind that this title is still in early access.

I had high hopes for this game. I saw a lot of promise in it, but I'm seeing too many trends. The devs don't release the server files, so if you want to play on your own private server, you either pay their partner for a server, or you try to find a server that someone else is paying their partner for. They also have a fair number of DLCs already, while still in early access.

I just can't recommend a game with this many troubling trends.

author: {'steamid': '76561198255513288', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 21704, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 145, 'playtime_at_review': 4183, 'last_played': 1712315700}
review:
I have been testing out this game for a few days now, intensively I'd like to add. And I really like the love for detail it is showing. It has huge potential to be a great game. BUT as of 0.95 I cannot recommend it. not for solo play anyways. The zombie spawning mechanism is a source of frustration, nothing else. A horde can insta-spawn everywhere around you, in your blind spot. Areas that had been cleared are suddenly occupied. And you die not through human error but by an unfair mechanism. This might work for people whoo have been playing long and have great equipment anyways. And some to spare for when they die. But if you die as a beginner, just having gotten to the point where you start feeling like you have achieved something, you are done. Cause when you have been killed in a horde spot, you have a snowball's chance in hell of getting your stuff back with a stick and a bow. It's one of the most unbalanced and frustrating mechanisms I have ever encountered, I guess. 
I will be back cause I liked a lot about this game. It's a tough survival game whee you have to manage and micro-manage quite a bit. But that was a lot of fun. Getting jumped by ghosts is unnecessary.

author: {'steamid': '76561198967658959', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 7381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7381, 'last_played': 1705441094}
review:
Now, what i want to say about scum will be really sad right now. Its about the new spawn system that also will be the foundation for future NPC's that will come to the game.
This means ALL NPC's will spawn like this in the future. And now i want to tell you how to cheat with this system implemented by the developers by the game itself.


Go into a town or a POI and spot a zombie (ingame AI) that is around. Now, backup from this zombie 50 meters. If its NOT disappearing after u reach 50 meters, someone is around, be careful.
If it disappears after the 50 meters, its clear, happy looting in peace. :)

Scum is/was my favourite survival game and the best survival game out there in my opinion. The immersion that was given was the absolute number 1 of all the survival games out there. And its making me really sick & sad 
that almost all of this immersion is gone because of this new spawn system just like that. I dont know what to say further. But i dont recommend buying it right now. This game will die the next year if it stays like this, they have to take this spawn system completely out. And i hope they'll start listen to their community again. Im not the only one whos complaining about this. And this system is REALLY bad and game breaking. All the years of hard work will go down the drain thats what i promise if this system stays in like that. You cant be sneaky in this game anymore its a implemented CHEAT by the devs themselfs whats in the game!! Stay away from it for now! 

Its very very very bad... its not bad its disgusting.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008283191', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 114607, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 110028, 'last_played': 1709756283}
review:
Langjähriger Spieler, aber das Spiel wird immer unspielbarer. Der Frustfactor steigt bei jedem einloggen. Ständig wird irgendetwas verschlimmbessert. Zombies spawnen unerwartet direkt hinter einem, in Wänden, im Boden oder auf Gebäuden. Man kämpft sich durch und plötzlich und vollkommen unlogisch spawnt ein Sprenger direkt hinter einem.

Man startet das Spiel und hat permanente Grafikfehler oder dein Fahrzeug ist weg. Einfach so.

Man sollte auf die finale Version warten.

author: {'steamid': '76561199582149903', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 10160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9602, 'last_played': 1710691727}

author: {'steamid': '76561198008927509', 'num_games_owned': 373, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 12221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12221, 'last_played': 1703608985}
review:
Nope, Hell no.
just follow other reviews or just take a look within the comments of one of their newest "hotfix".
So far they've broken my trust that this will get good again, therefore this I see this review as a last step.

If you okay with: Immersive breaking "puppet"-spawns, a super broken horde-system & many many more bugs even playing singleplayer, as 
1.) there's still no native linux support (even tho steam & epic made is super simple to "provide it"..) 
2.) We still are required to PAY one of the worst hosting-provider to actually play Multiplayer on our "own server"
3.) The Horde broke everything immersive that game had left to offer.
4.) Still Getting a bunch of "hotfixes" weeks later! after they've introduced the most breaking feature yet and still haven't been able to fix it correctly, only adjusted them to spawn further away, probly still no matter how they could have seen you through 30 walls. They still are triggered.

For those who own the game: stop playing & deinstall
For those who don't own the game: don't buy (yet? maybe this get's better or they just remove much more content before 1.0, we will see.)
Last question I've had: is it running on UE4? If so, we maybe need to worry about SCUM2 on UE5... wouldn't wonder if that actually happens too soonish.
What should you enjoy turned out just a big bunch of garbage.
developer_response:
Hi Ghostychan! We're sorry to see that you are thoroughly disappointed with the game and that the latest horde update was the straw that broke the camels back for you. We'd like to provide some reassurance and say that the team is hard at work on a fix for this issue, meaning that we'll have it sooner rather than later. That is why we'd like to invite you to check out our upcoming dev/hotfix updates to see when we'll have this fixed.

As for some of the other things that you mentioned, we can confirm that we'll be able to talk more about Linux support and additional multiplayer modes after we'll launch the full 1.0 version as we're currently focused exclusively on that.

We understand and respect the opinion you have for SCUM and we can agree with you that there is merit to it to an extent. However, we'd like to reiterate that the team is indeed working on making this game as awesome as it can be and that we sincerely hope that you'll give it another chance once we manage to get it fully out the door.

author: {'steamid': '76561199217958740', 'num_games_owned': 9, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 9588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8884, 'last_played': 1710081735}
review:
第一次知道scum，是我18年？还是19年？在当时的小米视频上看到的，我还记得那个视频很糊，也没有配音，剪辑的现在看来也很水，但是就是那个视频，它让我知道了除了gta还有游戏可以如此的自由，可以砍树，可以打僵尸，可以跟机器守卫作战，还可以如此真实，可以像现实一样大小便，吃东西会撑死，不吃会饿死，也是它让我窥见了更广大的一角世界，原来并不是只有手机才可以打游戏，电脑也不是只有4399和7k7k可以玩，原来在我不知道的地方，存在着真正的第九艺术，至此一个小男孩对于游戏世界的好奇探索开始了。
时隔5年，历经中考高考后的那个小男孩终于也有了属于自己的电脑，他下载了steam，购买了scum，打开了它，他也第一次出生在了那个岛上，玩了一百小时后，他说了和五年前一样的话--真tm真实啊

author: {'steamid': '76561198042246815', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2641, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2345, 'last_played': 1706496901}
review: Great in concept, horrible in reality. The spawn mechanic is horrible, clear an area, then watch the puppets spawn all around you. developer_response: Hi swordnk! We're sorry to see that the puppet spawning mechanic has made you disheartened with the game. We'd like to reassure you that the team is actively working on a fix for this and that we'll have it quite soon, which is why we'd like to invite you to keep an eye on the on our dev/hotfix updates to see when we'll get that sorted out and hope that you'll give the game another chance once we manage to get that sorted out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198208197732', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 13422, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1332, 'playtime_at_review': 6104, 'last_played': 1711934054}
review:
[h2]Primeira vez que deixo recomendação de game, e se eu gastei meu tempo vindo aqui falar bem é porque realmente me chamou atenção.[/h2]
 
Esse foi o primeiro jogo de sobrevivência que joguei, e no começo estava bem receosa porque sabia que não iria ser fácil e precisaria aprender muitas coisas, pois quando nascemos no game, temos que construir tudo, desde a primeira faca/lança, etc. Mas o jogo é tão imersivo e surpreendente que te prende a ponto de que mesmo que você não saiba nada, mesmo que seja difícil o começo, vai querer avançar e descobrir mais do game. 

Muuuuuito completo, muitas ações, tenta realmente reproduzir a sobrevivência quase que real dos humanos (temos que cuidar até da qtdd de vitamina que temos no corpo!), etc. E confesso que uma parte importante no jogos pra mim são os personalizáveis, dlcs, skins, etc... e até nisso me surpreendeu positivamente. (Ei, desenvolvedores! Aposto que tem muita mina que joga esse game, queremos cada vez mais itens personalizáveis! Nós lutamos, mas lutamos divas 😚💋). Além disso o jogo é [b]lindo[/b]!!!!

Enfim, recomendo fortemente... só não jogo mais pq infelizmente a vida cobra e preciso trabalhar kkk
Mas tenho passado momentos divertidíssimos no scum com meu namorado e amigos.

[b]Pontos negativos:[/b] ainda tem muitos bugs, como desparecimento de itens, crash, itens travados no meio do mapa, etc... Mas é early access né 😁

Enfim, JOGUEMMM!!! e curtam aqui se meu comentário ajudou em algo :) 💞
