review: Wish it was possible to give neutral review, Scum is still an unfinished game and its been a looong time there are still a lot of bugs alongside errors although developers did not left the game to die, the process could ve been faster. to sum it up scum is a survival game takes place in a cute Croatian town. if you are a fan of genre you may like the game. character customization to graphics and environment there are cool things in game and less cool things like zombies spawning and vanishing suddenly, item disappearence and invisible player model...

author: {'steamid': '76561198053056437', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 3229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1625, 'last_played': 1706549484}
review:
Mi permetto di recensire SCUM con poche ore perché ne ho 600 in Zomboid, che praticamente è SCUM senza grafica :) 
A mio avviso bisogna regolarsi nell'acquisto.
 E' in giro ed è EARLY dal 2018, è passato tanto tempo, tolto il "valore aggiunto" dei players al suo interno che si incontrano raramente comunque perché la mappa è grande, è la SOLITA MINESTRA. 

Bugs soliti dell'early, e  contenuti poveri.
In pratica c'è questa immensa mappa di natura, guarda te con dei zombie che oltretutto dopo le prime ore di gioco non costituiscono nemmeno un problema si uccidono easy e sono pochi. se avete gli occhi per vedere come attaccare. 
Looti, vai in giro, vendi robba per prendere maggiore equipaggiamento, ti costruisci una base che alla fine è anche abbastanza inutile. Perché da ramingo vivi tranquillo senza alcun problema. FINE. 

Non c'è struttura, non c'è "sottostante". Farete le ore di gioco lootando, uccidendo zombie, poi passerete da vanilla a server dei giocatori facendo PVP per un po' come in QUALSIASI altro gioco. 
Poi finirà nel dimenticatoio fino alla prossima patch. 

Io vi consiglio di prenderlo alla fine, se e quando esce, non ora.  Se proprio dovete prendere survival zombie, vi consiglio ZOMBOID. 
Zomboid è MOLTO MOLTO più difficile. SCUM è lento, noioso e piuttosto facile. Ha potenziale ma dal 2018 al 2024 hai sviluppato SOLO QUESTO??
 craftate arco lancia, e un ascia. non vi serve altro. lootate e mangiate quel che lootate, tutto il resto non serve a nulla. 

e' vuoto, non è collegato, non è originale, non ha un gameplay profondo . Si vaga per questa mappa e ZzzzzzZZZzzz
Non c'è altro di particolarmente originale o divertente. 
Se proprio dovete passate a DAY Z o uno sparatutto tattico come TARKOV, ma SCUM è un clone e noia pura.

author: {'steamid': '76561198845242277', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1145, 'last_played': 1705613528}
review:
Я в своем познании настолько преисполнился, что я как будто бы уже

сто триллионов миллиардов лет проживаю на триллионах и

триллионах таких же планет, как эта Земля, мне этот мир абсолютно

понятен, и я здесь ищу только одного - покоя, умиротворения и

вот этой гармонии, от слияния с бесконечно вечным, от созерцания

великого фрактального подобия и от вот этого замечательного всеединства

существа, бесконечно вечного, куда ни посмотри, хоть вглубь - бесконечно

малое, хоть ввысь - бесконечное большое, понимаешь? А ты мне опять со

своим вот этим, иди суетись дальше, это твоё распределение, это

твой путь и твой горизонт познания и ощущения твоей природы, он

несоизмеримо мелок по сравнению с моим, понимаешь? Я как будто бы уже

давно глубокий старец, бессмертный, ну или там уже почти бессмертный,

который на этой планете от её самого зарождения, ещё когда только Солнце

только-только сформировалось как звезда, и вот это газопылевое облако,

вот, после взрыва, Солнца, когда оно вспыхнуло, как звезда, начало

формировать вот эти коацерваты, планеты, понимаешь, я на этой Земле уже

как будто почти пять миллиардов лет живу и знаю её вдоль и поперёк

этот весь мир, а ты мне какие-то... мне не важно на твои тачки, на твои

яхты, на твои квартиры, там, на твоё благо. Я был на этой

планете бесконечным множеством, и круче Цезаря, и круче Гитлера, и круче

всех великих, понимаешь, был, а где-то был конченым говном, ещё хуже,

чем здесь. Я множество этих состояний чувствую. Где-то я был больше

подобен растению, где-то я больше был подобен птице, там, червю, где-то

был просто сгусток камня, это всё есть душа, понимаешь? Она имеет грани

подобия совершенно многообразные, бесконечное множество. Но тебе этого

не понять, поэтому ты езжай себе , мы в этом мире как бы живем

разными ощущениями и разными стремлениями, соответственно, разное наше и

место, разное и наше распределение. Тебе я желаю все самые крутые тачки

чтоб были у тебя, и все самые лучше самки, если мало идей, обращайся ко мне, я тебе на каждую твою идею предложу сотню триллионов, как всё делать. Ну а я всё, я иду как глубокий старец,узревший вечное, прикоснувшийся к Божественному, сам стал богоподобен и устремлен в это бесконечное, и который в умиротворении, покое, гармонии, благодати, в этом сокровенном блаженстве пребывает, вовлеченный во всё и во вся, понимаешь, вот и всё, в этом наша разница. Так что я иду любоваться мирозданием, а ты идёшь преисполняться в ГРАНЯХ каких-то, вот и вся разница, понимаешь, ты не зришь это вечное бесконечное, оно тебе не нужно. Ну зато ты, так сказать, более активен, как вот этот дятел долбящий, или муравей, который очень активен в своей стезе, поэтому давай, наши пути здесь, конечно, имеют грани подобия, потому что всё едино, но я-то тебя прекрасно понимаю, а вот ты меня - вряд ли, потому что я как бы тебя в себе содержу, всю твою природу, она составляет одну маленькую там песчиночку, от того что есть во мне, вот и всё, поэтому давай, ступай, езжай, а я пошел наслаждаться прекрасным осенним закатом на берегу теплой южной реки. Всё, ступай, и я пойду.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999720968', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 26452, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3036, 'last_played': 1709415829}
review:
Vorab: Ich habe dieses Spiel  wegen seiner Komplexität seit Release gemieden. Aber wie bei jedem Spiel, wenn man sich mal damit auseinandergesetzt hat, dann ist es umso interessanter.

Scum ist wohl das beste Survival Game welches auf dem Markt ist. 
Vom Umfang der Items und deren Sinn, über Charaktererstellung und Ausstattung mit Kleidung, wie sich Fahrzeuge lenken lassen bis zu Waffen - die Entwickler stellt viel Zeit, Mühe und vor allem Liebe in ihr Spiel und das merkt man deutlich.

 10/10 Punkte nach 60std Spielzeit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007425197', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 4866, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4866, 'last_played': 1703189469}
review:
An interesting game which i just kept trying to enjoy myself but ultimately failed. I tried and tried and tried but ultimately when they changed the horde mechanic, that was the final straw for me. I play single player only and now there is simply no immersion whatsoever.
You can turn around and then behind you things just respawn. Look one way then look the other and wham, that area you just spent ages carefully clearing is full of zombies (they call them puppets) again.
Been a long time since i've seen such an amateurish change in a core mechanic for a game. They literally just pop up in front of you now. Bye bye what little realism there was.

For positives it looks very pretty but the game lacks variety and everything just becomes a rinse, repeat as, at least in my view, the building assets are very limited in number. It's the same building again and again. I eventually thought i'd try out the main city but it's extremely limited as you can't access many of the buildings. Mile wide inch deep isn't fair but that expression does loom for me.
The map is huge which is great, but you really need a vehicle. I've played over 80 hours and only seen one bicycle wheel. Just one. And guess what, you need two as you only ever come across an empty frame, at least in my experience. And yes i loot EVERYTHING and EVERYWHERE. Same with dirt bikes. Cars are somewhat easier but still a real pain in the backside finding the minimum parts you need to get one going. Last time i did this they then wiped the game as part of their update procedure. Ok EA i get it but in a game where doing and getting things is a deliberate struggle it's a real pain to have EVERYTHING wiped just because it's easier for you devs. Gees, thanks.

So in conclusion it's just another DayZ with some more fleshed out mechanics with respect to crafting and your medical fitness etc. If you're into single player like me then i wouldn't bother, it's really just MP as SP is just gonna waste your time.

Hope you have fun - i tried really hard but just did not, and they're close to full release now as i understand it.
developer_response: Hi M00nshine! We're sorry to see that you've become disappointed with the game. You'll be pleased to know that we've acknowledged that there are issues with the horde spawning and that is team is actively working toward a resolution of this matter, which will make the spawns make more sense and feel more organic. As for the vehicles and their parts - they usually are a bit harder to come by, but you need to look in specific places such as garages and specific POI's that can spawn these parts. However, there's also no guarantee that you'll find them there as there's a chance that someone came before you and looted that spot. The fact of the matter is that we're working hard to deliver a very complete and polished version of the game as we're nearing the full 1.0 release of the game and we hope that, once we get there, you'll consider giving the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198171831393', 'num_games_owned': 22, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5509, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4939, 'last_played': 1707934275}
review: Fix boats and remove horde

author: {'steamid': '76561199544539818', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2357, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1037, 'last_played': 1707810987}
review:
Worst game I have tried in a long time. I was expecting a difficult, complex game with a steep learning curve. However, this is a running and looting simulator, without any real reason for the loot!
It is very easy to survive. After about 2 hours you have the basics figured out and it is not hard.
Water and food are very easy to find. 
Zombies are extremely easy to kill with the very first bow you craft in the first 2 minutes of the game.
PVP is easy to manage and avoid until you are ready to engage.
However, what is absolutely broken is the core of the game.
It has a huge map but almost zero vehicles. 
I spent 10 irl hours using scum map to try to find a fixable vehicle and never found a single vehicle.
I even turned spawns up to max and just searched for hours....NOTHING! 
What is the point of looting if it will take you 2 hours to run to a trader?
Why build a base? Traveling to and from your points of interest take hours.
I enjoy a very complex survival game but this one is not at all that!
the player base might think it is but it isn't.
I'm actually shocked that anyone plays this game but then I'm aware that some people also enjoy cutting themselves for pleasure as well!
save your money, this game is a complete waste!
First game I've ever requested a refund for!
developer_response: Hi hallner.interiors! We're sorry to see that the game did not live up to your expectations. If you feel that the game is too easy, you can try playing on hardcore servers where the loot is modified and much harder to come by and the metabolism requires more attention and the map is non-existent. As for the car parts, there are specific places on the map that tend to spawn them, such as garages and specific POI's. While we're aware that the game has some issues, we'd like to emphasize that we're still in Early access and that there's still a lot of work ahead of us before we manage to hit the 1.0 mark. With that being said, we'd like to express our hope that you will consider giving the game another chance once we manage to get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073348398', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 11978, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11978, 'last_played': 1705792267}
review: "No items found"
developer_response: Hi RSΛV! We're sorry to see that you were disappointed with the amount of loot that you were able to found in the game. SCUM is envisioned to be a hardcore survival experience that relies heavily on realism, meaning that you will not be able to find loot easily - especially some more valuable stuff such as firearms, explosives or car parts. It is also, entirely possible that someone managed to loot those locations right before you came there. We understand that some players do not find this entertaining, which is why we've enabled private servers where certain settings (such as loot spawns) can be modified to cater to the specific preferences of players. That is why we advise that you try to find a server with increased loot and hope that, knowing this, you'll consider giving the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036771795', 'num_games_owned': 56, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 361, 'last_played': 1705789212}
review: Its really difficult to try to do anything, it takes probably an hour or so just to meet up in the map IF you are going to play multiplayer! There is alot of things in game but it takes too much time trying to gather stuff just to be able to survive! it would be nice if it would be atleast little easier to survive! The trailer of the game is well done but in game, it sucks!
developer_response:
Hi Carnif3x! We're sorry to see that the game did not live up to your expectations. However, it is worthy to note that the game was designed to be a hardcore survival experience. You cannot spawn to one another if you are playing on official servers as this would immensely be abused for teleporting around the map. What you need to do is press 'M' once you enter the game to open the map and then find out what is the middle point between you and your friends and then go there. Once you are together, you can log in and log out at the same time to ensure that you will spawn in the same place next time you log in (provided that neither one of you dies). 
You also have the option to find a private server where the admin would accommodate your request to teleport all the members of your squad to one place and where some server settings (such as loot, puppet spawns, etc.) are modified and that might better cater to your preferences.
That being said, we hope you'll give the game another try - at least when we hit the 1.0 mark when the game will be further improved upon in a variety of aspects.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980157613', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 72, 'playtime_forever': 13180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 36, 'playtime_at_review': 238, 'last_played': 1711644498}
review: Be warned.  This game is extremely challenging, but it's worth the effort if you want a very detailed survival game that gets down to the most basic brass tacks (were talking blood pressure, specific nutrients, and other details).  I know that the trend has been to eschew these mechanics, but I find them fun now and again.  This game works them in nicely.  That said, I've yet to survive more than a few minutes but I can already see the learning curve and what I will need to to do survive longer.  All of that said, it still very much needs work.  As many have commented, the recent horde mechanic is brutal.  Hopefully that gets updated soon.  If you enjoy super challenging survival games with great care and detail placed in their mechanics and world, then this is the game for you.

review: 游戏供应商无故封禁我账号，单方面恶意禁止我进入游戏。给我的理由是说我使用外挂违反游戏规定，但却无法提供任何证据证明，我提供了服务器IP日记，提供我的远程码，提供我电脑的运行记录等电脑里所有信息供游戏公司检查，游戏公司拒绝检查拒绝证明且不给说法，就一句话说你开挂就不给你玩，面对独裁行为无处说理。也无法退款，根本不把消费者放在眼里。

developer_response: Hi there XXIIIXX! We're sorry to see that you were experiencing some issues with connectivity. While we don't know the specifics of the issue, the most common reason for the occurrence of this issue is the usage of a HDD. We're sorry to see that you've opted to refund the game before we managed to help you with this, but we completely understand and respect your decision. That being said, we hope you'll reconsider trying out the game once we manage to further elevate the experience with additional bugfixes, new content and optimizations when we hit the 1.0 release.

author: {'steamid': '76561198129810975', 'num_games_owned': 105, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 5992, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3019, 'last_played': 1708689103}
review:
亲爱的制作组：
你们好！我来自中国，同时我也是一个热爱生存沙盒游戏的玩家，我玩过3000个小时的Minecraft、1000小时的Unturned、100小时的raft，总得来说，沙盒生存游戏能带给我快乐，因为这类游戏的一个主要爽点是自由、富有创造性
我也承认我是一个操作不太敏锐的玩家，在这类游戏里，我非常不擅长战斗和探索，但我的朋友们都很喜欢和我一起玩——因为我总能建出漂亮的建筑，我的游戏流程几乎都是这样的：我和队友一起搜索资源》我充当移动背包和后勤》把食物和物资都汇集在我这里》我在家修漂亮的房子》大家一起住一起开心
刚开始玩scum的时候，我被僵尸打死，我知道我打不过僵尸，于是我就逃跑，没想到跑到水里，僵尸还能像在陆地上一样，飞快地移动跑步，在水里跑步的僵尸——这让我绝望，完全不给战斗弱鸡生存的机会
好吧，我承认我很菜，我放弃了地堡、甚至放弃了C3大城，我选择野外生存，尽量避免战斗，但是一到晚上，除了我能听见四周呼呼的风声和狐狸的鸣叫，我完全看不见任何东西，这游戏的夜晚就像瞎了眼一样
即使是这样，我还是没有放弃继续游玩你们的游戏，但这次我破防了——我在领地旗的旁边盖起了我们的家，但当我挥动我的手臂砸下最后一次榔头时，时间凝固了……
对，时间凝固了，刚刚还修房子修得津津有味的角色突然面对另一堵想要修好的墙时，只剩下蓝图变成了红色。我的角色像个傻子，他站在那里，仿佛失忆一般，仿佛忘记了自己会修房子这件事情一样……后来我查阅了一下帮助，原来是领地内的建筑物品达到了上限，如果想要升级，就必须要去交易区购买领地扩展，而且即使购买领地扩展，建筑仍然会有最大上限的限制
我停下了鼠标，开始回忆起在这款游戏里我受到的待遇：打不过僵尸被僵尸在水里追、在野外生存看不清夜幕的黑……即使这样我都坚持下来了，但在这一刻我破防了……彻底地束手无策了……
我很喜欢电影《头号玩家》里面的那句台词【谢谢你玩我的游戏】，看到那个场景的时候，我不禁感动地落泪。但在scum里面的游戏体验让我明白：不是所有的制作组都像绿洲的制作组一样，尊重、喜欢他们的玩家。我在这个游戏唯一有点欣慰的玩法也被这样限制，我玩这款游戏是为了什么呢？游戏不是给人快乐的事情吗？为什么这款游戏处处都在针对我呢？我做错了什么？就因为我的操作不好，只擅长修房子？是我这样的玩家不受制作组的欢迎吗？我认为制作组差点就把【你这种傻逼别玩我们的游戏】这几个字写在我脸上，我感受到了极大的不尊重，我感觉这游戏里所有的限制都是在针对我这样的玩家
对了，我在文章开头提到，我来自中国。中国是一个人口大国，这导致了我们国家的房子很贵，购买房屋是有一定限制的。制作组，在你们的国度也是这样的吗？一个能工巧匠，在上一秒修出得心应手的房子，但在下一秒他突然想起来：如果我再对着下一颗钉子敲下我的榔头是不行的，因为我没有得到住建部的批准……这是多么滑稽可笑的事情，我认为既然这在游戏里得以体现，这代表你们的国家也是如此，购买领地扩展也只是另一种方式的房屋买卖，在现实里有多少人还在为他们的房贷奔波，为什么在游戏里还要遭到二次伤害？而制作组惩罚他们的方式就是：你！你给我忘记你会修房子这件事！
我在这一刻不禁感慨：人类活着的目的是什么？我们爱做我们想做的事，但却又有各种各样的限制，是什么东西在限制我们呢？小时候父母限制我们、长大了工作限制我们、小有所为社会限制我们，人类什么时候才能挣脱桎梏？我为人类社会的发展感到担忧，这不仅是为我的国家感到担忧，也为你们的国家，为全人类……
人类，为什么要被各种各样不合理的东西所限制？人类！你们应该联合起来！反抗不合理的压迫！去反抗！去怒吼！去斗争！
在此，我仅代表我个人，对制作组问候一句：我在你的游戏里没有看到尊重，所以我也不会给你们任何尊重，你们制作的游戏就是作茧自缚的一坨狗屎，继续活在你们的狂妄里吧，我希望你们能早点倒闭解散，人类的游戏史上不需要你们这种筛选玩家、固步自封、不尊重小众群体的垃圾！

review: The game's gritty realism and relentless focus on surviving make it a challenging journey. It's not about fancy additions; it's a back-to-basics adventure that demands resilience. With constant updates and a raw authenticity, SCUM is a compelling choice for those who crave the pure essence of surviving in a harsh world.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053511490', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 50301, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 127, 'playtime_at_review': 43685, 'last_played': 1712353044}
review: I have 728 hours into this game, I have tried this week to play on multiple days, whatever they did with this current patch the random zombies spawning in fully cleared rooms, or right beside you, have literally cost me hours of play time. I've uninstalled. Like I think overall I enjoyed this game but whatever they have going on right now is not very player time friendly, it's actually the opposite. Yesterday during my play through I had back packs just disappear off my characters  while riding in a boot, full of loot to never be seen again, my character has died to puppets spawning right next to me after already fighting a horde, more times than I can count. Tonight was the last straw for me, I was looted the training base and the zombie that spawned right beside me inside one of the buildings after I literally just cleared it, spawned a Horde and killed me. I had been playing that toon for 6 hours. I go to retrieve my stuff, it's despawned by the time I've landed and made it to where I died, all of 10 mins. I will not be playing this game again until they address the constant bugs. Maybe when it's full released I'll play it again, but for now my 2 cents is this game is not enjoyable in the current state. I don't mind the occasional death by playing poorly, that's fine and fun, but loosing hours worth of game play because whatever code is still broken doesn't feel good.
developer_response: Hi there Apollo! We're sorry to see that your experience with the game was thoroughly disappointing and that you did not enjoy your time with it. We're definitely aware that there are things that are in dire need of improvement and that there are severe bugs that need fixing. You'll be pleased to know that we're in process of fixing the issue of horde spawning and that it will go live very soon, meaning that puppets will no longer spawn on top of players. As for losing your backpack on the boat, it is possible that it was not lost, but just disappeared visually. This was implemented as a fix for the backpack clipping through seats of cars and other players if the two of them are riding on a motorbike. All of this being said, we're aware that there are a lot of things that need fixing and that need to improved and polished, but the team is committed and motivated to delivering the best possible version of the game by the full 1.0 release and we truly hope that you'll give SCUM another chance once we manage to get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561199088722209', 'num_games_owned': 1, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1060, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1707879579}
review: I really want to love this game--and, it almost has everything, but 95% of the gameplay is you just staring at a pointless loading circle as, I guess for the sake of 'realism,' it takes over a minute to do basic tasks like crafting items and cutting down a tree. Some of the zombies are so fast that they cant be outrun, especially in hordes. If you get an infection, you have to travel to a pharmacy and even then theres no guarantee itll stop.
developer_response: Hi Tripwilder! We're sorry to see that the game did not live up to your expectations. However, there are things that might need to be clarified in this regard. Your character in SCUM has points allocated to different skills, which then influence their interactions with the environment. In this specific example, the speed of chopping down a tree is influenced by the level of your SURVIVAL skill and by the tool you are using, i.e. a real ax is much more efficient than a stone ax. Incidentally, crafting speed is also influenced by survival. That being said, if you want to be faster with these things, please make sure to create a character with a greater level of survival.

review:
Das Game ist eigentlich gut. Schöne Grafik, und alles schlüssig. mit dem neuen Respawnsystem macht es keinen Spaß mehr. Man ist in einer Stad/Dorf und am Ende spawnen dauern Puppets um einen. 
Ich bin in eine Garage gegangen und dann mache ich das Tor wieder aus und da steht eine Puppet. 
Man beseitig die Gegner in Town und geht den Weg den man gekommen ist und alles wieder da. 
Ich bin auf einer Straße gelaufen und da kommen plötzlich Wölfe aus dem Wald und greifen direkt an. Ich war noch nicht lange im Spiel, also keine Ausrüstung. Also instant tot. Anzumerken, ich war den Weg keine 5 Min vorher hin gelaufen und da war kein Gegner. Wieder einfach random Spawn.
Das macht für mich keinen Sinn und schafft nur Frust. Habe nach ein paar Stunden abgebrochen und spiele das Spiel nicht mehr, da es keinen Fun mehr bringt.

review: Each update is worse than the last. Don't waste your time for now, its not worth the headache and hard drive space.
developer_response: Hi Dr. Steve Drangle! We're sorry to see that the latest updates soured your opinion of the game. You'll be pleased to know that we're aware of the issues that came with 0.95 - namely the hordes that are spawning way too close to the players - and that we're tending to this issue at the moment, meaning that we'll have it fixed very soon. We're also aware that there are still a lot of underlying issues that are present in the game and we'd like to emphasize that the team is truly committed towards improving and polishing the game, and making it run as smoothly as possible once we get to the full 1.0 release of the game. That being said, we hope that you'll consider giving SCUM another chance once we'll get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013620749', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 29688, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29688, 'last_played': 1705293256}
review:
I've been playing this game since it started in beta, hell maybe even alpha it has been so long now idr. I was thoroughly enjoying this game up until about midway in 2022 when "modular vehicles" and airplanes were added. The game is glitchy af. You spend hours upon hours looking for all the parts to a car, only to upon completion hit a pebble or drive on the road and have it flip up in the air or over on itself and not be able to fix it. Before cars were fun and accessible and if they flipped on the side you could push it upright again, now you have to spend all your time grinding only to immediately lose it by driving through the road and ending up under the map, or park your car and watch it catch fire and despawn for no reason.

Crafting is bugged and tedious, building a simple shelter can take you forever because god forbid your character can carry 2 small sticks at once (do we not have two hands or the ability to carry stuff in one hand irl?). For a game that wants to focus on being realistic, it is far from it and in the end more work than fun.

Played only for about an hour recently and lost our car due to glitches, and then a horde of zombies spawned out of thin air on top of us. That's not fun, it's stupid. There is no sustenance in this game, there is no more fun, no more laughter with friends, no anything. This game went from being interesting to fun, to a complete waste of time and space in my library. It has been unplayable for over a year now and no updates have tried to fix any of this issues present in this game, but lets keep adding things that don't matter and no one asks for I guess?

This game at this time makes me want to fist myself with barbed wire, while parachuting out of a plane while being eaten by a zombie bear. That would be less painful than playing this game.
developer_response: Hi SynysterShadows1213! We're sorry to see that the game disappointed you in this manner - especially since you were a long-time aficionado of the game. We acknowledge that some of the issues that you mentioned are due to the fact that the game still needs to be vastly improved and polished, and that there are a lot of bugs that are detrimental to the overall experience that need to be fixed (such as the random despawning and falling through the map). However, you'll be pleased to know that the fix for horde spawning will come sooner rather than later and that they will no longer spawn directly on the players. As for the inventory, we're aware that starting inventory space is low and is it made that way by design. However, when talking about small sticks in particular, you can create bundles of up to five small sticks that can occupy one slot, either on your holster or in your hands - meaning that you can hold up to 15 small sticks on you. Also, you can easily craft an improvised courier backpack that will provide you with additional space until you find something better, such as better clothes and backpacks. We hope that this will provide some clarification and we hope that you'll give the game another chance once we'll manage to release the full 1.0 release of the game.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198021323999', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 12678, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 50, 'playtime_at_review': 9942, 'last_played': 1712075141}
review:
ATM... Bugs...Buuugs...more Bugs, freezes... and more Bugs

1. Spiel friert einfach ein, ohne Performance Probleme und lässt sich nicht mal mit Taskmanager Beenden... 
2. Wieder einloggen nach dem Freeze manchmal nicht möglich = Spielstand kaputt und man muss neu anfangen (ist halt Pokerspiel ob man den Spielstand nach dem Freeze wieder retten kann, manchmal bleibt das Game schon eingefroren beim wieder Einloggen)
3. Wieder einloggen nach dem Freeze im Wasser = Tot des Chars da man auf dem Grund einloggt und im Boden unter Wasser fest Bugt bis man ertrinkt 

Aktuelle Empfehlung : Nöp , wartet auf Fixes und Patches, denn es war mal ein STABILES Spiel, Early Access halt.

Sonstiges :  Funktionen und Ideen sind Einzigartig für ein Zombie - Survival - Crafting & Base Building Game, wer es nicht kennt aber die Art der Spiele mag - ein Blick lohnt.

author: {'steamid': '76561199132610564', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4404, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4404, 'last_played': 1695060295}
review:
This is the most tedious game i have ever played and not in a good way.

Survival in online sandbox games should be mostly based on the players around you and not on thirst, hunger or your ankles hurting.

This game is 10 out of 10 a definition of things what NOT to do in online pvp survival game. 

Loot has no meaning, you can't horde stuff because the base building mechanics are even more tedious than the idea of the game it self and not just that but it is 50 times easier to gather explosives to destroy a base than to actually build a base. 

I personally believe that this game got ruined by 50+ year old keyboard warrior veterans that play the game and the devs for some reason listened to them over the years and adjusted their game according to those people. 

If the game was a single player game with a proper story line, quests, cinematic cut scenes, voice acting and all that single player shebang, yes it could have a huge potential, but this what it is now? Nah. 

Garbage.
developer_response: Hi EMKY! We're sorry to see that the game did not live up to your expectations. The game is envisioned as a hardcore survival game and the metabolism and health mechanic only adds an additional layer of complexity in addition to fighting puppets and other players. It is what makes SCUM a unique hardcore survival experience. We completely respect your opinion of the game and would like to emphasize that we're still in Early access and that there are still a lot of things that we need to do in order to bring the game to the point where we want it be. All that being said, we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance once we get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198902936983', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1653645580}
review: The premise for the game was good, a realistic survival game with a wide open area to explore. But unfortunately the last few updates to the game have caused problem after problem. The most recent being the Horde Update, which now makes the enemies pop into existence right next to you, and that means you can no longer develop tactics or plans to make your way around, because an enemy will now just pop into existence right next to you and knock the cr*p out of you anyway, there's no avoiding it.. All the tactics and planning players have developed over time playing the game is now out the window.. As well as this, almost every update lately has messed up the sound, which later the devs have had to release a patch to 'fix again' afterwards, and the content promised and delivered in previous updates like birds and planes etc. have been removed from the game. There seems to be no Test Branch in use when the devs go to release an update, which would explain the plethora of problems each time.. So at present time I'm very disappointed with the game, it promised realism and the Horde update broke this promise, with no sign in sight of it being fixed, the dev's have just 'gone on to other things', perhaps it'll be fixed and players will return, but for right now it's been shifted to the dusty back of my Steam Shelf.
developer_response: Hi SonofAtlas7! We're sorry to see that the last update has soured your time with the game. We acknowledge that there are issues with the horde spawning and you'll be pleased to know that the team is tending to this issue and that we'll have this fixed as soon as possible. We're also aware that the sound in the game needs to be vastly improved and you'll be pleased to know that this is also being worked on extensively and by the 1.0 release, SCUM will have a worthy overall sound. There's still a lot of work ahead of us, but we're confident that we'll manage to deliver on the original promise of the game and we hope that you'll give it another chance once we get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092779084', 'num_games_owned': 397, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 4993, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4993, 'last_played': 1704576765}
review:
===Gráficos===
🔲 Minecraft
🔲 Bom
🔲 Ótimo
✅ The Witcher 3
🔲 Red Dead Redemption II

===Requisitos===
🔲 Uma calculadora com 1 pilha
🔲 PC comprado em loja de geladeira
✅ No minímo uma GTX 1660
🔲 Computador da Gamer
🔲 4 RTX3080TI ligadas numa hidroelétrica

===História===
✅ História? que história?
🔲 Lanterna Verde foi melhor
🔲 Uma história bacana
🔲 Uma história digna de prestar atenção
🔲 Baseado em fatos reais

===Jogabilidade===
🔲 Precisa de dois dedos pra jogar
🔲 Paga stremer para jogar
✅ Da pra aprender se vc tentar
🔲 Jogabilidade bacana
🔲 Jogabilidade excelente

===Complexidade===
🔲 Jogo da velha é mais complexo
🔲 Fácil de entender
🔲 Fácil de aprender, difícil de Virar Pro player
🔲 Precisa pesquisar como passar
✅ Precisa de, no mínimo, 2 doutorados

===Dificuldade===
🔲 Minha vó de 90 anos achou facil
🔲 Da pra salvar com uma mão só
🔲 Quase Dark Souls
✅ Um Dark Souls da vida
🔲 Nem pro player consegue

===Tempo de jogo===
🔲 Mais rápido que casal de coelhos
🔲 Pra jogar em um dia
🔲 Pra jogar em uma semana
🔲 Pra jogar em um mês
✅ Você começa, seu neto termina

===Áudio, músicas===
🔲Meu peido faz um barulho mais bonito
🔲Deixa mutado mano
🔲Aceitável
✅Muito bom
🔲Toque o tema no seu casamento
🔲Mozart escreveu junto com Beethoven

===Ambientação, imersão===
🔲 Acho que vou fazer uma caminhada,
🔲 Me chamou a atenção mas ainda ouço o barulho da rua
🔲 As vezes esqueço que estou jogando.
✅ Sword Art Online, ta no nível de realidade virtual
🔲 Não sabia que teleporte existia, não quero nem voltar pra casa.

===Bugs===
🔲 Nunca vi nenhum
🔲 Os bugs deixam o jogo mais divertido
✅ Pode estragar a gameplay se vc perder alguma coisa
🔲 Cyberbug 2077, é um beta ou protótipo?
🔲 Parece até uma lâmpada acesa cheia de inseto

===DIVERSÃO===
🔲 Prefiro ver poça d’água secar
🔲 Difícil de gostar
🔲 Repetitivo
✅ Meu mundo melhorou depois de jogar isso aqui
🔲 A viagem da sua vida

===Compensa Comprar? ===

review: I wouldn't touch this game until well after 1.0. Seriously. The forums are full of fanbois, community managers and devs that mostly just defend their failure, to date, instead of acknowledging the concerns and demonstrating how they are going to address the myriad of issues this game has had since day one. I know it's in development. That's the point of waiting until after release and then maybe checking vids prior to purchase. Don't do it. Not right now. And now, even though, I did't allow comments a Dev is here prattling. Go away Dev and take your comment with you.
developer_response: Hi Fiddler! We're sorry to see that the game disappointed you. There's still a lot of work ahead of us and we're aware of the shortcomings that the game has, but we'll make sure to deliver on the core promise that the game set out for itself, which is to be the best possible hardcore survival experience out there. That is why we sincerely hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance when we exit Early access and release the full, 1.0 version of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198116598031', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4738, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2706, 'last_played': 1706253643}
review: I've played pretty much every survival game with my friends. Scum is hands down THE BEST & most realistic survival game you can get. I recommend finding a server that has good admins & a welcome pack when you join to get you started. We have had so much fun on this game. No cheaters on the server we play on has been so refreshing because every other game has been filled with them. There is a pretty steep learning curve but this game is a blast. Still trying to get all my buddy's to buy it. 10/10 recommend. It just keeps getting better.

review:
The vehicle spawning is crazy broken. All I find is broken down cars that can't be repaired unless u want to walk back and forth form 6 different towns just to find the parts. Cant even foclx a bicycle. I really enjoy the game but the fact it is sooo hard to get a vehicle is ridiculous. The map is soo big
 ( witch is good) it takes way to long to travel. I even have spawn setting to maximum. Please fix vehicle spawning before I can't take it no more and stop playing like every other game.

author: {'steamid': '76561199097709700', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2209, 'last_played': 1705454744}
review: this used to be a really good game now this game is complete trash avoid it at all cost they changed how the ai spawn and they changed the medical system thinking there game is actually at that stage i donno what there vision is for this game but aparently its to run it into the ground and make it garbage
developer_response: Hey there Rex! We're sorry to see that your experience with the game was less than satisfying. While we don't know what you meant by us changing the health system as we have not made any additions or changes to it for a long while. As for the horde spawns - we're aware that there are issues with puppets spawning way too close to the player. You'll be pleased to know that the team is tending to that, as well as some other underlying issues that are still plaguing the game. We're very much committed to making the game as awesome as it can be for our players and to delivering to core promise of the game - to be the best hardcore survival experience out there. There's a lot of work ahead of us, but we know we'll get there. That's why we hope you'll consider giving the game another chance.

review: Ich war selten von einem Spiel so genervt. Nichts ist einfach oder selbsterklärend. Wenn ich anfangen würde zu beschreiben, was alles anstrengend und verwirrend ist, würde das hier sehr lang werden. Das Fieseste war, ich habe Stunden gebraucht um den Outpost B4 mit einem klapprigen Fahrrad zu erreichen, Tage gegrindet um genug Geld zusammen zu bekommen, um dann vor dem Mechaniker zu stehen und festzustellen, das er keine Fahrzeuge zu verkaufen hat. Im Internet erfahre ich das soll ein Bug sein, der Beitrag war von 2022. Das ist 2 Jahre her. I'm out. Ein fröhliches 6. Early Access Jahr noch. Auf das noch viele weitere kommen.

author: {'steamid': '76561199172934398', 'num_games_owned': 22, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1702426148}
review: The game was alright but it was difficult to find places without a vehicle.
developer_response:
Hi ItzSwampy [CRP]! We're sorry to see that you did not find enjoyment with SCUM and would like to thank you for giving it a shot. We are not quite sure what you meant by there being too many vehicles as the availability of vehicles is designed to be scarce, but we'd like to hear more about it if you would be kind enough to write us a detailed description of what happened via https://support.scumgame.com/

Even though you've refunded the game, you are always welcome to check us up after our 1.0 release and see how we've improved the game. We'd be more than happy to see you back!

author: {'steamid': '76561199574765883', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 40714, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 3718, 'playtime_at_review': 7994, 'last_played': 1712499381}
review:
after playing this game I got to thinking. Maybe this is a game about magical puppies (zombies). they can teleport and warp suddenly near you. At first I imagined I could do stealth and finish off the pupets one by one. Turns out I was wrong. A room that was originally empty can suddenly be full of pupets that appear in the ground. Putting the zoom on the rifle doesn't seem to be useful against the pupet that comes near you.

regarding the direction of the sound is also frustrating. This game is quite promising with outdoor experiences such as hunting and gardening. Unfortunately, it is difficult to detect the prey animal and the direction the sound is coming from. Initially the sound came from the front after we approached it suddenly changed to the back. Come on, an FPS game that is simpler than this can provide reliable 3D sound.

I can give a suggestion, the pupet will be triggered to be at the location when we touch the circular area of 500-100-200 meters for close range pupet and 500 meters for the pupets on guard at the location so that players can feel the sensation of sniping pupettes from a long distance. After the trigger area, pupets will appear at the location so players can carry out stealth movements to finish them off one by one. The horde will be triggered 100 -200 meters from the trigger that triggered it and run towards the location so that it is realistic enough to create a sensation of covering fire for teammates on the team.

The small map in the bottom corner (like in the Zomboid project) is quite useful so we don't have to open the map often. we can assemble this tool or get it when looting. Like GPS. A magnifying glass can be used to zoom the map and a ballpoint can be used to make marks on the map. We can save location points in GPS so that we can easily return to that place. It's very annoying for forgetful people like me to lose boxes of things because we forgot where to bury them.

Hopefully the developer will not abandon this fun game and continue to develop it well.

author: {'steamid': '76561199579729744', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 259, 'last_played': 1705375998}
review: great if you want hardcore survival, not so much if you're looking to build with a group. tried playing coop, so difficult to get together we just kept dying trying to reach each other
developer_response: Hi Peanutshell! We're sorry to see that the game did not live up to your expectations. SCUM is indeed a hardcore survival game and that is something that we are definitely leaning towards, which is why you just can't port to one another once you join an official server as that could be used as an exploit. That is why, once you join a server with your teammates, you should all open the map using the 'M' key and assess where all of you are and determine the middle point between each of you. There is also an option to play on private servers where the admins would be willing to port you to one another - you just need to find one that has this practice. Hope this provides some clarification and that you will consider giving the game another chance.

review:
Great game w/ real life mechanics! 
If you have a decent amount of spare time and love the realism feel within survival games, then I'd recommend it!
Scum may be a pretty penny, but it is most def. worth the price, especially if you can get it on sale.
Although there are bugs from time to time, admins are active in fixing them. 

So excited for full release!

author: {'steamid': '76561198029598651', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 22100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14426, 'last_played': 1708710845}
review: SCUM ist ein sehr gutes Survival-Game. Allerdings liegt die Einstiegshürde gerade für Anfänger sehr hoch. Ich kann diesbezüglich frustrierte Rezensionen durchaus verstehen. Wer aber durchhält, sich informiert, über einige Unzulänglichkeiten hinwegsieht (z.B. mangelnde Übersetzung) und vor allem Geduld aufbringt, wird mit einem spannenden, sehr intensiven Spielerlebnis belohnt. Die Entwickler aus Kroatien haben eine wunderschöne und große Map erschaffen, deren Erkundung zu Fuß, Fahrrad, Boot, Motorrad oder Auto großen Spaß macht. Je mehr man riskiert, desto besser ist der Loot. So ist man ständig motiviert, seine Ausrüstung zu verbessern.

developer_response: Hi AoiKao! We're sorry to see that the new update disappointed you. However, there is an option to modify the abandoned bunker settings in the game. Press ESC to open main menu and then pick the 'server settings' button. Under the 'World' section, pick the 'Bunkers' subcategory and there you will find options to modify settings for the abandoned bunkers. We're aware that we still have a lot of work ahead of us with the game before we exit Early access, but the team is committed towards delivering the full SCUM experience in the foreseeable future and we hope you'll give it another chance and be there to try it out for yourself.

author: {'steamid': '76561198215002845', 'num_games_owned': 174, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 19078, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11839, 'last_played': 1707271066}
review:
[h1]UPDATE[/h1]
I've gone ahead and made a reacquaintance post in regards to the game, to bring in some more detail about my experience. After a bit more time from this review, I've found that there are somewhat solid workarounds to the issues below, mainly the respawn bug. However, there's a caveat. It requires two people in order to fool-proof it.

Essentially, your body will despawn as soon as you respawn, I.E. hit random, sector or shelter respawn on death. Your loot despawning can be avoided if your teammate searches your body before you respawn.

This has made the game significantly more bearable and enjoyable to play, now knowing how to work around this. However, it's still not the solution, as this can plague solo players. Though, I have noticed in some casses my body would still stay even after respawning, so the bug comes and goes in some cases but most of the time it stays.

Here's my [url=https://www.reddit.com/r/SCUMgame/comments/196w4km/an_unfortunate_reacquaintance_095_and_other/]post[/url] about the game in more detail if you're curious to reading it.

[h1]Original Review[/h1]
As fun as this game can be, it is a game plagued with bugs that continue to reappear even after 8 years of development. Unfortunately, a lot of these bugs are game breaking, which somehow do not receive immediate attention or have a temporary hotfix pushed out to resolve them.

Aside from the hair ripping frustrating game bugs, the gameplay is great. It is definitely one of my go-to OWSC zombie games that I will probably likely return to once a lot of the bugs have settled down. The 0.95 update seems to be quite buggy, so once this moves off of that and potentially releases, I.E. the 1.0 update, I would recommend not playing seriously, or avoiding trying to start in the game.

One of the worst bugs by far in this game is the consistent body/loot despawning issue that is all over the place, regardless of what happens. You die to an infection? All of your loot or body despawns, essentially not allowing you to go back and pick it back up. Die in a bunker but had a buddy with you? Your body despawns right in front of their eyes before they can even search it. Voila, all of your hard earned gear and loot is gone just like that.

Once the game comes out with a few updates/hotfixes, I will return and update this review. When and if 1.0 ever does release, I will give a new review.
developer_response: Hi there Rage! We're sorry to see that these bugs soured your experience with the game. We'd like to emphasize that we're very much aware of the issues that you've mentioned and that we'll definitely be tending to these as we'll be nearing the full release of the game and increasing our efforts to polish it and iron out all of its underlying issues. That being said, we hope that you'll return to the game once we get there and give it another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198212577255', 'num_games_owned': 89, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 8278, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7900, 'last_played': 1705315657}
review:
Итак, что можно сказать про данную игру...Она...уникальна в каком-то плане. Весьма вариативная, интересная, где-то хардкорная(зачастую из-за багов).
Я бы не посоветовал эту игру по крайней мере на данном этапе.В игре множество, МНОЖЕСТВО багов, порой критичных. Ты можешь съесть что-то с своего схрона, а она просто исчезнет, можешь одеть что то с схрона а оно просто исчезнет, можешь лутать ящик и забаговаться и просто стоять, пока тебя месит марионетка или игрок, можешь улететь на машине в стратосферу. Абсолютно неудобный интерфейс для перемещения и сортировки лута. Если ты решишь навести порядок в схроне, то с этим справится только 40 летний девственник, поскольку тебе буквально нужно будет каждую позицию, в ручную переносить в схрон, никаких дабл кликов, только хардкор. Спавн марионеток, это отдельный вид искусства, ты можешь зачистить местность от марионеток, а они просто перед твоими глазами будут спавниться. А порой ты заходишь в полицейский участок(к примеру), что бы найти оружие, а на тебя летит орда марионеток за ордой, а ты стоишь в ахуе, с какой нибудь дубиной и голой жопой, и не понимаешь за что тебе всё это.
Итоги: мне игра нравится, но она всё ещё весьма сырая, много недоработок. Система орды-моё почтение(нет). Определенно систему орды, спавна марионеток надо дорабатывать, что бы они хотя бы не спавнились у тебя перед глазами в китайских масштабах. В целом она ламповая, можно строиться, хоть и сыровато ещё, но уж точно более детальнее чем в том же прямом аналоге (DayZ). Перевод на Русский тоже тяп ляп. Больше половины тупо не переведено, хотя игре далеко не один год, и это отвратительно.
Короче, 4 высраных СВД магазинов из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561197970483270', 'num_games_owned': 597, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 6312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1601, 'last_played': 1707196876}
review:
Such an impressive game that is ruined by stupid small bugs that should have been fixed long before now. I'll try it again after 1.0 is released. Hopefully there will be mod support by then as well.
-Edit After playing some more I realized that single player is the issue. If you die in single player you lose your body and all of your loot every time in my experience. I've played online some now and i'm not having this issue in this scenario. This doesn't make me want to change my recommendation yet though as I imagine a lot of folks will go to single player first and then find out the hard way that they have wasted their time. If you want to learn to play the game, your best bet is to find a "PVE ONLY" server. That's as close to the single player experience as you're going to get without the despawning body bug.
developer_response: Hi there Splice! We're sorry to see that your experience with the game was soured by bugs. We'd like to emphasize that as we'll be nearing the full, 1.0 release of the game, we'll make a conscious effort to bring as much polish and optimizations to it, as well as fixes to the underlying issues that the game. The team here is committed and motivated to bring out the best possible version of the game as possible for our players and we can't wait for our community to experience the best possible version of it. That is why we hope you'll give the game another chance once we get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979565688', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1705187441}
review:
Game felt exactly as I was afraid it would...

I was dropped into B3 (middle of map) began looting a farm shed, no real inventory space unless you can modify the parachute pack, which seemed to have disappeared upon landing. Then the "No item found" messages started.

I had a single fight bare handed with a zombie, killed it, no real loot of value, another in the distance, avoided him. Looked at map, went to the safe zone out post, and it took an hour of walking. More "No item found" messages 90%+ 
of the time.

- Controls need help, feel clumsy
- Planets unless previously harvested should contain something.
- If you want some plants to be empty or full, then have different models.
(example of this would be the Yucca, and Prickly Pear Cactus.)

By the way, no starting way to make a fire or process these items as you would have to eat them in real life, that I can tell from initial game play starting out. Eating raw seemed to have little impact, maybe 1% increase in food/hydration.

The density of activity in the game map seems to be an issue for entertainment value. I did find a knife in one of the kitchens, and a can of spam. Arrived to safe zone outpost half starved and dehydrated after a very long and boring walk.

I understand the game is Early Access, that these developers may also be Indie, that said not much different than someone buying prefab assets throwing them into a game level and then placing a character rig.

I would support this game for around $10 in it's current state. Best of luck to this team.
developer_response: Hi there Digital Coyote! We're sorry to see that you find the game to be disappointing. Some of the feedback that you've left is legitimate and we'll be relaying that to our designers, but there are some things that you've mentioned which possibly require further clarification. When you land on the island, you have very little inventory space from the default prisoner clothes you are wearing and you cannot rely on it. That is why it is crucial that you craft something to help you out until you find either better clothes or some kind of backpack. If you craft an improvised courier backpack, you'll have just enough space to help you get through that initial period. Loot is a more complex thing, but the gist of the thing is that SCUM is designed as a hardcore survival game, meaning that it won't shower you with loot and that you have to overcome some of the more challenging aspects of the game (such as bunkers, killboxes, police stations and abandoned bunkers) in order to acquire more complex items such as firearms, ammunition, weapon attachments, explosives, armor, etc. You also have to keep in mind that, if you are playing multiplayer where there's a lot of players on the server, there's a good chance that someone recently just looted the area that you are exploring. Regardless, we recognize that there are players that want to play with modified loot settings, which is why we've enabled the option to change that setting in singleplayer and for private server owners (multiplayer). You can try finding a server where loot is increased and try the game there. All that being said, we're still in Early access and there's still a lot that we have to do prior to the full release of the game. We recognize that there's room for improvement and we'll make sure to get the game out the door in the best possible shape. That's why we hope you'll give the game another chance eventually.

author: {'steamid': '76561199231874276', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 606, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 398, 'last_played': 1705276327}
review:
Recomiendo este juego, ya que en simulación es excelente. Muchas variables a tener en cuenta para la supervivencia, hasta demasiado fino en algunos aspectos. No jugué multijugador. Mi experiencia es totalmente en partidas individuales. Debo decir, que es muy dificil encontrar comida en este modo. Muchos pueblos looteados sin siquiera conseguir nada. Muchos lugares solitarios sin nada, y los lugares mas interesantes de lootear y poder conseguir algo de vestimenta adecuada, algun arma para defenderse y poco de comida, son los bunqueres ó lugares militarizados, donde lo custodian unos robots y muchos zombies. En ese aspecto flaquea. Supuestamente son 144 km2 de mapa, donde todo se concentra en esos bunqueres y zonas custodiadas. Luego pueblos enteros sin nada. Eso me parece un poco injusto. No es de supervivencia el juego, es de suerte poder llegar a esos lugares y hacerte con algo. Deberían enfocarse no solo en el multijugador, tb en el individual, ya que somos muchos que jugamos ese modo. 
Dicho esto, por otra parte, el juego cumple sobradamente en los demás aspectos. Se trata de conseguir mejorar tu equipo, conseguir una mochila pára poder llevar mas cosas, y poder venderselas a unos comerciantes, que de hecho son 3 en todo el mapa. Hay un sistema de fama, que a medida que pasa el tiempo y sobrevives, va subiendo. En los comerciantes debes tener cierto piso de fama para poder acceder a las mejores cosas que venden, como armas, coches, aviones, etc. 
Cuando mueres, tu jugador pierde dinero y la fama. Con lo cual, en solitario es jodidamente imposible poder acceder a esos items de una manera mas fácil. 
El juego es interesante. Deberían reveer los zombies, las zonas con loot y demás bugs que hay, como el daño de los zombies, la comida, etc. Solo jugué pocas horas. Mas adelante seguiré añadiendo mas detalles del juego. Yo espereraría a la versión 1.0 a ver que sale en esa versión. Si corrigieron bugs, pusieron mas loot de comida (modo individual). 
Cabe destacar que en modo individual, vayas en sigilo, haciendo ruido, a los sitios militares donde hay mas cosas interesantes para agarrar, te salen zombies por todos lados y te matan. Mal balanceado. Desinstalando hasta que saquen una versión mas estable.

Puntaje General (6): considerando todos los apartados, y basandome en otros juegos de superviviencia que he jugado (Green Hell, The Long Dark) este a veces flaquea y queda corto en muchos aspectos.
Saludos!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198141975960', 'num_games_owned': 303, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 38075, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 6867, 'playtime_at_review': 17747, 'last_played': 1712496556}
review:
In the current state If you like PvP it looks like it's worth it, but It's something I've heard since I don't play PvP (But I'd like to try it, not my focus tho).
If you are looking for a good PvE online or single player game, It's not ready yet.
With the last update (0.95) even less worth it, since they messed up a bit with the spawn system: You see the zombies spawn in front of you, like 5m from you, before that you don't see anything from distance (so if you like to play with a sniper rifle, well it's useless). They can scream to call more zombies, and even them spawn in front of you. If you clear a building and some zombie start to scream, some other zombie will spawn again inside that building. They made this choice to improve the performance (Since zombies don't spawn if there are no player around), but they killed the fun and broke the game immersion.
There is no eta for a fix, they dropped this update on december before the holidays, hopefully they will release a fix before the end of january.
Anyway, beside that "Spawn issue", the PVE can be fun for a while, but after the "survival phase", when the food is not a problem anymore, you don't have a lot to do. 
There are pretty thing like fishing (It's bugged: if you play with unlocked frame rate or at 144fps It doesn't read some control input), the barber shop where you can change your hair and make up (It is bugged: if you use a female character sometime your make up change when you log out), you can cook your food (aaand It's bugged: the UI often disappears and you can't cook).

But, despite all these bug, the game is not bad, at all, the problem is that It doesn't have a good gameplay loop, the PVE gameplay is just stay there and chill. 
There are these bunkers where you go inside and kill zombies and some powerful enemy to get better loot, but It gets old very fast. There is a radiation zone that it looks interesting, but still, no purpose to go there if not for curiosity, nothing else. Why even bother to get better loot? To kill what? To defend what?
I'd like something more, like defend your base from zombies, mechs, NPCs (human NPCs will come just after the release), some kind of quest to do, some good gameplay loop. There is no modding support yet, that would help to add something in the game (The mod support maybe will come after the release date, so there are MANY months to wait). Currently the best PvE things this game has to offer is just loot stuff and eat, play with the methabolism (That I love) to raise your attributes and...chat with people(?), if you play online of course.
It is really hard find something to do for a real reason, and not just "wow! Now I go to farm some explosive to kill some random mech, because why not?!"
This game is still in Early Access and the team is small, and I understand that, but it's not a free game so I don't feel like it's worth the money if you play alone (In single player mode) or you want a really good PvE experience.

To be clear: I like the game, Its core is interesting and it could be a really wonderful survival. Most of the things you can do in the game (when they work) are fun to play, but those things and some gameplay aspect lack of depth and polishing. I supported them buyng all the DLCs, and deep inside I'd like to see more people support this game (You can still try it and refund It if you don't like it) but, I don't really know what I should expect from this game, hopefully not something PvP focused, since it would kill my interest. There are plenty of PvP survival games out there.

The content is enough (and there wil be more), but currently It doesn't keep you motivated to keep playing.

Anyway, who knows. Despite the PvE flaws and the latest update (that partially influenced this review), I hope for the best.
developer_response: Hi there Rash! Firstly, we'd like to thank you for the extensive review you've left us and for supporting the game for quite some time now. This is why it pains us to see that you we're disappointed with the game. However, you'll be pleased to know that we acknowledge that the hordes and their spawning do not function as intended and that we'll make sure to further tweak that system so that it feels more organic. As we'll be nearing the full release of the game, we'll be adding more features that will additionally enrich both the PvP and PvE experience and since this is a live game, we'll make sure to further support it during its lifetime. We'll also make sure to polish and optimize the game as much as we can during this period so our players could have the best possible experience with the 1.0 version. All that being said, we really hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance and returning to it eventually.

review: 1.首先是网络问题，你第一次进去必须刷新好几次才能刷出来服务器，你只能进别人建立的服务器不能自己开房间，然后延迟高的还不让进，对新手极其不友好，我和我朋友试了好几次，铜鼓一个小时多 才成功进房间。然后进入战局了延迟极高是常有的事，还经常卡掉。2.还有分辨率问题，你不调他他的鼠标都是错位的，得去设置挑一个属于你显示器的分辨率。3.太肝了！整个地图那么大，你如果想要一个载具要先在地图某一个位置找到一个车的躯壳，然后把它一点点推到地图边边角上的交易区组装，车的配件还非常贵你得打工赚钱，间的垃圾根本卖不出几个钱，一个整车要好几万

review:
Ein Game das mit Unmengen an Bugs zu kämpfen hat. Nach jedem Update kommen neue und vorallem alte und bereinigte Bugs dazu. Noch nichtmals sowas einfaches und wichtiges wie Keybinding funktioniert. Die Map ist fehlerhaft und man kann nicht hineinzoomen. 
Aus meiner Sicht sind dort hauptsächlich Stümper und Nichtskönner am Werk. Scum ist das einzige Game das es immer wieder mal schaft den gesamten PC einzufrieren.

review:
You either have to take time to learn the game or do it the hard way like i did and start on a pvp server solo which was soul destroying, 
I would suggest doing single player for awhile to learn the game then when ready join a PvE server and then PvP when/ if that's what you so wish to do. 

Better with friends but also an enjoyable solo experience but for many it just requires patience and dying alot to understand the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198396836620', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 7879, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2804, 'last_played': 1707888923}
review:
So I feel I need to throw my 2 cents in on this one just from all the reading I've done here with other reviews.
First off the game is just beautiful. From the towns to the woods. All amazing.
Second the guns and gear are great finding all the good loots just makes it even better.
Third the horde can be a pain in the ass but as it should be. The thing is you gotta find a server that you can enjoy and one thats had some tweaks done to it. But i will say the horde spawn needs to have a distance set as in the server I'm playing in. The horde will come from around buildings and such no spawning in front of you. 
Overall its worth the time to put in on the game and money. Plus an easy fix to the horde..... be sneaky and GIT GUD!

author: {'steamid': '76561198087987767', 'num_games_owned': 42, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 63109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 9, 'playtime_at_review': 39388, 'last_played': 1711571572}
review:
SCUM is a groundbreaking survival game that surpasses expectations. The realistic open-world environment, intricate character development, and dynamic gameplay make it a true gem in the genre. The attention to detail is commendable, from the authentic metabolism system to the intricate crafting mechanics.

Graphics and Sound (5/5):
Visually stunning with detailed landscapes and realistic character animations. The sound design immerses you in the harsh world, enhancing the overall gaming experience.

Gameplay Mechanics (5/5):
SCUM's unique metabolism system adds an unparalleled level of realism, requiring players to manage nutrition and exercise. The crafting system is intuitive, offering a vast array of possibilities for survival. The PVP encounters are intense, encouraging strategic thinking and resourcefulness.

Community and Multiplayer (5/5):
The community is active and diverse, fostering a collaborative atmosphere. Multiplayer dynamics are well-balanced, with server options catering to different playstyles. Regular updates keep the game fresh, addressing bugs promptly.

Developers' Support (5/5):
The developers' commitment to the game is evident through frequent updates and responsive communication. They listen to player feedback, consistently refining and expanding the gaming experience.

Conclusion:
SCUM stands out as a masterpiece in the survival genre. Its realism, engaging mechanics, and dedicated development make it a must-play for any survival enthusiast. With an active community and developers committed to improvement, SCUM is an evolving adventure that promises endless hours of immersive gameplay. 5/5, hands down.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991118204', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 38367, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1542, 'playtime_at_review': 23101, 'last_played': 1712404623}
review:
I am 385 hours in and I am trying to love this game, A good pve community server with pvp zones makes it worth playing but im finding it hard to find things to do except run and drive around looking for stuff to sell, the cars drive great but will explode and die very easily trapped in a door or fence or in 3 inches of water, leaving you with loot you cant move, 
        I will keep trying and playing till i get my neckbeard at 1000 hours and Can complain properly, I hate mechs but get why they are there, please fix puppet spawning..why hide in a bush when the puppets are spawning in them 10 at a time, there is nowhere to hide really except on a roof top but the new puppets jump  like olympians which is hilarious. My advice to new players is to try it for 2 weeks even if you hate it more than anything and if you are dying to a lot of players and ragequit then play on PVE servers for a bit and focus on base building and looting the hospital.

author: {'steamid': '76561198445213178', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 934, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 934, 'last_played': 1688730367}
review: This game is not for the general public and needs to be repaired from the ground up. Although the game is perfect, but the game is much harder than you think. I can seriously say that this is the most difficult game Surviving the life of a zombie in history, the game is very, very slow, you need to speed up and even more meaningless is that it does not run with the shift button, but with the mouse to control the running I hope you remove the nonsense because this makes the game very unpleasant and difficult and also need to add a modification system, which is one of the shortcomings of the game in general is not very useful to play should be simplified Please follow these steps to get more people to believe that this game has a chance to become one of the best zombie survival games in history Please don't ignore this opinion
developer_response: Hi Ahmad Barznji! We're sorry to see that you did not find the game to be enjoyable. Thank you for the feedback you've left us, we'll make sure to relay this to our designers who'll carefully look into the matter and consider implementing these changes. That being said, we really hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198160771272', 'num_games_owned': 687, 'num_reviews': 95, 'playtime_forever': 947, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 947, 'last_played': 1665015714}
review: Spent more time in the tutorial than the actual game
developer_response: Hi there AlmondMilkVibes! We're sorry to see that you did not have an enjoyable experience with the game. SCUM is a complex game with multiple intricate mechanics and it may take some time to fully comprehend them. We would advise that you try out the game in singleplayer and let yourself learn the game organically through gameplay and with occasional glances to the tutorial, without the fear that more seasoned players will kill you. We still have a lot of work to be done with the game and we'll make sure to improve the experience for new players as we'll be nearing the full, 1.0 release of the game. That being said, we hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance eventually.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036183501', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1705016498}
review: Item not found
developer_response: Hi there Carstoni! We're sorry to see you disappointed with the game. However, it is important to emphasize that SCUM is designed in a way where it does not shower players with loot by default - especially with more valuable loot such as firearms, explosives, weapon attachments, car parts, etc. Also, if you were playing on an online server with loads of other players, it is entirely possible that someone else looted that area right before you came there and before the loot respawned. Regardless, we acknowledge that there's still a lot of work ahead of us with the game as we're nearing the full, 1.0 release of the game, and we hope that you'll give SCUM another chance once we'll get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025697485', 'num_games_owned': 29, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 26269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24929, 'last_played': 1706726702}
review:
For this moment I really can say that i don't like this current patch and there are bugs that are old and not addressed for a long time. 

You guys should wait a little bit longer if you want to buy this game because in the current state of the game is not good for a brand new player.
developer_response: Hi nsku! Firstly, we'd like to express our gratitude for supporting the game for such a long time and our regret that the new update is not to your liking. We'd like to emphasize that the team is aware of the issues that came with the new patch (namely the horde spawning) and of the underlying ones that are plaguing the game for quite some time now. You'll be pleased to know that the team is more than committed to iron out all of these issues as we'll be transitioning out of the Early access and fully releasing the game in the near future. That being said, we sincerely hope that you'll consider giving the game another chance and that you'll return to it eventually.

developer_response: Hey Silas! We're sorry to see that you did not enjoy your time with the game. We'd very much like to hear more about your time with SCUM and what made you dissatisfied with it so we can divert more attention to that part of the experience as we're nearing the full release of the game. It would be greatly appreciate from our side. if you are not inclined to do so, we'd like to remind you that we're still in Early access and that we still have a lot of work to do to make SCUM the best possible hardcore survival experience as we can possibly make it and we hope that you'll give it another chance once we get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031003290', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 15122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15122, 'last_played': 1704933804}
review: Haven't played the game in a while, load in as a noob and get owned by hordes that spawn everywhere. This game is no longer fun to play and is just designed to destroy Noobs.... Oh and it costs money to respawn now what is that crap.... can not recommend in its current state.
developer_response: Hi MachineGunMike! We're sorry to see that the game left you disappointed. We're aware that the newly implemented hordes and their spawning could work better and you'll be pleased to know that we will be tending to that as soon as possible. As for the money being spent on respawning instead of fame points, this change was implemented as a consequence of other elements being added to the game that required fame (e.g. the Trader). Since dying would result in a permanent loss of fame points that are harder to acquire, these players would then be locked out of using the trader or other elements that require fame. Regardless, much will be modified as we'll be nearing the full release of the game and we have much to do with new content additions, as well as bugfixes and optimizations and we hope that you'll give SCUM another chance once we get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036186781', 'num_games_owned': 399, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 3296, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3296, 'last_played': 1704932797}
review:
imagine being in a giant map filled with boxes and in those boxes is nothing, traveling between those boxes takes ages, now lets sprinkle the most weightless combat system and cluttered ui that u can imagine ur almost there with scum,

this is a perfect game for those that said no Dayz is not janky and tedious enough,

the worst part is i bought this when it was brand new and it had so much potential, i loved the melee system and the movement and all that but i dont know what happened now its just the basic hit a zombie 28 times until he decides hes tired,,,,
developer_response: Hi there Reality Disorder! We're sorry to see that you were thoroughly disappointed with the game. We acknowledge that there are elements within the game that can be improved (such as melee combat), but we've made certain changes to the loot system that should make it easier to find things in the world. If you still feel that there's nothing to be found, we suggest that you try out private servers with modified loot settings. We acknowledge that some players might feel that the game is too stingy with loot, but we also wanted to maintain that hardcore survival aspect that the game is known for. That is why we enabled the option to modify this for players that enjoy SCUM, but want to receive more loot. Regardless, the game is still in Early access and we still have a lot of work to do before the hit full 1.0 release of the game, which is why we hope you'll return to the game and give it one more chance once we get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198857366103', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 11340, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2670, 'last_played': 1707601303}
review:
Das Spiel entwickelt sich laufend weiter, beim letzten großen Patch 0.95 wurde (unter anderem) das positiv Crafting System überarbeitet. Es geht ständig voran, ich freue mich auf die Release-Version, mit der wie man hört in diesem Jahr zu rechnen ist, dann werde ich Dauergast auf der Insel sein. Zurzeit gibt es noch ein paar Bugs, aber das ist bei einem Early Acces Spiel ebenso, doch man kann das Spiel sauber spielen.

SCUM ist irre detailliert in etlichen Bereichen, man muss logisch denken, ansonsten scheitert man. Einmal bin ich verdurstet, ich konnte nichts trinken, dachte es wäre ein Bug. Doch schließlich wurde mir klar, dass ich die Gasmaske zum Trinken abnehmen muss und Schwupps es ging, ich konnte wieder trinken. Das ist nur ein Beispiel für die irre Komplexität des Spieles. 

Klare Empfehlung!

author: {'steamid': '76561198118686166', 'num_games_owned': 121, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 12334, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9573, 'last_played': 1705442221}
review:
Desde o início, "Scum" se destaca como um jogo de sobrevivência que realmente coloca suas habilidades à prova. O que mais impressiona é a atenção aos detalhes na jogabilidade. Cada elemento do jogo, desde a gestão de recursos até o combate, é pensado cuidadosamente para proporcionar uma experiência realista e envolvente.

Os gráficos são outro ponto forte. Os cenários são incrivelmente detalhados e contribuem para a atmosfera intensa do jogo. Seja explorando florestas densas ou ruínas abandonadas, cada ambiente é único e imersivo.

Além disso, a mecânica de sobrevivência é complexa e gratificante. A necessidade de balancear fome, sede, e saúde, enquanto enfrenta ameaças, torna cada decisão importante. Isso adiciona uma camada de estratégia e realismo raramente vista em outros jogos do gênero.

Em resumo, "Scum" é um jogo que desafia, recompensa e surpreende. Recomendo fortemente para os fãs de jogos de sobrevivência que procuram uma experiência profunda e detalhada.
