review: 制作组天天不知道怎么犯病的，更新的一次比一次让人失望，妈的天天就知道乱改，不过不去看他这个PVP还是可以的，虽然丧尸现在又是开门又是翻窗的，多死几次就自然熟悉了

author: {'steamid': '76561198032974814', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 1507, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 952, 'last_played': 1705455140}
review:
So seems I purchased this right as they updated to a version that makes the game unplayable.  You can not survive for more than 24 hours as a horde of puppets (zombies) will spawn surrounding you.  Every hit stuns you briefly, and as you will be surrounded and being pounded you will have no chance to attack or even run.  

Guns are overly complicated, you have to go into inventory to reload, manually dragging bullets to a clip and dragging clips to the weapon.  This makes reloading in combat a death sentence.  Hitting R just unloads the current clip to your inventory.  I had to go online to find out how to load, check to see i you have any bullets in your gun, switch fire modes for the gun, aim.  This is not intuitive or explained anywhere in the menus.

I only "found" a gun because of the Christmas event going on in game that, rarely, spawns a ghost Santa that gives you a present while looting a random thing, food plants for me.  Not that it did me any good.

I want to like this game, it has alot of potential, but the horde spawning in and mobbing you to death makes it pointless to play.
developer_response:
Hello TimeDisplacedSoul! 
We appreciate you taking the time to write this review! 
As you are aware, the game is still in early access so issues, and bugs are still expected. 
That's why in the polishing phase we will revisit every and any game mechanic and further tweak it out, make it balanced. That's why player feedback is very important to us!
As for the guns being complicated, how so? 
You have to fill the magazines manually, this is the way it's been since the beginning. Just take the appropriate ammunition, drag it into the empty magazine in the inventory/in hands, and wait for the animation to complete. If you have multiple filled magazines, pressing R will just load the next filled magazine. If you don't have a magazine but have bullets, you're just going to chamber one round.
The game was always challenging, and while we do agree on the hordes that need to be tweaked, the realistic gun mechanics are one of the main draws for players. 
Thank you again for reaching out to us, we hope you revisit the game and perhaps change your mind! 
Have a good one!

author: {'steamid': '76561198140375567', 'num_games_owned': 204, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 6776, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1023, 'playtime_at_review': 875, 'last_played': 1712499806}
review:
"Croatian DayZ" is an understatement for this game.
"3D Project Zombiod" is almost correct but not really.
"Tarkov with Zombies and mechs" is just silly way of saying that this game is a tarkov clone for zombie survival fans.
"Rust with extra steps" is like saying like you're new to survival games and you play it for PvP raids.
in reality..this game will break you like project zombiod, this game will make you want to quit life like DayZ because its as depressive if not more, only features missing in this one is mod support so if you like modding your game go play dayz and make it easier than what it's mean to be, i know you are scared of real gaming...also this game is like Tarkov, this game will make you regret getting into it and will be a waste of time and it will essentially become apart of your second life where you loot to get better gears...and if you are avid Rust player, please keep away from this game there's way too many toxicity in PvP as it is and noone will help you heal a gunshot from a mech you found in military base, expect if you plan playing PvE and hunting down mechs like a real chad.

In reality this ...game?, no no wait this is not a game, its a true supermax survival zombie apocalypse life simulator , and it will cure all your depressive toughts and will improve your understanding of what a good survival simulator expirience is.

author: {'steamid': '76561198344307004', 'num_games_owned': 70, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 3605, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2751, 'last_played': 1705136998}
review:
I've recently come back to the game after a long hiatus and I've found that the recent updates have been mostly positive. I have absolutely no complaints from the survival aspect, a lot of the effects and crafting options make as much sense as they can within a game.Generally I love the direction that Scum is heading in, although I do have some concerns that I hope get addressed.

The first issue is with the "puppets" (zombies.) The new horde mechanic is generally a welcome addition, although I think there needs to be some further troubleshooting to prevent them from spawning everywhere around the player. It can be easy to get completely surrounded and whilst yes, it does make you have to think about things, sometimes an area can go from being totally safe to a total nightmare in a matter of seconds which does seem a bit silly.

The second issue, for me at least, is to do with PvP servers. I know the developers aren't responsible for the actions of players in game, but right now the game actually rewards griefers and trolls. PvP is too difficult for new players to get into when they're playing solo. PvE is great but can get a little boring if there's nobody really communicating. I wonder if there should be a mechanic whereby you're given grief points or something when killing other players, and when it reaches a certain threshold their location appears on the map for others to see. It might help prevent one or two players absolutely dominating with the best equipment.

Additionally I wonder if player factions might help the situation, so as a for instance, when you create a character you either select or get thrown into a team. The map could then be divided in half and then players could fight over or capture territory from the other team? 

Just a few ideas. But generally I'm happy with the progress that has been made. Hope that V.1 gets released soon!

author: {'steamid': '76561197990804132', 'num_games_owned': 424, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1703814666}
review: Overall, pretty graphics, interesting theme, but did not feel fun in single player. You can't really play it blind. Too much unnecessary complexity. I found an onion, a shirt and a cooking pot within an hour of gameplay after visiting like 10+ small buildings. Yawn
developer_response:
Hi GR4V3 MIST4K3!

Thank you for your feedback! 
True, the game is complex with a steep learning curve but there's no reason to play it blind when we added the tutorial with the last update, 0.95. 
That should more than help you with getting started!
We will be entering the polishing phase fairly soon where we'll revisit all features/mechanics and rebalance/fine-tune them as best we can. 
That also includes major bugfixes and quality of life changes. 
We hope you'll give the game another chance and perhaps change your mind. 
Have a good one!

author: {'steamid': '76561198295184545', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 5397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1035, 'playtime_at_review': 3480, 'last_played': 1711666709}
review:
*EDIT*

I played for an additional 14 hours after posting this review to give this game it's absolute best chance. I can't do it. The hit registration for melee in this game is ABHORRENT. I DO NOT RECOMMEND BUYING THIS GAME IN THIS STATE.

There should never be a situation where you are armed with a melee weapon, knife, sword, axe, or bat (I have tried them all) and your swings go right through the zombie eating your face.

It's not even something just happens "every now and then". It literally happened AGAIN just now 5 swings in a row, no audio cue, no stumble animation from the zombie, no registration what-so-ever. The whole time my arm and weapon is going through the zombie, they are freely hitting me and every single one of their hits register.

DO NO BUY THIS GAME. THE MELEE IS SH*T. IT'S A ZOMBIE GAME YOU ARE SUPPOSED TO BE ABLE TO MELEE ZOMBIES.

For crying out loud the melee in Dead Rising (release year 2006) worked better than this game in 2023.

------------------------------------------------
One of the worst games I have played years after it's been updated from it's Alpha Release.

The melee is as bad as early 7 Days to Die. You swing at a zombie that is right up against you and the first 2 hits connect, you get the audio cue and they stumble. 3rd hit you get an audio cue and they act like nothing happened. 4th, 5th, and 6th hits your arm goes right through them, no audio cue, and no stumble animation.

Server hosting settings? They make no f*cking sense. You need a translation for the translations I have found on Wiki and Steam discussions. Then most of the settings in the Wiki are outdated and not even available in the server files. Good luck figuring out what:

scum.EncounterCharacterRespawnBatchSizeMultiplier=1.000000
scum.EncounterCharacterAggressiveSpawnChanceOverride=-1.000000
scum.EncounterCharacterAINoiseResponseRadiusMultiplier=1.000000
scum.EncounterHordeGroupBaseCharacterAmountMultiplier=1.000000
scum.EncounterHordeGroupExtraCharacterPerPlayerMultiplier=1.000000
scum.EncounterHordeGroupExtraCharacterPlayerCapMultiplier=1.000000
scum.EncounterHordeBaseCharacterAmountMultiplier=1.000000
scum.EncounterHordeExtraCharacterPerPlayerMultiplier=1.000000
scum.EncounterHordeExtraCharacterPlayerCapMultiplier=1.000000
scum.EncounterHordeActivationChanceMultiplier=1.000000
scum.EncounterHordeNoiseCheckCooldownMultiplier=1.000000
scum.EncounterHordeSpawnDistanceMultiplier=1.000000

any of that means. Some of it makes a little sense, but when tweaked it seems like absolutely nothing changes.

Zombie health is totally inconsistent. 1 zombie may take 3 hits to die, the next 5 or 6. Then you can immediately find yourself stabbing a zombie 30 times with the broken melee registration.

I was hoping that the game would have gotten better, but it seems like it's no different than original Alpha Release. At least other games like 7 Days to Die actually improved before releasing tons of content.

OH before I finish this review. THE HEALING HAS NO GOD D*MN EXPLANATION. They change the healing mechanic and then neglect to have a UI that is clear to understand when you're suffering from 2 or 3 C2 bleeds and you're trying to figure out why the rags in your inventory aren't working when you right click and choose "Treat".

The game is dumb. Maybe after the 1.0 I will revisit this game, but as of now it's not worth it.
developer_response:
Hi Torlokt! 

First of all we want to thank you for taking the time to write this review! 
We appreciate your feedback and we're sorry about your negative experience with the game and its melee system. 

Melee combat is something that's going to be addressed in the polish phase, that's when we'll dive into all the features and balance everything out as much as we can. 
We are FULLY aware of the issues in the melee system and it's one of our TOP priorities as we're heading towards the inevitable release of 1.0. 

Regarding these server settings, did you try them out in single-player? Hovering over each setting in the in-game server settings menu pops-up a rectangular text box with a explanation of what the setting does. 

Zombie health varies on the type of zombie. The skinny ones have the least health, obviously, but if you encounter a overweight zombie or a army zombie, wearing a helmet and full body armor, we believe it's only natural they have increased health and are not as easy to take down as the skinny ones. 

I'm not sure what exactly you mean by the healing change. If you right-click on the rag, click "treat" , it takes you to the health screen where your injuries are. Select the rags in your inventory or vicinity by clicking on them and click the "treat" icon. Please feel free to go into a little more detail. 

We are going to be entering the polish phase before releasing 1.0, and we'll iron out most of the issues so please be patient. 
We certainly appreciate your feedback and hope you'll revisit the game and perhaps change your mind. 
Have a great day!

author: {'steamid': '76561198879066149', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 14075, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11378, 'last_played': 1708282927}
review:
POS: one of the best survival pvp pve games (and ive played quite a few) based on content and play style choice.  survive alone, build, loot, fish, hunt, sell loot to traders and make a life in a forest if you want with impressive crafting options. or kill and raid in pvp. impressive realism when it comes to gunplay mechanics and crafting.  game is beautiful and runs great with new optimizations and graphics options.  (8700k 4.8 all core o.c. and 6700xt ave 120 fps on high) 

NEG: still a little buggy when it comes to loot transfers disappearing (not often) ie. storage chest to player inventory sometimes is an issue.  as well as some new features added that are buggy like battery chargers and cooking are an issue which will be fixed.  generally sorts itself out with a server restart or game restart.  again not often but still a little annoying.  
SERVER CHOICE IS HJGE BASED ON YOUR PLAY STYLE, IT CAN MAKE A BIG DIFFERENCE IN YOUR OPINION OF  THE GAME! overall great after .95!!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198002099181', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 7730, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4467, 'last_played': 1705732713}
review: When I had this game suggested and explained to me how this game works, I was pretty intimidated. It was a bit of a learning curve with crafting, health, injuries, infections, etc. This game is very in depth and is a pretty hardcore survival game. If it was not for some friends to help me along, I probably would not have spent this much time in the game. Hands down this is a great game with flaws obviously. A solid 8/10 for how the game is.

author: {'steamid': '76561198949959777', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1704184538}
review:
I am not 100% convinced the devs known how to program games.

I shouldn't have to modify my PC in 2023 to allow it to run a new game in compatibility mode.

After 1.5 hours trolling the internet trying to find a fix just to get past the main menu I give up. WTF and I expected to look for boot options for this?

If it was a brand new car....would you be happy to look for reasons why the bloody engine wouldn't start and chat to other people with engine problems to try and get your new drive out of the driveway?

If I could get my money back I would and that saying something as I got this game on 50% off special.

Money I would have been better off donating to Unicef because maybe someone would have gotten something out of it,.
developer_response:
Hi Darklordash73!

Thank you for taking the time to write this review! 
Would you mind going into a little more detail? Modify your PC in what way? 
Does your PC meet the minimum requirements? 
We understand your frustration and we're sorry this has caused you be dissatisfied with the game. 
However, we are still in early access and certain issues are to be expected. That's why we'll be entering our polishing phase fairly soon. During that phase we'll revisit all the features that need fine-tuning and balance them out, along with MAJOR bugfixes! That's all going to happen before the inevitable 1.0 release so you're bound to see some big changes.
We hope you'll revisit the game and perhaps change your mind. 
Have a good one!

author: {'steamid': '76561197991625014', 'num_games_owned': 595, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 1218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1158, 'last_played': 1705155115}
review: I love survival games especially with an element of PvP. This is a great DayZ replacement, at least for me. You have lots of crafting that is more intuitive than DayZ, the world seems to be more populated, server settings and single player is easier to set up, in my opinion it simply is the superior game in this genre. I still wouldn't choose this over something as flushed out as Rust however I believe I found the perfect way to play SCUM. In short bursts, go to a populated server, head to a red zone, get geared out in military equipment and get a gun, and just PvP. While progression feels janky, I'd rather spend my time shooting people than trying to survive. Great game if found at a discount.

review: i have run servers played on several and waited patiently this game to get back to what it was before the sold out. now it is a disappointment in so many ways to see them ask money for something that all other games gives away or at worst makes you earn is deplorable. asking for money for hair and dances is just ignorant and shows you have no love or even a bit of respect for your community. i have purchased and played since day 1. at this point even if you finished half of what was promised already i would not play or ever recommend this game to anyone.
developer_response:
Hi Plomak! 

Thank you for taking the time to write this review and for your honest feedback! 
We're sorry to hear your dissapointment with the game after so many hours you've played. 
Unfortunately, sometimes situations arise in game dev that complicate development, create new issues and ultimately dissapoint the players. We always try to fix any new issues at once. 

The DLC's are purely cosmetic and 100% players choice if he wants them or not. It doesn't affect gameplay at all. 

We have a roadmap that we're sticking to and it's been going well but we are a SMALL team, and sometimes things need to get shuffled, reprioritized in order to make maximum use of our people. This is a hugely ambitious game and we still got a ways to go before it's done, but with us entering the polishing phase fairly soon, a LOT of issues are going to get fixed, mechanics will be rebalanced and a whole lot more. 

We sincerely hope you revisit the game and perhaps change your mind! 

Have a good one!

author: {'steamid': '76561198056855623', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 14883, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14883, 'last_played': 1703731844}
review:
If you want to go into negative $$$ every time you die because you're just starting and you have no gear, this is the game for you. 
If you want to travel for 3 hours straight in the largest map in existence to get back to your base because you have no option to respawn close to your base, due to lack of funds, then this is the game for you. 
If you want to then die just outside of your base because you have to swim in a river to get there, and your character doesn't know how to swim even though his stamina is at full and you've dropped all of your gear in the river in a panic, then oh boy, this is the game for you. 

This game looked so good before it came out. I was stoked for a hardcore realistic survival pvp game. I love difficult games. It makes the game last longer and it builds on your skills. My friends hate it, lmao. 
I give this game a shot every now and then, a good healthy shot as you can see from my hours, but every time I'm slapped in the face with horrible and buggy mechanics. (Usually results in me rage quitting from losing everything due to bugs)
It's such a shame. This game has such potential to be good, but I just can't stick with it with the direction it's going. Wasting an entire day on this game just to have all of the efforts ripped away by a broken mechanic is just not worth it. And the money system they're using currently just doesn't work. I'm sure it's pushing new players away. You just can't get anywhere anymore. Starting a game on a new server and starting up a base was hard enough before I had to pay for everything I did. (Fame wasn't perfected either though...)

Like I've said, I've given this game a fair shot, but honestly, most of the hours spent in this game was just me TRYING to establish myself and then losing it all. I unfortunately can't recommend this game in it's current state. I really hope it gets better. It could be really cool. Even the option to have Dedicated Servers with custom options would be huge for everyone. Oh well. No one is going to read this. Wubba lubba dub dub. Squirrels and Potatoes.
developer_response:
Hi Trendus!
 
First of all, thank you for taking the time to write this review. 
The game has a steep learning curve and hardcore realism which is the main draw for a lot of players. That's what drew me to the game, as a gamer first. 
I do understand where your frustration is coming from and we are aware of some issues causing players to lose progress because of bugs.

Unfortunately, those kinds of bugs are VERY hard to reproduce in our conditions but we've made significant progress and already eliminated a lot of them. We take this very seriously and want our players to have pleasant and fun gaming sessions. 
That's why we'll be entering the polishing phase fairly soon. That's when we'll revisit ALL the mechanics, balance them out and fix any remaining bugs.
That's what we'll be doing until 1.0 releases.
 
Actually, we read, analyze and discuss player reviews on a daily basis and your voice has been heard. 
Thank you for your support and honest feedback, we really appreciate it.
We hope you revisit the game and perhaps change your mind!
Have a great day!

author: {'steamid': '76561198063690448', 'num_games_owned': 166, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 39174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39174, 'last_played': 1703724675}
review:
[b]Update: 
It appears that the development team for this project is running out of funds. It is likely that the game will be dead in the near future and development will be halted.
After several updates, the developers have damaged the game mechanics more than they have implemented positive changes. Considering that they are not fixing these issues but instead releasing new updates that only include new paid DLCs, these are clear signs that funding for this project has been cut off.

Under no circumstances should you currently purchase this game. Due to the AI enemies spawning arbitrarily and not being fixed for months, it is unplayable and will likely be discontinued sooner rather than later.[/b]




Scum has started with a wonderful development, a real interest of the developers in their players and in regular intervals, new great content and very fast bug fixes. 

At the moment, and unfortunately for ever, a purchase is absolutely not advisable, as the game is currently not playable. 


At the time, it was probably the most realistic survival game on the market (vitamin requirements, balanced eating/drinking habits, different types of food). Disease and impairment systems...) is developing more and more into a mixture of Left4Dead2 and an online MMORPG. 

The bunker update, which brought a new OP puppet/mech with integrated god mode, was questionable, but didn't have much impact on the game experience, as everyone was free to use and raid these bunkers or leave them out of their game experience. 

I also remember very well when, in my early hours of SCUM, I fled into a house from the Puppets, left the house and not a minute later became the delicious lunch of a hungry wolf.... well, but that was once upon a time, because a very over-motivated developer was probably of the opinion that wild animals are surreal in a world and can only be tracked down by "actively accepting missions". 

With the new update, where puppets (zombies) spawn around you randomly and by random generation, sometimes every second (imagine you clean an area and a few seconds later, garbage appears again in the area you just cleaned) and a "horde function", which can be quite nice and adds excitement, this game title is more like a budding Left4Dead2 or 7DaysToDie. If the developers' goal is to reach this level, then they are well on their way. 

Unfortunately, due to these changes and innovations, the game is anything but worthy of its hype at the time and a purchase is definitely not recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561197982073199', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3898, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3828, 'last_played': 1711061997}
review: Used to be a good game but now they've made it all about buying micro transactions to be able to play...removed from my steam.
developer_response:
Hi Sid! 

We're sorry DLC's made you lose interest in the game, but I have to address this claim. 
DLC's are purely cosmetic and totally OPTIONAL. You don't have to buy them, they don't change the gameplay and don't provide any kind of advantage over other players. 

Our game is about survival, puppets, weapons, vehicles, a huge map and having a good team by your side. 
That's what were all about and what the game is. 
We sincerely hope you'll revisit the game and perhaps change your mind. 
Have a great day!

author: {'steamid': '76561198089477182', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 613, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 613, 'last_played': 1703716581}
review: Spend hours building your character up just to have some screamer spawn 20 of his buddies and ruin your day. After 4 attempts and same thing happened I do not recommend a game that basically s@#$s you right when it is starting to get somewhere.
developer_response: Hi wolfgar7474! We're sorry to see that you were disappointed with the game. We acknowledge that there were certain issues with the hordes spawning and therefore made tweaks to this system which should make the hordes spawn further away from the player. Also, we buffed the amount of damage melee weapons do to puppets which should give our players a better fighting chance in the early game. We also understand that further tweaks will possibly be necessary, which is why your feedback is important to us and why the game is still in Early access. We're still balancing things out and we're confident that by the full 1.0 release, we'll have something that is truly enjoyable for our players. While you've had a negative experience now, we hope you'll give us another chance eventually once we get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198280956243', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 14611, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13452, 'last_played': 1710674040}
review:
Ganz ehrlich, ich mag eigentlich gar nichts mehr schreiben. Habe nach ca. einem Jahr es mal wieder probiert. Das Spiel wird immer unspielbarer. Das Kämpfen wird immer schlimmer. Während ich letztes Jahr mich noch mit einer schaufel oder Pickaxt wehren konnte geht das heute nicht mehr. Sofort aus allen löcher am Bluten, das verbinden hat nicht mehr geklappt. Genug Zeit, aber keine Ahnung wie das jetzt geht.  Warum einfach, wenn es auch kompliziert geht.  

Irgenwie ist das ein Körpersimmulator geworden. Nicht sehr realistisch, dafür aber unnütz. Großer Mist. 

Nachtrag (10.01.24): Da will wirklich einer, das man auf gar keinen Fall Spaß. Hat, Heute erst Schubkarre gefunden, dann sogar ein Fahrrad. Städle mit Schubkarre gelootet und in mein Camp gefahren. Meine Tasche auch noch schnell in die Karre geleert. Also loot vom ganzen Dorf. Dann zurück ins Städle, aufs Fahrrad umd die Küstenstraße lang ins nächste. 

Angefangen zu looten und dann neben dem Fahrrad ausgelogged zum Essen. Nach dem Essen wieder rein. Fahrrad nicht mehr da!. Gut. Die Taschen noch voll und Zufuß wieder den wirklich langen Weg wieder zurück. Hunger, Durst, auf Boden setzen und der ganz normale Scum-Spaß-Bremsen-SchikanenKram für devote Halbstarke.

Und natürlich war dann auch die Schubkarre mit dem ganzen Loot vom Vormittag auch weg.
Bei Scum bin ich echt im falschen Film. Modulare Fahrzeuge. Die Leute feiern diesen Mist, der die benutzten Fahrzeuge auf den Servern verringern soll als Feature. Dabei soll er nur die Serverlast drücken, weil sie die permanenten Lags nicht in den Griff bekommen.

Das ist Verarsche. Wer so ein feature im Ernst einbauen will, der muß auch alles bringen. Inclusive der ganzen doppelten und dreifachen Ersatzteilen, die dafür benötigt werden, damit es zufriedenstellend benutzbar ist. Aber wer die ersten fünf Stunden mal ein Spiel angefangen hat, wird sehr schnell feststellen, das nun zwar sehr viele Chassis für Autos zu finden sind, aber die nötigen Teile in einem akzeptablen rahmen und machbaren Radius nicht zu finden sind, wenn kein Clanboy mit Ersatzauto ist. Alleine ist man aufgeschmissen.

Immer wenn irgend etwas Spass bringt, kommt garantiert mit einem Update die Bremse. Zuerst ein Flugzeug oder zwei, dann wird es so gestellt, das man es erst von Mechs befreien muss. Eine ganze Zeit war es noch mögich in Bunkern gescheite Waffen zu bekommen. Nun tropfen in Alien-Stil kurz hinter der Bukertür Alien-Terminatoren von der Decke und befördern dich ins Nirvana, damit du ja keine Gegenwehr mehr gegen eigentlich nur nervende Zombies leisten kannst. 

Ob hell oder dunkel, kommen sie nun aus bis zu 400 Metern in einem Affenzahn alleine oder zu zweit auf dich zugerannt. Irgend einer wird schon einen Glückstreffer landen und mit einem Hit bis zu 7 blutende Wunden durch die Kleidung, die nur manchmal beschädigt ist, du aber eine tief klaffende Wunde hast, die dich dann in wenigen Minuten ausbluten lässt.

Man hat nicht immer den Platz bis zu zehn große Lumpen, dazu am besten sauber und desinfiziert. immer dabei zu haben. Aber was will man von einem Entwickler halten, der einen Godmode zulässt, allerdings nur fürs Bauen. Blueprint hinstellen und Fertig-cheaten finden sie OK. Aber mal durch die Luft fliegen oder vor den wirklich schlecht balanzierten Gegnern
in Sicherheit zu bringen ist wohl nur etwas für Looser. 

Da hat wohl ein 14jähriger Spieler das Ruder der Entwicklung übernommen. Es ist Survival und das darf keinen Spaß machen. Zusätzlich vermute ich eine sehr schwere Kindheit. Und besonders wenige Geschenke zu den üblichen Anlässen. Vermute ich bei der Normaleinstellung für Loot.

Zum Glück wissen gute Entwickler, das viel und gutes Loot zum Spass eines Spieles Beitragen. Sowie angemessener Fortschritt und Updates ohne das hinterher jedesmal ein paar mal nachgepatched werden muß. Gab es eigendlich schon ein Update ohne das hinterher etwas andere nicht ging. Ich glaube nicht. 

Man. So eine schöne Map. Die Atmosphäre ist brilliant. Ohne mich verbiegen zu müsse. Es ist der beste Walkingsimulator everever. Aber ein Spiel, was wirklich Spaß macht, bekommt ihr scheinbar nicht gebacken. Ich habe sogar den Eidruck ihr wollt oder könnt das gar nicht.

Wer Probleme damit hat, den Spielern über einen Gottmodus etwas zu erlauben, weil er das selber nicht will oder verstehen will, der hat vielleicht ein Problem. Darüber sollte er mal mit jemanden sprechen, der kein Problem damit hat einen richtigen Gottmodus anzubieten, weil er sich einfach sagt, wenn der Spieler damit Spass hat sich zum Beispiel unverwundbar zu machen, warum sollte ich ihm verbieten diesen Spass zu haben, Das ist doch dumm. Ich will ja das er Spass hat und will ihn ja nicht ersziehen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198137750007', 'num_games_owned': 7, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 19204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2855, 'last_played': 1710002612}
review:
bug非常多
但是勝在真實 生存遊戲就是要難活才叫生存 :)


My teammate quit the game due to issues with vehicles penetrating building models. He has had the same problem 3 times, each time causing him to lose the supplies in the vehicle and have to walk to find another vehicle.
He is using a 1060 graphics card, which may be too old.
But even I have encountered problems with penetration into building models, however I was using a 3060 graphics card.
Another teammate took out a backpack filled with screwdrivers from the cabinet, but the backpack disappeared and the teammate exited the game.

SCUM is more difficult than other survival games, and failure will cause a heavy sense of frustration, especially when the failure is caused by game bugs.
So far, three teammates have left me. They all chose to quit because they couldn't stand the various loopholes.
SCUM is a good game, and although it has a lot of problems now, I believe it will get better, and I hope I won't lose teammates because of the game's bugs again.

review:
If you enjoy the idea of ARMA but want a complex survival mechanic on top of it. This game is perfect for you. 

Being shot at when you are armed with a rock and a few sticks is actually not very fun. 

In fact, I think thats fucking stupid.
developer_response:
Hello HELLO:^) 
Thank you for your feedback. 
Would you mind going into a little more detail? 
We have added a tutorial to the 0.95 update which addresses all of the game's features and provides assistance. 

The game is admittedly hard and has a steep learning curve. Requires a careful approach if you wanna thrive, not just survive.

I would recommend crafting a stone axe and an improvised bag out of materials you can find ANYWHERE on the Island. 
Also, try playing on a private server with loot boosted to get the hang of the game before going on an official server. 

We hope you revisit the game and perhaps change your mind. 
Have a great day!

author: {'steamid': '76561198081620723', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 18831, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18697, 'last_played': 1703773475}
review:
Zdecydowanie polecam każdemu wymagającemu graczowi i fanowi survivali 
Wiele razy umarłem bo był akurat restart serwera a ja byłem na łodzi a po restarcie zrespiłem się OBOK łodzi co za tym idzie? a no utonąłem bo miałem do wyboru wyrzucić wszystko co zebrałem przez godziny zbierania i "Wypłynąć na powierzchnie" albo po prostu umrzeć i wyłączyć tę zbugowane coś,wybrałem opcję 2 o ile można nazwać to pływaniem gdyby nie internet nie wiedział bym że to "mechanika gry" bardziej przypomina czarną dziurę która po prostu wciąga nas pod tekstury albo ruchome piaski pod wodą zawsze myślałem że to bugi.
Ostatnio został dodany nowy update z HORDAMI zombie wszystko spoko ale łatwo taką hordę przyzwać i w grze w której mamy dostęp do broni nie powinno stanowić wyzwania obrona przed taką hordą a no takową przyzywają m.in dźwięki broni i strzelając już do tej hordy przyzywa się kolejna i kolejna taka incepcja respi się dookołą nieskończoność zombie z którymi nie wiadomo co zrobić,szkoda że te hordy po prostu nie podróżują po mapie było by to 10000 razy ciekawsze raz zdarzyło się ze hordę wezwał zombie którego zabiłem to tyle z minusów do plusów trzeba dodać wielką ZRÓŻNICOWANĄ mape,samochody,samoloty,motory,bunkry,opuszczone bunkry mega klimatyczne miejsca,elektrownię atomową,prypeć i wieele innych jeśli kupisz SCUM to nigdy więcej nie tkniesz DayZ nie ma nawet co porównywać.Dziękuję i apeluje do twórców żeby naprawili te jebane łodzie i pierdoloną wode!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198063432201', 'num_games_owned': 127, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 5089, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4970, 'last_played': 1703924483}
review:
SCUM hat die Messlatte für Survival-Spiele auf ein neues Niveau gehoben und stellt eine beeindruckende Kombination aus Realismus, Tiefe und Spielspaß dar. Entwickelt von Gamepires und veröffentlicht von Devolver Digital, hat SCUM seit seinem Release eine treue Fangemeinde gewonnen, und das aus gutem Grund.

Die realistische Darstellung des menschlichen Körpers und seiner Bedürfnisse in SCUM ist beeindruckend. Der Hunger, der Stoffwechsel, die Fitness und die Krankheitsanfälligkeit sind allesamt Faktoren, die berücksichtigt werden müssen, um im Spiel zu überleben. Dieser Grad an Detailtreue trägt dazu bei, eine fesselnde und immersive Spielerfahrung zu schaffen.

Die offene Welt von SCUM ist atemberaubend gestaltet und bietet eine Vielzahl von Umgebungen, von dichten Wäldern über städtische Gebiete bis hin zu militärischen Einrichtungen. Die grafische Präsentation ist beeindruckend, und die Liebe zum Detail ist in jedem Winkel der Karte spürbar.

Ein weiterer Höhepunkt von SCUM ist das ausgefeilte Crafting-System. Spieler können nicht nur Gegenstände sammeln, sondern auch ihre Fähigkeiten verbessern, um fortschrittlichere Werkzeuge und Waffen herzustellen. Dies fördert die Zusammenarbeit und den Wettbewerb zwischen den Spielern und trägt zur Tiefe des Spiels bei.

Der Mehrspieleraspekt von SCUM ist ein wesentlicher Bestandteil des Spielerlebnisses. Von PvP-Kämpfen bis hin zu Koop-Abenteuern bietet das Spiel eine Vielzahl von Interaktionsmöglichkeiten mit anderen Spielern. Die Integration von Teamarbeit und strategischer Planung verleiht dem Spiel eine soziale Dimension, die weit über das hinausgeht, was viele andere Survival-Spiele bieten.

Einige könnten argumentieren, dass die Lernkurve von SCUM steil ist, aber genau das macht das Spiel so lohnenswert. Durch das Überwinden von Herausforderungen und das Meistern der zahlreichen Aspekte des Spiels fühlt sich der Erfolg umso süßer an.

Insgesamt ist SCUM ein herausragendes Beispiel für ein Survival-Spiel, das Realismus, Kreativität und soziale Interaktion perfekt vereint. Die Entwickler haben ganze Arbeit geleistet, um eine immersive und fesselnde Welt zu schaffen, die sowohl erfahrene Survival-Spieler als auch Neulinge begeistern wird. SCUM ist zweifellos ein Meisterwerk und ein Muss für Fans des Genres.

author: {'steamid': '76561199070943476', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4848, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4392, 'last_played': 1703877913}
review: A lot of things are to be implemented but it's a pretty fun game. A lot of bugs where the puppets are able to reach you and glitch into you. My fiancé bought my version of the game so we could buy it together. I hope to see improvement in the future.

author: {'steamid': '76561198810226161', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 16466, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14104, 'last_played': 1706318377}
review:
这款游戏画质感觉比吃鸡还好，衣服、枪械、车子之类的样子也很漂亮
所以玩了人渣之后再去玩别的生存类游戏，总感觉没有人渣好看，玩不下去了ovo
可以手动自制的物资也蛮真实有趣，比如摸一些石头可以做成石刀
很硬核 能上厕所这一点也是很真实有趣的 作为一个“人”会吃会喝，会上厕所，会搜东西会打猎，技能、体质都可以慢慢上涨
是一款很有趣的生存类游戏，游戏内的国人大多会帮助新手，经常遇到很肥的国人帮助开荒的我，非常感激
人渣可以pvp也可以pve，可以玩成建家，搜物资的清闲养老游戏，也可以玩成刺激的互相侵略，互相伤害的游戏
游戏有很大的潜力，目前尚在测试阶段中，会有各类bug存在，但是每次更新也会修复很多bug，我们不妨多一些耐心和等待
期待早日上新正式版本

author: {'steamid': '76561198371490975', 'num_games_owned': 63, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 62752, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 5, 'playtime_at_review': 61247, 'last_played': 1712327490}
review:
玩了挺久的，发现这游戏一直火不起来，总结了几个点：
第一是游戏上手难度高，对萌新不友好，没有300小时+的连游戏机制都摸不清楚
第二是bug死多，就和2042刚出来时候一样，每次更新都是半成品拿出来的。
第三游戏优化差，明明电脑配置不错但玩起来就是掉帧发烫。
但是其实以上三点都是可以解决的，你看评论区骂声一片的基本都是不超过1000小时的萌新。
萌新入坑的话我可以推荐你去0333服务器，管理都是大小号加起来2000小时+的玩家，提供萌新带队的服务，包你从入坑到入门毫无难度。pvp老玩家也可以来服务器玩，新服开业练体狂欢，满倍率新陈代谢和技能倍率。管理和服主都是专业巡查员，保证有挂必纠。服务器节点加速日服/新加坡。

author: {'steamid': '76561198019266463', 'num_games_owned': 59, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 29927, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29927, 'last_played': 1702710157}
review: I really enjoyed the game, played it for almost 500 hours, even with the myriad of game-breaking bugs present. But then came version 0.95. And i felt the need to write this review because they messed the game up so much that i can tell you with all my heart please give this game a HARD PASS. Maybe wait a couple years and check back, see if the devs actually fixed all the bugs PLUS all the new ones they added with the last update. There's a bunch of old game-breaking bugs present from year 1 of the game, and with the passing months they just keep piling up along the new bugs. Do yourself a favor and don't play this mess.
developer_response:
Hi Maloiik!

Thank you for taking the time to write this review and for the many hours you sunk into the game. 
We're sorry to hear you're unsatisfied with the game as of the latest big update. 
The team is aware of the issue in the horde system and is investigating them thoroughly.

Yes, some bugs have been lingering for a while, but now that we're approaching the inevitable 1.0 release, we'll be entering the polishing phase where we'll revisit every mechanic not functioning as intended and balance it out as much as possible. 
Some of those lingering bugs could not have been fixed before adding all the content to the game. Also, keep in mind that we are a small studio and we're doing our best to make SCUM the best game that it can be. 

Thank you again for your feedback, we hope you revisit the game and perhaps change your mind. 
Have a great day!

author: {'steamid': '76561198334919748', 'num_games_owned': 167, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 84903, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78692, 'last_played': 1709585454}
review:
It's a great survival game! 
I can already say this game will have mod support in the future later down the road after it gets fully released!
Community servers have been a thing for a while now. Developers have added new features for server owners to tweak the game settings for their servers, including loot!

- Great server customization
- Plenty of variety of server types, including PvP, PvE, RP, and even some mixed together!
- Weapon variety
- Single-player mode
- Many different vehicle types
- Game has a tutorial/manual on how to play for new players! 

The game has great developers! They are very active and they are very open to new ideas and feedback from the players. 


I've had experience playing DayZ, and this in my opinion is far better and has more potential!

author: {'steamid': '76561198023175271', 'num_games_owned': 417, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 6471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3885, 'last_played': 1704825440}
review:
Coming from dayz I decided to try scum again after a few years of updates so coming in to it in late 2023 was a good surprise and how addicted I have become ( now Most of this could be the server I happen to join which was amazing Great community even help each other out it is mostly PvE but it dose have PvP in it )

 anyway the hole game has me hooked trying to re learn everything from scratch the craft system etc is pretty good but I do wish the base building was alot more easier for placing instead having place then build etc ( this is only the main base walls etc don't apply to this ) 

There is one thing I wish they would add and I really really hope this dose get added or something if you in your base proximity it should allow you to have access to all boxes for crafting building etc cutting down trees in that area should also save time with building walls from any planks sticks etc in the zone yeah they added you can pack and bundle all the stuff together like a bundle of sticks and a bundle of wood etc but it gets tedious quick 


 either way it's not the worse the gameplay feels pretty good once you get used to it basically dayz but with some enhanments in many ways like traders ( mods usually do this anyway on dayz just here is built into the game ) it feels really good with having risk for better loot in hopes to find to sell or keep then to head to trader sell and get better stuff

 there also bunkers underground with plenty loot t

he issue I have current version of this game is the map it doesn't show which direction you are going making it more tricky not only that can't zoom into the map which they should hopefully change 

The fame points are supsoe to be used not sure how but for my server if you respawn at base cost nothing which is making the game 100 time better in my opinion as the fame points stop you from having to run miles on foot 

Another thing I love is if you do die and don't have a base you can at least spawn in any grid area it will be random where you spawn  in there from the sky but at least it save you spawning at the bottom the map and running for 100miles to die yeah you probably still got slot of running to do but it's way better going from bottom olog the map to the top like in dayz as it's just random


The only other issue is the matabalsim section is pretty complex

And healing is a bit of a chore click the womb then look for the rag or what eve you using to heal you need to then click that then click treat instead of it automatically suggested the best option or just you clicking treat and applying automatically nope you need to hit click the health section click the cut click the rag click the treat then repeat if it's infected you then have to click the alcohol or what ever you use to disinfect click the rag then bring up the health menu click the cut click apply and repeat PLEASE FIX THAT

author: {'steamid': '76561198306963318', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 5682, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5682, 'last_played': 1692089173}
review:
id play scum if there was like actual future tec weapons you can use or mechs to wear so to me it kinda feels like a asset flip that's too basic.
there is nothing exiting other than the giant mechs that just shit on you.
like i wanna sneak up behind and disarm a giant mech jump inside and rampage they are a pointless nuisance and that's it
nothing worth finding.
maybe someday soon but until then I don't recommend.

PS; I do love this game but atm its too empty.
developer_response: Hi Kayo! We're sorry to see that you did not find adequate enjoyment with the game. We're still in Early access and we still have loads of new content that will further enhance the experience of the game and make moment-to-moment gameplay more enjoyable. If you have a strong dislike for the Sentries, we advise that you find a private server where they are removed from the game. You may also find some settings such as greater loot spawns to improve your experience of SCUM. Regardless which option you pick, we hope that you'll consider giving the game another shot as we'd hate to see you discouraged from it.

author: {'steamid': '76561199077837778', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 14439, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9086, 'last_played': 1710110178}
review:
Игра крутая.

НО!
Бесят читеры китайцы на евро-серверах, которые видят тебя ночью в кустах с любого расстояния. (уходя из города кинул фальшфеер и уехал в лес на велике, спустя 5 минут  треть квадрата от города, лежа в кустах в глухом лесу за камнями и перебирая лут услышал звук авто. думаю ну это мимо... ага, точно...  авто тормозит, поворачивает и наезжает прямо на меня... я минут 10 мансил от него между деревьев прячась по кустам, но он всеравно меня видел и пытался наехать. поняв что бесполезно - отъехал. я убегаю в другую сторону по кустам. слышу 2 выстрела. финал)
Так что неоднозначно.
Для одиночной игры - довольно скучная. Можно обрастать лутом до бесконечности, что в итоге просто надоест.
Для онлайна - вы в неравных условиях перед теми кто читерит. Интересно, пердак сгорит, если относиться с юмором то весело.

author: {'steamid': '76561199171743494', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 7897, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4382, 'last_played': 1705325063}
review:
极其不推荐.游玩两周(70小时)遇到两次恶心bug 导致两周的积累全部灰飞烟灭,所以我有理由认为会出现第三次甚至第四次,
如果你想体验一个生存游戏数周的累积因为游戏自身问题全部消失的话,我觉得可以体验这个游戏.
第一次bug 三天东拼西凑弄了个红色轿车 驶过一个足球场,开过来的时候是一片平地,开进来之后铁栏杆刷新出来了.然后就开不出去了...服务器创建者长期联系不上 房区也无法插旗.无奈报废 ,心态爆炸.  
第二次bug   缓了几天重新选了个管理在线的服务器.4人小队慢慢玩 ,花钱找服务器管理者生成了一辆车,带着一车物资出门的时候,行驶在大马路上直接掉进地底 全部消失不见,找管理,管理表示不补 不管 无能为力,还有其他人在附和说再花钱买一辆,,合着我付钱或者付时间给游戏bug买单??  出bug了需要我自己花钱补我自己的损失?   我认为我不配玩这个游戏!

review:
Bin Anfänger und habe leider erst nach 30 std gesehen, dass man am Server noch Einstellungen vornehmen kann ohne die man ansonsten doch schnell gefrustet wäre. Leider fast alles in Englisch, was das Verständnis für mich recht kompliziert macht.
Habe bis jetzt noch nie Antibiotika gesehen und Knoblauch gaanz selten. Hast du eine Infektion und diese Sachen nicht, stirbst du. Infektionen bekommt man aber ziemlich schnell wenn man nicht alles sauber hält bzw desinfiziert. Das und die fehlende komplette Übersetzung in Deutsch wären bisher meine einzigen Kritikpunkte.
Ansonsten sehr cooles Spiel, besser als DayZ finde ich

author: {'steamid': '76561197970983819', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 91498, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89997, 'last_played': 1704353907}
review:
第二戦闘配備中に不明瞭な会話で申し訳ないが、アレがああなったドサクサに光の速さでv0.95ぶっこんできたのは草、と感じる

ただ、SCUMのデベロッパーであるGamepiresはひたすらマイペースを貫き炎上にも強く今回も何も考えずのリリースなのかもしれない・・・
パペットのスポーン変更で例によって叩かれてはいるが、近接や弓矢などを使う人はステルスプレイ推奨の今verとむしろ相性がいいためかなり遊びやすくなっているだろう
昆虫を食べたり消化に気を使ったり排便したりクソ多い種類の弾丸をフリーハンドでいちいちスタッキングしたりガソリン飲んでゲロ吐いたり他所のゲームでは見たことないシステムだらけで、変わった物で遊びたい人にはオススメです

author: {'steamid': '76561197981913693', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 64283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64283, 'last_played': 1703586164}
review:
horde update made this game unplayable...
too trigger happy system just being spotted gets horde on you
almost no cooldown between hordes while you clearing that 1 massive horde that ya are shooting down...new one spawns in already cause you shooting.....making it pretty much endless horde
or the fact theres no special screamer zombie that causes the horde...no its everyzombie given this ability....get spotted...horde...get spotted by the horde..more horde...jeesus no brains used in making this update 
UNINSTALLED! GOOD BYE SCUM!

review:
狗屎一般的交互，烂到不行的画质，可怜的资源数，穷追不舍的丧尸，时不时出现的恶心BUG，弱智一般的教程手册以及逆天的刷新机制是我不推荐人渣的理由。就这垃圾游戏现在的样子，制作组坟头草两丈高这傻逼游戏也出不来正式服，玩这种游戏简直就是浪费人生，真别玩。
PS：建议制作组下葬的时候也加个百分比一直转好了。hhhhh

author: {'steamid': '76561198837435496', 'num_games_owned': 78, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1703574735}
review: This game has SO MUCH potential. Early access for 37 years kinda tells you where it's at, and where it's going though.
developer_response: Hi KevieChase! We're sorry to see that the length of our Early access phase made you discouraged with the game. We acknowledge that we've been in this phase for a significant period of time, but a lot has happened in the meantime and there were a lot of changes and circumstances that we had to endure and overcome. The game is truly ambitious and a lot of passion and elbow grease is has been invested to deliver it to the place it currently is. We've been continuously updating the game over the course of this year with patches 0.85, 0.9, 0.95 and we're just shy of getting to that coveted 1.0 version and the full release of the game. We're very motivated and want to get there as much as our fans and we're confident that we'll indeed get over the finish line and we hope that you'll give the game another chance once we get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561197995539546', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 333, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 333, 'last_played': 1691707063}
review: Very cool concept with a lot of impressive detail and effort put into development. Great visuals and creative game play but from my perspective as someone who occasionally picks up the game, SCUM has a major drawback. After 10 minutes, items de-spawn. While I'm sure some degree of de-spawn time is necessary for server stability over time, I rather not have to start almost completely from scratch after leaving the game for a week or two. Once an update is made to allow adjustment of the item de-spawn time so it can be set to infinity on my server, I'll be back playing.
developer_response: Hi Hel1! We're sorry to see that you've experienced this bug and that it has diminished your time with the game. This is something that we know is present and we'd like you to know that we're working hard to fix it as soon as possible. As we're nearing our 1.0 release, we'll be dedicating significant effort to polish and optimize the game so that our players can enjoy the game without experiencing issues such as these. Once again, we're really sorry that this happened to you and we hope that you'll be so kind to give the game another chance once we manage to exit Early access.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006535933', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 40971, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40200, 'last_played': 1703916088}
review:
I want to recommend this game, I really do. However, I just cannot at this time. The concept is something great but the execution is just not there. One thing to keep in mind is that it isn't finished. They are still working out a lot of the issues but sometimes for better and sometimes for worse. A couple of pros and cons:

Cons first - Almost every major update has me asking WTF did they do that for?!?
                - All the major updates are followed immediately with hotfixes almost like they didn't even bother 
                   to test the update for shipping it
                - The game has gotten more and more painful to play. (i.e. You need to go into abandoned bunkers 
                   to get good firepower, but without already having great gear and good firepower the abandoned 
                   bunkers are almost guaranteed death. Which out of 25 ish bunkers in the game they made 17 of 
                   them abandoned.)
                - It feels like the devs wake up each morning and ask themselves how they can make it even 
                   harder to survive, taking mechanics that were challenging but good and making them insanely 
                   difficult 

Now to give some of the good points and why I still play and have hope that it will be great when it's finished:

        Pros - The concept. The PvPvE inmates vs other inmates vs puppets (zombies) in a contained zone 
                   fighting over survival gear, weapons, food, vehicles, and for fame is pretty interesting.
                - Map. The map is very large and with different biomes, weather and themes.
                - Setting adjustments. In single player and on private servers the setting can be adjusted to create 
                   a play experience the way you like. This is a pro but the limited ability and confusing explanations 
                   for some settings is a definite con.

Final thoughts:

This game has a ton of potential. In its current state I cannot recommend it for everyone or even the casual survival game player. If you are the kind of player who likes to build yourself up only to lose everything because a bomb wearing "beeper" spawns behind you 10 seconds after clearing the room. And you can get it on sale, then by all means go for it.
developer_response: Hi Cr0ssh4ir! Thank you for writing such an extensive review and we'd like to express our regret that you did not find the last update to be enjoyable. SCUM was always designed to be a hardcore survival game and ramping up challenge while maintaining fairness was always our core tenet. We acknowledge that some of the functioning of the new hordes can be better tweaked and balanced (which is something that we've already done by making the hordes spawn further away from the players and buffing the damage melee weapons do to puppets). That is why we value the feedback we receive from our community, which is important for Early access games such as SCUM. What we'd like you to take away from this is that the team is committed to bringing the game to its full 1.0 release or, in other words, delivering all the promised content and rolling out the necessary improvements and fixes that will bring the experience of SCUM onto another level. That being said, we hope that this experience will not discourage you from the game and that you'll give the game another chance eventually.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091695670', 'num_games_owned': 80, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 3047, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3047, 'last_played': 1703550973}
review:
Os devs do jogo precisam saber que caminham desejam tomar. 
O jogo tem uma ideia muito legal, muitos crafts, metabolismo do personagem avançado, mas para por aí.
A ambientação das cidades é muito ruim, passa a impressão de algo mal feito, o combate com os zumbis também necessitava ser ajustado, parece que o enfrentamento é meio aleatório há horas que o combate flui, há horas que simplesmente o zumbi acerta tudo. O craft e inventário é nada intuitivo, fazendo o player ir tateando para descobrir algo.

review:
Pretty much complitely rip-off. Makers doesnt really fix anything, they just release new dlc:s. 
Stuff keeps gettin disapearing when takin them out of closer or anywhere, weapons keep on breaking complitely after few clips. 

This game would be a great game, if some company really would make it to work. In my honest opinion: Do not buy this. You just lost your money. 

I know there is hardcore fans who keep defending the game and its devs, but reality check: game that has been so long as a early access, its just an excuse to do things badly. How on earth you devs dont fix real problems - and no, i dont need to hear about plans, nor new DLC:s for hairs, how about fix problems what community has sayed and stop playing around.

author: {'steamid': '76561198844590348', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 30786, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1151, 'playtime_at_review': 22282, 'last_played': 1712350819}
review: 0.95的更新，就像是官方给玩家喂了一坨翔。本来我作为一个玩了将近400小时的玩家不应该说这话的，但是SCUM的策划像是看不惯玩家只玩PVE一样，非要整点东西出来给玩家增加难度。这个版本更新的部落模式，稍微有点动静都会触发尸潮，即使是拿着弓都一样，枪更是没法用了，一开枪一大堆丧尸追着跑。而且丧尸已经能开门爬窗，躲进室内也没用。在户外都还好一些，如果是下地堡触发了尸潮，不死都要掉层皮。本身一些自建的服务器物资倍率和丧尸倍率就很高了，这下更加是没得玩。所以官方到底是有多恨玩家，才要更新出这样的模式来恶心玩家，还美其名说是为了增加玩家PVE体验，这怕不是失了智才能说出来的话。如果不会更新，那还不如不更新。一个就靠搜刮物资为乐趣的游戏，还非要做这些恶心操作。

author: {'steamid': '76561197987031715', 'num_games_owned': 129, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2791, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2461, 'last_played': 1703574191}
review: Overall I would recommend this game if you like survival/crafting in a PVP/PVE open world. I've played a lot of DayZ and although there are similarities there are also a lot of differences. The puppets(zeds) are tougher, there are a lot more crafting options and the gun play is a lot different. However, when you die you start with nothing and go through the gear up cycle. which is similar, and involves more crating. The map is large with a lot of POI's and there are many active servers. Worth checking out.

review:
edit 2/29/24 : FIXXX THE ZOMBIE HORDE . i killed zombie with a bow but it keeps calling horde ? are you kidding me . what is that? that is an issue from 2 months ago. can we get that fixed atleast please.

Edit: i've been playing this game for almost 2k hours. its not that frustrating anymore . bugs do exist stutters are still there. but atleast its playable now to the point you can enjoy the game. I cannot recommend the game yet. you might quit when playing at the  moment. hopefully it gets changed upon the time they start doing fixing the game after full release

_________________________________________________________________
I was so hyped to play the new horde update. 
but it failed. it doesn't make any sense. if u see one zombie, even if u kill it , it doesn't stop the scream to call horde,
those 5-6 puppets that will be summoned. it can do another scream. it doesn't really stop. 

I understood that eventually the puppets can get in the doors. BUT they can flawlessly jump from WINDOWS !! ? WHAT !!?
What zombie movie have they watched that made zombies like a god damn smooth criminal. Zombies crawl in windows not jump. your character will need to vault in the windows its like 2 seconds. but the zombie  can just jump for 1 sec. HAHAHAHAHAHAHA my brain exploded. I have never seen a zombie movie with a zombie that can jump kick like a ninja in a window HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA
developer_response: Hi Grim! We're sorry to see that the new update disappointed you. The idea behind this update for the puppets was to create a greater challenge and further enhance the moment-to-moment gameplay. We acknowledge that some of their functioning might not be as satisfying for all players, but we wanted to increase their threat, especially with their entry into buildings. The agility of puppets is also something that is specific to the lore of the game, meaning that they are not monstrous, decaying creatures like in other media, but retain virtually the same functioning as the living because of the BCU's controlled by TEC1. Also, the other reason this was introduced is because the threat of puppets was easily mitigated by entering buildings and now this is not an option as hey can open doors and enter through windows. Regardless, the game's in Early access and we're gathering feedback from our players on these matters and we'll be making necessary tweaks if the need arises. That being said, we hope you'll give the game another chance, at least once we fully release the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198848325935', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 9992, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4861, 'last_played': 1708921022}
review: O jogo ta simplesmente um lixo depois dessa ultima atualização. Mesmo com os graficos no minimo ta todo travado(sempre  joguei no ultra). Algumas parte do mapa absolutamente injogáveis de tão travado e pra ajudar as vezes até as configurações bugam e não deixam aplicar a mudança. Os zumbis estão impossiveis dando até 5 sangramentos de uma só vez, fora q eles abrirem literalmente qualquer porta é muita sacanagem e eles dão spawn infinitamente oiuawehiougago Os mechs te veem por tras das paredes de vez em quando e até VARAM a parede. Tbm é impossivel acertar golpes corpo a corpo em uma escada e golpes de cima pra baixo quando inimigo está no chão, o jogo pega quando quer. Aí além disso tudo, os servidores oficiais n tem loot em lugar nenhum kkkkkkkkkk simplesmente injogavel. Só servidor da comunidade pra salvar mesmo. Infelizmente vou ser obrigado a desinstalar depois de 100 horas de jogo. O jeito vai ser ir pro Dayz mesmo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198400573871', 'num_games_owned': 539, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1953, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 222, 'last_played': 1704462888}
review:
first i bought DAYZ, but after it randomly crashing several times in first 30 minutes, i instantly refunded it and bought SCUM. from the users perspective who played neither of these 2 games before and only watched youtube gameplays - SCUM feels good to me, it's more polished, no crashes so far and all in all - i wish i bought scum first so i didn't have to wait dayz refund pending. 

as for gameplay loop it's addictive - u loot and upgrade your gear, kill zombies and eventually run into other players, pvp isn't as fast paced and shooter-like as in rust, which to some might be a downside but for me it's huge upside, best thing about it, even if it didn't had pvp, it has so much content u will have tons of fun in a single player.

review:
Gra mnie irytuje.

Począwszy od wyskalowania gry, tak by komfort gry był przyjemny poprzez generowanie postaci. Jest coś takiego w tej grze, że mnie zniechęca i trudno to mi zdefiniować.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016389129', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 3073, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3046, 'last_played': 1703507326}
review:
Anfangs war es ein Spiel mit einer Idee. Jetzt ist es eine Idee die sich selbst im Weg steht.

Statt sich darum zu kümmern dass das Spiel feritg wird, kommen immer neue Features rein nur um dann wieder entfernt zu werden, es wird in einer Tour am Loot rumgefummelt dass es mittlerweile so ist das 90% der Lootstelken leer sind. So habe ich in der letzten Session selbst nach 3 Stunden nicht eine Waffe gefunden (nicht mal in den 2 Militärbasen in denen ich war und auch keine auf dem Flugplatz), kein Essen, fast keine Kleidung ausser einem Beanie bei einem Zombi. Naja immerhin die kann man jetzt ordentlich melken. Rein ins Dörfchen, Zombies umhauen, raus aus dem Dörfchen-Zombies alle wieder da. Oder neulich an der Tanke: 4 Zombies dicklicher Gestalt halten eine Tanke im Griff der toten Klauen, ich dreh mich kurz um, weil ich etwas höre -nix, dreh mich wieder zurück - Zombies alle weg. So geht's auch.

Auch macht sich das Team wohl mehr Gedanken drum, welche Farbe die Kampfroboter haben sollen und was aus dem Gamplay man schon vorab als teuren DLC an den Mann und die Frau bringen kann.

Haarpack für 5 Euro? CHECK!
Charaterpack für 15 Euro? CHECK!

Gut bei Ark gelernt. Das Game lauft bis heute auch nicht rund obwohl es "fertig" ist wird aber schonmal geremastert und ist wieder nicht fertig. Das wird hier wohl ganz ähnlich laufen. Man merkt immer mehr dass das Team keinem Plan mehr folgt sondern nur noch alles weiter planlos kaputt patcht. 

Am Ende heisst das Spiel dann vermutlich Scum vs. Predator oder so. War ja mal ne zeitlang hip als Filmtitel.

So wie es seit 3-4 Patches läuft ist das Game ein klarer Fehlkauf für mich und ich fürchte dass die Entwickler die Kurve auch nicht mehr kriegen. 

Daher würde Interessenten dringend abraten zu kaufen, sondern erstmal zu sehen ob das Ganze ein Dauer-Early Access wird oder doch mal fertig.

review: Lets just say I don't live very long playing this game. I think the puppets are a bit much maybe, a little on the over powered and constantly popping up without giving you a break on normal settings. it's impossible to get anything done, for me anyway. I just hope it balances out a little better without having to mess with the server settings.

author: {'steamid': '76561198365155854', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 15996, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15996, 'last_played': 1703461927}
review: As 0.95 the game is not good. The new PVE system is really bad, there is no safe zone for encounters, so sometimes puppets spawn right in your head, i was trying to get used but when a suicide puppet spawn right in you back several times it start to get in you nerves. the hordes do Have a distance for spawning and are more manageble depending on server settings.
developer_response: Hi Snake's Tiger! We're sorry to see that you were disappointed with the game and with the changes introduced in the new patch. We acknowledge that there are certain issues with the puppet spawns after the new update and you'll be pleased to know that we have tweaked this system so the puppets are spawning further away from the player. We've also buffed the damage melee weapons deal to puppets, meaning that you'll have a much better chance of survival against them before you manage to get a gun which will greatly help you with dispatching them with ease. You should also consider running away and retreating from a situation that might be too dangerous to face head on. Regardless, the team is looking into ways to further tweak various systems that should greatly improve the experience for our players and we hope that you'll give the game another chance eventually.

author: {'steamid': '76561198884510794', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1703461350}
review:
ok, this game isnt that good.
i know i didnt play much, so take this with a grain of salt.
first off, i hate the long loading times.
and second, its way too hard.
this was a bit short of a review.
developer_response: Hi Brainharmer! We're sorry to see that you did not find enjoyment with the game. The loading times are usually not an issue and mostly depend on the quality of your internet connection as well as your system configuration. If you think that this is not the case, we'd like to kindly direct you towards our support team at https://support.scumgame.com/ and explain in the issue with loading you are experiencing. As for the difficulty, the game is designed to be a hardcore survival experience that leans heavily on realism, which means that is is designed to be challenging. However, we understand that some of our players want a more casual time with SCUM, which is why we've enabled private servers where settings can be modified in a way where things like puppets are removed, loot is more available, etc.  That is why we advise that, if this is your preference and willing to give the game another chance, you try out the game on one of those.

author: {'steamid': '76561197977550329', 'num_games_owned': 48, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 36053, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1081, 'playtime_at_review': 6718, 'last_played': 1712409778}
review: i found the game too difficult as you start with nothing and immediately are attacked by zeds, someone has locked all the garages and most of the building doors around the town at B4 making it impossible to collect anything to sell or find food and drink.  the night times are to long and you cannot get to see anything that will attack you. as i died so many times by hunger, thirst or zeds i was minus 2500 in coin which you have to pay off even before i could buy anything to help,
developer_response: Hi [Red Control] Smegga! We're sorry to see that you did not find enjoyment in the game. SCUM can have a steeper learning curve and can be a bit daunting for new players, which is why we would advise that you acquaint yourself with the game's mechanics in singleplayer so you don't find yourself stumbling upon a town that someone locked up and thus disabled you from looting it. Regardless, the team will make sure to bring about a lot of balancing and polishing as we'll be nearing the full release of the game and we hope that you'll give it one more chance once we get there.

review: Crafting and inventorymanagement are way overcomplicated
developer_response: Hi Galba89! We're sorry to see that you were not fond of the game and its mechanics. We understand that the game can have a steeper learning curve and that a tutorial would be greatly beneficial for new players. The game is still in Early access and there are still a lot of features that need to find their way into it. While the in-game manual that you can access by pressing TAB provides explanation for all of its mechanics, we acknowledge that a tutorial would be a better option. We'll make sure to address this as we'll be nearing the full release of the game and we hope that you'll consider giving it another chance once we get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198806286774', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 32510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31051, 'last_played': 1708310988}
review: why gamepires? WHY???? you ruined my favorite game with your need to complicate an already fun game. the reason this game was amazing was the simplicity in it, nobody has the time to deal with real time cooking and broken hordes. if the goal is to lose your entire fanbase then keep it up cause soon there will be no one left
developer_response: Hi e1mago420! We're sorry to see that you were disappointed with the changes introduced in the new patch. The ideas with the horde was to up the challenge and introduce more variety into the moment-to-moment gameplay. We acknowledge that there are certain issues with the hordes and you'll be pleased to know that we have tweaked this system so the puppets are spawning further away from the player. We've also buffed the damage melee weapons deal to puppets, meaning that you'll have a much better chance of survival against them before you manage to get a gun which will greatly help you with dispatching them with ease. Regardless, the team is looking into ways to further tweak various systems that should greatly improve the experience for our players and we hope that you'll give the game another chance eventually.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027982320', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 645, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 526, 'last_played': 1704171003}
review: The zombie group spawns that magically spawn in front of you make this game unplayable.  Even if you manage to kill them all you will succumb to your wounds.  Waste of money.
developer_response: Hi Rican! We're sorry to see that you were disappointed with the game and with the changes introduced in the new patch. We acknowledge that there are certain issues with the puppet spawns after the new update and you'll be pleased to know that we have tweaked this system so the puppets are spawning further away from the player. We've also buffed the damage melee weapons deal to puppets, meaning that you'll have a much better chance of survival against them before you manage to get a gun which will greatly help you with dispatching them with ease. You should also consider running away and retreating from a situation that might be too dangerous to face head on. Regardless, the team is looking into ways to further tweak various systems that should greatly improve the experience for our players and we hope that you'll give the game another chance eventually.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987057254', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1703447321}
review: the world looks pretty good, and the mechanics seem sound until you can create and host a serve to add true co-op this gets a no from me. it is presented as something it is not and that is a coop game
developer_response: Hi Rabide! We're sorry to see that you were disappointed by the game and that you felt misled. You can definitely play co-op by entering the same server (official or private) and then getting into a squad with your teammate, but you cannot host your private game without renting a server first. The team is focused on bringing the game to its full 1.0 release and rolling out the slated improvements and features. After that, we will be able to divert our focus onto other features that our community requests the most. Until then, we really hope that you'll give the game one more chance or when we exit Early access.

author: {'steamid': '76561198988080499', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 36224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 5485, 'playtime_at_review': 13570, 'last_played': 1712498399}
review:
Nach dem ich erfahren habe das es für den Solomodus auch den Admin Helper gibt, muss ich meine erste Rezension überarbeiten. der Admin Helper macht den einstieg in das Game deutlich einfacher. Wobei man sagen muss, dass man es mit dem Admin Helper nicht übertreiben sollte, um sich den Spielespaß nicht zu verderben. Man Spawnt sich eine  erste Grundausstattung und vielleicht eine erste kleine Basis als HQ. Man sollte die Anpassungen an seine Karte nur wenig verändern. So ist gewährleistet das man eine gesundes Verhältnis zu seiner Umwelt behält. Mit diesem Hintergrund kann ich das Game weiter Empfehlen. Ohne den Admin Helper rate ich nach wie vor vom kauf ab. Hier kann das Gameplay bei den Spielern für zu große Frustration führen. 

After I found out that the Admin Helper is also available for solo mode, I have to revise my first review. The Admin Helper makes getting started with the game much easier. It has to be said that you shouldn't overdo it with the Admin Helper so as not to spoil the fun of the game. You spawn your first basic equipment and perhaps your first small base as your HQ. You should only change the adjustments to your card a little. This ensures that you maintain a healthy relationship with your environment. With this background, I can recommend the game. Without the Admin Helper I still advise against purchasing. Here the gameplay can lead to great frustration among players.

Kleiner Nachtrag. Wie man sieht hat meine Rezension einen Clown Preis bekommen. Ich habe festgestellt das auch andere Spieler die das Game Positiv Bewertet haben einen solchen Preis bekommen haben. Ich gehe also davon aus das es sich um einen Frustrierten Spieler handelt der mit dem Game nicht zu recht gekommen ist. Ich für meinen Teil habe mich über die Extra Punkte sehr gefreut.  Also, anstatt deine Punkte für Unsinnige Preise auszugeben, solltest du lieber lernen wie man ein Game richtig spielt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198182263811', 'num_games_owned': 33, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4069, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4069, 'last_played': 1703434334}
review:
Really enjoyed the time i spent on this game apart from a few major issues which made me uninstall the game:- 

I enjoy looting and base building a lot but when you spend literally days worth of hours looting and then die (by puppets) you EXPECT your loot to be there on your body when you return.... i got to my body about 2 min later and ALL of my kit bugged out and i lost it all after spending around 10 hours looting today. I played a VERY low pop server and during my 70 hours of playing i did not see one guy so i know it bugged out and not looted. On top of this, you lose about 100 fame points which in themselves took 30-40 hours to get. 

Other frustrating things are time spent being exhausted when there is a complete lack of other transport (cars, city bikes, dirt bikes, boats) etc after 70 hours i could not find one god dam city bike tyre, a boat or a mountain bike ! lastly, why do i have to wait 10 - 15 minutes to cook a dam meal ? 

its just overall a bit to much and it just makes me feel like i have better things to do with my time.......
developer_response: Hi TEALETEAM! We're sorry for the inconvenience and frustration this situation has caused for you. We're aware of the issue and are working to fix it as soon as possible. The game is still in Early access and such issues are unfortunately bound to happen once in a while. Situations like these are the reason the team is committed to bringing the game to its 1.0 release as we'll be making a conscious effort to fix all of these issues that create frustration for our players and hamper their experience with the game. As for the car parts loot, you have to look at specific locations that tend to spawn such items, such as garages. You can help yourself and have a more detailed look at these spawn points on the third party map made by our community - https://scum-map.com/en/ . Again, we're very sorry that you've come across this issue and we hope that you'll give the game another chance once we bring to to its full release eventually.
