author: {'steamid': '76561197976708362', 'num_games_owned': 554, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 6563, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6485, 'last_played': 1700804261}
review:
Spawned in, built some basics, headed off to town.  Got a pistol, ammo, magazine, shotgun etc. at police station.  Loaded up my pistol clip with 45 ACP, put in into my pistol.  Put pistol on hotbar.  Loaded shotgun, put it in the 2 slot.  
A few minutes I come across 5+ puppets that aggro me.  No problem, I hit a few with bow and arrow and pull out the shotgun.  It drops to the ground.  I run around the shotgun trying to grab it while 5 puppets pound on me.  I bail, leave the shotgun and switch to my pistol.  But the pistol is no longer in my hot bar slot.  
I have to manually equip it from my inventory.
Still alive, thank god for the pistol.  Aim down sights, pull the trigger and ... nothing. click click.  As I am running away I realize the pistol clip has literally disappeared along with all the ammo.
This is pretty much a typical experience for me on Scum.  
Then you die and respawn randomly and have to run 1 to 2 hours in real time to get back to your body/base.  Unless it's night then traveling generally ends in death unless you are really prepared.  
Until the developers finally fix all the bugs, network performance issues, poor respawn mechanics, this game is more aggravating then it is fun.
It has a ton of potential but so far these bugs continue to plague every server I visit.  Disappearing items are super frequent.
developer_response: Hi there Alpha ∞ Omega! We're sorry to see that you've experienced a bug that severely undermined your time in the game and we'd like to thank you for the extensive review. The bug you've mentioned is known and we're working to fix it, along with a host of other known issues that are present and we'll aim to get those ironed out once we fully release the game. Until then, we'd like to kindly ask you for more patience and express our hope that you'll give the game another chance eventually.

author: {'steamid': '76561198370340466', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 61802, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59397, 'last_played': 1707024755}
review:
游戏很好玩 属于较硬核丧尸沙盒游戏 其本身的新陈代谢与属性系统使游戏入门的门槛较高 就抢鲜体验版本内容比较充实 对于单机党游戏后期 缺乏新鲜感 可能会让有些玩家感到有些乏味 游戏团队不断推出新的更新内容和功能 修复已知问题 优化游戏体验 但更新比较慢
如果您是一位游戏爱好者 不妨尝试一下这款充满挑战和乐趣的游戏

author: {'steamid': '76561198364261340', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1700819797}
review: Bought this game really excited to try it after seeing a lot on it and couldn't even get it to load. I know have the specs and the wifi to run it but every time i go to join a game it says network lost. I've tried everything i can think of and have looked all on the internet from deleting the files to the game. The game looks cool and i respect that you are still adding things to it but you need learn how to fix the basic problems of the game if you cant even load the game whats the point of all the jack o lanterns and junk you add.
developer_response: Hello Hazardous1026! We're sorry to see that you've been experiencing technical issues with the game and that those left you discouraged from it. If the issues are still present and you would be kind enough to give the game another chance, we'd like to kindly direct you towards our support team at https://support.scumgame.com/ who will do everything they can to assist you with this issue and hopefully help you fix it.

review:
Habe das Spiel wieder neu entdeckt, der aktuelle Stand ist bis dato sehr empfehlenswert. Die geplanten (Er-)Neuerungen könnten dieses Spiel zum besten Spiel dieser Art machen. Egal ob Solo- oder Multiplayer, PVE oder PVP, hier kommt jeder auf seine Kosten.
Die Entwickler sind sind mit Herz dabei und hören auf die Spieler. Wenn endlich der Mod Support kommt, sind dem Spiel so gut wie keine Grenzen mehr gesetzt - klare Empfehlung!

author: {'steamid': '76561198366459939', 'num_games_owned': 127, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 8542, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8519, 'last_played': 1700955146}
review:
If you ask me what I prefer: It is SCUM and not DayZ. Come on man, just look at the difference e.g. in the combat system against the zombies in SCUM vs. DayZ. DayZ charges for content like the Livonia map. And what else will it be in the future? SCUM is free content. (Don't count skins please). SCUM is less expensive than DayZ. DayZ is played because of the nostalgia, so people ignore everything else and give it a positive review regardless, or if there really are people who like it... whatever. SCUM is new, more interesting, less buggy, 3 times more things to do, better graphics, every update is rich and more frequent than in DayZ.  
Just Djude! What else can I say? Open your eyes! 
The thing is, I've played both games, for both I payed (Also for Livonia). I can tell you which game is more attractive at the moment. DayZ is developed since 2013. And a look at how the game still does not work, even after all this time... SCUM is 5 years ahead of DayZ. And in general, it is better in every way + IT'S IN EARLY ACCESS. You still not playing full game! Can you believe this fact?

author: {'steamid': '76561198864149844', 'num_games_owned': 145, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 49288, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 4469, 'playtime_at_review': 9892, 'last_played': 1712491783}
review:
"Scum" - это многопользовательская онлайн-игра в жанре потных и толстых мужчин. Главной особенностью "Scum" является фокус на реализме и выживании. С барета вам знатно дадут просратся в B2 и высать последние нервные кледки при взломе сундука с трусами. Основные задачи включают в себя поиск пиздюлей для стабильности, создание саной коробки из палок под названием "база", борьбу с враждебными чёпиксами и другими млекопитаающиеми серверов. Оптимизация в "Scum" находится на той же стадии, что и античит - отсутствует нахуй! 
Хотя игра все еще находится в раннем доступе, она уже завоевала моё сердце, благодаря своей уникальной концепции и отличной реализации потери моего времени. "Scum" - это отличный выбор для тех, кто ищет выживание в жестком и реалистичном многопользовательском мире, отдельный респект тележкам.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125186393', 'num_games_owned': 302, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 25546, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 37, 'playtime_at_review': 13495, 'last_played': 1711478190}
review:
Welcome, Welcome Welcome :-)
Fordernder Einstieg in das Game. Nach einer gewissen Einspiel zeit und viel Geduld wird es Solo aber noch mehr mit Freunden, zu einem fantastischen Survival Game.
Viel verschiedener Loot (Kleidung, Gegenstände,Waffen auf Privaten Servern), gute und teils lustige Ideen der Entwickler machen es zu einem richtigen Zeitfresser.
Es gibt viele unterschiedliche Möglichkeiten Scum zu spielen, also ist für jeden etwas dabei (PVP/PVE).
Kleine Macken, wie bei jedem Survival Spiel gibt es immer, diese sind aber nicht Spiel entscheidend.
Die Welt ist sehr groß (mit verschiedenen Fahrzeugen zu bereisen), wunderschön gestaltete Landschaften mit verschiedenen Klimazonen und deren Auswirkungen.
Top -> Die Radios spielen Musik für jeden Geschmack, macht den Basebau und die Fahrten wesentlich angenehmer :-)
Klare Kaufempfehlung!

Polecam, dobra gra. Slavic Power.

review:
O jogo é muito completo!!! Desde a saúde do personagem, com dados que vão desde aos níveis de vitaminas no corpo até o tratamento de infecções e outras patologias.
Jogue SOLO, ou em servidores PVE, PVP...
A temática sobrevivência é fantástica, muitas coisas para cuidar para não morrer de fome, sede ou doente...
Enfim, um baita jogo!

author: {'steamid': '76561197979295651', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 8712, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8711, 'last_played': 1701292673}
review: too difficult to pick up and put down survival elements of the game are good but it's just too difficult to really enjoy when you lose everything when you die. you will waste hours playing before you get anywhere. Single player game has no story mode it's just survival but what for?...
developer_response: Hey there BertBert! We're sorry to see that your time with the game was less than satisfactory. We acknowledge the predicament you've found yourself in - the game can be punishing for new players that play solo and on official servers. The loot is also more scarce, meaning that unfortunate encounters with zombies can results in either a quick or a slow death. We advise that you try playing on private servers where some settings are modified and may better cater to your playstyle (e.g. fewer puppets, more loot, no Sentries, etc.) To top it off, we just want to emphasize that the game is still in Early access and that we still have a lot of work ahead of us with all the content additions that will come before and with the full release of the game, as well as a multitude of improvements to the existing systems and mechanics. All that being said, we really hope that you'll give the game another chance eventually since you've expressed that you have an affinity for the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967324714', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1136, 'last_played': 1700842373}
review:
Richtig cooles Spiel, wäre da nicht der Fakt, dass die Zombies immer in den ungünstigsten Situationen neben einem spawnen.  Beim letzten Mal habe ich gerade ein Wohnhaus komplett von Zombies befreit als mich beim Wundenpflegen ein "Neuzombie" von hinten attackiert hat. Und natürlich hat der mir so derbe eingeschenkt, dass ich binnen weniger Sekunden tot war. Und der eigene Neuspawn ist dann ja ganz woanders, wodurch man wieder von vorne beginnt (Steinmesser, Holzspeer, einfacher Bogen,...). Nach ein paar Stunden macht das einfach keinen Spaß mehr. Da hat man endlich raus, wie das mit dem Craften und Heilen gedacht ist, da stirbt man dann immer an so einem Mist.
Oder Zombies die halb im Boden festzustecken scheinen. Manchmal stecken sie wirklich fest. Andere Male greifen sie doch unerwartet an. Aber damit kann man ja glücklicherweise umgehen, da man das sieht.
Es gibt aber auch tolle Momente: so stand ich mit sehr wenig Munition auf dem Hallendach einer Militäranlage und unter mir um die 20 aufgebrachte Zombies. Dazwischen ein Zombie mit Bombengürtel Das war schon cool, alle mit einem Schuß zu erledigen.
Und die Grafik ist auch toll. 
Wenn die Entwickler das mit den Respawns hinkriegen, werde ich mir das nochmal anschauen. Bis dahin Daumen eindeutig runter!

So macht das leider keinen Spaß!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198974170875', 'num_games_owned': 36, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 12957, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10707, 'last_played': 1704237226}
review:
从刚发售基本上就开始玩，因为汉化不全而且一更新就删档所以时长玩的不多但抵不上对scum的喜欢，不管你是跟我一样喜欢pve收集种菜，跟朋友钓鱼，还是喜欢pvp的对决，下地堡打boss抢夺物资，scum做的还不错，能看出来制作组每年的更新变化都是一点一点在完善，但是目前为止好像更偏向地堡以及pvp的更新，多了boss还有火箭筒装甲车等等。
pve养老更新了种植以及重做了烹饪系统这点挺好的，但是感觉打猎还有生存的多样性有些少了，比如在地图规划一片原始森林为玩家提供打猎，制作诱饵，。养老玩家表示很需要

author: {'steamid': '76561198098109336', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 497, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 497, 'last_played': 1700676096}
review:
Scum ist kein Spiel für Anfänger. Es ist einfach unlogisch, dass man als Anfänger den Schwierigkeitsgrad "Experte" zocken muss. Der Spaßfaktor ist sehr sehr schnell auf Minus 100 und Frust macht sich breit. Ich für meinen Teil werde Scum deinstallieren, denn ich habe die Schnauze gestrichen voll davon. Schade ums Geld!

Fahrzeuge fahren? Wo? So weit kommst du als Anfänger gar nicht. Du landest auf der Map, hebst ein paar Steine auf um dir ein Messer zu craften und rumms, haut der erste Zombie, der sich zudem noch lautlos angeschlichen hat,  dir eine. Ergebnis: Du blutest und hast rein gar nichts, um diesen Zustand zu ändern. Ergo: Du fängst wieder von vorne an und landest auf der Map und craftest dir ein paar Steine um... den Rest kennt ihr ja.

Scum ist einsteigerfeindlich und das wird sich irgendwann mal rächen.

review: I think this game is good and has a lot of potential however, sometimes I feel as though the prioritization of features in this game has been... weird to say the least. There are a lot of random features implemented that didn't make much sense in a survival game and a lot of re-worked features seemed to break the game rather than make it better. With that being said, I still think it is a fun game and that the developers are trying their best to make the game as good as they possibly can with the help of the community. I don't mind the paid DLC in support of the developers, but I hope game development heads in a more favorable direction.

Scum really is one of a kind. I love it. 
The creators put their heart and soul into this game and it shows.

The satisfaction you get from searching something and finding the ting you really need or something rare, is amazing.
I can't recommend it enough.

author: {'steamid': '76561198126247544', 'num_games_owned': 19, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 7330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5661, 'last_played': 1701930123}
review:
Typical Scum experience:

- Refresh the server list for 30 minutes, trying to find an official server with more than 7/64 on.
- Try the said official server and realize that it will take you weeks upon weeks of playing 6-8 hours per day to acquire the necessary stuff to build a base and acquire some decent gear. 
- Realize that there's a wipe every 30 days, so you can't really reach any meaningful goal without playing the game full time.
- You can get killed and looted while offline too.
- You can die of dehydration, hypothermia, hyperthermia, and hunger while offline too. So, you're forced to play the game if you want to preserve your progress.
- Play for days without getting your hands on a single weapon other than knives, bats, or bows.
- The only way to obtain actual weapons that shoot bullets (and by that I mean pistols and shotguns) is to loot a handful of spots across the map that hold military gear. And which are guarded by massive indestructible mechs that will ruin your day like nothing else. Mess up once, you're dead, lose hours of progress and loot.
- The only way to obtain automatic rifles is via bunker looting, which are notoriously difficult to get into and deadly due to the special puppets inside. Or buy them off traders after you acquire at least 100 fame points, which, given that you'll die quite a lot, should take a month. But by that time wipe comes, so there's no point really.
- Realize that when you die you lose not only what you have on you (loot and gear) but also fame points, which you use to unlock stuff at traders in outposts. Which sets you back hours. Especially when considering that you only have 4 outposts on the entire map and it takes forever to reach one.
- Realize that you're basically playing PVE since you'll probably meet another player once every 3 gaming days. If you're lucky. And you hope to God he isn't a cheater.
- Run into all-Chinese European servers filled with cheaters 
- Quit official servers and go to private ones instead. Admin bans you for asking a question.
- Try another private server. People camping hotspots, so you can't get any loot.
- Try another. Cheater incoming.
- Uninstall.

You're welcome.
developer_response: Hi there AmmuT! Firstly, we'd like to thank you for the extensive and descriptive review  that you've written and we'd like to say that we're sorry to see that your time with the game was less than satisfactory. We understand your position and respect your view of the game. However, there are things that need to be clarified. When you log out of the game, there's a 60-second timer which leaves you in the game. This was implemented to prevent the logout abuse when you are, for instance, in a losing fight. After the 60-second timer, you are completely offline from the server. Also, monthly wipes are necessary to prevent established, long-time players and big teams from absolutely dominating the server, thus making new players unable to establish a footing. However, this does not mean all is well from our side. We acknowledge that new players that play alone tend to have a more challenging time when starting the game, especially when playing on official PvP servers, which are designed to be a really hardcore survival experience. As for the loot, the idea is not to overflow the player with items as we want to retain that feeling of despair as you are frantically looking for food when you are getting more and more hungry. There are players who really enjoy this setup and we lean more towards that approach, with small adjustments being done here and there. Regardless, we don't want to alienate players that don't like this kind of approach toward loot availability, which is why we've added the support for private servers where server owners that modify the amount of loot, number of players, existence of Sentries, number of puppets, etc. We're sorry that you've had such bad experience with cheaters. We're aware of the issue and working to mitigate it as much as possible as we are implementing new systems and workflows that will enable us to tackle the problem more efficiently.  As for the private servers - it seems that you came across some that are not managed properly. There are many servers where players thrive and have loads of fun with the game. Lastly, we can see that you've really gave a lot of chances to the game and we'd like to say that we really appreciate that. Your decision is valid and we respect it. However, we truly hope that you'll give the game another chance in the future and see how the game has improved as we'll be nearing the full release of the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198412359990', 'num_games_owned': 99, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 11438, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11438, 'last_played': 1691836730}
review:
1:shift+r可以看枪内还剩多少子弹（开背包枪的左下角有子弹数量)
shift+e可以开枪上的灯
2：肉可以放在火堆旁烤成熟肉，不用串成肉串
3：ctrl+鼠标滚轮可以旋转背包内物品
4：刚开始的囚犯T恤和裤子可以拆掉+一根绳子做成
一个小背包
5：夜视仪可以用电池组或者手机电池来充电
6：很多物品都要拿在手中才能用，比如：开罐器，
电锯，打火机，火柴，蜡烛
7：小镇一些小房子后面种了很多菜，可以找一找
8：拿着铲子可以把箱子埋起来，PVP尤为重要
9：前期扒丧尸身上的衣服修好穿，丧尸的衣服只能
修到50%，但是前期背包容量不够的情况下还是可
以装一些东西的
10：遇到自爆丧尸的时候只需要躲进房子里，它在外
面过一会就自己炸了
11：前期没有工作台可以去小镇里找，有些工坊里有12：信号弹、烟花、车的大灯可以吸引丧尸，在丧尸没发现你之前，可以用这些东西吸引丧尸
13：喝完的水瓶可以在水并和抽水泵旁边加水
14：武器在打丧尸的时候，第三下会连续打两次，可
以用这个技巧秒丧尸
15：武器配件是可以自己做的，消音器，简易连接配
件，都可以做
16，人物捏脸时胸和JJ调到最小会给额外的0.6分配
点数
17：遇到高达可以跑到他的侧面或后面，它看不到你18:15把挂锁可以做成一个优质锁，PVE或PVP时把锁拖到箱子上或者门和车上可以锁住
19：酒不要喝太多，尤其是老爹苦艾酒和草本利口
酒，喝多了会死
20：心绞痛的时候别跑步，会猝死
21：被丧尸打了要扎绷带，没流血也要扎，流血是二级病症，被打一下是一级病症 别扎赃绷带！！！没药没酒没救啦！！!
22：：载具按J是车载音响，按X是开灯
23：负重高的时候不要下水，会沉下去嘎了
24：出现恶性高温直接脱衣服，大多数时候是衣服
穿多了
25：遇到熊就左右走位，熊的攻击方式只有往前
扑，扑过来往左或往右走一下就躲开了
26： ctrl+右键切换瞄具
27：骨头可以切成骨针
28:提前准备好满子弹的弹匣，按r可以直接换上，避
免打着打着突然没子弹
29：带着软管在加油站旁边可以直接给车加油，不用
一桶一桶的加
30:吉他、口琴、还有dlc的口哨都有谱子可以弹奏
去网上搜然后学一学
31:乐器按键的qwertyuio对应乐谱上的123456789
32：大部分布做的衣服都可以撕成布条治疗伤口，但
个别的衣服比如：口罩，面罩，手套等不可以撕

author: {'steamid': '76561198418397120', 'num_games_owned': 218, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 72782, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 442, 'playtime_at_review': 62460, 'last_played': 1712439437}
review:
Dieses Spiel hat in seiner Entwicklung Höhen und Tiefen erlebt!

Begonnen hat meine Reise in einer früheren Version. Es wurde viele neue Dinge in das Spiel gebracht, es wurde immer besser und auch die Bewertungen und Spielerzahlen stiegen an. Urplötzlich hatten die Entwickler die Idee alle Fahrzeuge aus dem Spiel zu nehmen. Im Gegenzug erhielt man ein einziges verbuggtes Fahrzeug. Gleichzeitig kam die Übernahme des Studios durch - meiner Meinung nach - einen eher dubiosen Publisher. Mein Vertrauen sank und die Bewertungen purzelten, genauso wie die Spielerzahlen. 

Ja man bekam im gleichen Update das "Modulare Fahrzeuge-Update", allerdings ganz klarer Streitpunkt: Wieso hat Gamepires nicht erst zumindest einen Fahrzeugtypen in das neue System integriert, ehe das Update kam. So fühlte sich das Spiel rückschrittlich an. Und jetzt in 1-2 Wochen erst kommt das nächste Fahrzeug. Wahrscheinlich NUR der PickupTruck. Weiterhin fehlen: Wasserflugzeug, Motorrad, ATV, SUV, Herstellbare "Rafts" und ein Speedboot. Im Spiel ist bereits das "Holzboot", welches aber nicht das neue System nutzt; genau wie die Schubkarre. Zum neuen Fahrzeugsystem war auch angekündigt, dass man Fahrzeuge mit erweiterten Tanks, Lagerplatz, Verteidigungen ausstatten kann, was auch komplett fehlt bisher. Dieses Update hat meiner Meinung nach das Spiel und den Entwicklungsprozess extrem verlangsamt. Es fühlt sich alles nicht fertig und sehr langwierig an im Moment. Es kommt kaum Spielspaß auf, da man alles schon mal gesehen hat.
Trotz all der Negativität war und ist das "Modular Vehicles - Update" eine riesengroße Bereicherung!

Genug genörgelt:

1. Was bietet SCUM

Alles was man sich nur für ein Survival-Spiel wünscht. Manch einer sagt zu viel, ich sage: Immer noch zu wenig

2. Öffentlichkeit Gamepires

In der Regel arbeitet Gamepires sehr nach dem Interesse der Community. Es gibt Umfragen (Auf Twitter/X) Oft werden Sneak Peaks veröffentlicht. Screenshots, Videos, Concept Arts. Soweit ich weiß gibt es einmal im Jahr ein (RL) Community Event. Außerdem hält sich Gamepires an eine mehr oder weniger öffentliche RoadMap. So weiß man mindestens immer was man im nächsten Update zu erwarten hat. 
Alles wurde meist gut kommuniziert. MEIST DA dass Fahrzeugupdate auf dieser Ebene eine Katastrophe war und auch die Übernahme Gamepires durch JAGEX sehr plötzlich war. 

3. Zustand des Spiels

(0.9) 
Funktioniert einwandfrei, aber man merkt den EA Status des Spiels. Teilweise existieren Bugs existieren seit langer Zeit, wenn nicht sogar schon seit release. Diese werden aber erst mit der 1.0 Version gefixed laut Entwickler.
Z.b. Puppet (Zombie) basierte Bugs werden nicht/kaum behoben, da ein komplettes Rework der NPCs bevorsteht (1.0) Warum sollten sie also Zeit und Ressourcen dafür "verschwenden"! Ergibt Sinn!

4. Updates

Updates kommen regelmäßig, unregelmäßig. Gamepires nennt kein Datum und arbeitet je nach Zustand des Updates mal Sonntags mal an Feiertagen. Mal bis in die Nacht und ziemlich sicher auch die ein oder andere Nacht durch. Nachdem ein Update released wurde gab es bisher IMMER ausnahmslos innerhalb von 24h (meist früher) einen Patch der die wichtigsten Bugs sofort behebt. Nicht viele Entwickler lieben ihr Spiel so sehr wie Gamepires. 

5. Bewertung

---{ Graphics }---
☑ You forget what reality is
☑ Beautiful
☐ Good
☐ Decent
☐ Bad
☐ Don‘t look too long at it
☐ MS-DOS

-> Einen Titel hat Scum bereits. Schönstes Survival Spiel!

---{ Gameplay }---

-> Scum ist ein SurvivalSpiel. Looten. Ausrüstung verbessern. Noch mehr looten. Oh nein das Essen ist leer. looten. Mir fehlt dieses Fahrzeugteil. Looten. Oh nein meine Ausrüstung ist kaputt. Looten. Jetzt muss ich eine Base bauen. Looten und Bäume fällen. Looten. Tank ist leer. Zur Tankstelle. Geld ist leer. Looten. Zum Händler. Loot verkaufen. Zur tankstelle zurücklaufen. Auto tanken. Heimfahren. Looten. Langsam hätte ich gerne eine bessere Waffe. Looten. Ich habe eine Infktion. Looten. Hoffe ihr habt das Gameplay verstanden.

Kann natürlich mit RolePlay oder Quests (die übrigens auch noch ins Spiel kommen sollen) aufgewertet werden, wer es brauacht oder mag.

---{ PC Requirements }---

---{ Grind }---

Serverabhängig! Meine Präferenz: Es ist ein SurvivalSpiel!

---{ Story }---

6. FAZIT

SCUM hat Potential zum besten Survival Spiel zu werden und das ist es auch meiner Meinung nach bereits jetz.
Es gibt Memes und Insider zwischen Community und Entwickler. Mehr dazu gibt es bald ;) Soontm!
Umfragen und eine Einbeziehung der Community. Interviews von den Entwicklern durch Streamer, wo fragen gestellt werden können. Alles in allem eine große Familie mit allem was dazu gehört. Höhen und Tiefen.

Wer Interesse an der Entwicklung des Spiels hat. Twitter @dedapong @scumgame 
Dort könnt ihr euch Sneak Peaks zur neuen Version abholen. Und wer nicht so gut auf Englisch unterwegs ist: @scumworldde ist die deutsche Community. Dauert natürlich immer (je nach dringlichkeit) bis zu einem Tag bis alles übersetzt wurde. Man kannauch tomislav (@dedapong) auf twitter schreiben sollte man fragen oder ideen haben. Außerdem natürlich auf dem offiziellen Scum-Discord (https://discord.gg/scum) wo es einen eigenen Bereich für ideen aus der community gibt. scumworldde besitzt natprlich auch einen eigenen Discord Kanal.

Die 0.95 steht in den Startlöchern und SCUM ist im SALE also worauf wartest du noch!

author: {'steamid': '76561199508945502', 'num_games_owned': 98, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 52310, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 5283, 'playtime_at_review': 26532, 'last_played': 1712470160}
review:
Was kann man aktuell zu SCUM sagen?

Eines der ausführlichsten Survival Spiele die es aktuell auf dem Markt gibt. Als Gefangener auf einer Insel, gefährdet durch Zombies, Mechs und andere Spieler (online).

Achte auf deine Körperliche Konstitution, Vitamine und Gesundheit. Jage, koche, pflanze an und bastel aus einfachsten Materialien deinen ersten Bogen oder das erste Messer.

Das Spiel befindet sich noch im Early Access, wodurch bei eingreifenden Patches auf Servern Dinge verloren gehen können, aber hey.. so ist das nun mal. Es soll noch eine so einiges kommen und vor allem auch eine aufschlussreichere Geschichte. 

Die vielen Menüs können zu beginn etwas erschlagend wirken, aber mit ein wenig Eingewöhnungszeit kommt man relativ schnell mit ihnen klar.

Für mich eines der besten Survival Games und eine klare Kaufempfehlung. 

Eine ausführlichere Rezension wird es geben, sobald die 1.0 veröffentlicht wird. Denn wer weiß, was wirklich bis dahin noch umgesetzt und verändert wird.

author: {'steamid': '76561199570374478', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 31245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3690, 'last_played': 1706626682}
review:
《SCUM》是一款多人生存类游戏，它将玩家置于一个开放的世界中，让他们在面对各种困难和威胁时学会生存。游戏中玩家可以打猎，建造避难所，制造工具和武器，并与其他玩家协作或竞争。
体验感方面，《SCUM》的游戏性能一般，但是它的生存元素和战略性较强，可以为玩家提供较为挑战的游戏体验。它还具有较为真实的物品系统，让玩家可以尝试各种各样的生存方式。
 不过，《SCUM》也有一些缺点。最严重的问题就是外挂，尤其在官服中，这个需要加强反作弊才行。还有游戏的故事背景和角色建模都相对简单，而且有时候玩家也会遇到一些技术问题。
总的来说，《SCUM》是一款值得一试的生存游戏，希望更多玩家喜欢它！

review: It's still in the early stages of development, so bugs are to be expected. However, the game is enjoyable to play. If you prefer to avoid the stress of player-versus-player (PVP) interactions, you have the option to create your own Player versus Environment (PVE) server, especially ideal for playing with friends. author: {'steamid': '76561198901369914', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 203236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 194238, 'last_played': 1710679002}
review:
2023 год. Игра не отпускает уже два года. Да - где-то сыровато, да - где-то нет оптимизации, да - лагает и глючит. Но это игра очень атмосферна и обаятельна. Разработчики не сидят на месте и постоянно, что-то доделывают и обновляют. Иногда эти обновления и переделки не всем нравятся, но все равно в игру продолжают играть.
Игра ещё далека от идеала, но у нее очень большие перспективы на будущее.
Любителям выживания или пвп контента с пострелушками - крайне рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198204580079', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 24870, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2922, 'last_played': 1707971173}
review:
Recent Updates have more less finished what I wanted originally. It's actually gotten EVEN more depth than before, pretty amazing game if you like open world survival. 

Joining a server that has the map split in half for PvE AND PvP with Major Point of Interest also being pvp focused, really scratched that Tarkov itch I've had. I feel like it's better, it is it's own thing now for sure. 
Open world Horror survival, with depth involving Nutrition. 
Very daunting with Survival when you start, once you get the idea that fresh foods are generally better then junk and pressing Ctrl every now and then to see what nutrient it you need/can get, you'll get the hang of it pretty quickly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123485908', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 160429, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 150128, 'last_played': 1709576348}
review:
I have been playing this game since 0.4 with just over 2500 hours and let me tell ya:

If u're thinking of buying it... please DON'T !!

If u're thinking they will improve it...the chances are SLIM at best. They add clothes, charms, weapon camos, and my "favorite" a supporter pack that allows you to have a watch and tell the in-game time...but you have to take off all your upper body clothes to see it and tell the time (ridiculous), instead of fixing bugs and making it worth your time.
There are bugs that have been there ever since i started playing and have YET to be addressed.  Most of my friends quit it long ago, but i kept playing because i was stupid enough to trust them and keep a positive attitude. There is nothing you can do in this game except get geared and kill some zombies and that's just about it. Every time anybody asks anything about some upcoming "feature", the answer is always "soon".
Everything they implement is so untested and so unbalanced, it makes you wonder. (u got hand abrasions after cutting down 3 trees, shoes got completely destroyed after walking 3 km, and i won't even start on the metabolism, etc). In some cases you have to wait 1 week or maybe 2 for any changes to take effect.
For 40 Euros, it's a slap in the face to everyone who buys it. It's not worth more than 5 Euros and in about 30 hours of play time u've pretty much exhausted everything the game has to offer. If u're realistic enough, it doesn't deserve the Mostly Positive reviews it has...not by a long shot.
They have redesigned the same features (vehicles, metabolism, to name a few ) twice or maybe 3 times over instead of dealing with bugs. 
At the rate things are going, it will never get out of beta and you will pay 40 Euros to be their game tester....it had so much potential and they threw it out the window. So much so that it feels like it is actually mocking us.

It does offer nice graphics and weapon design....but that's just about it...
Sadly this game is going nowhere and my guess is it will eventually lose all its player base.
I'm not going to stick around, that's for sure. 

Be safe, have fun, and if u chose to buy make sure u try everything out before the refund time expires. (i don't know if it still happens but a while back if u quit the game to desktop, the game would still somehow run in the background and if u're not careful your refund period will be long over.) I don't know if they did that on purpose so the game remains purchased, but if they did that's a sneaky thing to do. Make sure u check the Task Manager after u quit it, just to be sure.


Safe travels.
developer_response: Hi there HACKMAN! First off, we'd like to thank you for supporting and enjoying the game for as long as you have (and being the last of your group to stick with the game) and we'd like to say that we're sorry to see you disheartened with it. We completely understand the position you're in. Being with the game for so long and seeing that some of the issues persist is frustrating and even we can share a part of that sentiment. If we could wave a magic wand and remove all the issues that are present with the game, we'd definitely do so because we want these bugs to be fixed as much as you do. However, we have an imperative to release the game and exit Early access and deliver the content that we have planned. It's a balancing act between actively working on new features and fixing and polishing existing ones. Sometimes we're doing good in this regard, and sometimes the weight is tipped on one or the other side. Be that as it may - one thing is for certain and we can address immediately, which is actually the most important gripe you have with the game and which encompasses almost all other issues - the bugs, the missing features, the much needed improvements, the  - and that is the question whether we'll ever finish the game and exit Early access. Without a shadow of a doubt, we can confirm that the game is definitely on track to fully release in the near future. We cannot say when exactly, but if you've followed our dev updates, you'll see that we are slowly, but surely approaching towards our end goal. We have an immense amount of work ahead of us, but we're more than motivated to deliver on the core promise of the game and to deliver a feature-complete and polished experience (with as few bugs as possible) and we can't wait for our community to experience what we have in stock. We completely understand your decision to stop playing the game even though it saddens us greatly, but we'd be overjoyed if you'd return once we get the things that bothered you the most sorted out and give SCUM one more chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198186552969', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 59647, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1612, 'playtime_at_review': 40095, 'last_played': 1712281967}
review:
So I've had this game for a while and now all the sudden I don't own the game per their new EULA?

Game is amazing and I've got quite a few hours of game play but this just breaks my trust on the developers/publisher. I won't lease any other games from Jagex or Gamepires. This will be the first and last time I buy something in beta and then get stolen from my paid property. I get you develop the game buy if I pay for something I belive it should be mine until the end of time. I believe and banning players doing wrong things and messing the community but this is proposterous.

"We licence the use of the software to you on the basis of this Licence. We do not sell the software to you and we remain owners of the software at all times."

I recommend the game if you don't mind not owning your stuff and paying for something that they can remove your license at any time when ever they feel like it.
developer_response: Hi there G_Athlon! We'd like to dispel some misconceptions and provide some clarity on this matter. The quote that you've put here is standard for all software purchases and digital distribution of goods - be it games, apps, or anything else that comes in digital form. In specific terms, once you've bought SCUM on Steam, you did not buy the rights to own the entire SCUM intellectual property, but a digital license to play it and that is why these points are always present in EULA documents. You are free to check out the same documents for other games or any media you own in digital form and you will find the same. Hope this clears it up a bit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048892749', 'num_games_owned': 52, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 98097, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97281, 'last_played': 1707401320}
review:
A játék évekkel ezelött igen igéretesen indult. Sőt forradalminak volt mondható. De valahogy az évek alatt nem oda és abba az irányba fejlődött amit igértek. Eleinte négyszer nagyobb mapot igértek amiből semmi nem lett. Igértek küldetés rendszert, sztori módot. Eleinte volt is benne nagyon alap küldetés, amit nemrég kivettek. Látszólag a küldetéseket törölték. Ami nagyon nagy csalódás számomra. A másik probléma hogy a zombik képesek a falakon is átmenni igen gyakran. Ez a hiba az elejétől fogva meg van és a készitőket mintha egyáltalán nem érdekelné. Eléggé zavaró hogy ki-be mászkálnak a falakon át...
Összességében sokat fejlődött a játék, de tele rakták értelmetlen marhaságokkal ahelyett ami fontos lett volna. Amit igértek abból se sok minden valósúlt meg. Legalább is számomra. Szóval ha most kéne dönteni a megvásárlásáról, nem biztos hogy megvenném.

review: Esta muy bien el juego, tienes pesca, caza, construcción, comida y ZOMBIES. Es un juego ideal para estar con amigos, construir una base e ir a investigar en bunkers secretos y alguno asta peligrosos, teniendo que ir equipado con armamento adecuado y equipación corporal adecuadas (yo uso un arco sencillo y la ropa que me encuentre), la única pega es el tema de la caza, es muy aburrido y estresante a la vez, pero por lo demás, es una muy buena inversión.

developer_response: Hi there Ja4xt! We're sorry to see that you were disappointed with the game. There are still some bugs present in the game and we're sorry if they caused inconvenience for you. You'll be pleased to know that the team is hard at work on bringing as many fixes to the game as possible, as well as improving the overall experience through various updates and enhancements. While you are currently discouraged from the game, we hope that you'll give it another chance once we fully release the game and exit Early access.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112792086', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 30565, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30565, 'last_played': 1700319122}
review:
В игре все шикарно, графика отличная, карта красивая, крафт шикарный, выживалка отличная, в ней все хорошо кроме одного. В игру с шансом 50% нельзя будет поиграть, потому что не получиться подключится не на один сервер, пинг 60 - Подключится не удалось, пинг 100 - Подключится не удалось, пинг 150 - Подключится не удалось, и такая шляпа на 98% серверов, просто не заходит, взять Rust, отлично заходит на любой сервер, практически с любым пингом.
В общем игру не особо рекомендую пока разработчики свои жопы не поднимут и не устранят эту херню

We really hope to see you back in the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198273077033', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 267, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1701613672}
review:
whats the fun in being killed in few or in tens of minutes ? idiotic. No intruductions, explanations of how or what to do.. if not some yt video, which is the reason i bought it, I wouldnt knew about how to make the knife, cut clothes.. and thats about it. LOL.. few hits from some rotten zombie and the guy cant handle anymore,lol, and the ONLY place where I could find some gun is ofc where they are ! :D bare knuckles just dont do.. bow ?  idk how to make one in this game.. dont want to look for video to learn from someone else how to do it.. game has to intruduce me to it. if not, ITS USELESS.
Ohh, and eveythying I pick up, magically disappears somewhere :D , some items dont even have an option to pick up, just to take into hands..  with them stones, one time i can craft large axe head, and 20 other times I only can do knife or small axe..got some sticks and on..thought will make something, I go into inventory and its empty..  I bet 60-70% of ppl that got this game quits it just because of that. theres just no intruduction into the game or how to play it.. :(
developer_response: Hi there MrDRE! We're sorry to see that your experience was marred because of a lack of tutorial. We understand and acknowledge that the game might have a steeper learning curve which can prove insurmountable for some new player. You'll be pleased to know that we will be addressing this through the new patch as we'll be introducing great improvements to the crafting and UI, as well as a manual that will outline and explain the functionalities of all the game's mechanics. Looking at the situation you've experienced, it seems that you would have greatly benefited from such additions, which is why we hope you'll give the game another try as we'll be releasing this new patch quite soon!

author: {'steamid': '76561199251306990', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 24292, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 21, 'playtime_at_review': 20634, 'last_played': 1712008707}
review: This is the best and worst game ever created. Never have I known glory quite like this before! The rush of the fight. The sound of bullets whistling by my ears. The spray of my enemies blood in the air. Tales of adventure await you and your companions. But be weary. For you too shall experience the darkest machinations of humanity in this arena. I recall the feeling of betrayal when I attempted to befriend a lone traveler. A feeling only describable as being face to face with your lovers Sancho. We broke bread together. He spoke of his family and his children. He earned my trust. But he was not alone as I had thought. If you are to travel do not travel alone. Keep your eyes open for you're never truly safe anywhere. Don't trust anyone but those you hold nearest to your heart. And if you come across a man by the gamer tag Chum Lee, do me a favor. Put a bullet right between his eyes.

review: MR FUCKING BRENNER YOU ASSHOLES IS INVINCIBLE, what a bunch of dheads for adding something that cant die, small arms to explosives are worthless
developer_response: Hey there SPC IHDE! The idea behind Mr. Brenner was to create an enemy that could not be defeated, making the abandoned bunkers an even more challenging and rewarding experience. Also, you can avoid him altogether by being quiet and stealthing through the abandoned bunker, which will not alert him and make your run much easier. We don't know whether you are playing solo or with a team, but safety in numbers is something that is definitely applicable in this situation, as well as the the one that ''preparation is half the victory''. Stock yourself up with weapons, armor, and health items and you should be good to go. If things go south, a tactical retreat is always an option. Hope these tips help you with the abandoned bunkers.

review:
Bom, é um jogo de 69 conquistas  ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Mas enfim, é um jogo bom, porém tem muito o que melhorar ainda, tirando o fato que o boneco é duro ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) , mas sim amigo, é um fato, o boneco se movimenta parecendo um boneco de gesso pelo mapa, então é aquilo, voce realmente consegue gostar do jogo se vc se esforçar, porem como eu disse, a ideia é boa, e bela ideia em sí não tinha como errar, porem o jogo tem muitas melhorias a serem feitas, eu particularmente não pretendo voltar pro jogo até que façam uma atualização massiva, pois o jogo ja lançou a muito tempo atrás, e até hj n tivemos uma atualização massiva que realmente trouxe grandes mudanças pro game a ponto de fazer o pessoal voltar a jogar, levando em consideração que é um jogo extremamente mal otimizado, então vc tem que ter pelo menos um pc decente pra tentar jogar ele, pois no meu pc antigo, rodava a maioria dos jogos com uma boa qualidade, e esse maldito não rodava bem, então é isso ai.

review: Разработчики убили игру.. нагрузили её не нужными и глупыми механиками, вместо того чтобы оптимизировать её, они её усложнили, дали зомбам мозги, которые теперь не просто зомби, а организованная структура по раздачи звездюлей, с возможностью вызвать подмогу и достать тебя где угодно, они научились залазить в окна  и ломать двери.. я знаю что разработчики не увидят это сообщение.. но всё-же, попрошу вас, добавьте кооп оффлайн режим, хотя-бы на 4 человека,УМОЛЯЮ, чтобы можно было спокойно изучать игру без страха потерять прогресс и лут. ( можно даже для отдельного персонажа, который будет даваться чисто для оффлайн режима, чтобы нельзя было прокаченным зайти на сервер, а играть чисто в локалке.)

author: {'steamid': '76561197995282543', 'num_games_owned': 782, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 42957, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42957, 'last_played': 1673044411}
review:
First of all let me say that I would prefer a "neutral" rating at this stage of development, but that is not supported, so I acknowledge this as a game that many will enjoy, but do not personally recommend it at this time.

SCUM has a lot of impressive features and without doubt some players love it.  It doesn't upset me that I disagree with numerous design choices in the evolution of the game since I bought it.  SCUM was one of many games I bought because of encouragement of friends that wanted me to join them, and having kept my eye on it since first release I knew at the outset that for me it was a gamble.

Pretty soon those friends dropped out and I went on learn the hard way, playing quite a bit of solo, mostly on survival servers with little pvp apart from hosted events.  Scavenging, crafting, building, surviving puppets and animals was a good pastime now and then. 

The game world is intricate and varied.  It can be beautiful in some ways, yet you are not surviving in an idyllic world such as some central European woodland campground of DayZ for instance.  The island terrain is rough and challenging and you can seldom just bee-line from point A to point B.  Like many elements in SCUM you need to be focused and willing to master many skills to be effective.  This relatively hard core survival challenge is something that SCUM does better than most any other single game at this time.

When raft crafting and sailing became functional they worked great and became one of my favorite features in solo play, so when the rafts were removed for the modular vehicle re-work (and possibly water physics updates?) I was disappointed.  For a long time I kept checking updates until I lost confidence that there was an effective plan and execution.

I've got loads of early access experience in many games and SCUM has actually been one of the better ones.  In time I will likely try it again.  Meanwhile I find the game traders and economy system quirky and not enjoyable.  I was subscribed to Luthais way back in Miscreated and recommend him for players who are serious about SCUM.  He hosts some good servers too.

I respect that some friends and others are unhappy with the development and sale of numerous DLC during early access.   To me that's not a big deal as long as they continue to develop in good faith.  At least they are not "pay to win" items as far as I can see.  The supporter pack is comparable except for the wristwatch.  It is not "cosmetic only" since you can use it to tell time within the game UI when others cannot.

As a budget gamer that paid at or near full price just to jump in and play with friends I never could bring myself to donate extra for the watch when I remain on the fence about the game and many players have bought SCUM for 50%.  If I'm mistaken about the watch I welcome a dev response, otherwise please add some form of this feature for all players.

I will update my review in the future based upon subsequent game play experience.
developer_response: Hello Valka! First off, we'd like to thank you for taking the time to write this lengthy review and for being an avid player and supporter of the game for this long, and for continuing to enjoy the game even after your friends dropped out. The decision to remove certain vehicles to ensure the stability of the game was one of the hardest we had to make and we were heartbroken to see our players unable to use some of the more beloved features such as the raft. We'd like you to know that the team here is committed to returning the content that was cut and to add even more of it. As for the other big issue you've mentioned, we'd like to emphasize that the watch, while it has the functionality of showing the in-game time, is not something that can bring drastic (if any) advantage to those that have them. You can discern the approximate time of day by watching the position of the sun in the sky during the day. Nighttime is a different story, but by no means would we call it 'pay to win'. All that being said, we'd like to reiterate that we are poised to fully release the game with a myriad of improvements and content additions in the near future and we hope you'll join us again and give the game one more chance.

author: {'steamid': '76561198825222410', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 11899, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7748, 'last_played': 1701012275}
review: 这妥妥的一个傻逼游戏，刚开始玩觉得很傻逼，对新手极不友好，就算你玩到后期也很容易被游戏机制整崩溃，角色的生存能力太弱了，没错，这游戏就是折磨人的存在，不断让你死亡重来，你之前搜刮的所有物资全部消失，心血全部白费，不管是PVE还是PVP,都会让你累积的所有心血付诸东流，就算你是老手也很容易被小怪嘎掉，那种失落感会让你特别难受，还有游戏的完成度和BUG也很多，很多互动动作很拖沓不流畅，或者干脆就没有动作，被怪物按倒在地你突然又站起来了，我真的大跌眼球，去年买了个表，傻逼开饭组

review: Game is in "Early access", which means it is not complete. There is DLC for this incomplete game. That alone is a problem.
developer_response: Hello zavabia! We're sorry to see that the existence of DLC's diminished your experience with the game. We understand the connotations that come with them, but we want to clarify that they were added at the behest of our beloved community as a means of additional support for the game. They are cosmetic-only in nature and do not influence gameplay and do not impede the overall development of the game in no way. We hope that this provides some much needed clarity and that you will give the game another chance once we exit Early access and fully release the game in the foreseeable future.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987701326', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 1049, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1032, 'last_played': 1700025587}
review: It's just so boring...Maybe it was made with multiplayer in mind? But I don't play anything but solo. Any game that has PVP is going to have nothing but cheaters or people who play so much and just destroy you, but playing solo is just boring as hell. Get ready to see "nothing found" since every single place you go to has nothing in it, it's been in early access too long to really seem like there's nothing here. Good idea's I guess but it's always "whats being worked on" and not "here's some content".
developer_response: Hey HashSlingingSlasher! We're sorry to see that your time with the game has been disappointing for you. We admit that players that come in teams have a much easier time surviving and can engage more frequently and easily in more challenging aspects of the game - such as looting bunkers. We'd like to recommend that you try a variety of servers (both official and unofficial) that have modified settings such as greater loot drops, more/less puppets, etc. We acknowledge your concern and would like to emphasize that we plan to have quest-like content added before the full release of the game that will cater towards players that want to play solo. That being said, we hope that you'll give the game one more chance once we fully release it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198173252653', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 180, 'last_played': 1699889287}
review:
Very janky like IF pubg + seven days to die had a baby.... horrible HORRIBLE , tons of public assets too that look horribly ported, textures look low quality even with the highest possible settings. 

Combat IS very janky, animations look super janky, movement feels like pubg + even more arcade combination.

Devs don't care about the game only bug fixes that don't change the game at all.

WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!!!!! very disappointing. 
also most servers are ( PVE+PVP)  so you can't find much on here.
developer_response: Hello smelonka, we're sorry to see that you were disappointed with the game. We'd like to emphasize that the game is still in Early access and that we are working day in and day out on improving it in virtually all aspects - visuals included. We understand the frustration that some of the fixes for certain issues in the game are coming at a somewhat slower pace and we regret to see that you've conflated that with our supposed negligence for the game, because that can't be farther from the truth. The team is extremely motivated to finish the game and deliver on the core vision that the game set out for itself - to be the best hardcore survival experience. While it seems that it is highly unlikely that you will be returning to the game any time soon, we'd like to regardless invite you to give the game another chance once we exit Early access and fully release the game and see for yourself how the game has improved.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105961849', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 53728, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48752, 'last_played': 1702530855}
review:
One of the best survival games on Steam!
+Plenty of things to do, to stay busy
+ PVP is fun
+ Base building
+ Cooking
+ True survival game
+ Fun with teammates 

- Farming can be tough / tedious
- Your stuff is not safe, unless you build a Meta Base
- Lock Picking can be tough for new players
- your base will be raided, go to youtube and find a good base build
- dying can be rough, but that's why we play

Now this game does have a learning curve! The veterans of this game, will school you with no mercy! but learn from your mistakes and try again! Soon your base design and pvp will do well vs the Alpha tribes, and your group will be a factor! have fun scumming!

author: {'steamid': '76561197994568347', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 96044, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 3580, 'playtime_at_review': 76115, 'last_played': 1712500074}
review:
Solid core gameplay, appeals mostly to veterans. New players beware, the game is constantly upping the difficulty and mechanics it will take a while to get used to the controls especially the crafting interface.

One especially annoying aspect is that with the new vehicle updates transportation is very difficult to come by. I hope in the future there are more craftable vehicles such as bicycles.

By no means is this a perfect game but it does have many strengths such as the combat and sound. The loot is difficult to come by and solo players may have a difficult time finding what they need in a pinch (antibiotics especially).

author: {'steamid': '76561198409500431', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 391, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 391, 'last_played': 1699823205}
review: This could have been such a nice game if only there were not so many issues. sounds are so uneven from walking that sounds like a 3 out of 10 , running 4 out of 10 then suddenly when you rummage through garbage or a car its a 10 out of 10. lol. then theres the health issue where you get to the ground and build your bow and make a spear then head on into the town only 30 mters away and you will begin dying of hunger. dying. hahaha. this reminds me a bit of DAYZ except this is worse. at least in DAYZ you can hear the zombies across the street and know where they are. the reaction time of your character is crazy as well compared to the national team athleticism of the zombies.
developer_response: Hey there slicky1_1! We're sorry to see that you were disappointed with the game and some of its functionalities. There are a lot of improvements that will be done as we'll be nearing the full release of the game, which includes sound among a myriad of other things. We're not sure what you were referring to when you mentioned dying of hunger because you entered a town. That might be something that you would want to contact our support team at https://support.scumgame.com/ as it sounds like a bug the way you've described it. That being said, we hope you'll give the game another chance when we get there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198158579290', 'num_games_owned': 50, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 13650, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 1015, 'playtime_at_review': 7347, 'last_played': 1712490871}
review:
В игре нет ничего позитивного, раньше до ребаланса лута, и так всё с ним было скверно,можно было целую плантацию пробежать, и не найти даже самой ссаной кукурузы, щас и вовсе ходишь с голой жопой. Это пол беды, разработчик вкинувшись тяжелыми веществами, добавил роботов практически на каждую божую военку,в огромном количестве, то как на взлётке 4 робота асфальт охраняют, это вообще цирк. Что касаемо самих бункеров, играя даже в одиночке с кодами,с фулл комплектом шмота,брони и тд, в лучшей экипировке, зомби тебе дают просраться,только в путь. играть самому не-воз-мож-но. Ты умираешь от голода,ты умираешь от зомби,ты умираешь от роботов,ты умираешь от других игроков, единственное спасение, это серваки с икс сколько-то лута. Игра просто невыносимо сложная, и даёт ноль позитивных эмоций, с каждой обновой,разраб вбивает игрока в грязь всё сильнее и сильнее.

Из положительного в игре, красивый,проработанный мир(с одинаковыми домами расставленными там тут по принципу копипаста), красивая графика, большой мир,много механик.

author: {'steamid': '76561198965964611', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 56, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1680495840}
review: game has trash graphics and mechanics. Can't even shift sprint have to use middle mouse scroll to control sprint/sprint speed.
developer_response: Hello there ZealousMind!  Sorry to see that the game is not to your liking. The sprint button is assigned to the mouse wheel because there are three types of movement speed (walking, jogging and running). Because stamina and the health system are so vital for the game, it is important to have an easy way to manage your stamina when moving through the world so that you know you have enough when, for example, you might get attacked by a horde of puppets. Regardless, the game is still in Early access and there are a lot of changes and improvements that are to be implemented and we hope that you'll give the game at least another shot when we fully release.

author: {'steamid': '76561198425764311', 'num_games_owned': 63, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 13971, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3706, 'last_played': 1705901992}
review:
没人能说清楚来源是什么，或许是云层中迸发了一滴血色眼泪，如夏天细微的雨水般，滴落进他转动的眼眶里，或许也归功于大自然演变动物迁徙，新的文明。

睁开眼的下一秒，就是血色世界。

我被梦里的那双血红眼睛吓了一大跳，醒来时无意识踢到了旁边大妈脚底下放着的锅，弄出了很大的响声，“咚~~~~”引得乘客回头齐刷刷看我一眼，旁边大妈更是狠狠瞪我一眼，把脚底下的锅挪了个位置，我有些无语，心想大热天这老阿姨没事cos锅姨干嘛，面上有些害羞的故作萌态道，“骚瑞阿，阿姨人家不是故意的啦~”说完飞速下了站。

两百米以外的学校，保安室空无一人。
“什么情况，你们这是集体逃课啦？”

“快跑啊别进来”

“阿豪快看！卧槽好多美眉的睡衣秀，学校什么时候开始搞cosplay了阿！妹子你怎么咬我耳朵！！”

“同学请问你需要帮助么~啊！！--”

无数种声音几乎是同时响起，校门内校门外，乱哄哄的。

外围的人好奇里面发生了什么，里面的人恐慌着想要跑出来，再往前走几步，几百米的世界是一片猩红，地上碎落的，草坪上挂着的或许是人的残肢，我说不清那具体是什么，空气中淡淡的血腥味已经弥漫开来，地上随处脱落的大批人体毛发，跪坐在地上不断干呕的同学，失神盯着前一秒变异的丧尸蹒跚走来，奔跑中撞到他人没有回头的同学，因被撞跌入丧尸怀抱而被紧紧抱住的同学，下一秒又是被掠夺的生命...

很多时候，我都以为我会按部就班经历普通人的一生，也没有什么不好，毕竟这是多数人的选择，但经历过地震演习消防训练的我们始终不知道如果有天大厦覆灭，无人引导，我们又该何去何从？

大家都在疯狂往外跑，蜷曲的地面，凌乱倒地的路障，鲜红的太阳映照在每一个人身上。人流涌动，无数张脸上呈现出统一的焦急不安惊慌失措，或许谁也不知道该去哪里，回家么？内心在这刻疯狂祈求亲人团聚。似乎只要远离这一处人间炼狱就是安全的。但是很快我们发现附近的交通也因涌出来的大量人群和零星丧尸瘫痪了，车辆拥堵在路上。

写《巴黎圣母院》的雨果老师说，当命运递给我们一个酸的柠檬时，让我们设法把它制造成甜的柠檬汁。雨果老师告诉了我们，当一个人面临倒了八辈子血霉的艰难处境时，他应该有的正确态度。

但他就是没告诉我方法。

可乐很快溢了出来，我回神问旁边的女生淼淼要了张餐巾纸。在爆发丧尸后我第一时间冲进了小卖部，一起过来的还有几位跑得快的聪明b，进来后第一件事就是把门锁上。李跳跳顺手拧开一瓶汽水，晶莹的汗珠顺着他的脖颈下滑然后不见。

“这辈子没跑这么快过呼~~”

“可累死我了哎-”小胖瘫坐在地上粗喘着气，大学时候体测最后一名也在生死时候爆发出了潜力，又像是想起什么掏出手机拨打电话。

“接电话啊...求你了求你了为什么没人接....”

“喂？妈！”

我蹲在角落里，手机亮起又暗下，通话无人接听。手机上是我发的最后一条讯息，等我来找你们。旁边的小胖狠狠咬着面包，眼眶有些微红，只是死死盯着手机一言不发。不必刻意搜索，我们也发现了每个人手机短信上的推送，各地突发不明原因咬人，请大家呆在家里或者安全区不要外出。除此以外，也就给不出什么有用的消息了。

“你们看，酷安论坛在两天前给出了消息”

说话的是计算机系矮小的男生寒歌，虽然是我们社团的，但他很少会主动和人聊天，见大家都围过来看，不自然的脸红了一下解释道

“我记得以前都需要内网环境才可以登录，但不知道为什么，现在居然成了唯一可以与外界联系的论坛。”

几双眼睛继续随着他手指的滑动往下看，是个很奇怪的视频。那人倒在地上一动不动，记不清过了多久，赫然以不正常的角度竖直了身体，胯骨那边缺了一大块，混合着皮肉，怪恶心的。
下面是那位博主的言论，他说这是他朋友转发给他的，这不是疫情，是丧尸爆发了，提醒大家好好呆在家里屯够足够的水和食物。前几楼以开玩笑角度提出传播途径很有可能是因为楼主的言论，也有因为这个认真分析做好准备的，也有说被丧尸咬了会觉醒超能力么。下面的评论清一色的最新楼，大多数是后悔今天才看到的，也有少数人暗骂他怎么不更早说。更多的是问zf会有办法清理么，我们要相信国家。那个人显然已经注销了账号，最后一次登录IP并不在国内。

我们用布和柜台划分一小块区域，用来解决上厕所，只是食物的消耗还有水资源有限不能用于洗澡的问题，还是让我们肉眼可见的消愁下来。

“我想去找我爸妈”

淼淼求助式的看向她的男友，男友潘德成不自然的躲避了她的视线，辩解道

“我们现在出去肯定是找死，谁知道现在丧尸有多少，而且国家都说了让我们好好呆在安全区”

眼见女孩眼睛起了雾气，欧派上下浮动的厉害，他舔了舔干涩的唇，又好似安慰的哄道“你要相信国家，他们不是还有军队么，镇压丧尸很快的”，说完借着拥抱狠狠感受了一下女孩的柔软。

“没人知道会在这里呆多久，食物总有要吃完的一天，到那时候要怎么办呢”李跳跳打断了脆弱男的话，似乎在嘲讽淼淼这么找了个这么没用的垃圾色批男。

“你行你去啊！不还在这躲着”潘德成脸上怂但语气气势十足。

卷帘门再次被敲响，门外的人急急想要拉开门，是女孩的声音，众人默契的安静下来。

”有人在么？开门啊“

一下又一下的敲门声彷佛敲在所有人的心里，淼淼很显然有些犹豫，

”你们几个人？有没有人受伤？丧尸离多远？“寒歌问道

”两个女生，没有人受伤“寒歌目测了一下补给，又推算了双方人数占比，潘德成见他要开门，急切道”我们也不知道要呆多久，还要放两个人进来蹭吃蹭喝？“

”这本来也不是我们的，让我们的两个妹子检查一下她们有没有说谎就好了“

”只要没被丧尸咬过就在可控范围内，即使咬过也可以先绑起来，问完情况异变了直接帮她们了结就好了”寒哥掏出了sm绳，小胖眼角抽了抽，权当没看到是某电影同款牌子束缚绳。

“何况末日里情报很重要，我们需要她们了解外界如何了“

”开门吧“

在场众人都表了态，寒歌一锤定音，也就潘德成一个不赞同，卷帘门拉开又迅速合上。

我和淼淼一人查一个，男生们齐齐转头没有再看我们。检查完以后众人松了一口气，寒歌拿了两瓶汽水还有面包，递给她们,"外界现在是什么情况？”

女孩帮更小的那个拧瓶盖，舔了舔干涩的嘴唇，”一路上有十几只丧尸在游荡，我看到有男生打了他们脑袋，他们就爬不起来了，不知道有没有死。我跑的很快，上学时候拿过各种奖。“

又继续说”事发的时候我正带着妹妹在新街口商场，不知道为什么前面很吵闹，停着几辆警车还有120，隔的太远我们没有看见到底发生了什么，猜测是有人被撞了，妹妹也在这时候哭闹着拉着我别去，说要回家。我当时感觉心脏跳的厉害，想要打电话给老板请假，却在这时接到了父母的电话。“

她快速眨了眨泛红的双眼，看着妹妹柔声道”后来交通瘫痪，我抱着妹妹跑，出来太久我们没有带食物，妹妹饿坏了，大超市里面的人不愿意放我们进去，妹妹拉着我来到了巷子里“她脸上浮现一抹红晕，怀中的小女孩狡黠的看我们一眼。

新街口靠近市区，如果那里也沦陷了，每个人脸上都是不安。一天一夜的疲惫过后，再加上小卖部并没有充电设备，我们用收音机听到了国家已经建立了安全区，最近的大概离我们25公里，建议我们去安全区躲避，只是没人能知道自己是否能活着去那里。我们蜷缩在角落里，本是天之骄子却经历这场巨变。

“我受不了了，我要出门！被咬了我就自杀”

“你要出门么，我跟着你走”

潘德成虽然有些不情愿，但碍于淼淼，还是同意了。我们一行8个人，出发前用胶带和拆下来的纸板把胳膊大腿全身上下都覆盖了，确保只有脑袋露在外面。我们试图把凳子拆下来，但似乎只能用锯子才行。所以武器嘛，由于并不是五金店，每个人拿的都很奇怪，但也勉强可以当作武器吧。我扛着拖把小心翼翼跟着他们出了门。

衣衫褴褛的中年男大叔丧尸神情呆滞向我走来，如果忽略掉落的肉块的话，或许也能称之为吴彦祖吧，我用拖把狠狠打他脑壳上，没想到力气太小，他迷惑的看我一眼，又嘶吼着向我扑来，我脚一下子有些软了，没想到李跳跳一把拉开了我，随手把凳子砸大叔脑壳上，狠狠一记重锤，一下又一下，大叔倒地了，脚还像下水的牛蛙一样神经抽搐...我看到他脸上溅到了丧尸的血液，黑乎乎的，掏出纸帮他擦了一下，他有些脸红的看着我。

“上车！快走！！”寒歌不知道什么时候从车库里偷来了车，我和李跳跳迅速上了车，却发现车里只有潘德成淼淼还有那两个女生。

“小胖呢？”

“我没注意到车库那边有个丧尸，小胖为了救我，用身体推开了。”寒歌一边说，握着方向盘的手有些抖，“他说他父母都不在了”

我们一时之间都没有说话，沉默下来，想起很久前，小胖也是计算机系的开心果，甚至于很多男生都会用他的代码来表白，寒歌一向和他形影不离，这要怎么受得了。

我们没有走大道，卫星地图失灵，李跳跳是本地人，他知道有些隐蔽的小路怎么走，我们绕过市区，来到了树林里。

路不太好开，而且也快没油了，我们下了车

author: {'steamid': '76561198328518879', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 8697, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 110, 'playtime_at_review': 8587, 'last_played': 1711312898}
review:
no es de los mejores juegos que he jugado, pero tampoco de los peores.

Pros:
+devs todo el tiempo trabajando, mejorando, y metiendo contenido
+realismo al 100% en todo
+simulacion en absolutamente todo, como en repackear cargadores, o curarte
+la incorporacion de algo tan simple como la disenteria o vomitos, o desmayos

Contras:
-el no poder modificar el terreno
-no poder simplificar un poco el tema de build bassment
-la falta de un tutorial/modo historia
-bugs boludos
-no poder derribar a los Ghekos
-la "escases" de armas, te lleva como 2 horas encontrar un arma funcional y operativa
-el no poder hostear un sv dedicado, y que solamente sea pago
-la falta de mods/workshop. este juego en modo ROLEPLAY seria una genialidad


no se va GOTY, pero se acerca bastante. le queda mucho para hacer, mas alla de que los devs laburen todo el timepo en el game

review:
SCUM rentre dans  le TOP 3 des meilleurs jeux SURVIVAL !
Complet, graphiquement top, très réaliste, super en groupe ...
Oui il reste encore des bug a droite a gauche , mais très rare !
Après avoir testé beaucoup de survival , je ne comprend pas pourquoi il ne figure pas en haut de l'affiche car il mérite vraiment d’être connu et reconnu par les vrais joueurs ( pas les gamers du dimanche qui passent leur temps a chialer et vouloir le best en 1 heure de jeu).
Prenez le temps d'apprendre à jouer, comprendre le fonctionnement du jeu et vous prendrez un vrai plaisir à y jouer !

author: {'steamid': '76561198037684017', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 12952, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 344, 'playtime_at_review': 11697, 'last_played': 1711769013}
review:
Als Freund von Survival-Spielen bin ich absolut begeistert von SCUM.

Der Einstieg ist am Anfang hard, da man vermutlich dann doch den einen oder anderen Neustart (nachdem man gekillt wurde) hinlegen muss. 
Das sollte man aber auch als Entwicklungsphase und Entdeckungstour einstufen. Schliesslich ist es ja auch ein Survival Spiel.
Wenn man sich mit dem, Am Anfang komplex Wirkenden, Stoffwechsel, Tools zum Gesund werden und die richtige Anfängerwaffe angefreundet hat geht man aber auch schnell mit grossen Schritten in den Genuss sich ein schönes Reich aufbauen zu können.
Mich begeistert aktuell auch der Umfang an Gegenständen und die vielzahl an Bauoptionen in dem Spiel. Da es sich aktuell, auch nach so vielen Jahren im Early-Acces-Status befindet, kommt auch noch einiges. 
Das das Spiel immer noch intensiv weiter entwicklelt wird zeigt mir auch das sich diese Perle im Bereich der Survival-Games sogar noch verbessern wird. Updates kommen aktuell wöchentlich.
Viele negativ aufgeführten Punkte aus vergangenen Rezensionen sind inzwischen sogar Geschichte. Stellenweise merkt man natürlich noch die unvollendung des Spieles, jedoch sollte man nicht vergessen das die Entwickler den Status Early Access nicht umsonst so lange stehen lassen.
Die  >Community<  ist riesen groß und der Beitrag dieser nimmt auch Einfluss auf die Weiterentwicklung.

Ich selbst werde noch Stunden im Multiplayer verbringen und bin gespannt auf die nächsten Updates! 
Ob beim entspannten Basebau oder die Erkundung der riesiegen Map. Ein paar Stunden werde ich hier auf jeden Fall noch lassen und geniessen.
